Localization.Gloss: 亚拔他（ya ba tā），《思》阿巴革达。一名太监；亚哈随鲁（薛西斯）王的随从。Abagtha

Terms.Localization: eunuch; servant of king Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 芦苇，蒲草。高而直的植物，生长在河流和沼泽；用来制造轻巧的小船。papyrus, reeds

Terms.Localization: tall straight plant, growing in rivers and marshes (Arundo donax or Cyperus papyrus); used for making light boats

Localization.Gloss: 食槽，饲料槽。木制或石材造成的长形容器，常用来给家畜放食物。manger, crib, feed trough

Terms.Localization: long open container; made of wood or stone; for feeding domestic animals

Localization.Gloss: 西瓜。一种清甜多汁的水果，是埃及尼罗河沿岸一种蔓生植物的果实，很受人们喜爱，可作食物、饮料和药用，包括其种子。melon

Terms.Localization: sweet, juicy fruit, produced by a trailing plant (Citrullus vulgaris) cultivated in Egypt along the river Nile; much appreciated, used for food, drink, and medicine, including the seeds

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《和》亚比（ya bǐ），《思》阿彼雅。撒迦利雅的女儿，亚哈斯的妻子，犹大王希西家的母亲。Abi

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zechariah; wife of Ahaz; mother of Hezekiah; also known as Abijah

Localization.Gloss: 亚比以谢族（ya bǐ yǐ xie zu），《思》阿彼厄则尔。玛拿西的后裔，其宗族进入迦南地时承受产业。Abiezrite

Terms.Localization: member of clan of Abiezer

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚比．亚本（ya bǐ-ya běn），《和》亚比亚本（ya bǐ ya běn），《思》阿彼巴耳。亚拉巴人，大卫的三十勇士之一。Abi-Albon

Terms.Localization: warrior in time of king David; also known as Abiel

Localization.Gloss: 亚别（ya bie），《思》阿彼耳。便雅悯支派人，基士与尼珥的父亲，扫罗的祖父。Abiel

Terms.Localization: father of Kish and Ner, grandfather of king Saul and Abner; from the tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚比（ya bǐ），《思》阿彼巴耳。亚拉巴人，大卫的勇士之一。Abiel

Terms.Localization: warrior in the time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚比亚撒（ya bǐ ya sā），《思》阿彼雅撒夫。利未支派人，可拉的儿子。Abiasaph

Terms.Localization: son of Korah, from the tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《现》爱比该（ai bĭ gāi），《和》亚比该（ya bǐ gāi），《思》阿彼盖耳。迦密族富人拿八的妻子，后来嫁给大卫。Abigail

Terms.Localization: wife of Nabal and later David; spelled Abigal on three occasions

Localization.Gloss: 《现》爱比该（ai bĭ gāi），《和》亚比该（ya bǐ gāi），《思》阿彼盖耳。拿辖的女儿，大卫王的妹子，亚玛撒的母亲。“拿辖”可能是大卫的父亲耶西（Jesse）的别称。Abigail

Terms.Localization: daughter of Nahash, sister of David, wife of Jether the Ishmaelite, mother of Amasa

Localization.Gloss: 亚比但（ya bǐ dan），《思》阿彼丹。基多尼的儿子，摩西在旷野调查人口数目时的便雅悯支派的首领，他也在会幕建成时代表其支派献祭。Abidan

Terms.Localization: son of Gideoni; chief from the tribe of Benjamin at the time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 亚比大（ya bǐ da），《思》阿彼达。米甸的儿子，亚伯拉罕与基土拉的子孙。Abida

Terms.Localization: son of Midian, son of Keturah, wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。便雅悯支派比结之子。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Becher from the tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《和》亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ）。 希斯仑的妻子。Abijah

Terms.Localization: wife of Hezron

Localization.Gloss: 亚比亚（ya bǐ ya），《思》阿彼雅。撒母耳的儿子，与哥哥约珥一同在别是巴作士师。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Samuel

Localization.Gloss: 亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。利未支派人，大卫时代在圣殿供职的第八班次祭司首领。Abijah

Terms.Localization: priest, in charge of a division of priests in the time of David, from the tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。罗波安的儿子，继罗波安登位的南国犹大第二任君王（公元前913-911/10）；又名亚比央。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Rehoboam; king of Judah (913-911/10); also known as Abijam

Localization.Gloss: 亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。耶罗波安的儿子，患病而死。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroboam

Localization.Gloss: 亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。撒迦利雅的女儿，亚哈斯的妻子，犹大王希西家的母亲。Abijah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zechariah, wife of Ahaz, mother of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。被掳后的祭司家族的两位成员，也可能是指两个族名。Abijah

Terms.Localization: priest in the time after exile from the tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。罗波安的儿子，继罗波安登位的南国犹大第二任君王（公元前913-911/10）。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Rehoboam; king of Judah (913-911/10); name also spelled Abijah and also known as Abijam

Localization.Gloss: 亚比户（ya bǐ hu），《思》阿彼胡。以色列大祭司亚伦的次子，担任祭司的职分，因与拿答献上凡火而被神降火烧死。Abihu

Terms.Localization: son of Aaron, priest from the tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚比忽（ya bǐ hū），《思》厄胡得。便雅悯支派人，比拉的儿子。Abihud

Terms.Localization: son of Bela from tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚比孩（ya bǐ hai），《思》阿彼海耳。犹大支派耶拉篾的后裔亚比述的妻子。Abihail

Terms.Localization: wife of Abishur, descendant of Jerahmeel, tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚比孩（ya bǐ hai），《思》阿彼海耳。犹大王罗波安的妻子，耶西儿子以利押的女儿。Abihail

Terms.Localization: daughter of Eliab, son of Jesse

Localization.Gloss: 亚比亥（ya bǐ hai），《思》阿彼海耳。以色列人在旷野时，利未支派米拉利族领袖苏列的父亲。Abihail

Terms.Localization: father of Zuriel from tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚比孩（ya bǐ hai），《思》阿彼海耳。迦得支派户利的儿子。Abihail

Terms.Localization: son of Huri from tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚比亥（ya bǐ hai），《和》亚比孩（ya bǐ hai），《思》阿彼海耳。便雅悯支派人，以斯帖的父亲。Abihail

Terms.Localization: father of Esther from tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚比突（ya bǐ tū），《思》阿彼突布。便雅悯支派人，沙哈连的儿子。Abitub

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim from tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚比她（ya bǐ tā），《思》阿彼塔耳。大卫的妻子，示法提雅的母亲。Abital

Terms.Localization: wife of David, mother of Shephatiah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚比雅（ya bĭ yǎ），《和》亚比央（ya bǐ yāng），《思》阿彼雅。罗波安的儿子，继罗波安登位的南国犹大第二任君王（公元前913-911/10）。Abijam

Terms.Localization: son of Rehoboam; king of Judah (913-911/10); also known as Abijah

Localization.Gloss: 亚比玛利（ya bǐ mǎ li），《思》阿彼玛耳。闪的后裔，法勒的兄弟约坍的儿子。Abimael

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan, descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 亚比米勒（ya bǐ mǐ le），《思》阿彼默肋客。基拉耳地的国王，亚伯拉罕曾骗他说撒拉是妹妹。Abimelech

Terms.Localization: king of Gerar

Localization.Gloss: 亚比米勒（ya bǐ mǐ le），《思》阿彼默肋客。士师基甸的儿子，他杀死兄弟，被立为示剑王（公元前1129-1126）。Abimelech

Terms.Localization: son of Gideon; king of Shechem (1129-1126)

Localization.Gloss: 亚希米勒（ya xī mǐ le），《思》阿希默肋客。利未支派人，亚比亚他的儿子，担任祭司的职分。Abimelech

Terms.Localization: son of Abiathar; priest from tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚比米勒（ya bǐ mǐ le），《思》阿彼默肋客。即非利士人的迦特王“亚吉”。Abimelech

Terms.Localization: Achish, king of Gath?

Localization.Gloss: 亚比拿达（ya bǐ na da），《思》阿彼纳达布。基列耶琳人，非利士人归还耶和华的约柜时曾将约柜置放在他的家中，由他儿子以利亚撒看守约柜。Abinadab

Terms.Localization: man from Kiriath Jearim

Localization.Gloss: 亚比拿达（ya bǐ na da），《思》阿彼纳达布。犹大支派人，耶西的第二子，大卫的兄长。Abinadab

Terms.Localization: son of Jesse; brother of David, from tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚比拿达（ya bǐ na da），《思》阿彼纳达布。便雅悯支派人，扫罗王的儿子。Abinadab

Terms.Localization: son of king Saul from tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚比挪庵（ya bǐ nuo ān），《思》阿彼诺罕。协助女士师底波拉作战的巴拉的父亲。Abinoam

Terms.Localization: father of Barak

Localization.Gloss: 以比雅撒（yǐ bǐ yǎ sā），《思》厄贝雅撒夫／阿彼雅撒夫。利未儿子哥辖的后裔，以利加拿的儿子，亚惜的父亲，希幔的先祖。Ebiasaph

Terms.Localization: son of Elkanah, descendant of Kohath, father of Assir, ancestor of Heman, from tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚比以谢／亚比以谢族（ya bǐ yǐ xie (zu)），《思》阿彼厄责尔。哈摩利吉的儿子；玛拿西的后裔，其宗族进入迦南地时承受产业，民数记的拼写译作“伊以谢”和“伊以谢族”（Jeezer）。Abiezer

Terms.Localization: son of Hammolecheth, ancestor of clan from tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 亚比以谢（ya bǐ yǐ xie），《思》阿彼厄则尔。便雅悯支派的亚拿突人，大卫的三十勇士之一，是九月第九班的班长。Abiezer

Terms.Localization: man from Anatoth, commander in army of king David

Localization.Gloss: 公牛；壮牛；壮马。公马，主要用来运载士兵和拉动战车；字面意思：有能者（见〔2〕）；用于动物时，可以指战马或公牛。上下文通常（但不总是）会提供线索、表明所指是哪一种动物。明确指公牛的经文有：诗50:13、68:31；耶50:11也可能指公牛，虽然有些译本（RSV，TEV，NIV和NAB）译为“stallions”（公马）。bull; stallion

Terms.Localization: male bovine; male horse, mainly used for carrying soldiers and drawing chariots; literally means mighty one (see [2]); when used of animals it may refer to war-horses or to bulls. The context usually, but not always, gives the clue as to which sense is meant. The contexts in which bulls are meant unambiguously are PSA 50:13; 68:31; and probably JER 50:11, although there RSV, TEV, NIV, and NAB translate the word as “stallions”.

Localization.Gloss: 有势力的人；大能者；勇士。有权势或有力量的人，与权力、力量、侵略、战争有关。mighty one

Terms.Localization: a powerful being, associated with power, strength, aggression, warfare

Localization.Gloss: 大能者。上帝的头衔，强调他的大能和他作为雅各及其后裔的上帝的专属性；常常和“雅各的”或“以色列的”连用。mighty one

Terms.Localization: title for Yhwh, stressing his power and exclusivity as the God of Jacob and his descendants; always in combination with "of Jacob" or "of Israel"

Localization.Gloss: 意志坚强；勇敢；顽固。字面意思：心中有力的人决心追求目标，这或是勇敢的表现，或是固执的表现。strong-willed, brave, stubborn

Terms.Localization: literally, mighty of heart person determined to pursue goals, either a sign of bravery or stubbornness

Localization.Gloss: 亚比兰（ya bǐ lan），《思》阿彼兰。吕便支派以利押的儿子，与可拉等人联合攻击摩西，煽动群众叛乱，最后被地吞没而死。Abiram

Terms.Localization: man, son of Eliab, from tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 亚比兰（ya bǐ lan），《思》阿彼兰。伯特利人希伊勒的长子。Abiram

Terms.Localization: son of Hiel

Localization.Gloss: 《现》雅比莎（yǎ bĭ shā），《和》亚比煞（ya bĭ shā），《思》阿彼沙格。书念地的美貌童女，大卫王年老时的侍妾。Abishag

Terms.Localization: concubine of David

Localization.Gloss: 亚比书（ya bǐ shū），《思》阿彼叔亚。利未支派人，亚伦的曾孙，非尼哈的儿子，担任大祭司的职分。Abishua

Terms.Localization: son of Phinehas; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚比书（ya bǐ shū），《思》阿彼叔亚。便雅悯支派人，便雅悯的曾孙，比拉的儿子。Abishua

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚比述（ya bǐ shu），《思》阿彼叔尔。犹大支派人，耶拉篾的后裔，沙买的儿子。Abishur

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚比筛（ya bǐ shāi），《思》阿彼瑟。洗鲁雅的儿子，约押的兄弟，大卫的外甥。他是大卫勇士的首领，曾经建立显赫的战功。Abishai

Terms.Localization: son of Zeruiah, sister of David; warrior; also known as Abshai

Localization.Gloss: 押沙龙（yā shā long），《思》阿贝沙隆。罗波安的妻子玛迦的父亲。Absalom; Abishalom

Terms.Localization: father of Maakah, wife of Rehoboam; also known as Absalom

Localization.Gloss: 亚比亚他（ya bǐ ya tā），《思》厄贝雅塔尔／厄彼雅塔尔。亚希米勒的儿子，亚伦和以利的后裔；大卫时期的祭司。Abiathar

Terms.Localization: son of Ahimelech; priest in the time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚伯（ya bo），《和》亚比拉（ya bǐ lā），《思》阿贝耳。拿弗他利境内，上加利利一设防的边城。可能是“伯玛迦的亚比拉”（即“亚伯伯玛迦”〔Abel-Beth-Maachah〕）的缩写，也许与“亚伯玛音”为同一地点。Abel

Terms.Localization: town in the territory of Naphtali; short name for Abel-Beth-Maacah; also known as Abel-Maim

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚伯．伯．玛迦（ya bo-bo-mǎ jiā），《和》伯．玛迦的亚比拉（bo-mǎ jiā de ya bǐ lā），亚伯．伯．玛迦（ya bo-bo-mǎ jiā），《思》贝特玛阿加的阿贝耳，阿贝耳贝特玛阿加。拿弗他利的一座城；也称为亚比拉和亚伯玛音。Abel-Beth-Maacah

Terms.Localization: town in Naphtali; also known as Abel and Abel-Maim

Localization.Gloss: 《现》什亭谷（shi ting gǔ），《和》亚伯．什亭（ya bo-shi ting），《思》阿贝耳史廷。约旦河东的一城镇，位于摩押平原，以色列人出埃及后安营之地。Abel-Shittim

Terms.Localization: town; east of the Jordan river

Localization.Gloss: 亚备勒．基拉明（ya bei le-jī lā ming），《思》阿贝耳革辣明。亚扪境内的城镇或乡村，耶弗他杀败亚扪人的地方之一，位于现今约旦首都安曼以南不远之处。Abel-Keramim

Terms.Localization: town or village in Ammon

Localization.Gloss: 亚伯．米何拉（ya bo-mǐ he lā），《思》阿贝耳默曷拉。基列地一城镇，位于伯善南面，所罗门所建的十二行政区之一，是先知以利沙的家乡。Abel-Meholah

Terms.Localization: town in Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚伯．伯．玛迦（ya bo-bo-mǎ jiā），《和》亚伯．玛音（ya bo-mǎ yīn），《思》阿贝耳玛因。拿弗他利境内一城镇，亚兰王便哈达所攻破的以色列城镇之一。Abel-Maim

Terms.Localization: town in Naphtali; also known as Abel-Beth-Maacah and Abel

Localization.Gloss: 亚伯．麦西（ya bo-mai xī），《思》阿贝耳米兹辣殷。雅各死后他的儿子们在此地为父痛哭，即“亚达的禾场”，位于约旦河以东，死海之北。Abel-Mizraim

Terms.Localization: a location east of the Jordan

Localization.Gloss: 法码。各种不同大小和重量的石头，通常标上重量，用在天平上已确定所售产品的价格。stone weight

Terms.Localization: stones of various sizes and weights, usually marked with their weights, used on balance scales to determine the price of produce being sold

Localization.Gloss: 宝石。小物件的总称，包含各种因美丽和稀有而被认为珍贵的石头；用作饰物或装饰品；与尊贵、威严和荣耀关联。precious stone

Terms.Localization: generic term for small object consisting of a variety of stone that is considered precious because of its beauty and scarcity; used as ornament or decoration; associated with honor, majesty, and glory

Localization.Gloss: 吕便之子波罕的磐石（lǚ bian zhī zǐ bō hǎn de pan shi），《思》勒乌本人波罕的磐石。犹大和便雅悯的分界标记。Stone of Bohan the son of Reuben

Terms.Localization: a mark of division between Judah and Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《现》蛇岩（she yan），《和》琐希列磐石（suǒ xī lie pan shi），《思》左赫肋特磐石。“蛇岩”：位于隐．罗结附近的标记或地质特征。Serpent’s Stone; Stone of Zoheleth

Terms.Localization: serpent’s stone: marker or geological feature located near En-rogel

Localization.Gloss: 以便以谢（yǐ bian yǐ xie），《思》厄本厄则尔。“帮助之石”：位于示罗和亚弗之间的一块石头，由撒母耳竖立作为纪念碑。Ebenezer

Terms.Localization: stone of help: memorial stone located between Shiloh and Aphek

Localization.Gloss: 制作陶器的轮子，拉坯轮。扁平石轮，下方有尖状凸起物，用来插进一块固定底石的凹口，作为转动的轴心；陶匠使用这种轮子来制作陶器。pottery wheel

Terms.Localization: flat, horizontal wheel made of stone, with a pointed projection on the underside; this projection sat in an indentation on a stationary lower stone and served as an axis around which the upper stone turned; used by a potter for making pottery

Localization.Gloss: 产凳。埃及地所用的接生工具，由两块扁平的石头组成；产妇生产时会坐或跪在其上。birthstool

Terms.Localization: set of two flat objects, made of stone and used in Egypt, on which a woman used to sit or kneel while giving birth

Localization.Gloss: 押尼珥（yā ni ěr），《思》阿贝乃尔。便雅悯人尼珥的儿子，扫罗的堂兄弟与元帅。Abner

Terms.Localization: army commander of Saul, son of Ner from the tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚别（ya bie），《思》厄贝兹。以萨迦支派属地的城镇之一。Ebez

Terms.Localization: town in territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 以比赞（yǐ bǐ zan），《思》依贝赞。伯利恒人，继耶弗他之后，担任以色列人的士师七年。Ibzan

Terms.Localization: judge of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 亚伯拉罕（ya bo lā hǎn），《思》亚巴郎。以色列人的先祖，他拉的儿子，原名“亚伯兰”。他生于吾珥，迁居至迦南。神重申与他所立之约时，给他改名为“亚伯拉罕”。Abraham

Terms.Localization: son of Terah; ancestor of Israel; also known as Abram

Localization.Gloss: 亚伯兰（ya bo lan），《思》亚巴郎。以色列人的先祖，他拉的儿子，后来被神改名为“亚伯拉罕”。Abram

Terms.Localization: son of Terah; ancestor of Israel; later known as Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 押沙龙（yā shā long），《思》阿贝沙隆。大卫和玛迦的儿子。Absalom

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 押沙龙（yā shā long），《思》阿贝沙隆。罗波安的妻子玛迦的父亲。Absalom

Terms.Localization: father of Maacah, who was wife of Rehoboam; also known as Abishalom

Localization.Gloss: 阿伯（ā bo），《思》敖波特。位于以东，在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野的营地之一。Oboth

Terms.Localization: location in Edom along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 亚基（ya jī），《思》厄拉。哈拉人，大卫的勇士沙玛的父亲。Agee

Terms.Localization: father of Shammah, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚甲（ya jiǎ），《思》阿加格。摩西时代一亚玛力王的名字。这个名字可能是亚玛力君王的尊称。Agag

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 亚甲（ya jiǎ），《思》阿加格。扫罗时代一亚玛力王的名字。这个名字可能是亚玛力君王的尊称。Agag

Terms.Localization: king of Amalek

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚甲人 (ya jiǎ ren)，《和》亚甲族（ya jiǎ zu）《思》阿加格人。亚甲的后裔；犹太人的仇敌哈曼所属的民族，所指不详。犹太传统常将民族敌人归为亚玛力族一类（亚甲是亚玛力族君王的尊称），因此这名称可能是指该族为犹太人的敌人。Agagite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Agag

Localization.Gloss: 核桃，坚果；杏树。核桃树；树冠宽阔，叶子鲜绿色呈椭圆，好作遮阳或乘凉之用，还散发出宜人的香味；生长可供食用的坚果，果实由厚外皮包裹，这外皮可以制造一种褐色染料。walnut

Terms.Localization: walnut tree (Juglans regia); has a broad crown and fresh green oval leaves which offer welcome shade and an agreeable fragrance; produces edible nuts, covered by a thick rind which yields a brown dye; other uses include oil, tannin (for leather processing), and wood for furniture.

Localization.Gloss: 亚古珥（ya gǔ ěr），《思》阿古尔。雅基的儿子，是个智者，《箴言》的作者或辑录者之一。Agur

Terms.Localization: a wise man, son of Jakeh

Localization.Gloss: 以基莲（yǐ jī lian），《思》厄革拉因。摩押的城镇之一。Eglaim

Terms.Localization: town in Moab

Localization.Gloss: 灯草，芦苇。茎部柔软的植物，没有叶子，高度 1 米或以下；生在在河边或沼泽地（有多个品种）；燃烧时产生大量烟雾；可以用来制作绳索、垫子、篮子、墙和房屋的隔离物。rush, bulrush

Terms.Localization: plant with flexible stalks, no leaves, a meter (3 feet) or less in height; grows in or by rivers and marshes (various species of Scirpus and Juncus); produces much smoke when burning; used for making rope, mats, baskets, and walls and partitions of homes

Localization.Gloss: 亚德别（ya de bie），《思》阿德贝耳。以实玛利的儿子。Adbeel

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael

Localization.Gloss: 哈达（hā da），《思》哈达得。大卫时代的以东王后裔，后来成为所罗门的敌人。Hadad

Terms.Localization: son or descendant of king of Edom; usually known as Hadad

Localization.Gloss: 易多（yi duō），《思》依多。以斯拉时期的利未支派人，迦西斐雅的首领。Iddo

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 以东（yǐ dōng），《思》厄东。民族，地；以扫及其后裔。Edom

Terms.Localization: people, land; Esau and descendants of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 以东人（yǐ dōng ren），《思》厄东人。以东的后裔或以东地的居民。Edomite

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 亚顿（ya dun），《思》阿丹。巴比伦迦勒底一城镇，首批从此地回归耶路撒冷的人不能证明其宗族谱系是否为以色列人。Addon

Terms.Localization: town in Chaldea

Localization.Gloss: 主，主人，物主。权力在另一个人之上并作其雇主或君主的人。lord, master, owner

Terms.Localization: man who is in a position of authority over someone else as that person's legal owner, employer, or sovereign

Localization.Gloss: 亚多莱音（ya duō lai yīn），《思》阿多兰。犹大王罗波安所修筑的坚固城之一，位于希伯仑的西南方。Adoraim

Terms.Localization: town in Judah

Localization.Gloss: 巨大；大能；威武；强盛；高大；大有威力；尊贵；威严；壮丽；荣美。因某人或某物的美丽、巨大、力量或地位而引起惊叹、敬畏和尊敬。mighty, majestic, noble

Terms.Localization: inspiring awe and respect because of one's beauty, size, strength, or status

Localization.Gloss: 贵族；领导者；君王。做领导的人，或是在社群里，或是在军队中。noble, leader, officer

Terms.Localization: person in a position of leadership, either within the community or within the army

Localization.Gloss: 亚大利雅（ya da li yǎ），《思》阿达里达。哈曼的儿子之一。Adalia

Terms.Localization: son of Haman

Localization.Gloss: 染红。用漂染方式使物件变成红色。to be dyed red

Terms.Localization: to give something a red color by dying it

Localization.Gloss: 亚当（ya dāng），《思》亚当。人类的始祖，希伯来文意思是“人类”。他是神所创造的第一个人；夏娃的丈夫，该隐、亚伯、塞特的父亲。Adam

Terms.Localization: first man, husband of Eve, father of Cain, Abel, and Seth

Localization.Gloss: 亚当城（ya dāng cheng），《思》阿当城。位于约旦河附近，靠近撒拉但的一个地点；在约旦河与雅博河的交汇之处，即现代的达米耶废丘（Telled-Damiyeh）。Adam

Terms.Localization: location near the river Jordan near Zarethan

Localization.Gloss: 人；人类；世人。人类，作为个体或生物的一个种类；与生命的有限性关联。man, human; humankind; human being(s)

Terms.Localization: human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; associated with mortality

Localization.Gloss: 红宝石；红玛瑙。红色的（半）宝石，可能是红宝石或红玛瑙。ruby; carnelian

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone of a red color, possibly ruby or carnelian

Localization.Gloss: 押玛（yā mǎ），《思》阿德玛。迦南地某个平原的五座城之一，位置不详，所多玛和蛾摩拉也在该平原上；可能沉入今日死海的东南隅。Admah

Terms.Localization: one of the 5 cities in the plain which included Sodom and Gomorrah

Localization.Gloss: 亚大玛（ya da mǎ），《思》阿达玛。拿弗他利支派的境内一坚固城镇，位置不详。Adamah

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 亚大米．尼吉（ya da mǐ-ni ji），《思》阿达米乃刻布。拿弗他利支派属地的城镇，位于基尼烈城的西南方，加利利湖的附近。Adami Nekeb

Terms.Localization: town in Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚都冥隘口（ya dōu ming ai kǒu），《和》亚都冥坡（ya dōu ming pō），《思》阿杜明（山坡）。从耶路撒冷往耶利哥途中的一段陡峻的下坡道路，位于犹大支派地业的北界，便雅悯支派地业的南界。Adummim

Terms.Localization: ascent, pass; between Jerusalem and Jericho

Localization.Gloss: 押玛他（yā mǎ tā），《思》阿德玛达。亚哈随鲁王时代，波斯和玛代的七个顾问之一。Admatha

Terms.Localization: adviser to Ahasuerus

Localization.Gloss: 押但（yā dan），《思》阿丹。巴比伦迦勒底一城镇，首批从此地回归耶路撒冷的人不能证明其宗族谱系是否为以色列人。Addan

Terms.Localization: town in Chaldea

Localization.Gloss: 主；主人（仅指上帝）。称呼上帝为主人和主的方式。Lord, Master (only to refer to God)

Terms.Localization: way of addressing God as one's master and lord

Localization.Gloss: 亚多尼．比色（ya duō ni-bǐ se），《思》阿多尼贝则克。士师时期，巴勒斯坦南部比色城的王。Adoni-Bezek

Terms.Localization: king of Bezek; time of the Judges

Localization.Gloss: 亚多尼．洗德（ya duō ni-xǐ de），《思》阿多尼责德克。耶路撒冷的亚摩利王，联合四个迦南王与以色列人争战，被约书亚杀死。Adoni-Zedek

Terms.Localization: king of Jerusalem; time of Joshua

Localization.Gloss: 亚多尼雅（ya duō ni yǎ），《思》阿多尼雅。大卫的第四个儿子。Adonijah

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 亚多尼雅（ya duō ni yǎ），《思》阿多尼雅。被掳归回随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的人之一，在以斯拉记中称为“亚多尼干”（Adonikam）。Adonijah

Terms.Localization: man; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 亚多尼雅（ya duō ni yǎ），《思》阿多尼雅。大卫的第四个儿子。Adonijah

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 亚多尼雅（ya duō ni yǎ），《思》阿多尼雅。利未支派人，受命于犹大王约沙法往各城去教训百姓。Adonijah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 亚多尼干（ya duō ni gān），《思》阿多尼干。被掳归回的犹太人族长之一。Adonikam

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亚多尼兰（ya duō ni lan），《思》阿多尼兰。亚比大的儿子，他是大卫、所罗门、罗波安统治期间， 在以色列王室中掌管苦役的主管。Adoniram

Terms.Localization: son of Abda; official; time of kings David, Solomon, and Rehoboam

Localization.Gloss: 亚达珥（ya da ěr），《思》阿达尔。犹大支派属地南方边境的城镇，位于别是巴的西南方，即“哈萨亚达”（Hazar-addar）。Adar

Terms.Localization: town in Judah; also known as Hazar-Addar

Localization.Gloss: 亚大（ya da），《思》阿达尔。便雅悯支派人，便雅悯的孙子，比拉的儿子。Adar

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin; also referred to as Ard

Localization.Gloss: 亚多兰（ya duō lan），《思》阿多兰。亚比大的儿子，他是大卫、所罗门、罗波安统治期间， 在以色列王室中掌管苦役的主管。“亚多尼兰”的缩略拼写方式。Adoram

Terms.Localization: son of Abda; official; time of kings David and Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亚得米勒（ya de mǐ le），《思》阿德辣默肋客。西法瓦音人所敬拜的神。Adrammelech

Terms.Localization: god of Sepharvaim

Localization.Gloss: 亚得米勒（ya de mǐ le），《思》阿德辣默肋客。亚述王西拿基立的儿子，与兄弟沙利色一同杀害父亲。Adrammelech

Terms.Localization: son of Sennacherib, king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 以得来（yǐ de lai），《思》厄德勒。巴珊王噩住的京城，位于基列的拉末东北。后来归玛拿西支派。Edrei

Terms.Localization: town; Bashan, Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 以得来（yǐ de lai），《思》厄德勒。拿弗他利支派属地的坚固城，可能在加利利地的北部。Edrei

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 爱。感受对某人、某物或某个行为的感情。love

Terms.Localization: to experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

Localization.Gloss: 爱；爱情；喜好。对某人、某物或某个行为的感情。love

Terms.Localization: a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

Localization.Gloss: 阿辖（ā xia），《思》敖哈得。西缅的儿子之一。Ohad

Terms.Localization: son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈瓦（ya hā wǎ），《思》阿哈瓦。地点及河流，位于巴比伦迦勒底地区，不少被掳的犹太人居于此河的附近，确实位置不详。Ahava

Terms.Localization: location and river; Chaldea

Localization.Gloss: 以笏（yǐ hu），《思》厄胡得。便雅悯支派人，基拉的儿子，以色列的士师（主前1316-1236年在位）。Ehud

Terms.Localization: judge of Israel (1316-1236)

Localization.Gloss: 以忽（yǐ hū），《思》厄胡得。便雅悯的后裔，比勒罕的儿子。Ehud

Terms.Localization: son of Bilhan; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 阿黑（ā hēi），《思》敖赫耳。犹大支派米书兰的儿子，所罗巴伯的后裔。Ohel

Terms.Localization: son of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 会幕；圣幕。摩西为了与耶和华会面而搭建的圣会幕，在出33:7有所描述；用来安置约柜和进行宗教活动，包括求问耶和华和献祭。tent of meeting

Terms.Localization: sacred tent set up by Moses for meeting with the Lord, described in EXO 33.7; used for housing the ark of the covenant and for religious activity, including consulting the Lord and bringing offerings

Localization.Gloss: 阿荷拉（ā he lā），《思》敖曷拉。一名女性，《以西结书》用此名象征撒玛利亚；意思是“她的帐幕”。Oholah

Terms.Localization: woman; symbol of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 沉香。一种珍贵的香料，沉香木分泌的浓郁树脂；沉香木是一种高大的树木，高度可达36米，产于东南亚及印度北部；这种芳香的树脂可用作香料及香膏。aloes

Terms.Localization: aromatic resin, from the Aquilaria agallocha (eaglewood), a large tree which may reach a height of 36 m.; native to south-east Asia and northern India; the fragrant resin is used in incense and perfumes.

Localization.Gloss: 亚何利亚伯（ya he li ya bo），《思》敖曷里雅布。但支派人，亚希撒抹的儿子，被摩西差派协助比撒列建造会幕的一个工匠。Oholiab

Terms.Localization: son of Ahisamach; craftsman working on tabernacle; tribe of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 阿荷利巴（ā he li bā），《思》敖曷里巴。一名女性，《以西结书》用此名象征耶路撒冷；意思是“我的帐幕在她里面”。Oholibah

Terms.Localization: woman; symbol of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 阿何利巴玛（ā he li bā mǎ），《思》敖曷里巴玛。亚拿的女儿，以扫的妻子之一。Oholibamah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Anah; wife of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 《现》阿何利巴玛（ā he li bā mǎ），《和》阿何利巴玛／亚何利巴玛（ya he li bā mǎ），《思》敖曷里巴玛。以东的族长之一。Oholibamah

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 沉香。芳香树脂，来自沉香树，一种高大的树，可生长至 36 米高；原产自东南亚和印度北部；这种芳香树脂可用作香料和香水。aloes

Terms.Localization: aromatic resin, from the Aquilaria agallocha (eaglewood), a large tree which may reach a height of 36 m.; native to south-east Asia and northern India; the fragrant resin is used in incense and perfumes.

Localization.Gloss: 亚伦（ya lun），《思》亚郎。利未支派暗兰和约基别的儿子，摩西的哥哥，协助摩西带领以色列人出埃及。在旷野建立会幕后，他成为以色列的首任大祭司。Aaron

Terms.Localization: brother of Moses; first high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 乌益（wū yi），《思》约厄耳。巴尼的子孙，听从以斯拉劝告休弃外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Uel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Bani; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 灵媒，交鬼的，招魂的，通灵者。能与死人的灵魂进行沟通对话的人。spirit; necromancy, necromancer

Terms.Localization: one experienced in communication with the spirits of the dead; or, spirit of the dead

Localization.Gloss: 阿比勒（ā bǐ le），《思》敖彼耳。以实玛利人，大卫时期的官长之一。Obil

Terms.Localization: official; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 乌赛（wū sai），《思》乌斋。尼希米时期巴拉的父亲。Uzai

Terms.Localization: father of Palal; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 乌萨人（wū sa ren），《思》乌匝耳。约坦的儿子；闪的第五代孙乌萨及其后裔的族名。Uzal

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 有祸了，祸哉；完了；糟了，惨了，哀哉。感叹语，表达悲痛和沮丧。woe

Terms.Localization: exclamation expressing grief and dismay

Localization.Gloss: 以未（yǐ wei），《思》厄威。米甸的五王之一。Evi

Terms.Localization: king of Midian

Localization.Gloss: 愚妄，愚昧，愚蠢；无知。愚蠢的人，因为他不敬畏上帝，不愿听取劝告，多言多语，以及不能隐藏自己的脾气。fool

Terms.Localization: person who is regarded as foolish, because of his lack of fear of God, unwillingness to listen to advice, talking too much, and being unable to conceal his temper

Localization.Gloss: 以未．米罗达（yǐ wei-mǐ luo da），《思》厄威耳默洛达客。尼布甲尼撒的儿子，巴比伦新王朝君王（公元前562-560年在位）。Evil-Merodach

Terms.Localization: king of Babylon

Localization.Gloss: 乌莱河（wū lai he），《思》乌来河。河流；位于波斯。Ulai

Terms.Localization: river; Persia

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧，愚蠢，毫无价值，一无是处。愚蠢的，因为不敬畏上帝，不愿听取劝告，多言多语，以及不能隐藏自己的脾气。foolish, worthless, good-for-nothing

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being foolish, because of lack of fear of God, unwillingness to listen to advice, talking too much, and being unable to conceal one's temper

Localization.Gloss: 乌兰（wū lan），《思》乌蓝。玛拿西支派人，毗利施的儿子之一。Ulam

Terms.Localization: son of Peresh; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 乌兰（wū lan），《思》乌蓝。以设的长子，便雅悯家族的族长之一。Ulam

Terms.Localization: son of Eshek; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧；愚蠢；愚妄；愚蒙。被视为愚蠢的状态，因为不敬畏上帝，不愿听取劝告，多言多语，以及不能隐藏自己的脾气。foolishness, folly

Terms.Localization: state of being regarded as foolish, because of lack of fear of God, unwillingness to listen to advice, talking too much, and being unable to conceal one's temper

Localization.Gloss: 阿抹（ā mǒ），《思》敖玛尔。以利法的儿子，以扫的孙子，以东的族长之一。Omar

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 奸恶／毒害／邪恶／罪恶。极大的罪恶和道德败坏，这是某些人的特质，表现在他们的思想、说话和行为中。mischief, evil

Terms.Localization: great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions

Localization.Gloss: 《现》安（城）（ān (cheng)）／希利坡里（城）（xī li pō lǐ (cheng)），《和》安（城）（ān (cheng)）／亚文（ya wen），《思》翁（城）。埃及重要古城之一，位于现今开罗的东北。On

Terms.Localization: town; Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 安（ān），《思》翁。吕便支派比勒的儿子。On

Terms.Localization: son of Peleth; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 阿挪（ā nuo），《思》敖诺。便雅悯人沙麦所建的城镇，位于约帕以东。Ono

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 阿南（ā nan），《思》敖南。西珥的孙子，朔巴第五子，以东地何利人的祖先。Onam

Terms.Localization: son of Shobal, son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 阿南（ā nan），《思》敖南。犹大支派人，耶拉蔑的儿子。Onam

Terms.Localization: son of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 俄南（e nan），《思》敖难。犹大的儿子。Onan

Terms.Localization: son of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 乌法（wū fǎ），《思》敖非尔。盛产黄金之地。Uphaz

Terms.Localization: land

Localization.Gloss: 阿斐（ā fěi）／俄斐（e fěi），《思》敖非尔。闪的第五代孙，约坍的儿子及其后裔的族名和所居之地。Ophir

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan; descendant of Shem; land

Localization.Gloss: 车轮；石磙；碌碡。用来脱粒的车轮（把谷物和稻草分开）；גִּלְגַּל עֲגָלָה。cart wheel

Terms.Localization: wheel of cart used for threshing (separating the grain from the straw); גִּלְגַּל עֲגָלָה

Localization.Gloss: 吾珥（wu ěr），《思》乌尔。古代美索不达米亚南部苏米尔的重要城市，位于幼发拉底河下游，亚伯拉罕的原居地。Ur

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 吾珥（wu ěr），《思》乌尔。大卫的勇士以利法勒的父亲。Ur

Terms.Localization: father of Eliphal, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 畜栏；牛棚；羊圈。谷仓里喂饲牲畜的地方；或：户外饲养家畜的地方，通常是永久性的半圆形围封区域；一般位于房子附近或里面；אֻרְוָה。stall; animal pen

Terms.Localization: (part of a) barn where animals are fed; or, place where domesticated animals are fed outside, often a permanent semi-circular enclosure; usually located near or inside the house; אֻרְוָה

Localization.Gloss: 乌利（wū li），《思》乌黎。犹大支派人，户珥的儿子，比撒列的父亲。Uri

Terms.Localization: father of Bezalel

Localization.Gloss: 乌利（wū li），《思》乌黎。所罗门的官吏基别的父亲。Uri

Terms.Localization: father of Geber, district governor; time of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 乌利（wū li），《思》乌黎。利未支派人，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的圣殿守门者。Uri

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 乌列（wū lie），《思》乌黎耳。利未支派哥辖的后裔，大卫时期一个族长，他哈的儿子。Uriel

Terms.Localization: son of Tahath; descendant of Kohath; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 乌列（wū lie），《思》乌黎耳。基比亚人，罗波安的妻子米该亚的父亲。Uriel

Terms.Localization: father of Micaiah, wife of Rehoboam

Localization.Gloss: 乌利亚（wū li ya），《思》乌黎雅。赫人，大卫忠心的勇士，拔示巴的丈夫。Uriah

Terms.Localization: Hittite; warrior; husband of Bathsheba; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 乌利亚（wū li ya），《思》乌黎雅。犹大王亚哈斯时期的祭司。Uriah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king Ahaz

Localization.Gloss: 乌利亚（wū li ya），《思》乌黎雅／乌利雅。被掳归回后的祭司，米利末的父亲。Uriah

Terms.Localization: father of Meremoth, priest, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 乌利亚（wū li ya），《思》乌黎雅。以斯拉向众人宣读律法时，站在他右边的利未人。Uriah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 乌利亚（wū li ya），《思》乌黎雅。示玛雅的儿子；先知；耶利米时期的人。Uriah

Terms.Localization: son of Shemaiah; prophet; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 神迹。神明的超自然行为，由神明亲自施行或由别人以他的名义施行，目的是展示他的能力和伟大。miraculous sign; miracle

Terms.Localization: supernatural act of a deity, performed by the deity himself or in his name in order to assert his power and greatness

Localization.Gloss: 旗号；标帜。代表和标识一群人的物件；形式可以是一面旗帜，或是一块金属板或木板，上面往往刻有图像（如鹰或狮子）；固定在一根杆子上以便于携带；用于军事和宗教场合。sign, standard, banner

Terms.Localization: object that represents and identifies a group of people; in the form of a flag or a metal or wooden board, often with an image (such as an eagle or lion); attached to a pole so that it can be carried; used in both military and religious contexts.

Localization.Gloss: 记号；证据，纪念品。物件或事件，用来提醒人某事曾经发生，或用来确认某事将会发生。sign, souvenir

Terms.Localization: object or event that is a reminder of something that has happened or a confirmation of something that is yet to happen

Localization.Gloss: 伊斯拜（yī sī bai），《思》厄次拜。大卫的勇士拿莱的父亲。Ezbai

Terms.Localization: father of Naarai, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 牛膝草。一种根部和茎部像灌木的植物，茎很硬而强韧，多分枝，枝子是毛茸茸的，高50 至 80 厘米；在犹太人的洁净礼仪中用作刷子。hyssop, marjoram

Terms.Localization: plant with a shrub-like base and stems which are stiff, many-branched, hairy, and strong, 50-80 cm tall; Origanum syriacum or Majorana syriaca; used by the Jews in the ritual purification process as a sprinkling brush.

Localization.Gloss: 《现》象征，《和》纪念。作为纪念或象征的部分；在坛上的所献的素祭部分，以提醒人们一切都属于上帝。memorial or token portion

Terms.Localization: memorial or token portion; the part of the grain offering that is burnt on the altar as a reminder that all of it belongs to the Lord

Localization.Gloss: 乌羡．舍伊拉（wū xian-she yī lā），《思》乌曾舍厄辣。以法莲的女儿舍伊拉所建筑的地方，在上伯和仑与下伯和仑附近。Uzzen-Sheerah

Terms.Localization: town; built by Sheerah, daughter of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 亚斯纳．他泊（ya sī na-tā bo），《思》阿次诺特大博尔。拿弗他利支派属地的城镇之一，位于他泊山之东麓。Aznoth-Tabor

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 阿斯尼（ā sī ni），《思》敖次尼。迦得的儿子，也叫“以斯本”。Ozni

Terms.Localization: son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 阿斯尼（族）（ā sī ni (zu)），《思》敖次尼（家族）。迦得支派阿斯尼的后裔。Oznite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Ozni; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 亚散尼（ya san ni），《思》阿匝尼雅。被掳归回时期利未支派人耶书亚的父亲，耶书亚是随同尼希米签约遵守上帝律法的人之一。Azaniah

Terms.Localization: father of Jeshua, Levite, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 本地人／当地出生、属于该地的人。native

Terms.Localization: a person who belongs to a particular place by birth

Localization.Gloss: 以斯拉人（yǐ sī lā ren），《思》则辣黑人。犹大支派谢拉的后裔。Ezrahite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 豺。发出悲鸣声的动物；比狐狸大、黄褐色像狗的野生动物，生活在废墟和荒无人烟的地方；与死亡、破坏和毁灭关联。jackal

Terms.Localization: howling creature that produces mournful sounds, probably the jackal (Canis aureus), a yellowish brown dog-like wild animal larger than the fox, found among ruins and in desolate areas; associated with death, destruction, and devastation

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈（ya hā），《思》阿哈布。北国以色列的君王（约公元前874/73-853年在位），暗利之子。Ahab

Terms.Localization: son of Omri; king of Israel (874/73-853)

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈（ya hā），《思》阿哈布。哥赖雅的儿子，耶利米时代的假先知，因说假预言而被耶利米谴责。Ahab

Terms.Localization: false prophet; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈（ya hā），《思》阿哈布。哥赖雅的儿子，耶利米时代的假先知。Ahab

Terms.Localization: false prophet; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 亚办（ya ban），《思》阿赫班。犹大支派人，耶拉篾的后裔，亚比述的儿子。Ahban

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》芦苇，《和》芦荻。生长在尼罗河沿岸、牛吃的一种草。reeds

Terms.Localization: type of grass found on the borders of the Nile, eaten by cattle

Localization.Gloss: 以忽（yǐ hū），《思》厄胡得。便雅悯支派人，乃幔、亚希亚、基拉的父亲。Ehud

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚何亚（ya he ya），《思》阿曷亚。便雅悯支派比拉的儿子。Ahoah

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚合人（ya he ren）／亚哈希人（ya hā xī ren），《思》阿曷亚人。便雅悯支派亚合的后裔。Ahohite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Ahoah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚户买（ya hu mǎi），《思》阿胡买。犹大支派雅哈的儿子。Ahumai

Terms.Localization: son of Jahath; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈斯（ya hā sī），《思》阿哈次。犹大王约坦的儿子，南国犹大的君王（约在公元前732/31-716/5年在位）。Ahaz

Terms.Localization: son of Jotam; king of Judah (732/31-716/15)

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈斯（ya hā sī），《思》阿哈兹。便雅悯支派人，扫罗王的曾孙，米迦的儿子。Ahaz

Terms.Localization: son of Micah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈赛（ya hā sai），《思》阿赫斋。米实利末的儿子，亚玛帅（马赛）的先祖；耶路撒冷的祭司。Ahzai

Terms.Localization: son of Meshillemoth (Meshillemith); ancestor of Amashsai (Maasai), priest

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈谢（ya hā xie），《思》阿哈齐雅。北国以色列的君王（约公元前853-852），亚哈的儿子。Ahaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahab; king of Israel (853-852)

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈谢（ya hā xie），《思》阿哈齐雅。南国犹大的君王（公元前841），约兰的儿子，是亚哈家的女婿。Ahaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Joram; king of Judah (841)

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈谢（ya hā xie），《思》阿哈齐雅。北国以色列的君王（约公元前853-852），亚哈的儿子。Ahaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahab; king of Israel (853-852)

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈谢（ya hā xie），《思》阿哈齐雅。南国犹大的君王（公元前841），约兰的儿子，是亚哈家的女婿。Ahaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Joram; king of Judah (841)

Localization.Gloss: 亚户撒（ya hu sā），《思》阿胡仓。犹大支派亚施户的儿子。Ahuzzam

Terms.Localization: son of Ashhur; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚户撒（ya hu sā），《思》阿胡匝特。基拉耳王亚比米勒的顾问，曾与以撒订盟。Ahuzzath

Terms.Localization: adviser to Abimelech

Localization.Gloss: 以希（yǐ xī），《思》厄希。便雅悯的儿子之一。Ehi

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚希（ya xī），《思》阿希。迦得支派人，押比叠的儿子。Ahi

Terms.Localization: son of Abdiel; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 亚希（ya xī），《思》的译名在经文中没有出现。亚设支派人，朔默的儿子。Ahi

Terms.Localization: son of Shemer; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 亚希暗（ya xī an），《思》阿希扬。大卫的三十勇士之一，是哈拉人沙甲（沙拉）的儿子。Ahiam

Terms.Localization: son of Sachar, Sharar; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚希亚（ya xī ya），《思》阿希雅。以利的后裔，亚希突的儿子，扫罗时代的祭司，可能是挪伯的祭司亚希米勒的别名。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitub; descendant of Eli; priest

Localization.Gloss: 亚希亚（ya xī ya），《思》阿希雅。示沙的儿子，所罗门的书记。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: son of Shisha; secretary of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亚希雅（ya xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。示罗的先知，预言耶罗波安将会成为十支派的君王。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: prophet; time of king Jeroboam

Localization.Gloss: 亚希雅（ya xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。以色列王巴沙的父亲。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: father of Baasha, king of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 亚希雅（ya xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。犹大支派人，耶拉篾的儿子。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: son of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚希亚（ya xī ya），《思》阿希雅。便雅悯支派以忽的儿子，被掳到玛拿辖。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: son of Ehud; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚希雅（ya xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。大卫的勇士之一。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚希雅（ya xī yǎ），《思》的译名在经文中没有出现。利未支派人，大卫时代掌管圣殿府库的人。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚希雅（ya xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。被掳归回后的以色列人首领之一，随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的人。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亚希雅（ya xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。示罗的先知，预言耶罗波安将会成为十支派的君王。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: prophet; time of Jeroboam

Localization.Gloss: 亚希忽（ya xī hū），《思》阿希胡得。示罗米的儿子，亚设支派的首领之一。摩西拣选他协助把迦南地分给以色列人。Ahihud

Terms.Localization: son of Shelomi; chief; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 亚希约（ya xī yuē），《思》阿希约。亚比拿达的儿子，乌撒的兄弟。Ahio

Terms.Localization: son of Abinadab

Localization.Gloss: 亚希约（ya xī yuē），《思》厄耳帕耳。便雅悯支派族长比利亚的儿子，以利巴力的孙子。Ahio

Terms.Localization: son of Beria; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚希约（ya xī yuē），《思》阿希约。便雅悯支派人，耶利的后裔之一。Ahio

Terms.Localization: son of Jeiel; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚希忽（ya xī hū），《思》阿希胡得。便雅悯支派人，基拉的儿子。Ahihud

Terms.Localization: son of Gera; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚希突（ya xī tū），《思》阿希突布。利未支派人，担任祭司的职分。以利的孙子，非尼哈的儿子，以迦博的兄弟。Ahitub

Terms.Localization: son of Phinehas; priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚希突（ya xī tū），《思》阿希突布。亚玛利雅的儿子，撒督的父亲，亚希玛斯的祖父；大祭司；利未支派人。Ahitub

Terms.Localization: son of Amariah; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚希突（ya xī tū），《思》阿希突布。亚玛利雅的儿子，撒督的父亲，亚希玛斯的祖父；大祭司；利未支派人。Ahitub

Terms.Localization: son of Amariah; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚希突（ya xī tū），《思》阿希突布。利未支派人，担任祭司的职分，圣殿总管希勒家的先祖。Ahitub

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚希律（ya xī lǜ），《思》阿希路得。大卫和所罗门的史官约沙法的父亲。Ahilud

Terms.Localization: father of Jehoshapat, recorder; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 亚希律（ya xī lǜ），《思》阿希路得。所罗门时期一地区总督巴拿的父亲。Ahilud

Terms.Localization: father of Baana, district governor; time of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亚希摩（ya xī mo），《思》阿希摩特。利未支派人，哥辖的后裔，以利加拿的儿子，撒母耳的先祖。Ahimoth

Terms.Localization: son of Elkanah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚希米勒（ya xī mǐ le），《思》阿希默肋客。大卫时期挪伯的祭司，亚希突的儿子，亚比亚他的父亲。Ahimelech

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitub; father of Abiathar; priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚希米勒（ya xī mǐ le），《思》阿希默肋客。赫人，大卫时期的勇士之一，大卫逃避扫罗而藏身于旷野时的同伴。Ahimelech

Terms.Localization: Hittite; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚希米勒（ya xī mǐ le），《思》阿希默肋客。亚比亚他的儿子，与撒督同为大卫时代的祭司。Ahimelech

Terms.Localization: son of Abiathar; priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚希幔（ya xī man），《思》阿希曼。巨人，亚衲族的三个族长之一。Ahiman

Terms.Localization: giant; descendant of Anak

Localization.Gloss: 亚希幔（ya xī man），《思》阿希曼。被掳归回后的利未支派人，圣殿守门者。Ahiman

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亚希玛斯（ya xī mǎ sī），《思》阿希玛兹。扫罗王的妻子亚希暖的父亲。Ahimaaz

Terms.Localization: father of Ahinoam, wife of Saul

Localization.Gloss: 亚希玛斯（ya xī mǎ sī），《思》阿希玛兹。利未支派人，撒督的儿子，担任大祭司的职分。Ahimaaz

Terms.Localization: son of Zadok; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚希玛斯（ya xī mǎ sī），《思》阿希玛兹。所罗门时代供应王家食物的官吏之一，拿弗他利辖区总督，其妻是所罗门的女儿巴实抹。Ahimaaz

Terms.Localization: governor; time of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亚现（ya xian），《思》阿希杨。玛拿西支派示米大的儿子。Ahian

Terms.Localization: son of Shemida; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 亚希拿达（ya xī na da），《思》阿希纳达布。易多的儿子，所罗门时代供应王家食物的十二官吏之一，驻守玛哈念。Ahinadab

Terms.Localization: son of Iddo; official; time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亚希暖（ya xī nuǎn），《思》阿希诺罕。亚希玛斯的女儿，扫罗的妻子。Ahinoam

Terms.Localization: daughter of Ahimaaz; wife of Saul

Localization.Gloss: 亚希暖（ya xī nuǎn），《思》阿希诺罕。耶斯列人，大卫的妻子，暗嫩的母亲。Ahinoam

Terms.Localization: wife of David; from Jezreel

Localization.Gloss: 亚希撒抹（ya xī sā mǒ），《思》阿希撒玛客。但支派人，协助制作会幕器具的亚何利亚伯的父亲。Ahisamach

Terms.Localization: father of Oholiab; tribe of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 亚希以谢（ya xī yǐ xie），《思》阿希厄则尔。摩西时代但支派的首领，亚米沙代的儿子。Ahiezer

Terms.Localization: son of Ammishaddai; chief; tribe of Dan; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 亚希以谢（ya xī yǐ xie），《思》阿希厄则耳。便雅悯支派人，大卫的勇士之一，在洗革拉投奔大卫。Ahiezer

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚希甘（ya xī gān），《思》阿希甘。沙番的儿子；约西亚王时期及以后的重要人物；被掳时期的犹大的省长基大利的父亲。Ahikam

Terms.Localization: son of Shaphan; official; time of king Josiah; father of Gedaliah, governor of Judah, time of exile

Localization.Gloss: 亚希兰（ya xī lan），《思》阿希兰。便雅悯的儿子。Ahiram

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚希兰族（ya xī lan (zu)），《思》阿希兰家族。便雅悯的儿子亚希兰的后裔。Ahiramite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Ahiram, son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚希拉（ya xī lā），《思》阿希辣。拿弗他利支派的首领，以南的儿子，在摩西时代协助点算以色列人数。Ahira

Terms.Localization: son of Enan; chief; tribe of Naphtali; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 亚希沙哈（ya xī shā hā），《思》希沙哈尔。便雅悯支派耶叠的孙子，比勒罕的儿子，是族长和勇士。Ahishahar

Terms.Localization: son of Bilhan; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚希煞（ya xī shā），《思》阿希沙尔。所罗门时代宫内的家宰。Ahishar

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亚希多弗（ya xī duō fu），《思》阿希托费耳。基罗人，大卫的谋士。Ahithophel

Terms.Localization: from Giloh; counselor of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚黑拉（ya hēi lā），《思》阿赫拉布。亚设支派境内的一座城。Ahlab

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 亚来（ya lai），《思》阿赫来。犹大支派人，耶拉篾的后裔，示珊的儿子。Ahlai

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚莱（ya lai），《思》阿赫来。大卫的三十勇士之一撒拔的父亲。Ahlai

Terms.Localization: father of Zabad, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 紫晶（？）； 碧玉（？）。紫色的（半）宝石。amethyst (?); jasper (?)

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone of a purple color

Localization.Gloss: 亚马他（ya mǎ tā），《思》厄克巴塔纳。城镇；在米底亚省内。Ecbatana

Terms.Localization: town; in Media

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈拜（ya hā bai），《思》阿哈斯拜。大卫的三十勇士之一玛迦人以利法列的父亲。Ahasbai

Terms.Localization: from Maacah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈拉（ya hā lā），《思》阿希兰。便雅悯的儿子之一。Aharah

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈黑（ya hā hēi），《思》阿哈勒尔。犹大支派哈仑的儿子。Aharhel

Terms.Localization: son of Harum; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈随鲁（ya hā sui lǔ），《思》薛西斯。波斯君王，娶以斯帖为王后，可能是薛西斯一世（Xerxes I，公元前485-465）。Ahasuerus, Xerxes

Terms.Localization: king of Persia

Localization.Gloss: 荆棘。带刺植物。带刺的灌木或小树；悬钩子属。thorn, thistle, brier

Terms.Localization: bush or small tree with sharp thorns; Boxthorn Lycaeum europaeum or rubus species

Localization.Gloss: 亚麻布；线织的布；麻织的布。用亚麻茎的纤维造成的编织物料；比很多其他种类的布料更吸汗；用作床罩、船帆、祭司的衣服、帐幕的布置、丧葬的衣服等；与质量、强韧和清爽关联。linen

Terms.Localization: woven material made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; used for bed covers, sails of ships, garments for priests, furnishings for the tabernacle, burial clothes; associated with quality, strength, and coolness

Localization.Gloss: 亚特（ya te），《思》阿特尔。被掳归回时期的族长之一。Ater

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亚特（ya te），《思》阿特尔。被掳归回时期的族长之一，该家族负责圣殿守门的工作。Ater

Terms.Localization: family head; gatekeepers; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 豺狼或野狗。确切意思不明：与死亡、毁坏和荒废关联；可能是像狗一样嚎叫的野生动物。hyena or jackal

Terms.Localization: exact meaning uncertain: animal associated with death, destruction, and devastation; probably a dog-like wild animal that howls

Localization.Gloss: 隼；鹰。一种大型猛禽，能飞得快，也能盘旋（可能包括猎鹰、鹰、较大的鹞、红隼、苍鹰等；比老鹰和鸢小）；以大鼠、小鼠和其他鸟类为食；属不洁净的动物，所以不能食用。falcon or hawk

Terms.Localization: large bird of prey that can fly fast, but also hover (probably includes falcons, hawks, the bigger harriers, kestrels, goshawks, and others: Circus aeroginosus, Falco peregrinus, Falco biarmicus, and Falco subbuteo, smaller than eagles and kites); lives on rats, mice, and other birds; unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 亚雅（ya yǎ），《思》阿雅。西珥的后裔，何利人祭便的儿子，亚拿的兄弟，负责为父亲放驴。Aiah

Terms.Localization: son of Zibeon; descendant of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 爱亚（ai ya），《思》阿雅。扫罗的妃嫔利斯巴的父亲。Aiah

Terms.Localization: father of Rizpah, concubine of Saul

Localization.Gloss: 约伯（yuē bo），《思》约伯。乌斯地的一个义人。Job

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 《现》耶洗碧（yē xĭ bi），《和》耶洗别（yē xǐ bie），《思》依则贝耳。腓尼基公主，西顿王谒巴力的女儿，北国以色列王亚哈的妻子。Jezebel

Terms.Localization: wife of king Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 以迦博（yǐ jiā bo），《思》依加波得。以利的孙子，非尼哈的儿子；祭司。Ichabod

Terms.Localization: son of Phinehas, priest

Localization.Gloss: 鹿。四腿野生反刍动物，站立时肩高约有一米高；雄鹿会长角，每年脱落一次；夏季时毛呈红色，有白点；冬天时白点消失，毛色变深；是洁净的动物，因此可以食用；与力量、速度和敏捷关联；雄鹿也与性能力强关联。fallow deer

Terms.Localization: wild ruminating mammal with four legs, standing about a meter high at the shoulder; male grows antlers, which are dropped every year; has a reddish fur with white spots during summer; during winter the white spots disappear and the coat becomes darker; Cervidae family; clean animal and can therefore be eaten; associated with strength, speed, and agility; the male is also associated with sexual prowess

Localization.Gloss: 公绵羊。雄性草食哺乳类四足动物；胖尾羊；洁净的动物，可用来献祭，可为人类提供肉、皮革、羊毛和角；与力量和领导能力关联。ram

Terms.Localization: adult male herbivorous mammal with four legs; Ovis ladicaudata - fat-tailed sheep; clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, milk, hides, wool, and horns; associated with strength and leadership

Localization.Gloss: 领袖；族长；有势力的人。做领导的人。leader, chief

Terms.Localization: person who has a position of leadership

Localization.Gloss: 松脂木；橡树；圣树；绿树；树。树木；1- אֵלָה。terebinth

Terms.Localization: tree; 1- אֵלָה

Localization.Gloss: 侧墙；入口；墙柱。从建筑物的主墙突出来相对较短的墙，可以构成侧房或用来固定门框；或者是与墙或通道两旁齐平的柱子；也可能是门框的垂直组成部分（门窗边框）。side wall; entrance; jamb

Terms.Localization: relatively short side wall projecting from the main wall of a building, either to create side chambers or to hold a door frame. Or perhaps a pillar that stands flush with the wall or with the sides of an entranceway; or the verticle part of a door frame (jamb)

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒巴兰（yī le bā lan），《思》厄耳帕兰。巴兰旷野的某地，位于阿卡巴湾的北角上。El Paran

Terms.Localization: location in the desert of Paran

Localization.Gloss: 母鹿。成年母鹿（公鹿为אַיָּל）：野生反刍四足哺乳动物，肩高约一米，在夏季皮毛呈淡红色，有白色斑点；到了冬天，皮毛颜色变深，斑点消失；母鹿与步履稳健、生产许多后代的能力关联。female fallow deer, doe

Terms.Localization: adult female deer (male: אַיָּל): wild ruminating four-footed mammal (Cervidae family), about a meter high at the shoulder, reddish fur with white spots in summer, in winter the coat becomes darker and the spots disappear; the female is associated with surefootedness and the ability to produce abundant offspring

Localization.Gloss: 亚雅伦（ya yǎ lun），《思》阿雅隆。利未支派哥辖族在但支派、以法莲支派地业中所得的城镇，位于基遍以西。Aijalon

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Dan, Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 亚雅伦（ya yǎ lun），《思》阿雅隆。西布伦地的城镇，士师以伦葬在该处。Aijalon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 以伦（yǐ lun），《思》厄隆。以扫的赫人妻子巴实抹的父亲。Elon

Terms.Localization: father of Basmath, wife of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 以伦（yǐ lun），《思》厄隆／阿雅隆。但支派属地的城镇，在耶路撒冷的西北部，后来成为所罗门所设的行政区之一。Elon

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 以伦（yǐ lun），《思》厄隆。西布伦人，作以色列士师十年。Elon

Terms.Localization: judge

Localization.Gloss: 以禄（yǐ lu），《思》厄拉特。位于红海东北尖角的北端的一座海港城市。Eloth

Terms.Localization: town; Red Sea

Localization.Gloss: 以琳（yǐ lin），《思》厄林。以色列人出埃及时安营之地，位于红海苏伊士湾西岸。Elim

Terms.Localization: location near Mount Sinai

Localization.Gloss: 以拉他（yǐ lā tā），《思》厄拉特。以色列人出埃及所经之地，是通往红海的重要城市。Elath

Terms.Localization: town; Red Sea

Localization.Gloss: 惊骇，惊慌，惊惶，惊恐；惧怕；恐怖。状态，因为真实或预料的危险。terror, dread

Terms.Localization: state of strong fear because of an actual or perceived danger

Localization.Gloss: 以米；以米人。族群；居于沙微基列亭，是摩押地的原居民。Emim, Emites

Terms.Localization: a people

Localization.Gloss: 伊以谢（yī yǐ xie），《思》耶则尔。玛拿西的后裔，基列的儿子。Iezer

Terms.Localization: son of Gilead; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 伊以谢（族）（yī yǐ xie (zu)），《思》耶则尔家族。玛拿西支派基列的儿子伊以谢的后裔。Iezrite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Iezer, son of Gilead; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 伊施波设（yī shī bō she），《思》依市巴耳。便雅悯支派人，扫罗的儿子之一，原名“伊施巴力”。Ish-Bosheth

Terms.Localization: son of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 伊施荷（yī shī he），《思》依市曷得。玛拿西支派人，基列的妹子哈摩利吉的儿子。Ishhod

Terms.Localization: son of Hammolecheth; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 耶西（yē xī），《思》叶瑟。犹大支派人，俄备得的儿子，波阿斯和路得的孙子，大卫的父亲。Jesse

Terms.Localization: son of Obed; father of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以太（yǐ tai），《思》依泰。便雅悯族基比亚人利拜的儿子，大卫的勇士之一。Ithai

Terms.Localization: son of Ribai; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以铁（yǐ tiě），《思》依提耳。被掳归回时期的便雅悯支派人，耶筛亚的儿子，撒路的先祖。Ithiel

Terms.Localization: son of Jeshaiah; ancestor of Sallu, tribe of Benjamin, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以铁（yǐ tiě），《思》依提耳。雅基的儿子亚古珥的箴言对象。Ithiel

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 以他玛（yǐ tā mǎ），《思》依塔玛（尔）。亚伦的儿子之一，担任祭司的圣职。从巴比伦被掳之地归回的人中有他的后裔。Ithamar

Terms.Localization: son of Aaron; priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以探（yǐ tan），《思》厄堂。犹大的孙子，谢拉的儿子。Ethan

Terms.Localization: son of Zerah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以探（yǐ tan），《思》厄堂。服事大卫的智者；谢拉的后裔，犹大支派人，智慧可与所罗门相比的四名哲士之一（诗89；王上4.31）。Ethan

Terms.Localization: wise man serving David; descendant of Zerah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以探（yǐ tan），《思》厄堂。利未支派人，薪玛的儿子，亚萨的祖先。Ethan

Terms.Localization: son of Zimmah; ancestor of Asaph; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以探（yǐ tan），《思》厄堂。大卫时代的利未家乐师，基示（古沙雅）的儿子。Ethan

Terms.Localization: son of Kishi, Kushaiah; temple singer; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚甲（ya jiǎ），《思》阿加得。美索不达米亚的一座城。Accad

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 亚革悉（ya ge xī），《思》阿革齐布。犹大支派属地的高原城镇之一，位于希伯仑的西北方。Achzib

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚革悉（ya ge xī），《思》阿革齐布。亚设支派属地的城镇之一，位于亚柯以北。Achzib

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 亚吉（ya ji），《思》阿基士。玛迦的儿子，迦特的王。Achish

Terms.Localization: son of Maacah; king of Gath

Localization.Gloss: 乌甲（wū jiă），《思》乌加耳。亚古珥对他说了一番话。Ucal

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 押煞（yā shā），《思》阿革沙夫。亚设支派属地的城镇之一，迦南地的古城，位于亚柯以南。Achshaph

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 上帝，神。古代闪族语系中对神的希伯来文统称用语，这个字不是专有名词，通常与其他字词组合一起称呼以色列的独一上帝。god; God

Terms.Localization: generic term for a deity; also commonly used to denote the one God of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 至高者上帝／至高的上帝。音译作伊勒以罗安，是上帝的称号。El Elyon; God Most High

Terms.Localization: epithet for God

Localization.Gloss: 全能的上帝。音译作伊勒沙代，是上帝的称号。El Shaddai; God Almighty

Terms.Localization: epithet for God

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。所罗门时代地区总督示每的父亲。Ela

Terms.Localization: father of Shimei, official, time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 杜松；檀香木。高大的常青树，与香柏树相似，生长于黎巴嫩和俄斐；提供优质的木材；又或者是紫檀。juniper tree; sandalwood

Terms.Localization: large evergreen tree, somewhat similar to cedar, Juniperus phoenicea excelsa, found both in Lebanon and Ophir; provides excellent timber; or, red sandalwood, Pterocarpus santolinus

Localization.Gloss: 伊利达（yī li da），《思》厄耳达得。在旷野时代，分担摩西工作的七十位以色列长老之一。Eldad

Terms.Localization: elder of Israel; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以勒大（yǐ le da），《思》厄耳达阿。亚伯拉罕与基土拉的子孙，米甸的儿子。Eldaah

Terms.Localization: son of Midian, son of Keturah, wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 诅咒；发诅起誓；用诅咒束缚。发声请求伤害临到某人。to curse

Terms.Localization: to utter a statement calling for harm or injury to someone

Localization.Gloss: 树；圣树；橡树。树木；אֵלָה。terebinth

Terms.Localization: tree; אֵלָה

Localization.Gloss: 诅咒。愿某人受损伤的一种召唤或祈求，或这种祈求的提示物。curse

Terms.Localization: an invocation of harm or injury to someone, or a reminder of such an invocation

Localization.Gloss: 起誓。庄严的誓词，证明所说或想要做的事情是真确的。oath

Terms.Localization: a solemn attestation to the truth of what one says or intends to do

Localization.Gloss: 橡树。一种枝干粗大，树冠宽阔的树木，高度达7.5米至9米，是落叶乔木，花朵细小而不显眼；其树干含芳香松脂，一种树脂汁液，当树皮被切开便会流出来；坚果用于动物皮的染色和鞣制，烘烤后可以吃用；因其高大雄伟，人们喜欢坐在树下遮阴乘凉；这树与异教的敬拜有关，为古代以色列人和其他民族所崇敬，他们在橡树林中建造神龛和祭坛，有时也在树林中埋葬死人；3- אַיִל, אַלָּה。terebinth

Terms.Localization: tree, with a broad crown, heavy branches, and thick trunk; 7.5 to 9 m. high; sheds its leaves; has small inconspicuous flowers; Pistacia terebinthus or Pistacia atlantica; the stem contains aromatic turpentine, a resinous juice, which flows out when the bark is cut; the nuts are used for dyeing and tanning animal skins, and can be eaten if roasted; imposing tree, preferred place to sit under and enjoy the shade, associated with cultic worship, revered by ancient Israelites and other peoples, who built shrines and altars in the terebinth groves, and sometimes buried people there; 3- אַיִל, אַלָּה

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。以东的族长之一。Elah

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。巴沙的儿子，继承父位作以色列的君王（公元前886/85-885/84年在位）。Elah

Terms.Localization: son of Baasha; king of Israel (886/85-885/84)

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。以色列最后一个国王何细亚的父亲。Elah

Terms.Localization: father of Hoshea, king of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。犹大支派人，迦勒的儿子，耶孚尼的孙子。Elah

Terms.Localization: son of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。被掳归回时期的便雅悯支派人，乌西的儿子。Elah

Terms.Localization: son of Uzzi; tribe of Benjamin; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 神，上帝。这字原是一个复数名词，用来泛指某个民族所敬拜的多个神明；也常常用来指称以色列民所敬奉的独一上帝。god; gods; God

Terms.Localization: originally a plural form, used as a generic term for the deities served by a particular people; also commonly used to denote the one God of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 上帝。指以色列的神的术语。God

Terms.Localization: term for the deity of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 神明。指任何民族的神的术语。god

Terms.Localization: term for a deity of any peoples

Localization.Gloss: 以禄（yǐ lu），《思》厄路耳。第六个月，想当于八月至九月。Elul

Terms.Localization: the sixth month, equivalent to the period Aug-Sept

Localization.Gloss: 橡树。塔博橡木：一种高达 25 米（82 英尺）的大树，单独生长，也可见于丛林或森林中，冬天落叶。也指栎树：常绿树，在地面分枝的大型灌木。用作地标、墓穴标记或聚集地点；迦南人认为栎树树林是神圣的，经常在树下进行宗教仪式，以色列人也受引诱照样去做，圣经谴责这种行为是拜偶像；这种树的特点使其适合成为各种属性或态度的象征。oak tree

Terms.Localization: Quercus macrolepsis: a large tree reaching height of 25 meters (82 feet); found either alone or in clumps or forests; loses leaves in winter. Also refers to Quercus calliprinos: large shrub branching at ground level, evergreen. Functioned as landmarks, grave markers, or gathering places; since its groves were considered sacred by Canaanites, ritual practices under them was always a temptation to Israelites, denounced in the texts as idolatry; their characteristics made them suitable symbols of a variety of attributes or attitudes

Localization.Gloss: 亚龙（ya long），《思》阿隆。西缅支派人，耶大雅的儿子。Allon

Terms.Localization: son of Jedaya; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 橡树。塔博橡木：一种高达 25 米（82 英尺）的大树，在 5.5 米左右开始分枝，冬天落叶；也指栎树：常绿树，在地面分枝的大型灌木。用作地标、墓穴标记或聚集地点；迦南人认为栎树树林是神圣的，经常在树下进行宗教仪式，以色列人也受引诱照样去做，圣经谴责这种行为是拜偶像；这种树的特点使其适合成为各种属性或态度的象征。oak tree

Terms.Localization: Quercus macrolepsis (Tabor oak), large tree reaching height of 25 meters (82 feet), branching at around 5.5 meters, loses its leaves every winter; or, Quercus calliprinos (Kermes oak), large shrub branching at ground level, evergreen; functioned as landmarks, grave markers, or gathering places; since its groves were considered sacred by Canaanites, ritual practices under them was always a temptation to Israelites, denounced in the texts as idolatry; their characteristics made them suitable symbols of a variety of attributes or attitudes

Localization.Gloss: 以伦（yǐ lun），《思》厄隆。西布伦的儿子。Elon

Terms.Localization: son of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 《现》他泊的圣树（tā bo de sheng shu），《和》他泊的橡树（tā bo de xiang shu），《思》德波辣的橡树。撒母耳对扫罗的预言中所提及之地，位于拉玛与基比亚之间。oak of Tabor

Terms.Localization: tree; between Ramah and Gibea

Localization.Gloss: 以伦（族）（yǐ lun (zu)），《思》厄隆家族。西布伦的儿子以伦的后裔。Elonite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Elon, son of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 母牛，牲畜之首；公牛。家养牛的总称，包括雄性和雌性，通常是复数；用于供应奶和肉，也用于耕地；出现在描述幸福和繁荣的语境中。cow, head of cattle; ox

Terms.Localization: generic term for domesticated cattle, both male and female, always plural; used for milk and meat, and for plowing; used in contexts describing well-being and prosperity

Localization.Gloss: 亚录（ya lu），《思》阿路士。埃及之路上的一个地点，在脱加与利非订之间，确实的位置不详，以色列人前往迦南地途中曾在这里安营。Alush

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 以利萨巴（yǐ li sa bā），《思》厄耳匝巴得。迦得支派中投奔大卫的勇士。Elzabad

Terms.Localization: warrior; tribe of Gad; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利萨巴（yǐ li sa bā），《思》厄耳匝巴得。大卫时期，可拉族的守门人，示玛雅的儿子。Elzabad

Terms.Localization: son of Shemaiah; gatekeeper; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒哈难（yī le hā nan），《思》厄耳哈难。伯利恒人朵多的儿子，大卫军中的勇士。Elhanan

Terms.Localization: warrior(s); time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ li yā），《思》厄里雅布。摩西时代的西布伦支派领袖，希伦的儿子。Eliab

Terms.Localization: son of Helon; chief; tribe of Zebulun; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ li yā），《思》厄里雅布。吕便支派人，大坍和亚比兰的父亲。Eliab

Terms.Localization: father of Dathan and Abiram; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ li yā），《思》厄里雅布。犹大支派人，耶西的长子，大卫的长兄。Eliab

Terms.Localization: oldest son of Jesse; brother of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ li yā），《思》厄里雅布。利未支派人，以利加拿的后裔，撒母耳的祖先。Eliab

Terms.Localization: descendant of Elkanah; grandfather of Samuel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ li yā），《思》厄里阿布。利未支派的几个男子。Eliab

Terms.Localization: various men; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ li yā），《思》厄里雅布。迦得支派人，投奔大卫的勇士之一。Eliab

Terms.Localization: warrior; tribe of Gad; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ lie），《思》厄里耳。玛拿西半支派的族长之一。Eliel

Terms.Localization: family head; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ lie），《思》厄里耳。利未支派人，以利加拿的后裔，陀亚的儿子，撒母耳和希幔的祖先。Eliel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Elkanah; ancestor of Samuel, Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ lie），《思》厄里耳。便雅悯支派的族长之一，示每的儿子。Eliel

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ lie），《思》厄里耳。便雅悯支派的族长之一，沙煞的儿子。Eliel

Terms.Localization: son of Shashak; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利业（yǐ li ye），《思》厄里耳。大卫军中的几个勇士。Eliel

Terms.Localization: various warriors; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ lie），《思》厄里耳。希伯仑的子孙，利未支派的族长之一。Eliel

Terms.Localization: chief; descendants of Hebron; tribe of levi

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ lie），《思》厄里耳。犹大王希西家和管理神殿的亚撒利雅所委派的圣殿督理之一。Eliel

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚他（yǐ li ya tā），《思》厄里雅达。希幔的儿子，大卫时期第20班次圣殿乐师的首领。Eliathah

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利达（yǐ li da），《思》厄里达得。便雅悯支派的首领，基斯伦的儿子。Elidad

Terms.Localization: son of Chislon; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅大（yǐ li yǎ da），《思》厄肋雅达／厄里雅达。犹大支派人，大卫在耶路撒冷所生的儿子之一。Eliada

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚大（yǐ li ya da），《思》厄肋雅达。所罗门的敌人大马士革王利逊的父亲。Eliada

Terms.Localization: father of Rezon, king of Damascus

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅大（yǐ li yǎ da），《思》厄肋雅达。便雅悯的后裔，约沙法王时期军中的英勇战士。Eliada

Terms.Localization: army commander; time of Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚（yǐ li ya），《思》厄里亚。提斯比人，公元前9世纪北国以色列亚哈王和亚哈谢王时代的先知。Elijah

Terms.Localization: prophet; time of king Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚（yǐ li ya），《思》厄里雅。便雅悯支派的族长之一，耶罗罕的儿子。Elijah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅（yǐ li yǎ），《思》厄里雅。被掳归回时期，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的两个人。Elijah

Terms.Localization: various men; married foreign wives; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚（yǐ li ya），《思》厄里亚。提斯比人，公元前9世纪北国以色列亚哈王和亚哈谢王时代的先知。Elijah

Terms.Localization: prophet; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 以利户（yǐ li hu），《思》厄里胡。利未支派的可拉族人，俄别以东的孙子，示玛雅的儿子，负责守卫圣殿的门。Elihu

Terms.Localization: son of Shemaiah; gatekeeper; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利户（yǐ li hu），《思》厄里雅布。犹大支派的领袖之一，大卫的哥哥。Elihu

Terms.Localization: brother of David; chief; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利户（yǐ li hu），《思》厄里胡。利未支派人，以利加拿的后裔，撒母耳的曾祖父。Elihu

Terms.Localization: descendant of Elkanah; grandfather of Samuel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利户（yǐ li hu），《思》厄里胡。大卫时期的勇士，玛拿西支派人。Elihu

Terms.Localization: warrior; tribe of Manasseh; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利户（yǐ li hu），《思》厄里乌。布西人巴拉迦的儿子，约伯的朋友之一。Elihu

Terms.Localization: friend of Job

Localization.Gloss: 以利约乃（yǐ li yuē nǎi），《思》厄肋约乃。米施利米雅的七子，大卫时期可拉族的守门人。Eliehoenai

Terms.Localization: son of Meshelemiah; gatekeeper; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利约乃（yǐ li yuē nǎi），《思》厄里约乃。西拉希雅的儿子，被掳归回时期的巴哈．摩押家族领袖。Eliehoenai

Terms.Localization: son of Zerahiah; clan of Pahath-Moab; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利约乃（yǐ li yuē nǎi），《思》厄里约乃。犹大支派人，所罗巴伯的后裔，尼利雅的儿子。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利约乃（yǐ li yuē nǎi），《思》厄里约乃。西缅支派的族长之一。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 以利约乃（yǐ li yuē nǎi），《思》厄里约乃。便雅悯支派人，比结的儿子。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: son of Becher; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利约乃（yǐ li yuē nǎi），《思》厄里约乃。被掳归回时期的几个祭司。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: various priests; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利约乃（yǐ li yuē nǎi），《思》厄里约乃。萨土的子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: man; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅哈巴（yǐ li yǎ hā bā），《思》厄里雅巴。沙本人，大卫王的三十勇士之一。Eliahba

Terms.Localization: from Shaalbon; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利何烈（yǐ li he lie），《思》厄里曷勒夫。示沙的两个儿子之一，所罗门王的书记。Elihoreph

Terms.Localization: son of Shisha; official; time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 偶像。被认为代表神明且被当做神明来敬拜的物件；与无价值和无用关联；对外邦神明和偶像的蔑称。idol

Terms.Localization: object that is regarded to represent a deity and worshipped as such; associated with being worthless and useless; derogatory term for pagan god, idol

Localization.Gloss: 以利米勒（yǐ li mǐ le），《思》厄里默肋客。来自伯利恒，士师时代犹大支派人，拿俄米的丈夫。Elimelech

Terms.Localization: man from Bethlehem; time of the Judges

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅萨（yǐ li yǎ sa），《思》厄肋雅撒夫。摩西时期迦得支派族长，丢珥的儿子。Eliasaph

Terms.Localization: son of Deuel; chief; tribe of Gad; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅萨（yǐ li yǎ sa），《思》厄肋雅撒夫。利未支派革顺宗族的首领，拉伊勒的儿子。Eliasaph

Terms.Localization: man; son of Lael; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利以谢（yǐ li yǐ xie），《思》厄里厄则尔。大马士革人，亚伯拉罕的奴仆。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: slave of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 以利以谢（yǐ li yǐ xie），《思》厄里厄则尔。摩西的儿子。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: son of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以利以谢（yǐ li yǐ xie），《思》厄里厄则尔。便雅悯的孙子，比结的儿子。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: son of Becher; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利以谢（yǐ li yǐ xie），《思》厄里厄则尔。大卫把约柜搬进耶路撒冷时，在约柜前吹号的七位祭司之一。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利以谢（yǐ li yǐ xie），《思》厄里厄则尔。大卫时期的吕便支派领袖，细基利的儿子。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: son of Zichri; chief; tribe of Reuben; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利以谢（yǐ li yǐ xie），《思》厄里厄则尔。玛利沙人，多大瓦的儿子，犹大王约沙法时代的先知。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: son of Dodavahu; prophet; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 以利以谢（yǐ li yǐ xie），《思》厄里（厄）则尔。被掳归回时期的几个人。(1)被以斯拉派遣去见迦西斐雅的领袖易多的众人之一（拉8:16-17）。(2)耶书亚的子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的祭司（拉10:18）。 (3)听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的利未人（拉10:23）。 (4)哈琳的子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的人（拉10:31）。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《现》以莲（yǐ lian），《和》以连，《思》厄里安。大卫之妻拔示巴的父亲。Eliam

Terms.Localization: father of Bathsheba, wife of Uriah, David

Localization.Gloss: 以连（yǐ lian），《思》厄里安。基罗人亚希多弗的儿子，大卫军的三十勇士之一。Eliam

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitophel; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利乃（yǐ li nǎi），《思》厄里约乃。便雅悯支派的族长之一，示每的儿子。Elienai

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利法（yǐ li fǎ），《思》厄里法次。以扫跟亚大所生的长子，以东族的祖先。Eliphaz

Terms.Localization: son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 以利法（yǐ li fǎ），《思》厄里法次。提幔人，约伯的三个朋友之一。Eliphaz

Terms.Localization: Temanite; friend of Job

Localization.Gloss: 以利法勒（yǐ li fǎ le），《思》厄里法耳。吾珥的儿子，大卫军中的勇士之一。Eliphal

Terms.Localization: son of Ur; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利斐利户（yǐ li fěi li hu），《思》厄里斐路。大卫时期的利未支派人。Eliphelehu

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利法列（yǐ li fǎ lie），《思》厄里培肋特。犹大支派人，大卫在耶路撒冷所生的儿子之一。Eliphelet

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利法列（yǐ li fǎ lie），《思》厄里培肋特。玛迦人亚哈拜的儿子，大卫的勇士之一。Eliphelet

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利法列（yǐ li fǎ lie），《思》厄里培肋特。便雅悯支派人，扫罗和约拿单的后裔，以设的儿子。Eliphelet

Terms.Localization: son of Eshek; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利法列（yǐ li fǎ lie），《思》厄里培肋特。以斯拉时代从被掳之地归回巴勒斯坦的两个人。(1)亚多尼干的子孙。(2)哈顺的子孙。Eliphelet

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利蓿（yǐ li su），《思》厄里族尔。摩西时期吕便支派的族长，示丢珥的儿子。Elizur

Terms.Localization: son of Shedeur; chief; tribe of Reuben; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以利撒反（yǐ li sā fǎn），《思》厄里匝番。利未支派人，乌薛的儿子，哥辖宗族的首领。Elizaphan

Terms.Localization: son of Uzziel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利撒番（yǐ li sā fān），《思》厄里匝番。帕纳的儿子，西布伦支派的首领。Elizaphan

Terms.Localization: son of Parnach; chief; tribe of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 以利加（yǐ li jiā），《思》厄里卡。哈律人，大卫军的三十勇士之一。Elika

Terms.Localization: from Harod; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚敬（yĭ li ya jing），《思》厄里雅金。希勒家的儿子，犹大王希西家时期的家宰。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: son of Hilkiah; official; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》以利亚敬（yĭ li ya jing），《和》以利亚敬／以利雅敬（yǐ li yǎ jing），《思》厄里雅金。犹大王约西亚（公元前609-597年在位）的儿子，约哈斯的哥哥，法老尼哥立他为王，给他改名为约雅敬。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: son of Josiah; king of Judah (609-597)

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚金（yǐ li ya jīn），《思》厄里雅金。被掳归回后协助重建耶路撒冷城墙的祭司之一。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙巴（yǐ li shā bā），《思》厄里舍巴。亚米拿达的女儿，亚伦的妻子。Elisheba

Terms.Localization: daughter of Amminadab; wife of Aaron

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙（yǐ li shā），《思》厄里沙。雅完的儿子，雅弗的后裔；据信，他建立了一个同名国家，该国与泰尔贸易往来。Elishah

Terms.Localization: son of Javan; descendant of Japheth; also, name of the nation Elishah was believed to have founded, which traded with Tyre

Localization.Gloss: 以利书亚（yǐ li shū ya），《思》厄里叔亚。犹大支派人，大卫在耶路撒冷所生的儿子之一。Elishua

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚实（yǐ li ya shi），《思》厄里雅史布。犹大支派人，所罗巴伯的后裔，以利约乃的儿子。Eliashib

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚实（yǐ li ya shi），《思》厄里雅史布。大卫时代在圣殿供职的第11班次祭司首领。Eliashib

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚实（yǐ li ya shi），《思》厄里雅史布。被掳归回后，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的三个以色列人。Eliashib

Terms.Localization: various men; married foreign wives; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚实（yǐ li ya shi），《思》厄肋雅史布。约哈难的父亲，被掳归回时期的大祭司。Eliashib

Terms.Localization: high priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙玛（yǐ li shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙玛。出埃及时期以法莲支派的首领，亚米忽的儿子，约书亚的先祖。Elishama

Terms.Localization: son of Ammihud; chief; tribe of Ephraim; ancestor of Joshua

Localization.Gloss: 《现》以利沙玛／以利书亚（yǐ li shā mǎ/yǐ li shū ya），《和》以利沙玛，《思》厄里沙玛／里沙玛。犹大支派人，大卫在耶路撒冷所生的儿子之一。Elishama

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙玛（yǐ li shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙玛。以实玛利的祖父。Elishama

Terms.Localization: grandfather of Ishmael

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙玛（yǐ li shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙玛。犹大支派人，耶加米雅的儿子。Elishama

Terms.Localization: son of Jekamiah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙玛（yǐ li shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙玛。约沙法王差遣往犹大各城教训百姓的祭司之一。Elishama

Terms.Localization: priest; time of Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙玛（yǐ li shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙玛。约雅敬王时期的文士之一。Elishama

Terms.Localization: official; time of Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙（yǐ li shā），《思》厄里叟。沙法的儿子，公元前9世纪北国以色列的先知。Elisha

Terms.Localization: son of Shaphat; prophet

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙法（yǐ li shā fǎ），《思》厄里沙法特。亚她利雅掌权时期，耶何耶大所召的百夫长之一，细基利的儿子。Elishaphat

Terms.Localization: son of Zichri; army officer; time of queen Athaliah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚他（yǐ li ya tā），《思》厄里雅达。希幔的儿子，大卫时期第20班次圣殿乐师的首领。Eliathah

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 杜松树；檀香树。高大的常绿乔木，与香柏树相似，生长于黎巴嫩和俄斐；提供优质木材；或指紫檀木。juniper tree; sandalwood

Terms.Localization: large evergreen tree, somewhat similar to cedar, Juniperus phoenicea excelsa, found both in Lebanon and Ophir; provides excellent timber; or, red sandalwood, Pterocarpus santolinus

Localization.Gloss: 禾捆。农作物收割后，茎和穗绑在一起而成的麦穗捆；捆扎所用的通常是谷物本身的茎。sheaf

Terms.Localization: bundle of harvested ears of grain made by binding together the stalks and ears of a crop; binding often done with stalks of the grain itself

Localization.Gloss: 亚摩答（ya mo da），《思》阿耳摩达得。闪的后裔，约坍的儿子，亦可指亚摩答的后裔。Almodad

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 亚拉米勒（ya lā mǐ le），《思》阿拉默肋客。亚设支派的城镇，位置不详。Allammelech

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 伊利拿安（yī li na ān），《思》厄耳纳罕。大卫两个勇士耶利拜和约沙未雅的父亲。Elnaam

Terms.Localization: father of Jeribai and Joshaviah

Localization.Gloss: 以利拿单（yǐ li na dān），《思》厄耳纳堂。约雅敬王的妻子尼护施她的父亲。Elnathan

Terms.Localization: father of Nehushta, wife of king Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 以利拿单（yǐ li na dān），《思》厄耳纳堂。亚革波的儿子，约雅敬时代的犹大官员。Elnathan

Terms.Localization: son of Achbor; official; time of king Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 以利拿单（yǐ li na dān），《思》厄耳纳堂。被掳归回时期犹太人的三个首领。Elnathan

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以拉撒（yǐ lā sā），《思》厄拉撒尔。巴比伦尼亚地区中的一个小国，位于幼发拉底河的东岸。Ellasar

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 《现》以利（yǐ li），《和》以列（yǐ lie），《思》厄拉得。以法莲的儿子。Elad

Terms.Localization: son of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 以拉大（yǐ lā da），《思》厄拉达。以法莲支派人，他哈的儿子。Eleadah

Terms.Localization: son of Tahath; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 伊利乌赛（yī li wū sai），《思》厄路斋。便雅悯支派人，离开扫罗后成为大卫军的勇士。Eluzai

Terms.Localization: man; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚撒（yǐ li ya sā），《思》厄肋阿匝尔。亚伦的儿子，继承亚伦大祭司的职位。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: son of Aaron; high priest

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚撒（yǐ li ya sā），《思》厄肋阿匝尔。亚比拿达的儿子。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: man; son of Abinadab

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚撒（yǐ li ya sā），《思》厄肋阿匝尔。朵多的儿子，大卫的三个勇士之一。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: son of Dodo, Dodai; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚撒（yǐ li ya sā），《思》厄肋阿匝尔。利未支派人，抹利的儿子。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚撒（yǐ li ya sā），《思》厄肋阿匝尔。几个男子。(1)非尼哈的儿子，伴着祭司米利末一同处理圣殿的金银器皿（拉8.33）。(2)巴录的子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一（拉10.25）。(3)庆祝建成耶路撒冷城墙的祭司之一（尼12.42）。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: various men

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚利（yǐ li ya li），《思》厄肋阿肋。迦得支派与吕便支派向摩西所求城镇之一，亦是吕便子孙所造的坚固城之一，位于希实本的东北方。Elealeh

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚萨（yǐ li ya sa），《思》厄拉撒。犹大支派人，耶拉篾的后裔。Eleasah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚萨（yǐ li ya sa），《思》厄拉撒。便雅悯支派人，扫罗的后裔，拉法的儿子。Eleasah

Terms.Localization: son of Raphah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚撒（yǐ li ya sā），《思》厄拉撒。以斯拉时期的祭司。Eleasah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚萨（yǐ li ya sa），《思》厄拉撒。犹大王西底家的臣子，沙番的儿子。Eleasah

Terms.Localization: son of Shaphan; official; time of Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 牛；牲畜。驯养的牛的统称，包括雌性和雄性，总是以复数形式出现，用作产奶和肉类，也用作耕犁；出现在描述幸福和繁荣的语境中。cow, head of cattle; ox

Terms.Localization: generic term for domesticated cattle, both male and female, always plural; used for milk and meat, and for plowing; used in contexts describing well-being and prosperity

Localization.Gloss: 以法列（yǐ fǎ lie），《思》厄里培肋特。犹大支派人，大卫在耶路撒冷所生的众子之一。Elpelet

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利巴力（yǐ li bā li），《思》厄耳帕耳。便雅悯支派人，沙哈连的儿子。Elpaal

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利巴力（yǐ li bā li），《思》厄耳帕耳。便雅悯支派人。Elpaal

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利撒反（yǐ li sā fǎn），《思》厄里匝番。利未支派人，乌薛的儿子。Elzaphan

Terms.Localization: son of Uzziel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ li jiā na），《思》厄耳卡纳。利未支派人，哥辖的后裔，亚惜的儿子。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: son of Assir; descendant of Kohath; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ li jiā na），《思》厄耳卡纳。住在以法莲的利未支派人，耶罗罕的儿子，撒母耳的父亲，哈拿的丈夫；希幔的祖先。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; father of Samuel; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi; lived in Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ li jiā na），《思》厄耳卡纳。可拉人，大卫的勇士之一。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ li jiā na），《思》厄耳卡纳。利未支派人，可拉的后裔。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ li jiā na），《思》厄耳卡纳。利未支派人，（1）亚希摩的儿子，撒母耳的先祖；（2）玛哈的儿子，哥辖的后裔，希幔的先祖。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahimoth, Mahath; ancestor of Samuel, Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ li jiā na），《思》厄耳卡纳。利未支派人，约珥的儿子，希幔的先祖。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: son of Joel; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ li jiā na），《思》厄耳卡纳。利未支派人，比利家的祖先。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Berechiah, Levite

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ li jiā na），《思》厄耳卡纳。大卫时期利未支派人，负责看守约柜。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: carrier of the ark of the covenant; tribe of Levi; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ li jiā na），《思》厄耳卡纳。犹大王亚哈斯的宰相。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: second in command to king Ahaz

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒歌斯人（yī le gē sī ren），《思》厄耳科士人。伊勒歌斯的居民；伊勒歌斯是先知那鸿的家乡，位置不详。Elkoshite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Elkosh

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒多腊（yī le duō la）／伊利多拉（yī li duō lā），《思》厄耳托拉得。西缅支派自犹大支派属地中所取得的一座城，位置不详。Eltolad

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 伊利提基（yī li ti jī），《思》厄耳特刻。但支派属地的城镇，后分给利未支派哥辖族为业。Eltekeh

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒提君（yī le ti jūn），《思》厄耳特孔。犹大支派属地的城镇，位于伯利恒以西。Eltekon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛（山）（ya mǎ (shān)），《思》阿玛（山岗）。约押追赶押尼珥所到之山，在基遍的附近，位置不详。Ammah

Terms.Localization: hill

Localization.Gloss: 女奴；女仆，使女，婢女；宫女。女性，属于某人的合法财产；已婚的或有资格结婚的；她的儿女属于她的主人slave, handmaid

Terms.Localization: woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her

Localization.Gloss: 亚们（ya men），《思》阿孟。犹大王（公元前643/42-641/40年在位），玛拿西的儿子。Amon

Terms.Localization: son of Manasseh; king of Judah (643/42-641/40)

Localization.Gloss: 亚们（ya men），《思》阿孟。以色列王亚哈时期，撒玛利亚的邑宰。Amon

Terms.Localization: governor of Samaria; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚扪（ya men），《和》亚们（ya men），《思》阿孟。所罗门仆人后裔的家族领袖，从被掳之地回归巴勒斯坦。Amon

Terms.Localization: family head; servants of Solomon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亚扪（ya men），《思》阿孟。埃及的太阳神明， 源于底比斯的地方神明。Amon

Terms.Localization: Egyptian deity

Localization.Gloss: 忠诚；诚实；忠信的人。忠诚的品质，或具有这种品质的人。faithfulness; truth; faithful person

Terms.Localization: the quality of faithfulness, or person who has that quality

Localization.Gloss: 稳重；信实；信任。坚定、稳定、值得信赖的品质。steadiness; faithfulness; trust

Terms.Localization: the quality of being firm, steady, trustworthy

Localization.Gloss: 亚摩斯（ya mo sī），《思》阿摩兹。先知以赛亚的父亲。Amoz

Terms.Localization: father of prophet Isaiah

Localization.Gloss: 亚米（ya mǐ），《思》阿米。所罗门仆人的家族后裔领袖，跟随所罗巴伯回犹大，另称为“亚们”。Ami

Terms.Localization: family head; servant to Solomon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 暗嫩（an nen），《思》阿默农。大卫的长子，耶斯列人亚希暖所生。Amnon

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 亚曼（ya man），《思》阿曼。犹大支派属地南边的城镇之一，可能是在南地。Amam

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: Niphal（单纯被动式）：坚固，稳妥；忠诚，坚定，可靠，值得信赖。具有稳定、可靠或持久的品质。Niphal: be firm, well-established; be loyal, steadfast, reliable, trustworthy

Terms.Localization: have the quality of being stable or trustworthy or long-lasting

Localization.Gloss: Hiphil（使役主动式）：相信，信靠。认为某人或某事是值得信赖的。Hiphil: believe in, trust

Terms.Localization: think someone/thing is trustworthy

Localization.Gloss: 《现》是的／阿们／但愿如此，《和》阿们。郑重地表示同意或确认的一个表达式。surely!, amen!

Terms.Localization: solemn formula expressing agreement or affirmation

Localization.Gloss: 忠信，诚实，可靠。神明被视为值得信任的状态，因为他们可靠和尽职，性格坚定，这反映在他们的行为上。faithfulness, trustworthiness

Terms.Localization: state whereby deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their actions

Localization.Gloss: 亚罢拿（ya ba na），《思》阿巴纳。叙利亚境内流经大马色的主要河流之一，可能即今天的巴拉达河。Amanah

Terms.Localization: river; Syria

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛拿（ya mǎ na），《思》阿玛纳山巅。位于黎巴嫩的一座山。Amanah

Terms.Localization: mountain; Lebanon

Localization.Gloss: 暗嫩（an nen），《思》阿默农。大卫的长子，耶斯列人亚希暖所生。Amnon

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 暗嫩（an nen），《思》阿默农。犹大支派示门的儿子。Amnon

Terms.Localization: son of Shimon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 暗西（an xī），《思》阿默漆。利未支派米拉利的后裔，巴尼的儿子，以探的先祖。Amzi

Terms.Localization: son of Bani; ancestor of Ethan; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 暗洗（an xǐ），《思》阿默漆。利未支派人，撒迦利亚的儿子，亚大雅的先祖，担任祭司的职分。Amzi

Terms.Localization: son of Zechariah; ancestor of Adaiah, priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛谢（ya mǎ xie），《思》阿玛责雅。犹大王（公元前796-767），约阿施的儿子，25岁登位。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Joash; king of Judah (796-767)

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛谢（ya mǎ xie），《思》阿玛责雅。西缅支派人，约沙的父亲。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: father of Joshah; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛谢（ya mǎ xie），《思》阿玛责雅。利未支派人，米拉利的后裔，希勒家的儿子，以探的先祖。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Hilkiah; ancestor of Ethan; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛谢（ya mǎ xie），《思》阿玛责雅。先知阿摩司时期伯特利的祭司。他可能不属于利未支派，但被耶罗波安立为祭司。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: priest of Bethel; time of prophet Amos

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛谢（ya mǎ xie），《思》阿玛责雅。犹大王（公元前796-767），约阿施的儿子，25岁登位。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Joash; king of Judah (796-767)

Localization.Gloss: 小绵羊／绵羊羔。幼小的绵羊；用作祭品。lamb

Terms.Localization: a young sheep; used as sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: 音麦（yīn mai），《思》依默尔。玛赛、亚玛帅的先祖；祭司。Immer

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Maasai, Amashsai, priest

Localization.Gloss: 音麦（yīn mai），《思》依默尔。大卫时代在圣殿供职的第16班次祭司首领。Immer

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 音麦（yīn mai），《思》依默尔。被掳归回的族长之一。Immer

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 音麦（yīn mai），《思》依默尔。地点。Immer

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 音麦（yīn mai），《思》依默尔。耶利米时代圣殿的总管巴施户珥的父亲。Immer

Terms.Localization: father of Pashhur, priest

Localization.Gloss: 音利（yīn li），《思》依默黎。犹大支派人，巴尼的儿子，乌太的先祖。Imri

Terms.Localization: son of Bani; ancestor of Uthai; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 音利（yīn li），《思》依默黎。协助尼希米建造城墙的撒刻的父亲。Imri

Terms.Localization: father of Zaccur; wall repairer; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亚摩利人（ya mo li ren），《思》阿摩黎人。迦南之子亚摩利的后裔。Amorite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛利雅（ya mǎ li yǎ），《思》阿玛黎雅。利未支派人，亚伦第三子以利亚撒的后裔，米拉约的儿子，撒督的祖父；担任大祭司的职分。Amariah

Terms.Localization: son of Meraioth; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛利雅（ya mǎ li yǎ），《思》阿玛黎雅。利未支派人，亚伦第三子以利亚撒的后裔，亚撒利雅的儿子；担任大祭司的职分。Amariah

Terms.Localization: son of Azariah; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛利亚（ya mǎ li ya），《思》阿玛黎雅。大卫时代的利未支派人，哥辖的孙子，希伯伦的儿子。Amariah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Hebron; tribe of Levi; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛利雅（ya mǎ li yǎ），《思》阿玛黎雅。被掳归回时期的两个以色列人。（1）听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人。（2）约雅金时期的祭司，随同尼希米签约遵守神的律法，并与所罗巴伯一同归回耶路撒冷。Amariah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛利雅（ya mǎ li yǎ），《思》阿玛黎雅。被掳归回的犹大支派人，法勒斯的后裔，示法提雅的儿子。Amariah

Terms.Localization: son of Shephatiah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛利雅（ya mǎ li yǎ），《思》阿玛黎雅。希西家的儿子，先知西番雅的先祖。Amariah

Terms.Localization: son of Hezekiah; ancestor of prophet Zephaniah

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛利亚（ya mǎ li ya），《思》阿玛黎雅。利未支派人，哥辖的孙子，希伯伦的儿子。Amariah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Izhar; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛利雅（ya mǎ li yǎ），《思》阿玛黎雅。利未支派人，约沙法时期的大祭司，管理一切属神的事。Amariah

Terms.Localization: high priest; tribe of Levi; time of Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 亚玛利雅（ya mǎ li yǎ），《思》阿玛黎雅。利未支派人，希西家时期的祭司。Amariah

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi; time of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 暗拉非（an lā fēi），《思》阿默辣斐耳。示拿王，联同以拉撒王亚略、以拦王基大老玛、戈印王提达攻击所多玛等城，引致四王与五王交战。Amraphel

Terms.Localization: king of Shinar

Localization.Gloss: 真实；忠诚。人类和神明被视为值得信任的状态，因为他们可靠和尽职，性格坚定，这反映在他们的言语和行为上。truth, faithfulness

Terms.Localization: state whereby humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

Localization.Gloss: 袋子，口袋，布袋。比较大的袋子，用皮革或布料制成，用来贮藏及运送食物和谷物。bag, sack

Terms.Localization: large bag, made of leather or cloth, used for storing and transporting food or grain

Localization.Gloss: 亚米太（ya mǐ tai），《思》阿米泰。迦特希弗人，先知约拿的父亲。Amittai

Terms.Localization: father of prophet Jonah

Localization.Gloss: 以挪士（yǐ nuo shi），《思》厄诺士。塞特的儿子，该南的父亲。Enosh

Terms.Localization: son of Seth

Localization.Gloss: 亚拿哈拉（ya na hā lā），《思》阿纳哈辣特。以萨迦支派属地的城镇之一，位置不详，可能是在伯善以北的附近。Anaharath

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 阿尼安（ā ni ān），《思》阿尼罕。玛拿西支派示米大的儿子。Aniam

Terms.Localization: son of Shemida; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 《现》铅垂线，《和》准绳。绳子的一端系有重物，建筑工人用它来测量一堵墙是否垂直的工具。常用来比喻道德和伦理标准。plumb line

Terms.Localization: a weight suspended on the end of a string, used by builders to determine whether a wall was straight or not; often used in a figurative sense in the context of moral and ethical standards

Localization.Gloss: 鹭，鹭鸶，苍鹭。体形颇大的雀鸟，有长颈、长嘴，和长腿；或指任何长着突出的喙的水鸟，包括苍鹭、朱鹭、白鹭、池鹭和琵鹭；它们站立或缓慢行走于河流、堤坝、池塘，或湖泊的浅水区，会用极快的动作把头插进水里，捕捉小鱼；它们飞行时拍打翅膀的速度很慢；属于不洁的动物。heron

Terms.Localization: fairly large water bird with a long neck, long beak, and long legs (Ardea family); or any waterside bird with a prominent beak, including not only heron but also ibis, egret, and perhaps bittern and spoonbill; stands or walks slowly in shallow water in rivers or ponds looking for small fish, which it catches by suddenly darting its head into the water; flies with slow wing-beats; unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 壁虎。小型蜥蜴，身长约为 10 公分（4 英寸），脚趾末端有爪垫和小毛，让它可以在房顶和悬梁上倒立爬行；是唯一会发声的蜥蜴；以昆虫为食；地中海壁虎或各种壁虎的总称；有些品种经常出现在建筑物内；是不洁净的动物，因此不可吃。gecko
