Terms.Localization: to be responsible or take responsibility for a wrongful act against God or someone else; results in a state of guilt which may require atonement, restitution, and retribution

Localization.Gloss: 清洁，洁净。进行一种仪式，藉以除去自己、他人或物件的有罪或不洁的状态。to cleanse, to purify

Terms.Localization: to perform the ritual of removing the state of guilt or uncleanness from oneself, another person, or an object

Localization.Gloss: 罪。干犯上帝或别人的行为，无论是否故意；可能需要赎罪、赔偿，及／或接受惩罚。sin

Terms.Localization: wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not; may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Localization.Gloss: 罪过，罪。需要为有意或无意干犯上帝或别人的行为负责的状态；可能需要赎罪、赔偿，及／或接受惩罚。guilt

Terms.Localization: state of being responsible for a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether committed on purpose or not; may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Localization.Gloss: 献作赎罪祭；献上赎罪祭。举行献祭仪式，以除去自己或他人的有罪状态。to sacrifice as sin-offering; to present a sin-offering

Terms.Localization: to perform the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else

Localization.Gloss: 罪恶。干犯上帝或别人的行为，无论是否故意；可能需要赎罪、赔偿，及／或接受惩罚。sin

Terms.Localization: wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not; may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Localization.Gloss: 罪。干犯上帝或别人的行为，无论是否故意；可能需要赎罪、赔偿，及／或接受惩罚。sin

Terms.Localization: wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not; may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Localization.Gloss: 罪，罪恶。需要为有意或无意干犯上帝或别人的行为负责的状态；可能需要赎罪、赔偿，及／或接受惩罚。guilt

Terms.Localization: state of being responsible for a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether committed on purpose or not; may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Localization.Gloss: 赎罪祭。献祭的行为，目的是为有意或无意干犯上帝的行为赎罪，以除去自己或他人的有罪状态。sin-offering

Terms.Localization: act of bringing a sacrifice with the intention of making atonement for a wrongful act against God, whether committed on purpose or not, to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else

Localization.Gloss: 罪。干犯上帝或别人的行为，无论是否故意；可能需要赎罪、赔偿，及／或接受惩罚。sin

Terms.Localization: wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not; may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Localization.Gloss: 罪恶的东西。与干犯上帝或别人的行为有关的物品。sinful thing

Terms.Localization: object associated with wrongful acts against God or someone else

Localization.Gloss: 惩罚。一种处理方法，是犯罪行为的后果。punishment

Terms.Localization: treatment that is the consequence of a wrongful act

Localization.Gloss: 清洁，净化。除去一个人或物件的有罪或不洁状态的仪式。cleansing, purification

Terms.Localization: ritual of removing the state of guilt or uncleanness from a person or object

Localization.Gloss: 赎罪祭。献祭的行为，目的是为有意或无意干犯上帝的行为赎罪，以除去自己或他人的有罪状态。sin-offering

Terms.Localization: act of bringing a sacrifice with the intention of making atonement for a wrongful act against God, whether committed on purpose or not, to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else

Localization.Gloss: 哈突（hā tū），《思》哈突士。犹大支派人，所罗巴伯的后裔，示玛雅的儿子。Hattush

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈突（hā tū），《思》哈突士。被掳归回的犹大支派人，大卫的后裔。Hattush

Terms.Localization: descendant of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈突（hā tū），《思》哈突士。被掳归回时期的几个男子。Hattush

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈底大（hā dǐ da），《思》哈提达。从被掳之地归回的守门的家族族长之一。Hatitah

Terms.Localization: family head; gatekeepers; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈替（hā ti），《思》哈提耳／哈堤耳。被掳归回时期，所罗门仆人家族的族长之一。Hattil

Terms.Localization: family head; servants of Solomon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈提法（hā ti fǎ），《思》哈提法。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Hatipha

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 生命，有生命的。处于活着状态的动物（人或其他动物）。living being, the living

Terms.Localization: an animal (human or otherwise) that is in the state of being alive

Localization.Gloss: 希伊勒（xī yī le），《思》希耳。以色列王亚哈时期的伯特利人，重修耶利哥城。Hiel

Terms.Localization: man; from Bethel; rebuilt Jericho

Localization.Gloss: 生物，陆上野生动物，野兽。动物的统称，有时指所有动物，有时仅指陆上的野生动物。living creature, wild land animal, beast

Terms.Localization: animal; generic term, sometimes referring to all animals, sometimes limited to wild land animals only

Localization.Gloss: 群体；一帮人；民众。有亲属关系的一群人。community, band, group

Terms.Localization: a group of people related by kinship

Localization.Gloss: 食欲，饥饿。因缺乏食物而感到不安或痛苦的状态。appetite, hunger

Terms.Localization: state of an uneasy or painful sensation due to lack of food

Localization.Gloss: 生物，陆上野生动物，野兽。动物；一个统称，有时指所有动物，有时仅指陆上的野生动物。living creature, animal, beast

Terms.Localization: animal; generic term, sometimes referring to all animals, sometimes limited to wild land animals only

Localization.Gloss: 希仑（xī lun），《思》希肋次。利未支派亚伦子孙从犹大支派所得的城镇，位于希伯仑的西北。Hilen (MT: Hilez)

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 希兰（xī lan），《思》赫蓝。大卫击败亚兰诸王之地，位于基列的拉末之东北，靠近约旦河。Helam

Terms.Localization: location; near Jordan river

Localization.Gloss: 希仑（xī lun），《思》希肋次。在犹大支派地业内的一座城镇，位于希伯仑的西北，分配给利未人。Hilen (MT: Hilez)

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 希拉（xī lā），《思》希辣。亚杜兰人，雅各的儿子犹大的朋友。Hirah

Terms.Localization: man from Adullam; friend of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 希兰（xī lan），《思》希兰。大卫和所罗门时期的泰尔王；1- חִירָם 和 1- חוּרָם。Hiram (Huram)

Terms.Localization: king of Tyre; time of David and Solomon; 1- חִירָם and 1- חוּרָם

Localization.Gloss: 《现》户兰（hu lan），《和》户兰，希兰（xī lan），《思》希兰，胡兰阿彼。工匠；来自泰尔；所罗门时期；2- חִירָם 和 2- חוּרָם。Hiram (Huram)

Terms.Localization: craftsman; from Tyre; time of Solomon; 2- חִירָם and 2- חוּרָם

Localization.Gloss: 希兰（xī lan），《思》希兰。大卫和所罗门时代的泰尔王。Hiram (Huram)

Terms.Localization: king of Tyre; time of David and Solomon; 1- חִירוֹם and 1- חוּרָם

Localization.Gloss: 户兰（hu lan），《思》希兰。所罗门时代的从泰尔来的巧匠。Hiram (Huram)

Terms.Localization: craftsman; from Tyre; time of Solomon; 2- חִירוֹם and 2- חוּרָם

Localization.Gloss: 鱼钩，鱼叉。约与一个人高度相等的木棒；一端有锐利和带倒钩的金属或骨尖，另一端绑着一条绳子，用来抛向海里的鱼或其他海洋生物；常指攻击和控制。harpoon, fishing spear

Terms.Localization: wooden rod about the length of a man; with a metal or bone point with barbs on one end, and a rope on the other end; thrown at fish or aquatic animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 哈基拉（山）（hā jī lā (shān)），《思》曷勒士（山）／哈基拉（山）。犹大支派属地的山地，在旷野边缘，位置不详。Hachilah

Terms.Localization: hill; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈迦利亚（hā jiā li ya），《思》哈加里雅。尼希米的父亲。Hacaliah

Terms.Localization: father of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 能力；技能。有一定熟练程度的状态。ability; skill

Terms.Localization: state of having a certain level of proficiency

Localization.Gloss: 智慧。有高度智慧聪明的状态。wisdom

Terms.Localization: state of having a high degree of wisdom or intelligence

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈革摩尼宗族（hā ge mo ni zōng zu），《和》哈革摩尼的，《思》哈革摩尼的。哈革摩尼是大卫勇士雅朔班的父亲。Hachmonite

Terms.Localization: father of Jashobeam, warrior, time of David

Localization.Gloss: 哈摩尼的（hā mo ni de），《思》哈革摩尼的。哈摩尼是大卫众子的老师耶歇的父亲。Hachmonite

Terms.Localization: father of Jehiel, official, time of David

Localization.Gloss: 不洁净的／俗的。平常人毋须先进行洁净的仪式便可以接触的东西。profane, ordinary, common

Terms.Localization: something that is accessible to ordinary people without requiring a purification ritual

Localization.Gloss: 希拉（xī lā），《思》赫拉。。犹大支派提哥亚之祖亚施户的两个妻子之一。Hela

Terms.Localization: wife of Ashhur, founder of Tekoa

Localization.Gloss: 希立（xī li），《思》赫肋得。大卫的勇士，俄陀聂族尼陀法人巴拿之子。黑玳的别称。Heleb

Terms.Localization: son of Baanah; from Netophah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 黑巴（hēi bā），《思》赫耳巴。亚设支派所得的迦南城镇，位置不详。Helbah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 黑本（hēi běn），《思》赫耳朋。叙利亚境内，大马色以北的城镇。Helbon

Terms.Localization: town; Syria

Localization.Gloss: 《现》白松香，《和》喜利比拿，《思》白松香；一种带香气的胶状树脂；从茴香科植物中获得；是圣礼时所焚香料的材料。galbanum

Terms.Localization: fragrant resinous gum; obtained from the fennel plant (Ferula galbaniflua); ingredient of holy incense

Localization.Gloss: 希立（xī li），《思》赫肋得。大卫的勇士，俄陀聂族尼陀法人巴拿之子。黑玳的别称。Heled

Terms.Localization: son of Baanah; from Netophah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 鼬鼠／鼹鼠。细小，敏捷，身体纤长的四脚动物；性情凶猛，属肉食性；不洁动物，所以不能供人食用。mongoose or weasel

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unsure: small, nimble, slender-bodied four-footed animal; ferocious and carnivorous; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 户勒大（hu le da），《思》胡耳达。沙龙的妻子，犹大王约西亚时期的女先知。Huldah

Terms.Localization: prophetess; time of Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 黑玳（hēi dai），《思》赫耳待。大卫的勇士，俄陀聂族尼陀法人巴拿之子。Heldai

Terms.Localization: son of Baanah; from Netophah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 黑玳（hēi dai），《思》赫耳待。撒迦利亚先知时期的祭司之一。Heldai

Terms.Localization: priest; time of prophet Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 热切地恳求某人帮助或施恩。字面意思：使某人的脸变弱；因此解作：谦卑地恳求某人展示同情心来削弱某人的决心。fervently ask someone for help or goodwill

Terms.Localization: literally: to weaken someone's face; hence: to weaken someone's resolve by humbly imploring that person to show compassion

Localization.Gloss: 哈腊（城）（hā la (cheng)），《思》哈拉（黑）。以色列人被亚述人掳到之地，位于尼尼微北部。Halah

Terms.Localization: town in Assyria; north of Niniveh

Localization.Gloss: 哈忽（hā hū），《思》哈耳胡耳。犹大支派的山地城镇之一，位于希伯仑以北。Halhul

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈利（hā li），《思》哈里。亚设支派属地的城镇之一，位于亚柯的东南方。Hali

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 污秽／不洁净／亵渎／辱没。进行使某人或某物在礼仪上变得不洁净的行为。to profane

Terms.Localization: to perfom an action that causes someone or something to become ritually unclean

Localization.Gloss: 玷污； 亵渎； 侮辱。进行给某人或某物人带来羞辱的行为。to dishonor

Terms.Localization: to perform an action that brings dishonor to someone or something

Localization.Gloss: 《现》黑玳（hēi dai），《和》希连（xī lian），《思》赫耳待。撒迦利亚先知时期的祭司之一。Helem

Terms.Localization: priest; time of prophet Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 马齿苋汁，锦葵。可能是马齿苋或锦葵；马齿苋是一种有浓滑汁液的植物；锦葵是一种枝叶茂密的灌木，有椭圆形叶子，它的嫩芽和嫩叶都可供食用；可作食物；被视为并不美味可口。purslane

Terms.Localization: either: purslane, a plant with a thick slimy juice, or: mallow, a bushy shrub with oval leaves, of which the buds and the young leaves are edible; Suaeda asphaltica or Atriplex halimus; may serve as food; regarded as not very tasty

Localization.Gloss: 希伦（xī lun），《思》赫隆 ／厄隆。西布伦支派的族长以利押的父亲。Helon

Terms.Localization: father of Eliab; tribe of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 希利弗（xī li fu），《思》赫肋弗。拿弗他利支派属地的城镇之一，位于耶斯列的东北。Heleph

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 希利斯（xī li sī），《思》赫肋兹。帕勒提人或比伦人，大卫的勇士之一。Helez

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 希利斯（xī li sī），《思》赫肋兹。犹大支派耶拉篾的子孙。Helez

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 希勒（xī le），《思》赫肋克。玛拿西支派基列的儿子。Helek

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 希勒恺（xī le kǎi），《思》赫耳凯。被掳归回时期的祭司。Helkai

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 希勒（族）（xī le (zu)），《思》赫肋克家族。玛拿西支派基列的儿子希勒的子孙。Helekite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Helek; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希耳克雅。希西家的家宰以利亚敬的父亲。Hilqiah

Terms.Localization: father of Eliakim, official, time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希耳克雅。沙龙的儿子，以斯拉的祖先，大祭司；属希西家王时期。Hilqiah

Terms.Localization: son of Shallum; high priest; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希耳克雅。利未支派米拉利的子孙，暗西的儿子，以探的先祖。Hilqiah

Terms.Localization: son of Amzi; ancestor of Etan; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希耳克雅。米书兰的儿子，被掳归回时期住在耶路撒冷的祭司亚萨利雅与西莱雅的父亲。Hilqiah

Terms.Localization: son of Meshullam; father of Azariah, Seraiah, priest

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希耳克雅／希耳克。三个不同的利未支派人：(1) 犹大王约西亚时期的大祭司（代下35.8）。(2)被掳归回后耶书亚时期的祭司之一（尼12.7）。(3)被掳归回时期的祭司家族族长之一（尼12.21）。Hilqiah

Terms.Localization: various men; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希则克雅。耶利米先知时期，基玛利的父亲。Hilqiah

Terms.Localization: father of Gemariah; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希耳克雅。希西家的家宰以利亚敬的父亲。Hilkiah

Terms.Localization: father of Eliakim, official, time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希耳克雅。犹大王希西家时期的大祭司，沙龙的儿子。Hilkiah

Terms.Localization: son of Shallum; high priest; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希耳克雅。利未支派米拉利的子孙，何萨的次子，圣殿的守门人。Hilkiah

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 希勒家（xī le jiā），《思》希耳克雅。先知耶利米的父亲，便雅悯地亚拿突城的祭司。Hilkiah

Terms.Localization: father of Jeremiah, prophet

Localization.Gloss: 黑甲（hēi jiǎ），《思》赫耳卡特。亚设支派的属地，后来分配给利未支派的革顺族为业，位于基顺河之东岸。Helkath

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 含，《思》含。挪亚之子。Ham

Terms.Localization: son of Noah

Localization.Gloss: 含。国家名称；埃及的另一名字Ham

Terms.Localization: location; poetical for Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 欣但（xīn dan），《思》赫默丹。西珥的子孙，何利人底顺的儿子。Hemdan

Terms.Localization: son of Dishon; descendant of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 哈母利（hā mǔ li），《思》哈慕耳。西缅支派米施玛的儿子。Hammuel

Terms.Localization: son of Mishma; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈慕她（hā mu tā）／哈慕他，《和》哈慕她，《思》哈慕塔耳。立拿人耶利米的女儿，犹大王约西亚的妻子，约哈斯和西底家的母亲。Hamutal

Terms.Localization: wife of Josiah, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈母勒（hā mǔ le），《思》哈慕耳。犹大家族法勒斯的儿子。Hamul

Terms.Localization: son of Perez; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈母勒宗族（hā mǔ le zōng zu），《和》哈母勒族，《思》哈慕耳家族。犹大家族法勒斯的儿子哈母勒的后裔。Hamulite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Hamul, son of Perez; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈们（hā men），《思》哈孟。亚设支派的城镇之一，位于推罗以南。Hammon

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 哈们（hā men），《思》哈孟。利未支派革顺族在拿弗他利支派所取得为业的城镇之一， 位于加利利海南部的西岸边。Hammon

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 驴。家畜类动物，生物上与马属同一科，比马细小，耳朵较长；它有多种颜色，由深褐色，浅棕至灰色，以至偶然出现的白色；用于骑行，运送货物，或完成其他工作；受高度评价；雄性的驴，参עַיִר；雌性的驴，参אָתֹון。donkey

Terms.Localization: domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; Equus Asinus africanus; used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; highly regarded; for male see עַיִר; female see אָתוֹן

Localization.Gloss: 哈抹（hā mǒ），《思》哈摩尔。示剑的父亲。Hamor

Terms.Localization: father of Shechem

Localization.Gloss: 《现》蜥蜴，《和》蛇医。身躯细小的爬虫类动物，与蜥蝪相似，生物上属石龙子科；身体呈微黄色；居住沙漠地区；它不攀爬，这方面并不像真正的蜥蝪，却躲藏在石头底下或洞穴里；成群结队地出没的陆上生物；不洁的动物，所以不能供人食用。skink

Terms.Localization: small reptile resembling a lizard; Scincidae family; yellowish in color; lives in desert places; unlike the true lizard it does not climb, but hides under stones or in holes; swarming land creature; unclean animal, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 宏他（hong tā），《思》胡默达。犹大支派属地的山地城镇之一，位置不详。Humtah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》欣但(xīn dan)，《和》哈默兰（hā mo lan），《思》哈默郎。西珥的后裔，底顺的儿子。Hamran

Terms.Localization: son of Dishon; descendant of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 哈末（hā mo），《思》哈玛特。拿弗他利支派的坚固城之一，位于加利利海南部的西岸边。Hammath

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 哈末（hā mo），《思》哈玛特。基尼人利甲家的先祖。Hammath

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Kenites

Localization.Gloss: 哈马（hā mǎ），《思》哈玛特。大马士革城以北的城镇，在今日叙利亚的奥朗特斯（Orontes）河流域。Hamath

Terms.Localization: town on Orontes river; חֲמָת רַבָּה and חֲמָת צוֹבָה

Localization.Gloss: 哈末．多珥（hā mo-duō ěr），《思》哈摩特多尔。位于拿弗他利支派的地业中的一座逃城，位于加利利海南部的西岸边。Hammoth-Dor

Terms.Localization: town of refuge; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 哈马．琐巴（hā mǎ-suǒ bā），《思》哈玛特祚巴。奥朗特斯（Orontes）河流域的城镇；חֲמָת רַבָּה 和 חֲמָת。Hamath-zobah

Terms.Localization: town on Orontes river; חֲמָת רַבָּה and חֲמָת

Localization.Gloss: 《现》大哈马市（da hā mǎ shi），《和》哈马大城（hā mǎ da cheng），大城哈马（da cheng hā mǎ）《思》大哈玛特。奥朗特斯（Orontes）河上的城镇；חֲמָת 和 חֲמָת צוֹבָה。Hamath-rabbah, Hamath the great

Terms.Localization: town on Orontes river; חֲמָת and חֲמָת צוֹבָה

Localization.Gloss: 哈马人（hā mǎ ren），《思》哈玛特人。迦南的后裔，哈马的居民。Hamathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Hamath; descendant of Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 恩惠，恩典；怜悯，同情；仁慈；赞许。对他人怀着积极和同情态度的状态。favor; approval; pity; grace; kindness; mercy; compassion

Terms.Localization: state of having a positive and compassionate attitude towards someone else

Localization.Gloss: 仁慈，和蔼，亲切。为了赢得别人好感而表现得善良和亲切的过程。gracious

Terms.Localization: process of being performed in a kind and gracious way in order to win a favorable attitude from someone else

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约西亚（yuē xī ya），《和》贤（xian），《思》约史雅。西番雅的儿子；先知撒迦利亚的时代。Hen

Terms.Localization: son of Zephaniah; time of prophet Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 希拿达（xī na da），《思》赫纳达得。被掳归回后的利未家族领袖。Henadad

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈娜（hā na），《和》哈拿（hā na），《思》亚纳。以利加拿的妻子之一，先知撒母耳的母亲。Hannah

Terms.Localization: wife of Elkanah; mother of Samuel

Localization.Gloss: 以诺（yǐ nuo），《思》哈诺客。塞特的后裔，雅列之子，玛土撒拉之父。Enoch, Hanoch

Terms.Localization: son of Jared; descendant of Seth

Localization.Gloss: 以诺（yǐ nuo），《思》哈诺客。该隐的儿子及以其名字命名的城。Enoch, Hanoch

Terms.Localization: son of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 哈诺（hā nuo），《思》哈诺客。亚伯拉罕与基土拉的孙子，米甸的儿子。Enoch, Hanoch

Terms.Localization: son of Midian, son of Keturah, wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 哈诺（hā nuo），《思》哈诺客。吕便的儿子。Enoch, Hanoch

Terms.Localization: son of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 有恩惠的／仁慈的。指对他人有积极或富有同情心的态度，并用行动表现出来的意愿。generous; merciful

Terms.Localization: state of having a positive and compassionate attitude towards someone else and a willlingness to act

Localization.Gloss: 哈嫩（hā nen），《思》哈农。亚扪人的王拿辖的儿子，继承拿辖作王。Hanun

Terms.Localization: son of Nahash; king of Ammon

Localization.Gloss: 哈嫩（hā nen），《思》哈农。被掳归回时期修建城墙的几个以色列人：(1) 与撒挪亚的居民协助修造耶路撒冷的谷门的人（尼13:13）。(2) 萨拉的第六子，在被掳归回后协助修补耶路撒冷东面的城墙（尼3:30）。Hanun

Terms.Localization: various men; repairers of wall; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 汉聂（han nie），《思》哈尼耳。以弗的儿子，玛拿西支派的首领。Hanniel

Terms.Localization: son of Ephod; chief; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 汉尼业（han ni ye），《思》哈巴耳。乌拉的儿子，亚设支派的族长与大能的勇士。Hanniel

Terms.Localization: son of Ulla; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 奉献。使建筑物预备好，可以开始使用，通常是把它献给一位神明。to dedicate

Terms.Localization: to make a building ready for use, usually by devoting it to a deity

Localization.Gloss: 奉献（仪式），奉献典礼的献祭。使建筑物预备好，可以开始使用，通常是把它献给一位神明。。dedication (ceremony), dedication offering

Terms.Localization: act of making a building ready for use, usually by devoting it to a deity

Localization.Gloss: 奉献（仪式），奉献典礼的献祭。使建筑物预备好，可以开始使用，通常是把它献给一位神明。。dedication (ceremony), dedication offering

Terms.Localization: act of making a building ready for use, usually by devoting it to a deity

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈诺（hā nuo），《和》哈诺族，《思》哈诺客家族。吕便支派的哈诺的后裔。Hanochite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Hanoch; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈拿默（hā na mo），《和》哈拿篾（hā na mie），《思》哈纳默耳。沙龙的儿子，先知耶利米的堂兄弟。Hanamel

Terms.Localization: son of Shallum, uncle of prophet Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 被仁慈对待； 宽宏大量； 怜悯； 恩待； 同情。仁慈地对待某人，或由于怜悯其他人，而作出相应的行动。to be kindly disposed; be generous; be merciful

Terms.Localization: to be favorably disposed to someone, or to experience an emotion of compassion towards other people, and act accordingly

Localization.Gloss: 哀求／恳求／祈求。十分谦卑地来到某人面前，以期得到他的恩待。to beg for mercy

Terms.Localization: to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else by approaching that person in a very humble way

Localization.Gloss: 哈难（hā nan），《思》哈南。便雅悯支派的一个领袖，沙煞的儿子。Hanan

Terms.Localization: son of Shashak; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 哈难（hā nan），《思》哈南。扫罗的后裔，便雅悯支派人，亚悉的六个儿子之一。Hanan

Terms.Localization: son of Azel; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 哈难（hā nan），《思》哈南。玛迦的儿子，大卫的勇士之一。Hanan

Terms.Localization: son of Maacah; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 哈难（hā nan），《思》哈南。跟随所罗巴伯返回耶路撒冷的尼提宁（殿役）家族族长之一。Hanan

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈难（hā nan），《思》哈南。被掳归回时期的几个以色列人：(1)协助以斯拉宣讲律法的人之一（尼8:7；10:10）。(2)以斯拉时代，两个一同随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的领袖（尼10:22, 26）。(3)撒刻的儿子，尼希米时代协助管理库房的人之一（尼13:13）。Hanan

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈难（hā nan），《思》哈南。耶利米先知时期神人伊基大利的儿子。Hanan

Terms.Localization: son of Igdaliah, man of God; time of prophet Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 哈楠业（hā nan ye），《思》哈纳乃耳。耶路撒冷城内北墙的城楼。Hananel

Terms.Localization: tower in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼（hā na ni），《思》哈纳尼。先见耶户的父亲。Hanani

Terms.Localization: father of prophet Jehu

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼（hā na ni），《思》哈纳尼。希幔的儿子，大卫时代在圣殿中负责吹角颂赞的乐师。Hanani

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼（hā na ni），《思》哈纳尼。音麦的子孙，被掳归回后听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的祭司之一。Hanani

Terms.Localization: descendant of Immer; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼（hā na ni），《思》哈纳尼。尼希米的兄弟，后来成为管理耶路撒冷的人之一。Hanani

Terms.Localization: brother of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼（hā na ni），《思》哈纳尼。被掳归回后的祭司，在耶路撒冷城墙奉献礼中负责奏乐。Hanani

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》哈纳尼雅。犹大支派人，所罗巴伯的儿子之一。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: son of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》哈纳尼雅。便雅悯支派的一个领袖，沙煞的儿子。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: son of Shashak; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》哈纳尼雅。希幔的儿子，大卫时期的圣殿乐师之一。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》哈纳尼雅。被掳归回时期的几个以色列人：(1)比拜的子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人（拉10:28）；(2)在尼希米时代修建耶路撒冷城墙的其中一人，他是作香的（尼3:8）；(3) 示利米雅的儿子，在尼希米时代修建耶路撒冷城墙（尼3:30）；(4) 尼希米时代管理耶路撒冷的其中一人，是个敬畏神的人（尼7:2）；(5) 随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的其中一人（尼10:23）；(6) 参与耶路撒冷城墙奉献礼的祭司之一（尼12:41）。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》哈纳尼雅。利未支派耶利米族的族长，耶路撒冷城墙奉献礼的祭司之一。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: family head; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》哈纳尼雅。先知耶利米时期的假先知，基遍人押朔的儿子。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: false prophet; time of prophet Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼亚（hā na ni ya），《思》哈纳尼雅。犹大王西底家时期的守门官伊利雅的祖父。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: grandfather of Irijah, captain of the guard, time of king Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》阿纳尼雅。但以理的三友之一，沙得拉的希伯来文名字。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》阿纳尼雅。但以理的朋友。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》哈纳尼雅。希幔的儿子，大卫时期的圣殿乐师之一。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; singer; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》哈纳尼雅。犹大王乌西雅时代的一个将军。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: official; time of Uzziah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈难（hā nan），《和》哈拿尼雅（hā na ni yǎ），《思》哈纳尼雅。犹大王约雅敬时代的一个领袖，西底家的父亲。Hananiah

Terms.Localization: father of Zedekiah, official; time of Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 哈内斯（hā nei sī），《思》哈乃斯。在埃及境内的一座城镇。Hanes

Terms.Localization: town; Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 哈拿顿（hā na dun），《思》哈纳通。西布伦支派地业的城镇之一，位于米吉多以北。Hannathon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 显示个人忠诚 ；显示个人守信。忠诚地行事。to show oneself loyal; to show oneself faithful

Terms.Localization: to act with loyalty

Localization.Gloss: 慈爱，恩慈；忠诚； 信实； 投入。一种状态，指人或神明坚决地履行责任，这种决心藉由他们的行动表现出来；这种责任可能来源于契约或协议，又或者是出于道德义务，而报答曾给自己施予恩惠的他人。kindness; lovingkindness; solidarity; joint liability; grace

Terms.Localization: state whereby humans or deities are committed to fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; either obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do good to someone who has done good to you

Localization.Gloss: 哈撒底（hā sā dǐ），《思》哈撒狄雅。犹大支派人，所罗巴伯的儿子。Hasadiah

Terms.Localization: son of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 寻求或寻找庇护、保护。因困难境况而前往某一地点以寻求保护或安稳。seek/find refuge, protection

Terms.Localization: to go to a certain location because of difficult circumstances in order to find protection or safety

Localization.Gloss: （在上帝里面）寻求或寻找安全。因困难境况而信靠他人以寻求保护或安稳。seek/find safety (in God)

Terms.Localization: to put one's trust in someone else because of difficult circumstances in order to find protection or safety

Localization.Gloss: 何萨（he sa），《思》辣玛。亚设支派属地的城镇之一，位于推罗的东南方海岸。Hosah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 何萨（he sa），《思》曷撒。米拉利子孙，大卫时期圣殿守卫的家族族长。Hosah

Terms.Localization: head of family of gatekeepers

Localization.Gloss: 避难。前往某一地点以寻求保护或安稳的行为。taking refuge

Terms.Localization: act of going to a certain location in order to find protection or safety

Localization.Gloss: 虔诚人／忠信的人／信实的人／圣民／忠贞人民。实践 חֶסֶד 的人，坚决地履行个人责任；这些责任可能是源于盟约或协议的条文，又或者是道义上作出感恩图报的行为。loyal person; pious person

Terms.Localization: someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed to fulfilling his/her obligations, whether obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do good to someone who has done good to you

Localization.Gloss: 鹳鸟。一种体型大的鸟，有长腿和长颈；白鹳有白色身体，黑色翅膀；黑鹳是光泽的褐黑色，腹部白色；两种鹳都有红色的喙和腿；两种鹳大部分时间都在陆地上或水浅处寻找食物；白鹳主要捕食蝗虫、蚱蜢和其他昆虫，也吃青蛙、蜥蜴和地面筑巢鸟类的雏鸟；黑鹳吃同样的东西，但较喜欢鱼和青蛙；属不洁的动物，不可吃。stork

Terms.Localization: large bird with long legs and a long neck; the white stork has a white body and black wings; the black stork is a glossy brownish black color with a white belly; both varieties have a red beak and legs; both types spend most of the time on the ground or in shallow water searching for food; the white stork eats mainly locusts, grasshoppers, and other insects, as well as frogs, lizards, and the chicks of ground-nesting birds; the black stork eats the same things but prefers fish and frogs; Ciconia ciconia or Ciconia nigra; unclean animal, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 蝗虫，蚂蚱。六足有翼昆虫，特征是第三对脚特别长，适于跳跃；属于蝗科；会成群结队地迁移到新的地方聚居；其他时候则独居或小群聚居；吃用方法是烤、烧、炸或焙，但在某些地方也会生吃；属洁净的动物，可以吃；由于数量众多和成群结队的特性，蝗虫被用来象征庞大、难以抵御的进攻部队，也象征上帝的惩罚。locust

Terms.Localization: six-legged winged insect whose third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; Acrididae family; moves in swarms that migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times lives solitary or in small groups; eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, may be eaten; because of their large numbers and swarming characteristics, locusts were a symbol of a vast attacking army against which there was no defense and also a symbol of divine punishment

Localization.Gloss: 笼住（动物的）嘴。把一个用绳子或皮条做成的网套在动物的嘴上，防止它乱咬乱吃。to muzzle

Terms.Localization: to place a guard, made of rope or leather strips formed into a loose mesh, over or around the mouth of an animal to prevent it from biting or eating

Localization.Gloss: 愚蠢；无知。习语：缺乏常识或智慧。stupid; foolish

Terms.Localization: idiom: lacking the quality of commonsense or wisdom

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈珥哈斯（hā ěr hā sī），《和》哈斯拉（hā ěr lā），《思》哈色辣。女先知户勒大的丈夫沙龙的祖先。Hasrah

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Shallum, husband of Huldah, prophetess

Localization.Gloss: 胡巴（hu bā），《思》胡帕。大卫时代在圣殿供职的第13班次祭司首领。Huppah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 户平（hu ping）／户品（hu pǐn），《思》胡平。便雅悯支派人，以珥的儿子。Huppim

Terms.Localization: son of Ir; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 何弗尼（he fu ni），《思》曷弗尼。利未支派人，以利的儿子，非尼哈的兄弟，在示罗当祭司。Hophni

Terms.Localization: son of Eli; priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 协西巴（xie xī bā），《思》赫斐漆巴。犹大王希西家的妻子，玛拿西的母亲。Hephzibah

Terms.Localization: wife of king Hezekiah; mother of king Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 希弗（xī fu），《思》赫斐尔。玛拿西支派，玛吉的曾孙，希弗族的祖先。Hepher

Terms.Localization: descendant of Machir; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 希弗（xī fu），《思》赫斐尔／赫费尔。玛拿西支派属地，位于约帕以北。Hepher

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 希弗（xī fu），《思》赫斐尔。犹大支派的亚施户的儿子。Hepher

Terms.Localization: son of Ashhur; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 希弗（xī fu），《思》赫费尔。米基拉人，大卫的勇士之一。Hepher

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 希弗（宗）族（xī fu (zōng) zu），《思》赫斐尔家族。玛拿西支派希弗的后裔。Hepherite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Hepher; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 哈弗连（hā fu lian），《思》哈法辣殷。以萨迦支派属地的城镇之一，位于耶斯列的东北方。Hapharaim

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 合弗拉（he fu lā），《思》曷斐辣。耶利米先知时期的埃及王法老。Hophra

Terms.Localization: king of Egypt; time of prophet Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 箭。一种用芦苇或木制成的细而直的杆，大约 50-70 厘米长；一段有尖的石头或金属；另一端有一个凹槽，正好放置于弓的弦上；带凹槽的末端有时会有两根或更多的羽毛，以便使箭在飞行中保持稳定；象征。暴力，惩罚和危险。arrow

Terms.Localization: a thin, straight rod made of reed or wood, about 50-70 cm in length; at one end is a sharpened point of stone or metal; at the other end a carved notch fits on the string of the bow; the notched end is sometimes fitted with two or more feathers that helped stabilize the arrow in flight; symbol of violence, punishment, danger

Localization.Gloss: 夏琐（xia suǒ），《思》哈祚尔。位于加利利的坚固城和王国。Hazor

Terms.Localization: fortified town and kingdom in Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 夏琐（xia suǒ），《思》哈祚尔。犹大支派地业的城镇。Hazor

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 夏琐（xia suǒ），《思》哈祚尔。尼希米时期，便雅悯支派地业的城镇之一。Hazor

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 夏琐（xia suǒ），《思》哈祚尔。巴比伦王尼布甲尼撒所攻打的王国。Hazor

Terms.Localization: kingdom

Localization.Gloss: 夏琐．哈大他（xia suǒ-hā da tā），《思》哈祚尔哈达大。犹大支派地业的城镇之一，位于别是巴以东。Hazor-Hadattah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 青草，香草，干草。草的种类；植物；作为动物的食物；被认为是软弱、脆弱和短命的。grass, herb, hay

Terms.Localization: type of grass; plants; serves as food for animals; regarded as weak, vulnerable, and short-lived

Localization.Gloss: 韭菜。多年生蔬菜，鳞茎为长圆形；属百合科植物，韭葱；可作食物；很受欢迎。leek

Terms.Localization: perennial vegetable, with oblong shaped bulb; member of the lily family, Allium porrum; may serve as food; much appreciated

Localization.Gloss: 哈洗逊．他玛（hā xǐ xun-tā mǎ），《思》哈匝宗塔玛尔。位于别是巴以东的城镇。Hazazon Tamar

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 哈萨．亚达（hā sa-ya da），《思》哈匝尔阿达尔。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇。Hazar Addar

Terms.Localization: town; Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈萨．迦大（hā sa-jiā da），《思》哈匝尔加达。犹大支派地业南边的城镇之一，位置不详。Hazar-Gaddah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈撒．哈提干（hā sā-hā ti gan），《思》哈匝尔厄南。地点；可能是以色列理想边界的东北角。Hazer-hatticon

Terms.Localization: location; possibly north-east corner of Israel's ideal borders

Localization.Gloss: 哈萨．苏撒（hā sa-sū sā），《思》哈匝尔稣撒。西缅支派从犹大支派地业中所得的城镇，位于别是巴以北。Hazar-Susah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 哈萨．苏撒（hā sa-sū sā），《思》哈匝尔稣心。西缅支派从犹大支派地业中所得的城镇，位于别是巴以北。Hazar-Susim

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 《现》以难城（yǐ nan cheng），《和》哈萨．以难（hā sa-yǐ nan），《思》哈匝尔厄南。位于以色列的东北方。Hazar-Enon

Terms.Localization: location; north-east of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈萨．以难（hā sa-yǐ nan）／以难城，《和》哈萨．以难，《思》哈匝尔厄南。位于以色列的东北方。Hazar-Enan

Terms.Localization: location; north-east of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 哈萨．书亚（hā sa-shū ya），《思》哈匝（尔）叔阿耳。西缅支派地业内的一个地点。Hazar-Shual

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 希斯罗（xī sī luo），《思》赫兹赖。迦密人，大卫三十勇士之一。Hezro

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 《现》希斯伦／西斯仑／希斯仑（xī sī lun），《和》希斯伦，《思》赫兹龙。吕便的儿子，雅各的孙子。Hezron

Terms.Localization: son of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 《现》希斯伦／希斯仑（xī sī lun），《和》希斯仑，《思》赫兹龙。法勒斯的儿子，犹大的孙子，大卫的先祖。Hezron

Terms.Localization: son of Perez; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 希斯仑（xī sī lun），《思》赫兹龙。犹大支派南部边界的城镇，位于别是巴的西南。Hezron

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 希斯仑（xī sī lun），《思》赫兹龙。犹大支派地业的城镇之一。Hezron

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 希斯伦族（xī sī lun zu），《思》赫兹龙家族。吕便的儿子希斯伦的后裔。Hezronite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Hezron, son of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 《现》希斯伦族（xī sī lun zu），《和》希斯仑族，《思》赫兹龙家族。犹大支派法勒斯的儿子希斯伦的后裔。Hezronite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Hezron, son of Perez; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈洗录（hā xǐ lu），《思》哈兹洛特／哈则洛特／哈责洛特。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野安营的地方，位于西奈山的东北，基博罗哈他瓦和利提玛之间。Hazeroth

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 希斯莱（xī sī lai），《思》赫兹赖。迦密人，大卫三十勇士之一。Hezro

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 哈萨玛非（hā sa mǎ fēi），《思》哈匝玛委特。闪的后裔，约坍的儿子哈萨玛非及其后裔的族名与所居之地。Hazarmaveth

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 《现》津贴，《和》常俸，《思》常粮。定期发给某人的某物的定例。fixed allowance

Terms.Localization: a prescribed portion of something that is given regularly to someone

Localization.Gloss: 固定的数目，定额数目。一个固定的数目，设定要要达到的标准。fixed quota

Terms.Localization: a prescribed amount that is set as a standard to be met

Localization.Gloss: 《现》法律／条例／律例，《和》常例／律例／定例／法度。正式的、权威的命令或具有法律效力的要求。decree, statute

Terms.Localization: a formal, authoritative order or requirement that has the force of law

Localization.Gloss: 哈古巴（hā gǔ bā），《思》哈谷法。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Hakupha

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《现》显贵／首领／领袖／贵族，《和》贵胄。属于贵族阶层的人，因为常处于权威的地位。leader, noble

Terms.Localization: person belonging to the social class of the nobility and therefore often in a position of authority

Localization.Gloss: 曷．哈及甲（he-hā ji jiǎ），《思》曷尔哈基加得。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野安营之地，位置不详。Hor-Haggidgad

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 刀剑，暴力，战争，死亡。“刀剑”的引申喻意：暴力，战争，死亡。sword, violence, warfare, death

Terms.Localization: figurative extension of meaning of 'sword': violence, warfare, death

Localization.Gloss: 《现》何烈（山）（he lie (shān)）／西奈山（xī nai shān），《和》何烈山，《思》曷勒布。今西奈半岛南部的山脉，又名“西乃山”（Mount Sinai，或译“西奈山”）。Horeb

Terms.Localization: mountain

Localization.Gloss: 刀和弓；军事力量，战绩。字面意思：刀和弓；因此解作：军事力量，战绩。sword and bow; military strength, achievement

Terms.Localization: literally: sword and bow; hence: military strength, achievement

Localization.Gloss: 哈波拿（hā bō na）。太监；亚哈随鲁王（薛西斯）的仆人。Harbona

Terms.Localization: eunuch; servant of king Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 蟋蟀。意义不确定：一种昆虫，有专门用来跳跃的腿，可能是蟋蟀，蝗虫和蚱蜢的近亲，无翅膀，夜间活动；黑色或褐色，身体较短和较圆；白天躲在石头或木头下，或在它们挖的洞里；发出特有的高音啁啾声；以植物为食，通常是树叶。cricket

Terms.Localization: meaning uncertain: an insect with specialized legs for hopping, perhaps a cricket, a wingless, nocturnal relative of locusts and grasshoppers; black or brown, with shorter rounder body; shelters during the day under rocks or logs, or in holes that they dig; makes characteristic high-pitched chirping sound; feeds on vegetation, usually leaves

Localization.Gloss: 哈律（hā lǜ），《思》哈洛得。基甸与米甸人争战时安营之地，是位于基利波山之北麓的小溪。(Spring of) Harod; (En-)Harod

Terms.Localization: location; near Mount Gilboa

Localization.Gloss: 哈拉大（hā lā da），《思》哈辣达。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野安营之地，位置不详。Haradah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈律人（hā lǜ ren），《思》哈洛得人。大卫勇士之一沙玛的故乡哈律的居民。of Harod

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Harod

Localization.Gloss: 哈海雅（hā hǎi yǎ）。被掳归回时期协助修造耶路撒冷城墙的乌薛的父亲；乌薛是金匠。Harhaiah

Terms.Localization: father of Uzziel, goldsmith, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈路抹（hā lu mǒ），《思》哈鲁玛夫。被掳归回时期协助尼希米修筑耶路撒冷城墙的耶大雅的父亲。Harumaph

Terms.Localization: father of Jedaiah, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 何罗念（he luo nian），《思》曷洛纳因。摩押的城镇，是一处陡坡，位于吉珥哈列设的西南方。Horonaim

Terms.Localization: town; Moab

Localization.Gloss: 哈律弗人（hā lǜ fu ren），《思》哈黎夫人。哈律弗的后裔。Haruphite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Haruph (?)

Localization.Gloss: 《现》勤劳的人，《和》殷勤人／手勤的。具有勤劳、随时准备在有需要时做出行动的品格。diligent (person)

Terms.Localization: having the characteristic of being hard-working, ready and prepared to act when needed

Localization.Gloss: 钉耙／尖利的器具／快齿／打粮食的铁器。一种木制的板，上有尖石或铁耙；这种器具由一头役畜在收割下来的谷物上拖动，把谷粒和谷壳或稻草分开；这词用来象征权力和侵略。threshing-sledge

Terms.Localization: wooden board with sharp stones or pieces of iron tightly wedged into small holes; dragged over harvested grain with the help of a draft animal to separate grain from straw or husk; symbol of power and aggression

Localization.Gloss: 哈鲁斯（hā lǔ sī），《思》哈鲁兹。约提巴人，犹大王玛拿西的岳父，犹大王亚们的母亲米舒利密的父亲。Haruz

Terms.Localization: father-in-law of Manasseh, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈忽（hā hū），《思》哈尔胡尔。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Harhur

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈珥哈斯（hā ěr hā sī），《思》哈尔哈斯。女先知户勒大的丈夫沙龙的祖先。Harhas

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Shallum, husband of Huldah, prophetess

Localization.Gloss: 尖笔。尖锐的短铁杆，是在石板和金属板上刻记号，通常是写字或画图，的工具；常指恒久不变的状况。stylus

Terms.Localization: short, sharp piece of iron; used for engraving marks, usually writing or drawing, on stone or metal; associated with conditions that are permanent and are not likely to change

Localization.Gloss: 《现》巫师，《和》术士。某一类别的祭司，他们精通魔术和占卜；在埃及和巴比伦都有这些人；在王宫内工作。soothsayer, priest, magician

Terms.Localization: title of priest skilled in magic and soothsaying, found both in Egypt and Babylon, working at the royal court

Localization.Gloss: 何利（he li），《思》曷黎。以东地的何利人，罗坍的儿子，西珥的后裔。Hori

Terms.Localization: son of Lotan; descendant of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 何利（he li），《思》曷黎。代表西缅支派窥探迦南地的探子沙法的父亲。Hori

Terms.Localization: father of Shaphat; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 何利人（he li ren），《思》曷黎人。居于西珥山的民族。Horite

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 《现》袋子／钱包，《和》口袋／荷包，《思》布袋／手袋。一种容器，最初用树皮制成，可能用来携带金钱。purse, bag

Terms.Localization: kind of receptacle, originally made out of bark; possibly used for carrying money

Localization.Gloss: 哈琳（hā lin），《思》哈陵。大卫时代在圣殿供职的第一班次祭司首领。Harim

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 哈琳（hā lin），《思》哈陵。被掳归回时期的几个族长。Harim

Terms.Localization: family heads; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈拉（hā lā）／哈利（hā li），《和》哈拉，《思》哈黎夫／哈黎布。跟随所罗巴伯返回耶路撒冷的家族族长之一。Hariph

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《现》献给上主，《和》献与耶和华。使某人或某物义无反顾地分别出来归给上帝，其结果是那人或动物的死亡，城市的被毁，而其他物件则分别出来专为事奉上帝之用。proscribe, devote to God

Terms.Localization: to set someone or something irrevocably apart for God; as a result of which people and animals are to be put to death, cities are to be destroyed, and other objects are to be set apart for the service of God

Localization.Gloss: 毁灭；灭绝净尽；杀灭。把城镇、人民、动物，和物品义无反顾地分别出来，专为事奉上帝之用，方法是把城镇毁灭，把奉献的人和动物治死，而其他贵重物品则分别出来专为事奉上帝之用。proscribe; kill, exterminate, destroy

Terms.Localization: to set towns, people, animals, and objects irrevocably apart for the service of God by destroying the towns, putting the people and the animals to death, and by setting apart valuable objects for the service of God

Localization.Gloss: 撒网／网罗／拉网。一种上有浮标，下有重砣，垂直放在水中的长网；渔夫会在船上或岸上收网；把网拖向渔船或岸边的时候，鱼便被围困在渔网的范围内；渔夫撒网后会立即收回来；常指侵略和控制。dragnet

Terms.Localization: long net hanging vertically in the water with floats at the upper edge and weights at the lower edge; drawn in by men working in boats or from shore; as the ends are drawn together to the boat or drawn ashore, fish are trapped in the area enclosed by the net; drawn in immediately after it has been spread out; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 献给耶和华的物；当灭的物。一种义无反顾地分别出来归给上帝的状态，其结果是所献的人和动物必须被治死，城市被摧毁，其他物件则分别出来专为事奉上帝之用。something devoted to God, something devoted for destruction; devoted thing

Terms.Localization: state of having been set irrevocably apart for God; as a result of which people and animals are to be put to death, cities are to be destroyed, and other objects are to be set apart for the service of God

Localization.Gloss: 和琏（he lian），《思》曷楞。拿弗他利支派的坚固城之一，位于夏琐的西北方。Horem

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 何珥玛（he ěr mǎ），《思》曷尔玛。位于别是巴以东，在以东边界的城镇。先后归于犹大支派与西缅支派。Hormah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 黑门（hēi men），《思》赫尔孟。以色列东北的黎巴嫩山脉的最高峰，位于今日叙利亚的南部。Hermon

Terms.Localization: range of mountains, north-east of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 镰刀。一种大弯刀，有短木柄（长15-20厘米）；用来收割谷物。sickle

Terms.Localization: large, curved knife with a short wooden handle (15-20 cm); used for cutting grain

Localization.Gloss: 哈兰（hā lan），《思》哈郎／哈兰。城镇；在美索不达米亚北部；亚伯拉罕的父亲离开吾珥时定居的地方，他的亲戚后来继续住在那里；后被亚述摧毁；推罗的贸易伙伴。Haran

Terms.Localization: town

Localization.Gloss: 哈兰（hā lan），《思》哈郎。犹大支派人，迦勒的后裔。Haran

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 和伦人（he lun ren），《思》曷龙人。伯．和伦的居民。Horonite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Beth-Horon

Localization.Gloss: 哈尼弗（hā ni fu），《思》哈尔乃费尔。亚设支派琐法的儿子。Harnepher

Terms.Localization: son of Zophah; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 《现》希列斯隘口（xī lie sī ai kǒu），《和》希列斯坡，《思》赫勒斯斜坡。但支派地业内的一座城镇，基甸杀败米甸人之后所经之处，位置不详。Heres

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 哈勒（hā le），《思》哈勒夫。犹大支派的一个领袖，迦勒的后裔，伯·迦得的始祖。Hareph

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah; founder of Beth Gader

Localization.Gloss: 耕地。用家畜拖动犁头，破开土壤，为耕作做好准备。to plow

Terms.Localization: to break the soil with a plow, pulled by domestic animals to make it ready for cultivation

Localization.Gloss: 《现》刻，《和》铭刻。用锋利或坚硬的工具在木材或石材的表面刻上记号。to engrave (on stone); to carve (wood)

Terms.Localization: to make incised marks on a surface of wood or stone; with a sharp and hard tool

Localization.Gloss: 工匠。能用粗糙的材料，如石头、木头、金属制造工艺品的人。craftsman

Terms.Localization: person with the skill to produce an artifact out of rough materials, such as stone, wood, metal

Localization.Gloss: 黑勒施（hēi le shī），《思》赫勒士。被掳归回耶路撒冷的利未人。Heresh

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙（hā shā），《思》哈尔沙。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Harsha

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《现》哈列（hā lie），《和》树林（shu lin），《思》曷勒士。犹大支派的分地，大卫逃避扫罗时隐藏的地方，在西弗旷野中。Horesh

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 雕刻。用锋利或坚硬的工具在木材或石材的表面刻上记号的过程。engraving (on stone); carving (on wood)

Terms.Localization: process of making incised marks on a surface of wood or stone; with a sharp and hard tool

Localization.Gloss: 外邦人的夏罗设（wai bāng ren de xia luo she），《思》哈洛舍特哥因。位于以色列北部的一个地点。Harosheth-Hagoyim

Terms.Localization: location; north of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 哈列（hā lie），《思》赫勒特。犹大支派属地的森林，位于希伯仑的东南方。Hereth

Terms.Localization: forest; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈苏巴（hā sū bā），《思》哈稣法。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Hasupha

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈拔大拿（hā ba da na），《思》哈协巴达纳。被掳归回时期的一个男子，以斯拉宣读律法时，站在他左边的其中一人。Hashbaddanah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈舒巴（hā shū bā），《思》哈叔巴。犹大支派人，所罗巴伯的儿子。Hashubah

Terms.Localization: son of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 希实本（xī shi běn），《思》赫市朋。亚摩利王西宏统治之地的首都，位于约旦河东；后归迦得支派、分配给利未人。Heshbon

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。利未支派米拉利的子孙之一，亚玛谢的儿子，玛鹿的父亲，以探的先祖。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: son of Amaziah; ancestor of Ethan; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。利未人米拉利的子孙之一，布尼的儿子，示玛雅的曾祖父。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: son of Bunni; ancestor of Shemaiah, Levite

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。利未支派人，大卫时期的圣殿的乐师之一。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: clan of temple singers; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。基母利的儿子，大卫时期利未支派人的领袖。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: son of Kemuel; chief; tribe of Levi; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。被掳归回时期利未支派米拉利的子孙，以斯拉时代十二个祭司长之一，被派管理为神殿所献的金银和器皿。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。尼希米时代管理基伊拉一半地区，协助修筑城墙，也是协助立约的利未人族长之一。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: chief of half of district of Keilah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。被掳归回时期的三个以色列人：(1)尼希米时代协助修筑城墙，也是协助立约的利未人族长之一（尼10:11，12:24）。(2)玛他尼的儿子，利未人的长官，管理神殿的事务（尼11:22）。(3)希勒家族的祭司和族长（尼12:21）。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。耶杜顿的儿子，大卫时代在圣殿中供职音乐的事奉。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeduthun; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。被掳归回时期利未支派的希伯伦族壮士。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Hebron; tribe of Levi; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙比雅（hā shā bǐ yǎ），《思》哈沙彼雅。犹大王约西亚时代的利未人族长。Hashabiah

Terms.Localization: chief; tribe of Levi; time of Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙拿（hā shā na），《思》哈沙贝纳。被掳归回后随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的民众首领之一。Hashabnah

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙尼（hā shā ni），《思》哈沙贝乃雅。被掳归回后后协助尼希米修造城墙的哈突的父亲。Hashabneiah

Terms.Localization: father of Hattush, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈沙尼（hā shā ni），《思》哈沙彼雅。尼希米时代立约祷告提到的利未人之一。Hashabneiah

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哈述（hā shu），《思》哈叔布。利未支派人，押利甘的儿子，示玛雅的父亲。Hasshub

Terms.Localization: son of Azrikam; father of Shemaiah, Levite

Localization.Gloss: 哈述（hā shu），《思》哈叔布。被掳归回时期的三个以色列人：(1)巴哈摩押的儿子，协助修筑城墙（尼3:11）；(2)另一个协助修筑城墙的人（尼3:23）；(3) 随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的民间首领（尼10:23）。Hasshub

Terms.Localization: various men

Localization.Gloss: 户伸（hu shēn），《思》胡生。但的儿子。Hushim

Terms.Localization: son of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 哈顺（hā shun），《思》哈雄。被掳归回时期的家族族长之一。Hashum

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 户珊（hu shān），《思》胡商。以色列人未有君王治理以先，在以东地作王的人。Husham

Terms.Localization: king of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 户伸（hu shēn），《思》胡生。便雅悯支派人，亚黑的儿子。Hushim

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 黑实门（hēi shi men），《思》赫市孟。犹大支派地业的城镇之一，位置不详，可能在南地境内。Heshmon

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈摩拿（hā mo na），《思》哈市摩纳。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野安营之地，位置不详。Hashmonah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 草，香草，干草。意思不确定；可能指：干草，树叶；或指：容易燃烧的麦秸；植物的部分；无用的；被视为没什么价值。grass, herb, hay

Terms.Localization: meaning unsure; either: dried grass, foliage, or: chaff, which burns easily; part of plants; useless; considered of little value

Localization.Gloss: 户沙人（hu shā ren），《思》胡沙人。大卫勇士的家乡户沙的居民。of Hushah

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Hushah

Localization.Gloss: 赫人（he ren），《思》赫特人。含的孙子，迦南的儿子，赫人的祖先。Heth

Terms.Localization: son of Canaan; ancestor of the Hittites

Localization.Gloss: 赫人（he ren），《思》赫特人。迦南的次子赫的后裔。Hittite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Heth

Localization.Gloss: 希特伦（xī te lun），《思》赫特隆。先知以西结预言中以色列的北方地界，位于大马色的西北。Hethlon

Terms.Localization: location; at northern boundary of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 哈塔（hā tǎ），《思》哈塔特。犹大支派人，俄陀聂的儿子。Hatath

Terms.Localization: son of Othniel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 他比勒（tā bǐ le），《思》塔贝耳。男性；先知以赛亚时期的人。Tabeel

Terms.Localization: man; time of prophet Isaiah

Localization.Gloss: 他别（tā bie），《思》塔贝耳。男性；被掳归回时期的人。Tabeel

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 提八（ti bā），《思》特巴黑。亚伯拉罕的兄弟拿鹤的儿子之一。Tebah

Terms.Localization: son of Nahor

Localization.Gloss: 提巴（ti bā），《思》贝塔。在琐巴王哈大底谢境内的一座城镇。Tibhath

Terms.Localization: town; territory of king Hadadezer of Zobah

Localization.Gloss: 底巴利雅（dǐ bā li yǎ），《思》特巴里雅。米拉利的后裔，何萨的儿子，大卫时期圣殿守门的班长之一。Tebaliah

Terms.Localization: son of Hosah; gatekeeper; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 答巴俄（da bā e），《思》塔巴敖特。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Tabbaoth

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 他伯利们（tā bo li men），《思》塔贝黎孟。希旬的儿子，亚兰王便哈达的父亲。Tabrimmon

Terms.Localization: son of Hezion; father of Ben-Hadad; king of Syria

Localization.Gloss: 他巴（tā bā），《思》塔巴特。以法莲支派的城镇之一，位于约旦河以东。Tabbath

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 纯洁的，洁净的。指未受不良因素污染，无论是礼仪上还是身体上。pure, clean

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being uncontaminated, whether ritually or physically, by undesirable elements

Localization.Gloss: 纯洁的，洁净的。处于洁净的状态，不受污染，无论是礼仪上还是身体上，因此适合使用。be pure, clean

Terms.Localization: to be in clean state, free from contamination, whether ritual or physical, and therefore fit for use

Localization.Gloss: 明净，洁净。没有污垢和污染的状态，无论是身体上还是礼仪上。purity, cleanness

Terms.Localization: state of being free of dirt and contamination, whether physical or ritual

Localization.Gloss: 洁净。在礼仪上变得洁净的过程。purity, cleanness

Terms.Localization: process of becoming ceremonially clean

Localization.Gloss: 陀伯（tuo bo），《思》托布。约旦河东的一个地区。Tob

Terms.Localization: region; east of Jordan

Localization.Gloss: 《现》驼巴多尼雅（tuo bā duō ni yǎ），《和》驼．巴多尼雅（tuo-bā duō ni yǎ）。约沙法王时期的一个利未人。Tob-Adonijah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 多比雅（duō bǐ yǎ），《思》托彼雅。与所罗巴伯一同归回耶路撒冷的家族族长之一。Tobiah

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 多比雅（duō bǐ yǎ），《思》托彼雅／托雅。被掳归回时期的一个亚扪人，尼希米的反对者之一。Tobiah

Terms.Localization: Ammonite; official; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 多比雅（duō bǐ yǎ），《思》托彼雅。撒迦利亚先知时期的一个祭司。Tobiah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of prophet Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 多比雅（duō bǐ yǎ），《思》多彼雅。犹大王约沙法时期的利未人之一。Tobijah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 《现》粉刷／装饰／刷，《和》墁／贴／抹。在墙壁上涂上一层物料，作为保护和装饰；有时指人们为掩饰真实情况而作出的努力。to cover; to coat; to plaster; to smear; to paint; to overlay

Terms.Localization: to coat a wall with a material, to protect or decorate its surface; sometimes associated with efforts to make something appear different from what it actually is

Localization.Gloss: 《现》毒疮／疮疱，《和》痔疮。确切含义不确定：身体内部发生的肿胀或疼痛；可能是因患痢疾或黑死病等感染性疾病而引起；被视为痛苦、衰弱及对社会有威胁。tumors; ulcers; body sores

Terms.Localization: exact meaning insure: swelling of internal parts of the body or sores; probably due to infectious disease such as dysentery or bubonic plague; regarded as painful, enfeebling and threatening to a community

Localization.Gloss: 灰泥。涂抹在墙壁上，用来遮盖粗糙难看之表面的物料；常常用来形容人们为掩饰真实情况而作出的努力。plaster

Terms.Localization: coat of material painted on walls to cover ugly rough surfaces; often associated with efforts to make something appear different from what it actually is

Localization.Gloss: 补／修补。为了修补破洞或裂缝，用一块布料补在衣服上，或用一块皮革补在鞋子上。to patch, mend

Terms.Localization: to sew a piece of cloth or leather on clothing or shoes to repair a hole or tear

Localization.Gloss: 《现》提炼（ti lian），《和》提拉因（ti lā yīn），《思》特冷。犹大支派地业的城镇之一，位于别是巴地区。Telaim

Terms.Localization: location; region of Beersheba

Localization.Gloss: 羊羔。小绵羊，也许还没有断奶，与常用词 כֶּבֶשׂ 缺乏对比，因此大多数译本以相同方式翻译这两个术语；完全依赖母羊的喂养和牧羊人的保护；无助的，没有防御能力的，天真无知的。lamb

Terms.Localization: young sheep, perhaps unweaned, although lack of contrast with the frequent term כֶּבֶשׂ leads most versions to translate the two terms in the same way; fully dependent on its mother for nourishment and on the shepherd for protection; helpless, defenseless, innocent

Localization.Gloss: 提炼（ti lian），《思》特冷。犹大支派地业的城镇之一，位于别是巴地区。Telem

Terms.Localization: location; region of Beersheba

Localization.Gloss: 提联（ti lian），《思》特冷。被掳归回时期的利未支派人，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的圣殿乐师。Telem

Terms.Localization: temple singer; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 达们（da men），《思》塔耳孟。被掳归回后看守殿门的利未人，也是在圣殿守门的家族名称。Talmon

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 达们（da men），《思》塔耳孟。几个不同的男性。Talmon

Terms.Localization: various men

Localization.Gloss: 污秽；不洁净。变得在礼仪上不洁净，不管是有意还是无意而造成的结果。be unclean

Terms.Localization: to be (or become, or declare, or treat as) ceremonially unclean, whether intentionally or not

Localization.Gloss: 不洁净。处于礼仪上污秽的状态，因此不适合在宗教仪式上使用。unclean

Terms.Localization: in a state of being ritually contaminated and therefore not fit for use in religious ceremonies

Localization.Gloss: 污秽，不洁净。处于礼仪上污秽的状态，因此不适合在宗教仪式上使用。uncleanness

Terms.Localization: state of being ritually contaminated and therefore not fit for use in religious ceremonies

Localization.Gloss: 掩饰，涂抹。在表面刷上一层白色涂料，遮盖粗糙难看的表面；这样做并不能巩固结构，只是加以美化；因此，这种做法常常用来形容人们为掩饰真实情况而作出的努力。to whitewash; to smear

Terms.Localization: to cover a surface with whitewash, to make it white and cover ugly rough surfaces; it does not strengthen a structure but only beautifies it; for that reason it is often associated with efforts to make something appear different from what it actually is

Localization.Gloss: 涂抹／赦免；遮掩他人的恶行，暗示他们已被认为得了赦免。to cover > to forgive

Terms.Localization: to cover someone else's evil deeds with the implication that they are considered forgiven

Localization.Gloss: 她法（tā fǎ），《旧》他法，《思》塔法特。所罗门的女儿，便．亚比拿达的妻子。Taphath

Terms.Localization: daughter of Solomon; wife of Ben-Abinadab

Localization.Gloss: 雅撒尼亚（yǎ sā ni ya），《思》雅匝尼雅。雅利米雅的儿子，利甲族的领袖之一。Jaazaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeremiah; descendant of Rechab

Localization.Gloss: 雅撒尼亚（yǎ sā ni ya），《思》雅匝尼雅。押朔的儿子，先知以西结时期的以色列民间首领之一。Jaazaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Azzur; chief; time of prophet Ezekiel

Localization.Gloss: 雅撒尼亚（yǎ sā ni ya），《思》雅匝尼雅。被掳时期的犹大军长之一，玛迦人的儿子。Jaazaniah

Terms.Localization: army officer of Judah; time of exile

Localization.Gloss: 雅撒尼亚（yǎ sā ni ya），《思》雅匝尼雅。沙番的儿子，先知以西结时期的以色列家七十个长老之一。Jaazaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Shaphan; elder of Israel; time of prophet Ezekiel

Localization.Gloss: 睚珥（ya ěr），《思》雅依尔。玛拿西的子孙。Jair

Terms.Localization: descendant of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 睚珥（ya ěr），《思》雅依尔。以色列的士师之一（公元前1126-1103年），基列人。Jair

Terms.Localization: judge of Israel (1126-1103)

Localization.Gloss: 睚珥（ya ěr），《思》雅依尔。便雅悯支派人，末底改的父亲。Jair

Terms.Localization: father of Mordecai; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 尼罗河（ni luo he），《思》尼罗河。河流；位于埃及。Nile

Terms.Localization: river; in Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 尼罗河的支流；尼罗河的河道；尼罗河的水道。从尼罗河流出的水，无论是通过人工渠道（运河），还是，在大多数情况下，通过自然渠道（河流分支），特别是尼罗河三角洲地区的分支。Nile's branches; channels of the Nile; waterways of the Nile

Terms.Localization: water flowing from the Nile, whether through manmade channels (canals) or, probably in most cases, natural ones (river branches), especially the branches of the Nile delta region

Localization.Gloss: 那河。字面意思：“那河”；可能指底格里斯河或幼发拉底河。the river

Terms.Localization: literally: "the river"; probably a reference to the Tigris or Euphrates

Localization.Gloss: 隧道，坑道。地下通道；人类所挖掘；用于采矿；被视为人类智慧和能力的证明。tunnel, shaft

Terms.Localization: underground passageway; dug by humans; for mining purposes; seen as proof of the intelligence and capabilities of humans

Localization.Gloss: 睚珥人。睚珥的居民。Jairite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Jair

Localization.Gloss: 约西亚（yuē xī ya），《思》约史雅。先知撒迦利亚时期，西番雅的儿子。Josiah

Terms.Localization: son of Zephaniah; time of prophet Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 约西亚（yuē xī ya），《思》约史雅。犹大君王（约公元前640/639-609年在位），亚们的儿子。Josiah

Terms.Localization: son of Amon; king of Judah (640/39-609)

Localization.Gloss: 耶特赖（yē te lai），《思》约特赖。利未支派人，谢拉的儿子，立尼的后裔。Jeatherai

Terms.Localization: son of Zerah; descendant of Libni; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 耶布斯（yē bu sī），《思》耶步斯。迦南山区中央的城镇，即耶路撒冷。Jebus

Terms.Localization: town; Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 耶布斯人（yē bu sī ren），《思》耶步斯人。耶布斯城的居民；迦南的后裔。Jebusite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Jebus; descendant of Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 益辖（yi xia），《思》依贝哈尔。犹大支派人，大卫的儿子之一。Ibhar

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶宾（yē bīn），《思》雅宾。约书亚时期的夏琐王。Jabin

Terms.Localization: king of Hazor; time of Joshua

Localization.Gloss: 耶宾（yē bīn），《思》雅宾。底波拉作士师时，统治夏琐的迦南王。Jabin

Terms.Localization: king of Hazor; time of Deborah

Localization.Gloss: 雅八（yǎ bā），《思》雅巴耳。该隐的子孙，拉麦和亚大的儿子。Jabal

Terms.Localization: son of Lamech; descendant of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 以伯莲（yǐ bo lian），《思》依贝肋罕。玛拿西支派地业内的城镇，分配给利未人。Ibleam

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 雅比聂（yǎ bǐ nie），《思》雅贝乃耳。犹大支派的城镇之一，位于约帕以南。Jabneel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 雅比聂（yǎ bǐ nie），《思》雅贝乃耳。拿弗他利支派的城镇之一，位于伯善以北。Jabneel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 雅比尼（yǎ bǐ ni），《思》雅贝乃。非利士人的城镇之一，位于约帕以南。Jabneh

Terms.Localization: town; Philistea

Localization.Gloss: 伊比尼雅（yī bǐ ni yǎ），《思》依贝尼雅。便雅悯支派人，米书兰的先祖，流珥的父亲。Ibnijah

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Meshullam; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 伊比尼雅（yī bǐ ni yǎ），《思》依贝乃雅。被掳归回之后的便雅悯支派人，耶罗罕的儿子。Ibneiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; tribe of Benjamin; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 雅博（河）（yǎ bo (he)），《思》雅波克（河）。约旦河东面的一条支流，自东流经一个深峡谷，在死海以北与约但河汇合。Jabbok

Terms.Localization: river

Localization.Gloss: 耶比利家（yē bǐ li jiā），《思》耶贝勒基雅。先知以赛亚时期撒迦利亚的父亲。Jeberechiah

Terms.Localization: father of Zechariah, time of prophet Isaiah

Localization.Gloss: 易伯散（yi bo san），《思》依贝散。陀拉的儿子，以萨迦支派的族长之一。Ibsam

Terms.Localization: son of Tola; tribe of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 雅比（yǎ bǐ），《思》雅贝士。约旦河东的一个城镇，位于伯珊的东南。Jabesh

Terms.Localization: town; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 雅比（yǎ bǐ），《思》雅贝士。以色列王沙龙的父亲。Jabesh

Terms.Localization: father of Shallum, king of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 以迦（yǐ jiā），《思》依卡耳。以萨迦支派人，约色的儿子，窥探迦南的探子之一。Igal

Terms.Localization: son of Joseph; spy; tribe of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 以甲（yǐ jiǎ），《思》依加耳。拿单的儿子，大卫的勇士之一。Igal

Terms.Localization: son of Nathan; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以甲（yǐ jiǎ），《思》依加耳。犹大支派人，所罗巴伯的后裔，示玛雅的儿子。Igal

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 约比哈（yuē bǐ hā），《思》约革波哈。位于迦得境内的一座城镇。Jogbehah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 伊基大利（yī jī da li），《思》依革达里雅。神人，哈难的父亲。Igdaliah

Terms.Localization: father of Hanan; man of God

Localization.Gloss: 雅姑珥（yǎ gū ěr），《思》雅古尔。犹大支派地业的城镇之一，靠近以东。Jagur

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 约利（yuē li），《思》约革里。但支派的首领之一布基的父亲。Jogli

Terms.Localization: father of Bukki, chief; tribe of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 以大拉（yǐ da lā），《思》依德阿拉。西布伦支派属地的城镇之一，位于伯利恒西南。Idalah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 伊得巴（yī de bā），《思》依德巴士。犹大的后裔，以坦的儿子之一。Idbash

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 赞美／歌颂／颂赞／称赞。以赞赏、祝贺和欣赏的方式公开表达对他人所作或所取得成就的认可；有时候，由人向他人直接表达，但通常是由人在欢乐的、公开的敬拜中向上帝表达，尤其是在殿中，伴有诗歌和献祭。to acknowledge, praise, celebrate, give thanks

Terms.Localization: to openly express recognition of what someone has done or achieved in the form of an admiring, congratulatory, appreciative expression; expressed by humans; sometimes directed towards other humans, but usually towards God in the context of joyful, public worship, especially at the temple, accompanied by song and sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: （在上帝面前）承认（自己的罪）。人们私下或在公开场合向上帝承认自己的罪。to admit, confess, acknowledge (one's sins before God)

Terms.Localization: to confess one's sins, both in private as in a public gathering; applies to humans, directed towards God

Localization.Gloss: 易多（yi duō），《思》依多。撒迦利亚的儿子，玛拿西半个支派的首领。Iddo

Terms.Localization: son of Zechariah; chief; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 雅顿（yǎ dun），《思》雅冬。米伦人，被掳归回后协助修建耶路撒冷城墙的其中一人。Jadon

Terms.Localization: man from Meronoth; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 押杜亚（yā du ya），《思》雅杜亚。随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的民众首领之一。Jaddua

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 押杜亚（yā du ya），《思》雅杜亚。尼希米时代的大祭司，约拿单（或约哈难）的儿子。Jaddua

Terms.Localization: son of Jonathan; high priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶杜顿（yē du dun），《思》耶杜通。大卫时代的利未人，圣殿的乐师，米拉利的子孙。Jeduthun

Terms.Localization: temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 雅玳（yǎ dai），《思》雅待。被掳归回时期娶了外邦女子为妻的男子之一。Jaddai

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶底大（yē dǐ da），《思》耶狄达。犹大王约西亚的母亲，亚们王的妻子；波斯加人亚大雅的女儿。Jedidah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Adaiah; wife of king Amon; mother of king Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 耶底底亚（yē dǐ dǐ ya），《思》耶狄狄雅。所罗门的另一个名字。Jedidiah

Terms.Localization: other name of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 耶大雅（yē da yǎ），《思》耶达雅。西缅支派的族长之一，申利的儿子。Jedaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Shimri; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 耶大雅（yē da yǎ），《思》耶达雅。哈路抹的儿子，协助修造耶路撒冷的城墙的人之一。Jedaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Harumaph; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶叠（yē die），《思》耶狄厄耳。便雅悯支派人，比勒罕的父亲。Jediael

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 耶叠（yē die），《思》耶狄阿耳。提洗人申利的儿子，大卫的勇士之一。Jediael

Terms.Localization: son of Shimri; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 耶叠（yē die），《思》耶狄厄耳。大卫的勇士之一。Jediael

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 耶叠（yē die），《思》耶狄厄耳。利未支派可拉族米施利米雅的次子，是圣殿的守门人。Jediael

Terms.Localization: son of Meshelemiah; gatekeeper; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 益拉（yi lā），《思》依德拉夫。拿鹤的儿子。Jidlaph

Terms.Localization: son of Nahor

Localization.Gloss: 雅大（yǎ da），《思》雅达。犹大支派耶拉篾的孙子，阿南的儿子。Jada

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶大雅（yē da yǎ），《思》耶达雅。被掳归回的祭司之一。Jedaiah

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶大雅（yē da yǎ），《思》耶达雅。大卫时代的祭司首领之一。Jedaiah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 耶大雅（yē da yǎ），《思》耶达雅／阿达雅。被掳归回时期的几个男子。Jedaiah

Terms.Localization: various men

Localization.Gloss: 耶大雅（yē da yǎ），《思》耶达雅。撒迦利亚时期从巴比伦回归的犹太人之一。Jedaiah

Terms.Localization: man; time of prophet Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 占卜的，算命的；求问死人之灵的。能够与死人的灵魂交流的人；因此能够就如何处理某个困难的情况，或预测其结果提出建议；为摩西律法所禁止；总是出现在短语 אוֹב וְיִדְּעֹנִי 中，暗示这是二词一义：“善于与死人的灵魂沟通的人”；如果不是二词一义，意思可能是：“死者的灵魂及那些接触他们的人”。medium; one who consults the spirits of the dead; soothsayer

Terms.Localization: someone able to communicate with the spirits of the dead; and so be able to give advice on how to handle a difficult situation or predict what its outcome will be; forbidden in law of Moses; always occurs in the expression אוֹב וְיִדְּעֹנִי , suggesting a hendiadys meaning: "one experienced in communication with spritis of the dead"; if not a hendiadys the sense may be: "spirits of the dead and those who contact them"

Localization.Gloss: 《现》上主（shang zhǔ）／耶和华（yē he hua），《和》耶和华（yē he hua），《思》上主／雅威／大君。יהוה（YHWH)的缩写；以色列人所信仰的上帝的名字。Yah (=Yahweh) / LORD

Terms.Localization: God; abbreviation of YHWH

Localization.Gloss: 雅代（yǎ dai），《思》雅赫待。犹大支派人，迦勒的后裔。Jahdai

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶户（yē hu），《思》耶胡。哈拿尼的儿子，以色列王巴沙时期的先知。Jehu

Terms.Localization: son of Hanani; prophet

Localization.Gloss: 耶户（yē hu），《思》耶胡。约沙法的儿子，宁示的孙子；北国以色列的君王（约公元前841-814/813年在位），也是耶户王朝的开创者。Jehu

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoshaphat; king of Israel (841-814/13)

Localization.Gloss: 耶户（yē hu），《思》耶胡。犹大支派耶拉篾的后裔，俄备得的儿子。Jehu

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶户（yē hu），《思》耶胡。西缅支派约示比的儿子。Jehu

Terms.Localization: son of Joshibiah; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 耶户（yē hu），《思》耶胡。便雅悯支派亚拿突人，大卫的勇士之一。Jehu

Terms.Localization: from Anathoth; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 约哈斯（yuē hā sī），《思》约阿哈次。北国以色列的君王（公元前814/813-798年在位），耶户的儿子。Jehoahaz

Terms.Localization: son of Jehu; king of Israel (814/13-798)

Localization.Gloss: 约哈斯（yuē hā sī），《思》约阿哈次。南国犹大的君王（公元前609年在位），约西亚的儿子。Jehoahaz

Terms.Localization: son of Josiah; king of Judah (609)

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚哈谢（ya hā xie），《和》约哈斯（yuē hā sī），《思》约阿哈次／阿哈齐雅。南国犹大的君王（公元前841年在位），约兰的儿子。Jehoahaz

Terms.Localization: son of Joram; king of Judah (841)

Localization.Gloss: 约阿施（yuē ā shī），《思》约阿士。犹大的君王（公元前835-796年在位），亚哈谢的儿子。Jehoash

Terms.Localization: son of Ahaziah; king of Judah (835-796)

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约华施（yuē hua shī），《和》约阿施（yuē ā shī），《思》耶曷阿士。北国以色列的君王（约公元前798-782/781年在位），约哈斯的儿子。Jehoash

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoahaz; king of Israel (798-782/81)

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹大。犹大支派的领地。Judah, Jehud

Terms.Localization: territory of tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 伊胡得（yī hu de），《思》耶胡得。城镇；在但的境内。Judah, Jehud

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹大。雅各与利亚的儿子，以色列支派的先祖之一。Judah

Terms.Localization: son of Jacob; founder of tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹达。被掳归回后的五个人：(1)娶了外邦女子的利未人之一；(2)便雅悯支派人，哈西努亚的儿子，尼希米时期耶路撒冷的副官；(3)跟所罗巴伯回到犹大的利未人；(4)犹大的首领之一，参与耶路撒冷城墙的告成礼；(5)撒迦利亚的弟兄，庆祝城墙完成的礼仪中，负责奏乐的祭司。Judah

Terms.Localization: various men

Localization.Gloss: 犹太人（you tai ren），《思》犹太人。以色列人后裔的别称。Jew

Terms.Localization: another name for a descendant of the Israelites

Localization.Gloss: 《现》犹大（太）人（you da (tai) ren）／犹大支族／以色列人（yǐ se lie ren），《和》犹大(人)，《思》犹大(人) ／犹太人。属于犹大支派的百姓。Judean; Jew

Terms.Localization: member of tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 犹大话。犹大王国的人所说的语言。Judean, the language of Judah

Terms.Localization: (f.sg.) the language of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 犹底（you dǐ），《思》犹狄。犹大王约雅敬的王室仆役，尼探雅的儿子。Jehudi

Terms.Localization: son of Nethaniah; official; time of king Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 犹滴（you dī），《思》友狄特。以扫的妻子，赫人比利的女儿。Judith

Terms.Localization: daughter of Beeri; wife of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 《现》（上）主（(shang) zhǔ）／耶和华（yē he hua），《和》耶和华（yē he hua），《思》上主／雅威。以色列所信仰的上帝的名字。YHWH / Yahweh / LORD

Terms.Localization: name of God of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 约萨拔（yuē sa ba），《思》约匝巴得。犹大王约阿施的臣仆和谋杀者，朔默和示米利的儿子。Jehozabad

Terms.Localization: son of Shomer, Shimrith; servant of Joash, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 约萨拔（yuē sa ba），《思》约匝巴得。大卫时期的利未支派人，俄别以东的次子，圣殿的守门者。Jehozabad

Terms.Localization: son of Obed-Edom; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 约萨拔（yuē sa ba），《思》约匝巴得。犹大王约沙法时期，便雅悯族的战士。Jehozabad

Terms.Localization: officer; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 约哈难（yuē hā nan），《思》约哈南。大卫时期可拉族米施利米雅的第六子，圣殿守门人。Jehohanan

Terms.Localization: son of Meshelemiah; gatekeeper; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 约哈难（yuē hā nan），《思》约哈南。犹大王约沙法时期的千夫长之一。Jehohanan

Terms.Localization: officer; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 约哈难（yuē hā nan），《思》约哈南。亚她利雅时期的百夫长之一以实玛利的父亲。Jehohanan

Terms.Localization: father of Ishmael, officer, time of queen Athaliah

Localization.Gloss: 约哈难（yuē hā nan），《思》约哈南。亚哈斯时期的以法莲支派的族长之一，亚撒利雅的父亲。Jehohanan

Terms.Localization: father of Azaraiah, chief, tribe of Ephraim, time of king Ahaz

Localization.Gloss: 约哈难（yuē hā nan），《思》约哈南。被掳归回时期的几个男子：(1)以利亚实的儿子；(2)比拜的子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一；(3)亚扪人多比雅的儿子，比利迦的儿子米书兰的女婿；(4)约雅金时期亚玛利雅族的祭司族长；(5)在耶路撒冷城墙告成礼中奏乐的祭司之一。Jehohanan

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶何耶大（yē he yē da），《思》约雅达。大卫和所罗门的护卫长比拿雅的父亲。Jehoiada

Terms.Localization: father of Benaiah, warrior, later army commander of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 耶何耶大。利未支派人，祭司；亚她利雅、犹大王约西亚时期的人物。Jehoiada

Terms.Localization: priest; time of queen Athaliah and king Joash of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶何耶大（yē he yē da），《思》约雅达。先知耶利米时期的祭司。Jehoiada

Terms.Localization: priest; time of prophet Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 约雅斤（yuē yǎ jīn），《思》耶苛尼雅。南国犹大末期的君王（公元前597年在位），约雅敬的儿子。Jehoiachin

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiakim; king of Judah (597)

Localization.Gloss: 约雅敬（yuē yǎ jing），《思》约雅金。南国犹大末期的君王（约公元前609-597年在位），约西亚的儿子。Jehoiakim

Terms.Localization: son of Josiah; king of Judah (609-597)

Localization.Gloss: 耶何雅立（yē he yǎ li），《思》约雅黎布。被掳归回之后的祭司之一。Jehoiarib

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶何雅立（yē he yǎ li），《思》约雅黎布。大卫时代在圣殿供职的第一班次祭司首领。Jehoiarib

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 犹甲（you jiǎ），《思》犹加耳。犹大王西底家时期的官长，示利米雅的儿子。Jehucal

Terms.Localization: son of Shelemiah; official; time of Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 约拿达（yuē na da），《思》约纳达布。犹大支派人，大卫的哥哥示米亚的儿子。Jehonadab

Terms.Localization: son of Shimea, brother of David

Localization.Gloss: 约拿达（yuē na da），《思》约纳达布。利甲的儿子，利甲族的先祖。Jehonadab

Terms.Localization: son of Rechab; ancestor of Rechabites

Localization.Gloss: 约拿单（yuē na dān），《思》约纳堂。便雅悯支派人，扫罗王的儿子；1- יוֹנָתָן。Jonathan

Terms.Localization: son of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin; 1- יוֹנָתָן

Localization.Gloss: 约拿单（yuē na dān），《思》约纳堂。利未支派人，亚比亚他的儿子；2- יוֹנָתָן。Jonathan

Terms.Localization: son of Abiathar; tribe of Levi; 2- יוֹנָתָן

Localization.Gloss: 约拿单（yuē na dān），《思》约纳堂。犹大支派人，大卫的哥哥示米亚的儿子。Jonathan

Terms.Localization: son of Shimeah, brother of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 约拿单（yuē na dān），《思》约纳堂。大卫的勇士之一，雅善儿子。Jonathan

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 约拿单（yuē na dān），《思》约纳堂。书记；西底家时期的人物；先知耶利米被囚禁在他家中。Jonathan

Terms.Localization: secretary; time of Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 约拿单（yuē na dān），《思》约纳堂。几个不同的男子。Jonathan

Localization.Gloss: 鸽子。一种蓝灰色的鸟，颈部羽毛有粉红色的光泽，尾端呈黑色；成群居住，主要吃种子；求爱、交配；每年几次在岩架上结巢；用作食物和祭品；被认为敏捷、温顺、纯洁，但也被认为愚蠢和不明智；因其交配习惯，被认为与爱、生育和性有关；这种鸟有时发出的呻吟声与痛苦和苦难有关。pigeon, dove

Terms.Localization: Asiatic Rock dove: bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; Columba via; used as food and for sacrifices; regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility, and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

Localization.Gloss: 约拿（yuē na），《思》约纳。迦特希弗人亚米太的儿子，耶罗波安二世时期北国以色列的先知。Jonah

Localization.Gloss: 希西家（xī xī jiā），《思》希则克雅。南国犹大的君王（公元前716/715-687/686年在位），亚哈斯的儿子。Jehizkiah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahaz; king of Judah (716/15-687/86)

Localization.Gloss: 耶歇（yē xiē），《思》耶希耳。被掳归回时期的四个人：(1)约押的子孙，俄巴底亚的父亲；(2)以拦的子孙，示迦尼的父亲；(3)哈琳的子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的祭司之一；(4)听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的人之一。Jehiel

Localization.Gloss: 耶希伊利（yē xī yī li），《思》耶希耳。利未支派革顺族拉但的子孙。Jehieli

Localization.Gloss: 耶希亚（yē xī ya），《思》耶希雅。大卫时期看守约柜的人。Jehiah

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper for the ark; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 雅利（yǎ li），《思》雅赫肋耳。西布伦的儿子。Jahleel

Terms.Localization: son of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 雅利支族（yǎ li (zhī zu)），《思》雅赫肋耳家族。西布伦的儿子雅利的后裔。Jahleelite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jahleel, son of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 獐子，麋羚；袍子。北非麋羚或红麋羚：肩高约 1.5 米的大羚羊；雄羚和雌羚的脸都很长，头部有一个大凸块，上面长着粗短的角，角先向上弯曲，然后向前弯曲一半的长度，然后大幅度向后倾斜；红棕色；草原动物，成群吃草；又或者是袍子：一种小型鹿；成年雄鹿有三尖的短角；毛皮在夏季呈褐色，在冬季呈灰色；单独或成对生活在林下灌木丛或茂密的树林中，并且总是呆在灌木或树丛附近，不超过一、两米远的地方。bubal hartebeest or roe deer

Terms.Localization: Bubal or Red Hartebeest (Alcelaphus buselaphus): large antelope about 1.5 m high at the shoulder; males and females have long faces with a large lump on the head from which sprout short thick horns that curve upward and forward for half their length and then angle sharply backwards; reddish brown in color; plains animal, grazing in herds; or, Roe Deer (Capreolus capreolus): small deer; adult male has short horns that have three prongs; fur is brownish in summer and gray in winter; lives singly or in pairs in the undergrowth of forests and thick woodland, never moving more than one or two m from cover

Localization.Gloss: 雅买（yǎ mǎi），《思》雅赫买。陀拉的儿子，以萨迦支派的族长之一。Yahmai

Localization.Gloss: 雅哈（yǎ hā），《思》雅哈特。约西亚时期利未人米拉利的子孙。Jahath

Localization.Gloss: 约提巴（yuē ti bā），《思》约特巴。拿弗他利支派的地业之一，位于亚柯的东南方。Jotbah

Localization.Gloss: 约巴他（yuē bā tā），《思》约特巴达。出埃及路线的沿途地点。Jotbathah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 淤他（yū tā），《思》犹他。犹大支派在山地的城镇之一，后来归给利未支派亚伦子孙为地业，位于希伯仑以南。Juttah

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 伊突人（yī tū ren），《思》耶突尔人。以实玛利的众子之一。Jetur

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael

Localization.Gloss: 耶可利雅（yē kě li yǎ），《思》耶苛里雅（在Qere作 יְכָלְיָה）。犹大王乌西雅（亚撒利雅）的母亲。Jecoliah (read יְכָלְיָה with Qere)

Localization.Gloss: 雅斤（yǎ jīn），《思》雅津。被掳归回后的一个祭司。Jachin

Localization.Gloss: 雅斤（yǎ jīn），《思》雅津。所罗门圣殿中在殿廊前头一根铜柱的名字。Jachin

Terms.Localization: mother of Uzziah (Azariah), king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》耶哥尼雅（yē gē ni yǎ）／约雅斤（yuē yǎ jīn），《和》耶哥尼雅（yē gē ni yǎ），《思》耶苛尼雅。南国犹大末期的君王（公元前597年在位），约雅敬的儿子。Jeconiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiakim; king of Judah (597)

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约雅斤（yuē yǎ jīn），《和》耶哥尼雅（yē gē ni yǎ），《思》耶苛尼雅。南国犹大末期的君王（公元前597年在位），约雅敬的儿子。Jeconiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiakim; king of Judah (597)

Localization.Gloss: 雅伦（yǎ lun），《思》雅隆。犹大支派以斯拉的一个儿子。Jalon

Terms.Localization: son of Ezrah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 蝗虫，蝗虫蝻子，蝗虫蚂蚱。六足有翼昆虫，特征是第三对脚特别长，适于跳跃；属于蝗科；会成群结队地迁移到新的地方聚居；其他时候则独居或小群聚居；吃用方法是烤、烧、炸或焙，但在某些地方也会生吃；属洁净的动物，可以吃；由于数量众多和成群结队的特性，蝗虫被用来象征庞大、难以抵御的进攻部队，也象征上帝的惩罚。locust

Terms.Localization: six-legged winged insect whose third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; Acrididae family; moves in swarms that migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times lives solitary or in small groups; eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, may be eaten; because of their large numbers and swarming characteristics, locusts were a symbol of a vast attacking army against which there was no defense and also a symbol of divine punishment

Localization.Gloss: 袋子，小袋。用带子挂在肩上或系在腰带上的小袋子；用皮革或布做成；牧羊人用来装食物或小件的个人用品。bag, pouch

Terms.Localization: small bag hung from the shoulder by a strap or attached to the belt or sash around the waist; made of leather or cloth; used by shepherds for carrying food and small personal items

Localization.Gloss: 《现》死海（sǐ hǎi），《和》盐海（yan hǎi），《思》盐海。直译：盐海；以色列裂谷的内陆湖泊，没有出口，含盐量高。Dead Sea

Terms.Localization: literally, the salt sea; inland lake in the rift valley in Israel, with no outlet and high salt content

Localization.Gloss: 红海（hong hǎi），《思》红海。位于非洲和阿拉伯之间狭长的海域，现今的苏彝士运河北部的地区。Sea of Reeds, Red Sea

Terms.Localization: extreme northern part of Gulf of Suez

Localization.Gloss: 耶母利（yē mǔ li），《思》耶慕耳。西缅的儿子。Jemuel

Localization.Gloss: 耶米玛（yē mǐ mǎ），《思》耶米玛。约伯的女儿之一。Jemimah

Localization.Gloss: 雅悯（yǎ mǐn），《思》雅明。西缅的儿子之一。Jamin

Localization.Gloss: 雅悯（yǎ mǐn），《思》雅明。协助以斯拉使百姓明白律法的一个利未人。Jamin

Localization.Gloss: 雅悯（族）（yǎ mǐn (zu)），《思》雅明家族。西缅的儿子雅悯的后裔。Jaminite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jamin, son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 《现》便雅悯(支族) （bian yă mĭn (zhī zu)），《和》便雅悯人，《思》本雅明族人／本雅明支派。便雅悯支派的成员。Benjaminite

Terms.Localization: member of tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 音拉（yīn lā），《思》依默拉。亚哈王时期先知米该雅的父亲。Imlah

Terms.Localization: father of Micaiah, prophet, time of king Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 雅米勒（yǎ mǐ le），《思》雅默肋客。西缅支派的族长之一。Jamlek

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 音拿（yīn na），《思》依默纳。亚设的儿子。Imnah

Terms.Localization: father of Korah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 音拿（yīn na）／音拿（宗）族（yīn na (zōng) zu），《思》依默纳／依默纳家族。亚设的儿子音拿的后裔。Imnite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Imnah, son of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 《现》音拿（yīn na），《和》音那（yīn na），《思》依默纳。亚设的后裔，希连的儿子。Imna

Terms.Localization: son of Helem; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 音拉（yīn lā），《思》依默辣。亚设的后裔，琐法的儿子。Imrah

Terms.Localization: son of Zophah; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 雅挪哈（yǎ nuo hā），《思》雅诺亚。以法莲支派和玛拿西支派地业的边界，位于示剑的东南方。Janoah

Localization.Gloss: 亚挪（ya nuo），《思》雅诺亚。亚设支派地业的城镇之一，位于亚柯的东北。Janoah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 雅农（yǎ nong），《思》雅农。犹大支派属地的山地城镇之一，位置不详。Janum

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 猫头鹰。确切意思不明；可能指：猫头鹰的一种，有灰棕色的斑纹；眼睛周围呈浅色，因此看上去像戴了眼镜；喜爱树木繁茂的地区或果园，在树干附近栖息；不洁净，因此不可食用。tawny owl

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unknown; possibly: type of owl with a mottled gray-brown color; its eyes are outlined with pale circles, so that it looks as though it is wearing spectacles; it prefers wooded areas or orchards and roosts close to the trunk of a tree; Strix aluco; unclean animal, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 亦迦（yi jiā），《思》依色加。哈兰的女儿之一，密迦的姐妹。Iscah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Haran; sister of Milcah

Localization.Gloss: 伊斯玛基雅（yī sī mǎ jī yǎ），《思》依斯玛基雅。犹大王希西家所委派的圣殿督理之一，利未支派人。Ismachiah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 雅比斯（yǎ bǐ sī），《思》雅贝兹。众文士居住之地，可能是在犹大的伯利恒附近，位置不详。Jabez

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 雅比斯（yǎ bǐ sī），《思》雅贝兹。犹大支派的族长之一。Jabez

Localization.Gloss: 易多（yi duō），《思》依多。记录列王事迹的先知。Iddo

Localization.Gloss: 耶乌利（yē wū li），《思》耶乌耳。被掳归回之后的犹大支派人，谢拉的子孙。Jeuel

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 耶乌施（yē wū shī），《思》耶乌士。以扫和阿何利巴玛的儿子。Jeush

Localization.Gloss: 耶乌施（yē wū shī），《思》耶乌士。便雅悯支派比勒罕的儿子。Jeush

Localization.Gloss: 耶乌施（yē wū shī），《思》耶乌士。便雅悯支派以设的次子，扫罗的后裔。Jeush

Localization.Gloss: 耶乌施（yē wū shī），《思》耶乌士。利未支派人，革顺的后裔，示每的儿子。Jeush

Localization.Gloss: 耶乌施（yē wū shī），《思》耶乌士。犹大王罗波安的儿子。Jeush

Localization.Gloss: 雅薛（yǎ xuē），《思》雅阿齐耳。大卫时期奏乐的利未人之一。Jaaziel

Localization.Gloss: 雅西雅（yǎ xī yǎ），《思》雅哈齐雅。利未支派米拉利的后裔。Jaaziah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 雅谢（yǎ xie），《思》雅则尔。利未支派从迦得支派所取得的城镇，位于希实本以北之地。Jazer

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē li），《思》耶厄耳。吕便支派的族长之一。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē li），《思》耶依耳。基遍的创建者。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: founder of Gibeon

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē li），《思》耶厄耳。亚罗珥人何坦的儿子，大卫的勇士之一。Jeiel

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē li），《思》耶依耳／耶希耳。大卫时期，利未支派负责在约柜前事奉的其中一人。Jeiel

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē li），《思》耶依耳。大卫时期，利未支派负责在约柜前事奉的其中一人。Jeiel

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē li），《思》耶乌耳。希西家时期，利未支派以利撒反的子孙。Jeiel
