Localization.Gloss: 基绿（jī lǜ），《思》革路布。大卫时代掌管耕田种地的官员以斯利的父亲。Chelub

Terms.Localization: father of Ezri, official, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 基路拜（jī lu bai），《思》革路拜。犹大支派人，希斯仑的儿子。Chelubai

Terms.Localization: son of Hezron; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基禄（jī lu），《思》革路希。巴尼的子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人。Cheluhi

Terms.Localization: man; married to a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 迦拉（jiā lā），《思》加拉。宁录所建造的城镇之一，位于美索不达米亚。Calah

Terms.Localization: town in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 《现》牧人用的袋子，《和》牧人带的囊。用带子挂在肩膀上，或系在腰间的皮带或布带上的小袋子；用皮革或布料制成；牧羊人用它来携带食物和细小的个人物品。shepherd's bag

Terms.Localization: small bag hung from the shoulder by a strap or attached to the belt or sash around the waist; made of leather or cloth; used by shepherds for carrying food and small personal items

Localization.Gloss: 监狱，监牢。关押罪犯或其他囚犯的地方；כֶּלֶא 和 כְּלוּא。prison

Terms.Localization: place where criminals or other prisoners were confined; כֶּלֶא and כְּלוּא

Localization.Gloss: 基连（jī lian），《思》基肋雍。士师时代犹大伯利恒人，以利米勒和拿俄米的儿子之一。Chilion

Terms.Localization: son of Elimelech

Localization.Gloss: 甲各（jiǎ ge），《思》加耳苛耳。大卫时期的四名哲士之一，玛曷的儿子。Calcol

Terms.Localization: son of Mahol; wise man; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 甲各（jiǎ ge），《思》加耳苛耳。犹大支派人，谢拉的儿子。Calcol

Terms.Localization: son of Zerah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基拉（jī lā），《思》革拉耳。巴哈．摩押的子孙，娶了外邦女子为妻；被掳归回时期的人物。Chelal

Terms.Localization: descendant of Pahath-Moab; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 基抹（jī mǒ），《思》玛待。美索不达米亚的城镇之一。Chilmad

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 甲尼（城）（jiǎ ni (cheng)），《思》加耳乃。美索不达米亚的城镇之一。Calneh

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒挪（jiā le nuo），《思》加耳诺。美索不达米亚的城镇，亚述帝国所征服的国家之一。Calno

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 《现》金罕（jīn hǎn），《和》金罕寓（jīn hǎn yu）／金罕（jīn hǎn），《思》革鲁特基默罕／基默罕。基列人巴西莱的儿子。Chimham

Terms.Localization: son of Barzillai, from Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 金罕（jīn hǎn），《思》基默罕。基列人巴西莱的儿子。Chimham

Terms.Localization: son of Barzillai, from Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 基抹（jī mǒ），《思》革摩士。摩押的神明。Chemosh

Terms.Localization: deity; of Moab

Localization.Gloss: 小茴香。可能是植物小茴香：与胡萝卜同科；这种植物从基部开始分枝，有相似的叶子和花，但种子的气味更强烈；每年种植和收获，可高达 50-60 厘米；其种子用于烹饪和药物；与其他花园种子一起引用，来说明不同植物和果实需要不同的照料和处理。cummin (cumin)

Terms.Localization: probably the plant Cuminum cyminum; same family as carrot; branches from the base and has similar leaves and flowers, though seeds have a sharper smell; planted and harvested each year, reaching a height of about 50-60 cm; seeds are used in cooking and as medicine; cited with other garden plants to show how different plants and their fruits require different care and processing

Localization.Gloss: 蚊虫／虱子。一种小飞虫，飞行时发出一种特有的鸣叫声；见于死水和植被周围；以人和动物的血为食；有些种类可以传播疟疾和登革热等疾病。mosquito

Terms.Localization: small flying insect that makes a characteristic whining noise as it flies; found around stagnant water and vegetation; feeds on human or animal blood; some species can transmit diseases such as malaria and dengue fever.

Localization.Gloss: 干尼人（gān ni ren），《思》加乃。美索不达米亚的一座城镇。Canneh

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约雅斤（yuē yǎ jīn），《和》哥尼雅（gē ni yă），《思》苛尼雅。南国犹大末期的君王（公元前597年在位），约雅敬的儿子；又名耶哥尼雅。Coniah

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiakim; king of Judah (597); also known as Jehoiachin

Localization.Gloss: 基拿尼（jī na ni），《思》革纳尼。被掳归回时期的一个利未人。Chenani

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 基拿尼雅（jī na ni yǎ），《思》革纳黎雅。利未人以斯哈族的族长， 大卫时期圣殿乐师的首领，并且管理以色列的外事。Chenaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; chief; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 基拿尼雅（jī na ni yǎ），《思》革纳尼雅。利未支派以斯哈族的族长，大卫时期圣殿乐师的首领，并且管理以色列的外事。Chenaniah, Conaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; chief; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 歌楠雅（gē nan yǎ），《思》苛纳尼雅。利未支派人，希西家王委派他掌管供物和圣物的仓库。Chenaniah, Conaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 歌楠雅（gē nan yǎ），《思》苛纳尼雅。约西亚时代的利未支派族长之一。Chenaniah, Conaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; chief; time of king Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 基拿尼雅（jī na ni yǎ），《思》革纳尼雅。利未人以斯哈族的族长， 大卫时期圣殿乐师的首领，并且管理以色列的外事。Chenaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; chief; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 迦南（jiā nan），《思》客纳罕。含的儿子；迦南人的祖先。Canaan

Terms.Localization: son of Ham; ancestor of the Canaanites

Localization.Gloss: 《现》迦南，《和》迦南地，《思》客纳罕地。约旦河以西的土地。(land of) Canaan

Terms.Localization: land west of the Jordan River

Localization.Gloss: 基拿拿（jī na na），《思》革纳阿纳。亚哈时代假先知西底家的父亲。Chenaanah

Terms.Localization: father of Zedekiah, false prophet; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 基拿拿（jī na na），《思》革纳阿纳。便雅悯支派人，比勒罕的儿子，大卫的勇士之一。Chenaanah

Terms.Localization: son of Bilhan; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 迦南人（jiā nan ren），《思》客纳罕人。含的儿子迦南的后裔。Canaanite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 《现》加利利（jiā li li），《和》基尼烈（jī ni lie），《思》基乃勒特。加利利湖及其西岸的地区。Chinnereth, Chinneroth

Terms.Localization: Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 基尼烈（jī ni lie），《思》基乃勒特。拿弗他利支派的坚固城之一，位于加利利湖的西北岸。Chinnereth, Chinneroth

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 宝座／王位。供君王所使用的座位；相对较大、精心制作；用石头或木头、珍贵的金属或象牙做成；通常有靠背和扶手；与统治和审判有关。throne

Terms.Localization: seat used by kings; relatively large and elaborate; made of stone or wood, precious metals or ivory; usually with back and armrests; associated with ruling, judging

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧。缺乏智慧和理智。stupid

Terms.Localization: lacking wisdom and good sense

Localization.Gloss: 基失（jī shī），《思》革息耳。在犹大境内的一座城镇。Chesil

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧／愚蒙／愚蠢。缺乏智慧和理智。stupidity

Terms.Localization: lack of wisdom and good sense

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧。缺乏智慧和理智。stupidity

Terms.Localization: lack of wisdom and good sense

Localization.Gloss: 基斯伦（jī sī lun），《思》基斯隆。便雅悯支派的首领， 以利达的父亲。Chislon

Terms.Localization: father of Elidad; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 基撒仑（jī sā lun），《思》革撒隆。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇。Chesalon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基苏律（jī sū lǜ），《思》革稣罗特。以萨迦支派地业的城镇之一， 位于约念以东。Chesulloth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 迦斯路希人（jiā sī lu xī ren），《思》加斯路人。族群；含的儿子麦西的后裔。Casluhim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 吉斯绿．他泊（ji sī lǜ-tā bo），《思》基斯罗特大博尔。以萨迦支派属地的城镇之一，位于东方边界上。Chisloth-Tabor

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 粗麦。一种谷物，可能是二粒小麦的一种。spelt

Terms.Localization: type of grain, probably a type of emmer wheat; Triticum dicoccum

Localization.Gloss: 银子／银钱。通常是平滑没有盖戳的银块，需要称重来决定其价值；被掳归回后，以色列人开始使用钱币。silver; money

Terms.Localization: silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile people in Israel started using coins

Localization.Gloss: 迦西斐雅（jiā xī fěi yǎ），《思》加息非雅。以斯拉打发人去招集利未人建殿之地，在巴比伦境内。Casiphia

Terms.Localization: location; Babylonia

Localization.Gloss: 棕树枝。棕树上的枝子；在住棚节时使用。palm branch

Terms.Localization: branch of palm tree; used in the Festival of Shelters (Booths)

Localization.Gloss: 棕枝与芦苇，即：每一个人，不论大小、贵贱。习语，用棕树枝（高贵而高大）和芦苇（弱小而卑微）来比喻社会上各阶层的每一个人。palm branch and reed = everyone, whether great or small

Terms.Localization: idiomatic expression that indicates everyone from the great to the small using the metaphor of the palm branch (noble and high) and the reed (weak and low down)

Localization.Gloss: 幼狮／少壮狮子。雄性年轻狮子；效率杀手。young lion

Terms.Localization: young male lion; efficient killer

Localization.Gloss: 基非拉（jī fēi lā），《思》革非辣。便雅悯支派地业内的一座城镇。Chephirah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 宽容，饶恕；赎罪。宽容，饶恕；赎罪。appease, make amends

Terms.Localization: appease, make amends

Localization.Gloss: 举行赎罪的礼仪。举行赎罪的礼仪。perform the ritual of making atonement

Terms.Localization: perform the ritual of making atonement

Localization.Gloss: 饶恕，赦免。饶恕，赦免。forgive

Terms.Localization: forgive

Localization.Gloss: 基法．阿摩尼（jī fǎ-ā mo ni），《思》革法尔阿摩尼。便雅悯支派地业的城镇之一，位于伯特利以北。Chephar-Ammoni

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 赎罪。赎罪。atonement

Terms.Localization: atonement

Localization.Gloss: 《现》克里特（ke lǐ te）／迦斐托（岛）（jiā fěi tuō (dǎo)），《和》迦斐托（岛），《思》加非托尔（岛）。地区名称，可能就是克里特岛。Caphtor

Terms.Localization: area; possibly Crete

Localization.Gloss: 《现》克里特人（ke lǐ te ren）／迦斐托人（jiā fěi tuō ren），《和》迦斐托人，《思》加非托尔人。迦斐托的居民；麦西的后裔Caphtorim

Terms.Localization: inhabitants of Caphtor; descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 小羊／羊羔；被阉割了的公羊。显然指指从外地进口的羊或一个特别配种的羊 ; 也可能指一头阉羊 （ 被阉割了的公羊 ）；不能用于献祭。sheep; castrated ram

Terms.Localization: apparently: imported foreign sheep or a special breed; or, a castrated ram (wether; never used in the context of sacrifice)

Localization.Gloss: 骆驼鞍的袋子／（骆驼的）驮篓。确切含义不肯定；指放在骆驼上、让人坐在上面的东西，可能是一个放有毯子的木架。(camel) saddle

Terms.Localization: exact meaning uncertain: something to place on a camel to sit on, possibly a wooden frame on which to put blankets

Localization.Gloss: 基路伯。天上带翅膀的生物；象征上帝的威严，与他的同在有关。cherub, cherubim (pl.)

Terms.Localization: heavenly creature, symbol of God's majesty and associated with his presence

Localization.Gloss: 基绿（jī lǜ），《思》革鲁布。位于巴比伦的一座城镇；一群犹太人从那里回到了以色列。Cherub

Terms.Localization: town; Chaldea

Localization.Gloss: 《现》王室侍卫／王室警卫，《和》迦利人（jiā li ren），《思》加黎人。王室护卫兵的成员。Carite

Terms.Localization: member of the royal guard

Localization.Gloss: 基立溪（jī li xī），《思》革黎特（小河）。约旦河东边、靠近耶利哥的一条小溪，又称雅比河。Cherith

Terms.Localization: brook; east of Jordan

Localization.Gloss: 番红花。一种长锥形草状叶子的植物，从地下洋葱状的球茎中长出来；开红色或紫色的花；它的花朵可以用来做香水和药。saffron plant

Terms.Localization: plant with tapered grasslike leaves growing from an onion-like bult under the ground; reddish or purple flower; Crocus sativus; flower is used for perfume and medicine

Localization.Gloss: 迦基米施（jiā jī mǐ shī），《思》加革米士／加克米士。位于哈兰以西，幼发拉底河西岸的一座城。Carchemish

Terms.Localization: town; on the Euphrates

Localization.Gloss: 甲迦（jiǎ jiā），《思》加尔加斯。亚哈随鲁王的七个太监之一。Carkas

Terms.Localization: eunuch; servant of king Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 骆驼，独峰驼。大型四足哺乳动物，可达 2 米甚至更高；单峰骆驼的体型更大，统一为浅黄褐色；双峰骆驼的颜色更深；骆驼适合生活在沙漠地区，在驼峰中储存多余的食物，可以长时间不喝水，在干旱地区长途跋涉；这个词似乎是指骑行骆驼，而不是载重骆驼；是不洁净的动物，不可吃。camel, dromedary

Terms.Localization: large four-footed mammal; Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; bactrians may reach 2 m.; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; suited to life in desert areas; store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods; can make long journeys through dry areas; this word seems to refer to camels used for riding rather than carrying loads; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄园。种植葡萄树的田地；一般以石墙围绕，设有一个守望塔。vineyard

Terms.Localization: field in which grapevines are cultivated; typically surrounded by stone fence, with guard-tower

Localization.Gloss: 迦米（jiā mǐ），《思》加尔米。吕便的儿子。Carmi

Terms.Localization: son of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 迦米（jiā mǐ），《思》加尔米。犹大支派，撒底的儿子，亚干的父亲。Carmi

Terms.Localization: father of Achan; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 迦米（jiā mǐ），《思》加尔米。犹大的儿子。Carmi

Terms.Localization: son of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》迦米（宗族）（jiā mǐ (zōng zu)），《和》迦米族，《思》加尔米家族。吕便的儿子迦米的后裔。Carmite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Carmi, son of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 迦密（jiā mi），《思》加尔默耳。犹大支派地业的山地城镇之一，位于希伯仑的东南方。Carmel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 迦密山（jiā mi shān），《思》加尔默耳山。位于以色列北面的一座山。Carmel

Terms.Localization: mountain in north of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 迦密人（jiā mi ren），《思》加尔默耳人。犹大支派地业的山地城镇迦密的居民。of Carmel

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Carmel

Localization.Gloss: 基兰（jī lan），《思》革兰／革郎。西珥的后裔，何利人底顺的儿子。Cheran

Terms.Localization: son of Dishon; descendant of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 甲示拿（jiǎ shi na），《思》加尔舍纳。亚哈随鲁王的七个参谋之一。Carshena

Terms.Localization: adviser to Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 基利提人（jī li ti ren），《思》革勒提人。非利士人的别称。Cherethites

Terms.Localization: other name for Philistine

Localization.Gloss: 《现》宫廷侍卫队，《和》基利提人（jī li ti ren），《思》革勒提人。大卫宫廷侍卫的称号。Cherethites

Terms.Localization: name of David's royal guard

Localization.Gloss: 绵羊羔，小绵羊。小羊，常用于献祭；כֶּשֶׂב（雄）；כִּשְׂבָּה（雌）。lamb

Terms.Localization: young of a sheep; often used for ritual sacrifice; כֶּשֶׂב (m); כִּשְׂבָּה (f)

Localization.Gloss: 基薛（jī xuē），《思》革色得。拿鹤和密迦的儿子之一，迦勒底人的先祖。Chesed

Terms.Localization: son of Nahor; ancestor of the Chaldeans

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒底人（jiā le dǐ ren），《思》加色丁人。拿鹤儿子基薛的后代。Chaldean

Terms.Localization: descendant of Chesed, son of Nahor

Localization.Gloss: 《现》巴比伦人（bā bĭ lun ren），《和》迦勒底人（jiā le dǐ ren），《思》加色丁人。拿鹤和密迦之子基薛的后裔及其所居之地。Chaldea, Chaldean

Terms.Localization: descendant of Chesed, son of Nahor; their land

Localization.Gloss: 占星者。占星者。astrologers

Terms.Localization: astrologers

Localization.Gloss: 算命的／占卜的／观兆的／行邪术的。算命的／占卜的／观兆的／行邪术的。enchanter, magician

Terms.Localization: enchanter, magician

Localization.Gloss: 行邪术。行邪术。incantations, sorceries

Terms.Localization: incantations, sorceries

Localization.Gloss: 基提（jī ti），《思》基廷。雅弗儿子雅完的后裔；希腊？Kittim

Terms.Localization: descendants of Javan, son of Japheth; Greece?

Localization.Gloss: 基提利（jī ti li），《思》基特里士。犹大支派地业的高原城镇之一，位于希伯仑以西。Chitlish

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 冠冕；王冠。圆形或半圆形的头饰，通常用贵重金属制成，并有宝石作装饰，为王后所配戴，象征她的权威和身分。crown; diadem

Terms.Localization: circular or semi-circular ornamental headdress, usually made out of precious metals and decorated with jewels, worn by a queen as a symbol of authority and status

Localization.Gloss: 罗．阿米（luo-ā mǐ），《思》罗阿米。先知何西阿的儿子；“不是我的子民”。Lo-Ammi

Terms.Localization: son of prophet Hosea; "Not my people"

Localization.Gloss: 《现》罗．露哈玛（luo-lu hā mǎ），《和》罗．路哈玛，《思》罗鲁阿玛。先知何西阿的女儿；“不蒙怜悯”。Lo-Ruhamah

Terms.Localization: daughter of prophet Hosea; "No compassion"

Localization.Gloss: 《现》丽亚（li ya），《和》利亚（li ya），《思》肋阿。拉班的长女，拉结的姊姊，雅各的妻子。Leah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Laban; wife of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 拉伊勒（lā yī le），《思》拉耳。利未支派革顺宗族的首领以利雅萨的父亲。Lael

Terms.Localization: father of Eliasaph, chief of Gershonites; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《现》利乌米人（li wū mǐ ren），《和》利乌米族，《思》肋乌明人。亚伯拉罕的儿子约珊的后裔。Leummim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Jokshan

Localization.Gloss: 利巴勿（li bā wu），《思》肋巴敖特。西缅支派地业内的一座城镇。Lebaoth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 利波拿（li bō na），《思》肋波纳。城镇；在示罗附近。Lebonah

Terms.Localization: town; near Shiloh

Localization.Gloss: 狮子。最大的猫科动物，通常从鼻子到尾巴尖约有 2.8 米，站立时肩膀高度可达 1 米（3 尺 3寸）；浅啡黄色；成年雄性脖子和肩膀周围的鬃毛比其他部位的毛发颜色更深；不洁的动物；与侵略和力量相关。lion

Terms.Localization: largest of the great cats, often about 2.8 m. from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; adult males have a mane around the neck and shoulders that is darker than the rest of their fur; Panthera leo; unclean animal; associated with aggression and strength

Localization.Gloss: 母狮。雌性狮子。lioness

Terms.Localization: female lion

Localization.Gloss: 拉班（lā bān），《思》拉班。彼土利的儿子，拿鹤的孙子，利百加的哥哥，利亚和拉结的父亲。Laban

Terms.Localization: son of Bethuel; father of Leah and Rachel

Localization.Gloss: 拉班（lā bān），《思》拉班。地点，可能就是立拿；在西奈半岛，位于临门．帕烈和勒撒之间；以色列人从埃及起行，往迦南地去时，在路上安营的地方，离摩西重申律法的地方不远。Laban

Terms.Localization: location, possibly to be identified with Libnah, in Sinai, between Rimmon-Perez and Rissah; Israelites encamped there on their way from Egypt to Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 立拿（li na），《思》里贝纳。地点，可能就是拉班；在西奈半岛，位于临门．帕烈和勒撒之间；以色列人从埃及起行，往迦南地去时，在路上安营的地方，离摩西重申律法的地方不远。Libnah

Terms.Localization: location, possibly to be identified with Laban, in Sinai, between Rimmon-Perez and Rissah; Israelites encamped there on their way from Egypt to Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 立拿（li na），《思》里贝纳。犹大支派属地的城镇之一，分配给利未支派亚伦族，位于希伯仑的西北。Libnah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah; assigned to clan of Aaron, tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 白杨树。一种树，高达 20 米；沿河岸生长。white poplar

Terms.Localization: tall tree reaching 20 m; Populus alba; grows along riverbanks

Localization.Gloss: 苏合香树，安息香树。一种小树或灌木，3 至 6 米高，有椭圆形的树叶，叶面是绿色，底部白色和有棉的质感；长白色的花与橙树的花相似；提供良好的树荫，以色列人在那里进行偶像崇拜。styrax tree

Terms.Localization: small tree or shrub, 3 to 6 m high, with oval leaves that are green above and white and cottony below; it has white flowers that resemble those of the orange tree; Styrax officinalis; gives good shade, where Israelites practiced idolatry

Localization.Gloss: 利巴拿（li bā na），《思》肋巴纳。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Lebanah

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 砖。用粘土倒模制成的方块，放在太阳底下晒干，或放在烤炉中烘硬，便可成形；用作建筑物料，尤其在很难找到石材和木材的地方。brick

Terms.Localization: block made of clay in a mold and either dried in the sun or hardened in an oven; used as a building material, especially in places where stone or wood was scarce

Localization.Gloss: 乳香。树脂类；由橄榄科乳香属树木产生的黄色或带红色树胶；乳香树是一种可生长至大约 3 米高的灌木，有多个树干和细小带绿色或白色的花；树胶从树枝上滴出来；是在会幕中燃烧的香的原料。frankincense

Terms.Localization: type of resin; Boswellia sacra; yellow or reddish gum produced by the Boswellia tree, a shrub that reaches 3m high, with multiple trunks and small greenish or white flowers; gum comes out in drops from the branches; ingredient of the incense burned in the tabernacle

Localization.Gloss: 黎巴嫩（li bā nen），《旧》利巴嫩，《思》黎巴嫩。以色列的北部的山脉。Lebanon

Terms.Localization: range of mountains; north of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 立尼（li ni），《思》里贝尼。利未支派人，革顺的儿子，立尼族的先祖。Libni

Terms.Localization: son of Gershon; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 立尼（li ni），《思》里贝尼。利未支派米拉利的后裔，抹利的儿子。Libni

Terms.Localization: son of Mahli; descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《现》立尼家族（li ni jiā zu），《和》立尼族，《思》里贝尼族。利未支派立尼的后裔。Libnite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Libni; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《现》罗德／罗得（luo de），《和》罗德，《思》罗得。便雅悯支派地业内的一座城镇；由沙麦建造。Lod

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 底璧。城镇，犹大支派的山地；分配了给利未支派的亚伦宗族。of Debir

Terms.Localization: town; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 利哈比人（li hā bǐ ren），《思》肋哈宾人。麦西的儿子利哈比的后裔。Lehabim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 拉哈（lā hā），《思》拉哈得。犹大支派人，雅哈的儿子。Lahad

Terms.Localization: son of Jahath; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 罗．底巴（luo dǐ bā），《思》罗德巴尔。位于基列境内、约旦河以东的一座城镇；属迦得支派。Lodebar

Terms.Localization: town; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 《现》利比亚人（li bǐ ya ren），《和》利比亚人（li bǐ ya ren）／路比人（lu bǐ ren）／路比族（lu bǐ zu），《思》利比亚人。利比亚的居民。Libyan

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Libya

Localization.Gloss: 《现》路德人（lu de ren）／吕底亚（lǚ dǐ ya），《和》路德人，《思》路得／路丁。闪的儿子路德及其后裔的族名与所居之地。Lud

Terms.Localization: son of Shem; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 《现》路低人（lu dī ren）／吕底亚人（lǚ dǐ ya ren），《和》路低人／路德族（lu de zu），《思》路丁人。含的孙子路低及其后裔的族名与所居之地。Ludim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 杏树。一种树，属于桃科；生长在野外，可高达 4.5 至 6 米，叶子呈椭圆形；冬天落叶，开白色或粉红色的花朵，而且花期很早；叶子更晚才长出来；肉质果实里面包着坚硬的果核；果核含油。almond tree

Terms.Localization: tree, belonging to the peach family, which grows wild, reaching a height of 4.5 to 6 m; Prunis dulcis; sheds its oblong leaves in winter; produces white or pink flowers and blooms as early as January; the leaves appear much later; its fleshy fruit encloses a stone, which contains oil

Localization.Gloss: 路斯（lu sī），《思》路次。伯特利城原本的迦南名字。Luz

Terms.Localization: town; Bethel

Localization.Gloss: 木板／板。表面平滑的扁平物；通常用木制成；是建筑或装饰的物料。board, plank

Terms.Localization: flat object with a smooth surface; usually made of wood; used for construction or decoration

Localization.Gloss: 石版／法版。石头制成的小书写板，要用铁笔来书写，常指恒久不变的状况。(stone) tablet

Terms.Localization: small, flat tablet, made of stone, on which words were scratched with a stylus; associated with conditions that are permanent and are not likely to change

Localization.Gloss: 鲁希（lǔ xī），《思》路希特。位于摩押一个海拔相对较高的地方。Luhith

Terms.Localization: location; Moab

Localization.Gloss: 罗得（luo de），《思》罗特。哈兰的儿子，亚伯拉罕的侄儿。Lot

Terms.Localization: son of Haran; nephew of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 罗坍（luo tān），《思》罗堂。西珥的长子，何利人的族长之一。Lotan

Terms.Localization: son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 利未人（li wei ren），《思》肋未人。利未祭司支派的成员。Levite

Terms.Localization: of the priestly tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 利未（li wei），《思》肋未。雅各的儿子；利未支派的始祖。Levi

Terms.Localization: man; son of Jacob; founder of tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 利未人（li wei ren），《思》肋未人。利未祭司支派的成员。Levite

Terms.Localization: of the priestly tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 力威亚探；巨型海怪。生活在海里的大型神话怪物，象征埃及及其神明，也象征亚述和巴比伦，因而是以色列的大仇敌。sea monster, Leviathan

Terms.Localization: a mythical sea animal of gigantic proportions; symbolized Egypt and its gods, and also Assyria and Babylon, thus the great enemies of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 利希（li xī），《思》肋希。地点；在非利士边界上的一个地点。Lehi

Terms.Localization: location; on the boundary of Philistea

Localization.Gloss: 陈设饼；供饼；圣饼。献祭的圣饼，常放在圣殿的专用桌子上。bread of display; bread of the Presence; sacred bread

Terms.Localization: sacred bread of offering, always present on a dedicated table in the temple

Localization.Gloss: 拉哈米（lā hā mǐ），《思》拉赫米。迦特人歌利亚的兄弟，非利士的军人。Lahmi

Terms.Localization: from Gath; brother of Goliath; Philistine

Localization.Gloss: 拉幔（lā man），《思》拉赫玛斯。犹大支派属地的高原城镇之一，位于别是巴以北。Lahmas

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 岩蔷薇；没药。芳从一种矮灌木的多毛叶子中提取的香、粘稠的汁液；汁液变硬、磨成粉末后作药用和香水。ladanum; fragrant sap

Terms.Localization: fragrant sticky juice from the hairy leaves of a low shrub; Cistus laurifolius (rock rose); juice is hardened and ground for medicine, perfume

Localization.Gloss: 《现》蜥蜴，《和》守宫。体型较小的蜥蜴，长约 15-20 厘米；皮肤光滑、有光泽、有颜色；以昆虫为食，生活在果园和森林；又或者是一种较大型的蜥蜴，长约 50-60 厘米；暗灰色；雄蜥蜴在交配的季节颜色会变得明亮；以昆虫和小蜥蜴为食；蜥蜴被列为不洁净的动物，因而不能食用。lizard

Terms.Localization: relatively small type of lizard, about 15-20 cm long; shiny, smooth, and colored skin; feeds on insects and is found in orchards and woods; Lacerta trilineata; or, larger type, about 50-60 cm long; dull gray color, except in mating season when the male is brightly colored; feeds on insects and smaller lizards; Agama stellio; lizards are listed as unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 《现》利都是人（li dū shi ren），《和》利都是族，《思》肋突兴人。族群；亚伯拉罕的儿子约珊的后裔。Letushim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Jokshan

Localization.Gloss: 《现》妖魔鬼怪，《和》怪物。确切意思不明；可能是灰林鸮的另一个名字；或：一种小耳朵、灰色具有杂斑的猫头鹰；白天栖息在靠近树干的地方，带斑点的颜色与树皮融合在一起，使其看起来就像折断的树干；叫声轻柔，有颤音；与魔鬼有关。tawny owl; scops owl

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unknown; possibly another name for the tawny owl; or, type of owl with tiny ears; mottled gray in color; by day it perches close to the trunk of a tree, where its mottled coloring makes it look like the stump of a broken branch; soft, trilled call; associated with demons

Localization.Gloss: 强壮的狮子。公狮子； 一种强壮无畏的动物。mighty lion

Terms.Localization: male lion; seen as a strong and fearless animal

Localization.Gloss: 拉亿（lā yi），《思》拉依士。“但”城（Dan）的原称，位于加利利海以北，哥兰高地的北部边界。Laish

Terms.Localization: previous name of town of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 拉亿（lā yi），《思》拉依士。迦琳人；米甲的丈夫帕铁的父亲；米甲曾嫁给大卫。Laish

Terms.Localization: from Gallim; father of Palti, who married Michal, David's wife

Localization.Gloss: 莱煞（lai shā），《思》拉依士。便雅悯支派之地，位于耶路撒冷的东北方。Laishah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利迦（li jiā），《思》肋加。犹大支派示拉的儿子珥所建立的城镇。Lekah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拉吉（lā ji），《思》拉基士。犹大支派的高原城镇之一，在希伯仑西面，位于往迦萨的路上。Lachish

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 利慕伊勒（li mu yī le），《思》肋慕耳。撰写《箴言》31:1-9中提到的王。Lemuel

Terms.Localization: king

Localization.Gloss: 拉麦（lā mai），《思》拉默客。玛土撒利的儿子，该隐的后裔。Lamech

Terms.Localization: son of Methushael; descendant of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 拉麦（lā mai），《思》拉默客。玛土撒拉的儿子，塞特的后裔。Lamech

Terms.Localization: son of Methuselah; descendant of Seth

Localization.Gloss: 拉大（lā da），《思》拉阿达。犹大支派人，示拉的儿子，玛利沙的创建者。Laadah

Terms.Localization: son of Shelah; founder of Maresha; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拉但（lā dan），《思》拉丹。以法莲支派人，他罕的儿子，约书亚的先祖。Ladan

Terms.Localization: son of Tahan; ancestor of Joshua; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 拉但（lā dan），《思》拉当。利未支派革顺家族的子孙。Ladan

Terms.Localization: descendant of Gershon; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《现》苦果／毒药，《和》茵陈／苦菜。可长至灌木大小、叶子具有棉状毛的一种植物，其叶子的汁液有苦味，可能有毒；作药用。wormwood

Terms.Localization: plant that may grow as large as a bush, with woolly green leaves; the juice of the leaves tastes bitter and can be poisonous; functions as medicine

Localization.Gloss: 拉比多（lā bǐ duō），《思》拉丕多特。女士师、女先知底波拉的丈夫。Lappidoth

Terms.Localization: husband of Deborah, prophetess and judge

Localization.Gloss: 拉共（lā gong），《思》拉孔。拿弗他利支派属地的坚固城之一，位于耶斯列北面，加利利湖的南端。Lakkum

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 利克希（li ke xī），《思》里刻希。玛拿西支派人，示米大的儿子。Likhi

Terms.Localization: son of Shemida; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 红锆石；紫玛瑙。红色或橙色的（半）宝石；可能是锆石的一种：红锆石。jacinth

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone of red or orange color; possibly variety of zircon: jacinth

Localization.Gloss: 利善（li shan），《思》肋笙。城镇；在但的境内。Leshem

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 拉沙（lā shā），《思》肋沙。位于迦南境内的南部边界的一座城镇。Lasha

Terms.Localization: town

Localization.Gloss: 《现》榖仓，《和》仓廪。用来储存谷物的房舍；通常用石头建成。granary

Terms.Localization: building used for storing grain; usually made of stone

Localization.Gloss: 天平，秤。用绳子绑在木棒的中央，两端各连接着一个盘子的一种装置，用以称量重量，有时用作比喻，以重量来描述人的地位或道德，或情况的严重性。balance; scales

Terms.Localization: contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; used for weighing objects; sometimes used figuratively in expressions describing people's status or integrity or the seriousness of a situation in terms of weight

Localization.Gloss: 咒诅%＝针对某人或某物的一种宣告，要把他们交付死亡、损坏或毁灭。curse

Terms.Localization: a pronouncement against someone or something, calling for death, damage, or destruction

Localization.Gloss: 弥伯哈。男性；哈基利的儿子战士；大卫的勇士之一。Mibhar

Terms.Localization: son of Hagri; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 自信；信靠；安全。一种安全、感到自信的状态。safety; confidence; trust

Terms.Localization: a state of security, feeling of confidence

Localization.Gloss: 米本乃。户沙人；大卫的勇士之一。Mebunnai

Terms.Localization: from Hushah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 米比萨（mǐ bǐ sa），《思》米贝匝尔。以东人的族长之一。Mibzar

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 米比衫（mǐ bǐ shān），《思》米贝散。以实玛利的儿子。Mibsam

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael

Localization.Gloss: 米比衫（mǐ bǐ shān），《思》米贝散。西缅支派人，沙龙的儿子，米施玛的父亲。Mibsam

Terms.Localization: son of Shallum; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 末必（mo bi），《思》玛革彼士。被掳归回时期的家族族长之一。Magbish

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 米吉多（mǐ ji duō），《思》默基多。玛拿西支派地业内的一座城镇；位于耶斯列山谷西南方；在以前的迦南帝国境内；犹大王约西亚与法老尼哥打战被杀的地点。Megiddo

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 塔。用石头做成、相当高的建筑；用来保卫和防御来自外部的敌对势力；מִגְדָּל。tower

Terms.Localization: high structure made of stone; for guarding and protecting against hostile forces from outside; מִגְדָּל

Localization.Gloss: 玛基叠（mǎ jī die），《思》玛革狄耳。以东人的族长之一。Magdiel

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 塔。用石头做成、相当高的建筑；用来保卫和防御来自外部的敌对势力；与安全和保护有关。watchtower

Terms.Localization: relatively high structure made of stone; used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; associated with security and protection

Localization.Gloss: 密夺。在埃及东北、邻近红海的一个地点；靠近比哈希录；以色列从埃及前往迦南途中，未穿过红海之前，曾在这里扎营。Migdol

Terms.Localization: location; Egypt; along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 密大．伊勒。拿弗他利支派地业内的一座坚固城。Migdal-El

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 麦大．迦得（mai da-jiā de），《思》米革达耳加得。犹大支派地业的城镇之一，位于希伯仑以东。Migdal-Gad

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》百楼（bǎi lou），《和》哈米亚楼（hā mĭ ya lou），《思》默阿堡。耶路撒冷城墙的塔楼之一。Tower of a Hundred

Terms.Localization: Tower of the Hundred; tower in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 《现》以得塔（yǐ de tǎ），《和》以得台（yǐ de tai），《思》米革达耳厄德尔。以得塔，以色列民出埃及时的营地之一，位置不详。Migdal Eder

Terms.Localization: location; "tower of Eder"

Localization.Gloss: 示剑楼。位于示剑附近的一座城镇，或在示剑内的一座建筑。Tower of Shechem

Terms.Localization: town; near Shechem, or construction within Shechem

Localization.Gloss: 玛各。雅弗的儿子；被认为是相同名字的国家的建立者。Magog

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 镰刀。有短木柄（15-20厘米）的大弯刀，用来收割谷物。sickle

Terms.Localization: large, curved knife with a short wooden handle (15-20 cm); used for cutting grain

Localization.Gloss: 经卷／书卷。用一张张的蒲草纸或皮革缝制而成的书写材料，通常两端各有一木棍，书卷可绕着木棍从一端或两端卷起来。这种书卷摊开来约长10米，高约23-25厘米。scroll

Terms.Localization: long strip of writing material made by sewing together sheets of papyrus or parchment; this strip was then rolled up from one end or from both ends to form one or two cylinders; usually the ends of the scroll were attached to sticks, around which the scroll was rolled; an unrolled scroll was often about 10 m long and stood approximately 23-25 cm high

Localization.Gloss: 盾牌。扁平状，通常为圆形的物件；木头或铁制成；用于战争；战士拿在身前以保护自己免受敌人武器的攻击；比צִנָּה小。shield

Terms.Localization: flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; smaller than a צִנָּה

Localization.Gloss: 盾牌；保护者。“盾牌”的引申义，描述上帝的保护。shield; protector

Terms.Localization: figurative extension of meaning of 'shield,' to describe God's protection

Localization.Gloss: 打击，瘟疫，击败。字面意思：沉重的打击；严重的伤害，损伤、流行病，或影响个人或群体的其他疾苦。blow, plague, defeat

Terms.Localization: literally: heavy blow; serious harm, injury, epidemic, or other affliction affecting an individual or group of people

Localization.Gloss: 抹比押（mǒ bǐ yā），《思》玛革丕阿士。被掳归回后随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的民众首领之一。Magpiash

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 锯子，磨石刨子，石锉刀。好像锉刀、表面粗糙的铁器工具，在大石上来回推拉，可使其表面平滑。stone plane; stone file

Terms.Localization: heavy metal instrument with a wide rough surface, like that of a file; pushed and pulled across the surface of the stone until it is smooth

Localization.Gloss: 米矶仑（mǐ jī lun），《思》米革龙／禾场。便雅悯支派地业的城镇之一，在基比亚附近。Migron

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 玛顿（mǎ dun），《思》玛冬。约书亚所攻击的迦南城镇之一，位于基尼烈城的西南方。Madon

Terms.Localization: location; Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 玛代。雅弗的儿子；玛代人的祖先。Madai, Media, Mede

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth; ancestor of Medians

Localization.Gloss: 玛代。雅弗的儿子；玛代人的祖先。Madai, Media, Mede

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth; ancestor of Medians

Localization.Gloss: 密丁（mi dīng），《思》米丁。犹大支派在旷野的城镇之一，位于耶路撒冷以东，亚割谷的荒原之内。Middin

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 米甸人（mǐ dian ren），《思》米德杨人。亚伯拉罕和基土拉所生的儿子米甸及其后裔的族名及所住之地的名称。Midian

Terms.Localization: son of Abraham; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 米甸人（mǐ dian ren）／米甸的，《思》米德杨人／米德杨的。亚伯拉罕的儿子米甸的后裔或居民。Midianite

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Midian, son of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 玛得缅（mǎ de miǎn），《思》玛德门。位于死海以东的摩押之地；可能是底本。Madmen

Terms.Localization: location; Moab; perhaps Dibon

Localization.Gloss: 麦玛拿（mai mǎ na），《思》玛德玛纳。犹大支派尽南边的城镇之一，与以东交界相近。Madmannah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 玛得米那（mǎ de mǐ na ren），《思》玛德默纳。便雅悯支派地业内的一座城镇。Madmenah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 米但（mǐ dan），《思》默丹。亚伯拉罕的儿子之一。Medan

Terms.Localization: son of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 米户幔（mǐ hu man），《思》默胡曼。亚哈随鲁王的七个太监之一。Mehuman

Terms.Localization: eunuch; servant of king Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 米希她别（mǐ xī tā bie），《思》默塔贝耳。玛特列的女儿，以东王哈达的妻子。Mehetabel

Terms.Localization: daughter of Matred; wife of Hadar, king of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 米希大别（mǐ xī da bie），《思》默塔贝耳。尼希米时期的假先知示玛雅的祖父。Mehetabel

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 玛勒列（mǎ le lie），《思》玛拉肋耳。塞特的后裔，该南的儿子，雅列的父亲。Mahalalel

Terms.Localization: son of Kenan; descendant of Seth

Localization.Gloss: 玛勒列（mǎ le lie），《思》玛拉肋耳。犹大支派人，法勒斯的儿子，示法提雅的父亲；尼希米时期的人物。Mahalalel

Terms.Localization: father of Shephatiah; tribe of Judah; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》快抢、速夺，《和》玛黑珥．沙拉勒．哈施．罢斯（mă hēi ĕr-shā lā le-hā shī-ba sī），《思》玛赫尔沙拉耳哈市巴次。以赛亚给他第三个儿子所起的名字，意思是“掳掠速临抢夺快到”，象征以色列和亚兰即将被亚述所灭，不能进侵犹大。Maher-Shalal-Hash-Baz

Terms.Localization: son of prophet Isaiah; "Quick to the plunder, swift to the spoil"

Localization.Gloss: 玛哈莱（mǎ hā lai），《思》玛哈赖。犹大地谢拉族的尼陀法人，大卫的勇士之一。Maharai

Terms.Localization: of Netophah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 摩押（mo yā），《思》摩阿布。罗得长女所生的儿子摩押与其后裔的族名，并其所居之地，位于死海东边的地区。Moab

Terms.Localization: son of Lot; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 摩押人（mo yā ren），《思》摩阿布人。摩押的后裔或摩押地的居民。Moabite

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Moab

Localization.Gloss: 轭。见מוֹטָה。yoke

Terms.Localization: מוֹטָה

Localization.Gloss: 轭。套在动物或人的颈项上的木棒，用一根绳索来控制，可以限制被套者的行动，防止他逃脱；这词经常用来比喻压迫；מוֹט。yoke

Terms.Localization: wooden pole secured to the necks of animals or human beings with the help of a rope to restrict movement or to prevent escape; often used in a figurative sense to denote oppression; מוֹט

Localization.Gloss: 割包皮；割礼。某人移除阴茎上的包皮的动作，最好是用火石刀；亚伯拉罕的后代跟上帝之间立约的记号；被视为一种外在改变 , 这种改变应该连带产生态度上的内在改变。（见[b]）to circumsize; circumcision

Terms.Localization: action whereby someone removes the foreskin of the penis, preferably with a flint knife, as a sign of the covenant between YHWH and Abraham's descendants; considered an outward change for the good that should be accompanied by an inward change in attitude as well (see [b])

Localization.Gloss: （一个人的心）受割礼 >委身（跟随上帝）。字面意思：移除心脏的包皮；因此：＝某人面对上主改变他／她的态度，就好像移除包在心脏外的东西，就像移除包皮一样，这样，心便变得乐意守约、全心事奉上帝。to circumsize (one's heart) > to (re)commit oneself (to following God)

Terms.Localization: literally: to remove the foreskin of the heart; hence: action whereby someone changes his/her attitude towards YHWH, as if by removing something that covers the heart like a foreskin, and so become willing to obey the terms of the covenant and serve YHWH wholeheartedly

Localization.Gloss: 使……受割礼；切除。确切含义不明；可能是：杀害未受割礼的敌人，割下包皮做证据。to cause to be circumsized; to cut off

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unknown; probably: to kill an uncircumsized enemy, and remove his foreskin as proof

Localization.Gloss: 摩拉大。犹大、西缅支派地业内的城镇。Moladah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah, Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 后代，家族。后代，家族。offspring, family

Terms.Localization: offspring, family

Localization.Gloss: 割礼。某人移除阴茎上的包皮的动作，最好是用火石刀，亚伯拉罕的后代跟上帝之间立约的记号。circumcision

Terms.Localization: action whereby someone removes the foreskin of the penis, preferably with a flint knife, as a sign of the covenant between YHWH and Abraham's descendants

Localization.Gloss: 摩利。耶拉篾的后裔；犹大支派人。Molid

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 摩西录（mo xī lu），《思》摩色尔。מֹסֵרֹות；以色列人出埃及时在旷野的营地之一。Moserah

Terms.Localization: מֹסֵרֹות; location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 指定的节期。指定的节期。appointed feast

Terms.Localization: appointed feast

Localization.Gloss: 摩亚底（mo ya dǐ），《思》摩阿狄雅。被掳归回时期的一个祭司。Moadiah

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 证据，警告，预兆，记号。证据，警告，预兆，记号。example, symbol, sign

Terms.Localization: example, symbol, sign

Localization.Gloss: 神迹奇事，预兆，兆头。神迹奇事，预兆，兆头。miracle, wonder

Terms.Localization: miracle, wonder

Localization.Gloss: 摩撒（mo sā），《思》摩匝。犹大支派人，迦勒的儿子。Moza

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 摩撒（mo sā），《思》摩匝。便雅悯支派扫罗的后裔，心利的儿子，比尼亚的父亲。Moza

Terms.Localization: son of Zimri; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 圈套，网罗。用来抓动物的圈套；与侵略和控制相关。trap

Terms.Localization: contraption used for catching animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 惊恐／畏惧／大而可畏。惊恐／畏惧／大而可畏。fear, awe

Terms.Localization: fear, awe

Localization.Gloss: 钉耙／尖利的器具／打麦板／打粮的器具。一种木制的板，板上有尖石或铁耙嵌在一些小洞孔里；由役畜拖拉着这种器具，在收割下来的谷物上拖动，使谷粒与谷壳或稻草分离；象征权力和侵略。threshing-sledge

Terms.Localization: wooden board with sharp stones or pieces of iron tightly wedged into small holes; dragged over harvested grain with the help of a draft animal to separate grain from straw or husk; symbol of power and aggression

Localization.Gloss: 剃头刀。利刀，用来刮去皮肤上的毛发。razor

Terms.Localization: sharp knife, used to shave hair from the skin

Localization.Gloss: 摩利（mo li），《思》摩勒。示剑的一个地方或一个人。Moreh

Terms.Localization: person or location

Localization.Gloss: 摩利冈（mo li gāng），《思》摩勒山。位于米吉多平原东端的小山冈。Moreh

Terms.Localization: hill

Localization.Gloss: 摩利设．迦特（mo li she-jiā te），《思》摩勒舍特加特。犹大支派希伯仑西北方的城镇。Moresheth-Gath

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》摩利沙人（mo li shā ren）／摩利设人（mo li she ren），《和》摩利沙人（mo li shā ren），《思》摩勒舍特人。摩利设．迦特的居民。of Moresheth

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Moresheth-Gath

Localization.Gloss: 母示（mǔ shi），《思》慕史。利未的孙子，米拉利的第二个儿子。Mushi

Terms.Localization: son of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《现》母示（族）（mǔ shi (zu)），《和》母示族（mǔ shi zu），《思》慕史族。利未支派人，母示的后裔。Mushite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Mushi; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 救恩；拯救者。救恩。salvation, rescuer

Terms.Localization: salvation

Localization.Gloss: 燔祭坛。殿里用火献祭的坛。altar of burnt offering

Terms.Localization: temple altar for sacrifices offered by fire

Localization.Gloss: 米撒。男性；以扫的儿子流珥的儿子。Mizzah

Terms.Localization: son of Reuel, son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 圈套，网罗。用来抓动物的圈套；与侵略和控制相关。trap

Terms.Localization: contraption; used for catching animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 史官。可能是在王室宫廷负责国家纪录和文件的人。recorder, chronicler

Terms.Localization: recorder, chronicler

Localization.Gloss: 慎重／谋略。慎重／谋略。discretion

Terms.Localization: discretion

Localization.Gloss: 计划；计谋。人或神明想出来要完成特定目的的计划或策略；用在人身上时只有负面的意思。plan, purpose, device, scheme

Terms.Localization: plan, purpose, device, scheme

Localization.Gloss: 诗歌／诗。诗歌／诗。psalm

Terms.Localization: psalm

Localization.Gloss: 镰刀，剪枝刀。一种刀或金属刀刃，有时连接着长木柄；用来剪去不结果的枝子，令作物产量增加。pruning knife

Terms.Localization: knife or metal blade, sometimes attached to a long wooden handle; used for cutting away or cutting back unproductive branches so they can produce better

Localization.Gloss: 杈子／簸箕。像叉子的一种木制工具，有五至七个尖齿，可以把打过的谷物扬到空中，借助风力使稻草和糠秕从谷粒分离；在修辞手法上，簸谷常用来比喻区别好坏的过程。winnowing fork

Terms.Localization: wooden fork-like implement with five to seven prongs, for throwing threshed grain into the air so that the wind separates the straw and chaff from the grain; winnowing is often used as a figure of speech to denote the process of distinguishing between good and bad

Localization.Gloss: 赦免。抹去（罪）；赦免。forgive

Terms.Localization: wipe out (sins) forgive

Localization.Gloss: 《现》消灭／清除，《和》除灭／涂抹／擦净。抹去；毁灭。destroy

Terms.Localization: wipe (out) destroy

Localization.Gloss: 圆尺／圆规。用来画圆的工具。compass

Terms.Localization: tool for drawing or marking circles

Localization.Gloss: 米户雅利（mǐ hu yǎ li），《思》默胡雅耳。该隐的后裔，以诺的孙子，以拿的儿子，玛土撒利的父亲。Mehujael

Terms.Localization: son of Irad; descendant of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 玛哈未人（mǎ hā wei ren），《思》玛红人。玛哈未的居民。Mahavite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Mahavah

Localization.Gloss: 跳舞／圆舞。跳舞／圆舞。round dance

Terms.Localization: round dance

Localization.Gloss: 玛曷（mǎ he），《思》玛曷耳。大卫时代的哲士希幔、甲各、达大的父亲。Mahol

Terms.Localization: father of Calcol and Darda, wise men, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 玛哈秀（mǎ hā xiu），《思》玛哈齐约特。希幔的儿子，大卫委派的圣殿乐师之一。Mahazioth

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 米希大（mǐ xī da），《思》默希达。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Mehida

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 米黑（mǐ hēi），《思》默希尔。犹大支派人，基绿的儿子，伊施屯的父亲。Mehir

Terms.Localization: son of Chelub; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 玛黑拉（mǎ hēi lā），《思》玛哈肋布。亚设支派地业内的一个地点，位于推罗以北。Mahalab

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Asher (with emendation)

Localization.Gloss: 玛拉（mǎ lā），《思》玛赫拉。玛拿西支派人西罗非哈的第一个女儿。Mahlah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zelophehad; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 玛拉（mǎ lā），《思》玛赫拉。玛拿西的后裔，基列的妹子哈摩利吉的儿子。Mahlah

Terms.Localization: son of Hammolecheth; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 玛伦（mǎ lun），《思》玛赫隆。犹大的伯利恒人，以利米勒的儿子。Mahlon

Terms.Localization: son of Elimelech

Localization.Gloss: 抹利（mǒ li）／末力（mo li），《思》玛赫里。利未支派米拉利的儿子，母示的兄弟。Mahli

Terms.Localization: son of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 末力（mo li），《思》玛赫里。利未支派人；米拉利的孙子，母示的儿子。Mahli

Terms.Localization: son of Mushi; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 抹利族（mŏ li zu）／玛利族（mǎ li zu），《思》玛赫里家族。米拉利的儿子抹利的后裔；利未支派人。Mahlite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Mahli; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 玛哈拉。以实马利的女儿；以扫的妻子。Mahalath

Terms.Localization: daughter of Ishmael; wife of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 玛哈拉。耶利末的女儿；犹大王罗波安的妻子。Mahalath

Terms.Localization: daughter of Jerimoth; wife of Rehoboam, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 米何拉人。亚伯．米何拉的居民。Meholathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Abel-Meholah

Localization.Gloss: 玛哈念（mǎ hā nian），《思》玛哈纳殷／玛哈纳因。迦得支派地业内的一座城镇；分配给利未人。Mahanaim

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 避难所；庇护所。提供庇护和安全的地方。refuge, shelter

Terms.Localization: a place that provides shelter and safety

Localization.Gloss: 嚼环。用绳子或皮条做成的网套，用来套在动物的嘴上，防止它乱咬乱吃；用来比喻一种阻止人说话的装置。muzzle

Terms.Localization: a guard made of rope or leather strips formed into a loose mesh, placed over or around the mouth of an animal to prevent it from biting or eating; used figuratively to refer to a device that keeps human beings from talking

Localization.Gloss: 《现》玛西雅（mǎ xī yǎ）／玛西亚（mǎ xī ya），《和》玛西雅，《思》玛赫色雅。尼利亚的父亲，巴录和西莱雅的祖父。Mahseiah

Terms.Localization: father of Neriah; grandfather of Baruch and Seraiah

Localization.Gloss: 锄／犁。金属制的三角形刀刃，是一个更大装置的一部分，用来破土，为耕种做准备。plowshare or mattock

Terms.Localization: triangular blade, made of metal, and part of a larger contraption, used for breaking the soil to make it ready for cultivation

Localization.Gloss: 玛哈（mǎ hā），《思》玛哈特。希西家时期的利未人，希幔的先祖，亚玛赛的儿子。Mahath

Terms.Localization: son of Amasai; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 玛哈（mǎ hā），《思》玛哈特。希西家统治时期的利未支派人，哥辖的子孙，亚玛赛的儿子。Mahath

Terms.Localization: son of Amasai; tribe of Levi; time of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 玛哈（mǎ hā），《思》玛哈特。希西家时期的利未人，哥辖的子孙，亚玛赛的儿子。Mahath

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi; time of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》支族，《和》支派。在同一位领袖的带领下团结起来的氏族群。tribe

Terms.Localization: group of clans united by a common leader

Localization.Gloss: 玛特列（mǎ te lie），《思》玛特勒得。以东王哈达之妻米希他别的母亲，米．萨合的女儿。Matred

Terms.Localization: daughter of Mezahab; mother of Mehetabel

Localization.Gloss: 玛特利族（mǎ te li zu），《思》玛特黎家族。扫罗王所属的宗族；属便雅悯支派。Matrite

Terms.Localization: clan of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 米．萨合（mǐ-sa he），《思》默匝哈布人。玛特列的父亲（或母亲）。Mezahab

Terms.Localization: father (or mother) of Matred

Localization.Gloss: 米底巴（mǐ dǐ bā），《思》默德巴。流便支派地业内的一座城镇；在摩押境内。Medeba

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Reuben, Moab

Localization.Gloss: 米达（mǐ da），《思》默达得。以色列的长老；摩西时期的人物。Medad

Terms.Localization: elder of Israel; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。便雅悯支派米非波设的儿子，约拿单的孙子，扫罗的曾孙。Mica

Terms.Localization: descendant of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。利未支派亚萨的子孙，撒底、细基利的儿子，玛他尼的父亲。Mica

Terms.Localization: son of Zichri, Zabdi; father of Mattaniah, Levite

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。被掳归回时期在尼希米的约上签名的利未人之一。Mica

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》米加耳。摩西时期亚设支派的探子西帖的父亲。Michael

Terms.Localization: father of Sethur, spy; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》米加耳。犹大王约沙法的儿子。Michael

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoshaphat, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒。天上的活物；以色列的王子。Michael

Terms.Localization: heavenly creature; prince of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》米加耳。迦得支派的几个男子。Michael

Terms.Localization: various men; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》米加耳。利未支派人，圣殿的乐师，亚萨的曾祖父，巴西雅的儿子。Michael

Terms.Localization: son of Baaseiah; ancestor of Asaph; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》米加耳。以萨迦支派的族长和勇士，伊斯拉希的儿子。Michael

Terms.Localization: son of Izrahiah; tribe of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》米加耳。便雅悯支派的族长之一，比利亚的儿子。Michael

Terms.Localization: son of Beria; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》米加耳。玛拿西支派人；大卫的勇士之一。Michael

Terms.Localization: warrior; tribe of Manasseh; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》米加耳。大卫时期以萨迦支派的军事首领暗利的父亲。Michael

Terms.Localization: father of Omri, chief; tribe of Issachar; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》米加耳。以斯拉时期示法提雅的子孙，西巴第雅的父亲。Michael

Terms.Localization: father of Zebadiah; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。以法莲山地的一个人。Micah

Terms.Localization: man; region of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。吕便的后裔，示每的儿子，备拉的先祖。Micah

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。便雅悯支派人；米非波设的儿子，约拿单的孙子，扫罗的曾孙。Micah

Terms.Localization: descendant of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。大卫时期的利未支派人，乌薛的长子。Micah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 米该雅（mǐ gāi yǎ），《思》米加雅。音拉的儿子，以色列王亚哈时期的先知。Micah

Terms.Localization: son of Imlah; prophet; time of king Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 《现》米该亚（mǐ gāi ya），《和》米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。约西亚时期亚比顿的父亲。Micah

Terms.Localization: man; time of king Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 弥迦（mi jiā），《思》米该亚。摩利沙人，犹大王约坦、亚哈斯、希西家在位时的先知。Micah

Terms.Localization: prophet; time of kings Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 米该亚（mǐ gāi ya），《思》米加。约西亚时期的官长之一，亚革波的父亲。Micaiah

Terms.Localization: father of Achbor, official; time of Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》米该亚（mǐ gāi ya）／米该雅（mǐ gāi yǎ），《和》米该亚，《思》米加雅。尼希米时期的两个利未祭司：(1)撒刻的儿子，撒迦利亚的先祖（尼12:35）；(2)在耶路撒冷城墙告成礼上吹号的祭司（尼12:41）。Micaiah

Terms.Localization: various priests; tribe of Levi; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》玛迦（mǎ jiā），《和》米该亚（mǐ gāi ya），《思》玛阿加。犹大王亚比雅的母亲，基比亚人乌列的女儿。Micaiah

Terms.Localization: woman; daughter of Uriel; mother of Abijah

Localization.Gloss: 米该亚（mǐ gāi ya），《思》米加雅。犹大王约沙法时期犹大的首领之一。Micaiah

Terms.Localization: man; official; time of Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。以法莲山地的一个人。Micah, Micaiah

Terms.Localization: man; region of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 米该雅（mǐ gāi yǎ），《思》米加雅。音拉的儿子，以色列王亚哈时期的先知。Micah, Micaiah

Terms.Localization: man; son of Imlah; prophet; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 米该亚（mǐ gāi ya），《思》米加雅。约雅敬时期基玛利雅的儿子。Micah, Micaiah

Terms.Localization: man; son of Gemariah; time of Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 《现》米甲（mǐ jiǎ）／米拉（mǐ lā），《和》米甲（mǐ jiǎ），《思》米加耳／默辣布。扫罗的次女，大卫的第一任妻子。Michal

Terms.Localization: woman; daughter of king Saul; wife of king David

Localization.Gloss: 米雅民（mǐ yǎ min），《思》米雅明。利未支派人，亚伦的后裔，大卫时代在圣殿供职的第六班次祭司首领。Mijamin

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 米雅民（mǐ yǎ min），《思》米雅明。巴录的子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Mijamin

Terms.Localization: man; descendant of Parosh; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 米雅民（mǐ yǎ min），《思》米雅明。几个利未祭司：(1)在尼希米的约上签名的祭司之一（尼10:7）；(2)被掳之后，随着所罗巴伯一同回归巴勒斯坦的祭司（尼12:5）。Mijamin

Terms.Localization: various men; priests; tribe of Levi; time of Zerubbabel

Localization.Gloss: 类别；种类。类别；种类。kind, sort

Terms.Localization: kind, sort

Localization.Gloss: 米法押（mǐ fǎ yā），《思》默法阿特。吕便支派属地的城镇，分配给利未支派的米利拉族，位于希实本之东。Mephaath

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 米沙（mǐ shā），《思》默沙。便雅悯的族长之一，沙哈连和贺得的儿子。Mesha

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 米沙利（mǐ shā li），《思》米沙耳。利未支派人，哥辖的后裔，乌薛的儿子。Mishael

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 米沙利（mǐ shā li），《思》米沙耳。以斯拉宣读律法时站在他左边的其中一人。Mishael

Terms.Localization: man; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 米沙利（mǐ shā li），《思》米沙耳。但以理的朋友之一。Mishael

Terms.Localization: friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 米沙利（mǐ shā li），《思》米沙耳。但以理的朋友之一。Mishael

Terms.Localization: friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 公平，公正。公平，公正。fairness

Terms.Localization: fairness

Localization.Gloss: 米煞。米沙利的迦勒底名字；但以理的朋友。Meshach

Terms.Localization: Chaldean name of Mishael, friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 米煞。米沙利的迦勒底名字；但以理的朋友。Meshach

Terms.Localization: Chaldean name of Mishael, friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 米沙（mǐ shā），《思》默沙。以色列王亚哈时期的摩押王。Mesha

Terms.Localization: man; king of Moab; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 米沙（mǐ shā），《思》玛勒沙。犹大支派人，迦勒的长子。Mesha

Terms.Localization: son of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 公平，公正。公平，公正。fairness

Terms.Localization: fairness

Localization.Gloss: 抹比拿（mǒ bǐ na），《思》玛革贝纳。犹大支派地业的城镇之一。Machbenah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 末巴奈（mo bā nai），《思》玛革邦乃。迦得支派人，大卫的勇士之一。Machbannai

Terms.Localization: warrior; tribe of Gad; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 玛基（mǎ jī），《思》玛基。迦得支派的探子臼利的父亲。Machi

Terms.Localization: father of Geuel, spy; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 玛吉（mǎ ji），《思》玛基尔。玛拿西的长子，基列的父亲。Machir

Terms.Localization: man; son of Manasseh; father of Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 玛吉（mǎ ji），《思》玛基尔。亚米利的儿子，基列地罗底巴的富人。Machir

Terms.Localization: man; son of Ammiel

Localization.Gloss: 《现》玛吉（mǎ ji），《和》玛吉族，《思》玛基尔家族。玛拿西的长子、基列的父亲玛吉的后裔。Machirite

Terms.Localization: man; descendant of Makir, son of Manasseh; father of Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 羊圈。用石墙或篱笆（篱笆以树枝和荆棘筑成）围封的区域，有一个狭窄的门口，可用柴木或牧羊人的身体拦起来；是羊群晚上休息的地方，为保护它们免遭盗贼或野兽的伤害。sheep pen; sheepfold

Terms.Localization: area enclosed by a stone wall or hedge made of branches and thorns, with a narrow opening which can be closed with brush or by the shepherd’s body; used for keeping sheep at night to protect them from thieves or wild animals

Localization.Gloss: 网罗／罗网。形状和大小不详，用来捕猎野兽；与侵略和控制有关。net

Terms.Localization: net of unknown size and shape, used for hunting animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 撒网／拉网。一种配备重物和拉绳的圆网，圆周约有6-7.5米；渔夫从船上或岸上用曲线的动作来撒网，使网在水上完全散开；网的重物把它坠下，围困下面的鱼，然后渔夫用拉绳把网收回；与侵略和控制有关。casting net

Terms.Localization: circular net with weights and a draw rope around its edge of roughly 6-7.5 m in diameter; thrown from a boat or the shore in a circular motion so that it lands with the net fully spread out on the water; the weights carry it down, trapping fish underneath; then the fisherman uses the draw rope to close the net and pull it back to himself; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 密抹（mi mǒ）／默玛（mo mǎ），《思》米革玛斯。便雅悯支派的城镇之一，位于耶路撒冷城以北，靠近伯特利的地方。Michmash

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 密米他（mi mǐ tā），《思》米革默塔特。以法莲和玛拿西领土边界上的一座城镇，位于示剑以南。Michmethath

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim, Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 玛拿底拜（mǎ na dǐ bai），《思》玛革纳德拜。被掳归回时期去了外邦女子为妻的一个人。Machnadebai

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 米哥拿。犹大支派地业内的一个地点。Meconah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 麦比拉。靠近希伯仑，亚伯拉罕从赫人买来，包含一个洞的地点；亚伯拉罕、撒拉、以撒、利百加、雅各和利亚埋葬的地方。Machpelah

Terms.Localization: cave

Localization.Gloss: 《现》米基利（mǐ jī li），《和》米基立（mǐ jī li），《思》米革黎。便雅悯支派人，以拉的先祖。Michri

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Elah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 米基拉人（mǐ jī lā ren），《思》默革辣人。米基拉的居民。Mecherathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Mecherah

Localization.Gloss: 玛革提施；下城地区。耶路撒冷的下城区；市场区域。the Mortar

Terms.Localization: mortar; (lower) part of Jerusalem; market area

Localization.Gloss: 使者。某人派去给别人传递信息的人。messenger

Terms.Localization: person sent by someone to deliver a message to someone else

Localization.Gloss: 天使。传递上帝的信息、赞美上帝、保护虔诚人，执行上帝的审判的人。angel

Terms.Localization: supernatural being who delivers messages from God, praises God, protects the pious, carries out God's judgment

Localization.Gloss: 玛拉基（mǎ lā jī），《思》玛拉基亚。被掳归回后的先知之一。Malachi

Terms.Localization: prophet

Localization.Gloss: 砖模；砖窑。确切含义不明：一种长形的小木盒（约20-25 X 10厘米），用来制作大小相同的砖；或是户外用来烤砖的大型烤炉。brick mold; brick kiln

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unknown: small, rectangular wooden container (about 20-25 by 10 cm) used to form bricks in equal sizes; or large outdoor oven for baking bricks to harden them

Localization.Gloss: 接受圣职，按立祭司，承接圣职。接受圣职，按立祭司，承接圣职。installation of a priest

Terms.Localization: installation of a priest

Localization.Gloss: 咸草。一种不确定身份的植物；可长至 2 米高；公尺的一种植物；茎和枝长着银灰色、布满细毛的小叶子；叶子可吃，有咸味；大量生长在沙漠盐分地区、地中海和死海沿岸。saltbush; saltwort; mallow

Terms.Localization: a plant of uncertain identification: perhaps Atriplex halimus Shrubby Orache, or saltbush; grows up to 2 m tall; stem and branches have small silver-gray leaves covered with tiny hairs; leaves are edible but salty; abundant in salty areas in the desert and on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea and the Dead Sea

Localization.Gloss: 玛鹿（mǎ lu），《思》玛路客。利未支派人，米拉利的子孙，亚伯底的父亲，哈沙比雅的儿子，圣殿乐师以探的先祖。Malluch

Terms.Localization: son of Hashabiah; ancestor of Ethan; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 玛鹿（mǎ lu），《思》玛路客。娶了外邦女子为妻的几个男子：(1)巴尼的子孙；(2)哈琳的子孙。Malluch

Terms.Localization: various men; married foreign wives; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 玛鹿（mǎ lu），《思》玛路客。被掳归回后的两个人：(1)随同尼希米签约遵守上帝律法的民众首领之一；(2)随所罗巴伯从被掳之地归回的祭司之一。Malluch

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 玛罗提（mǎ luo ti），《思》玛罗提。希幔的儿子，大卫时代圣殿第19班次的乐师首领。Mallothi

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 米拉提（mǐ lā ti），《思》默拉提雅。被掳归回时期协助尼希米重建耶路撒冷城墙的基遍人。Melatiah

Terms.Localization: man from Gibeon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 米利古（mǐ li gǔ），《思》玛路客。利未支派人，被掳归回时期的祭司家族的族长之一。Malluchi

Terms.Localization: priest; family head; tribe of Levi; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 王。一个国家或地区的男性统治者；与威严，权力，尊荣有关，但也与公义有关；也引用来指个人的神明。king

Terms.Localization: male ruler of a nation or area; associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Localization.Gloss: 米勒（mǐ le），《思》默肋客。便雅悯支派人，扫罗的后裔，米力巴力的孙子，米迦的儿子。Melech

Terms.Localization: son of Micah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《现》摩洛（神）（mo luo (shen)），《和》摩洛（mo luo），《思》摩肋客。迦南人敬拜的神明，小孩常被当作祭物献给它。Molech

Terms.Localization: Canaanite deity, to whom young children used to be sacrificed

Localization.Gloss: 《现》罗网，《和》羁绊。用来捕捉野兽的装置；常指侵略和控制。trap

Terms.Localization: contraption; used for catching animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 女王。一个国家或地区的女性统治者。queen

Terms.Localization: female ruler of a nation or area

Localization.Gloss: 密迦（mi jiā），《思》米耳加。哈兰的女儿，亚伯拉罕的兄弟拿鹤的妻子，利百加和拉班的祖母。Milcah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Haran; wife of Nahor

Localization.Gloss: 密迦（mi jiā），《思》米耳加。玛拿西支派西罗非哈的第四个女儿。Milcah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zelophehad; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 麦基洗德（mai jī xǐ de），《思》默基瑟德。亚伯拉罕时期的撒冷王。Melchizedek

Terms.Localization: king of Salem

Localization.Gloss: 《现》麦基．舒亚（mai jī-shū ya），《和》麦基舒亚，《思》玛耳基叔亚。便雅悯支派人，扫罗王的儿子。Malchi-Shua

Terms.Localization: son of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 玛结（mǎ jie），《思》玛耳基耳。亚设支派比利亚的儿子，比撒威的父亲。Malchiel

Terms.Localization: son of Beriah; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 玛结（宗）族（mǎ jie (zōng) zu），《思》玛耳基耳家族。亚设支派比利亚的儿子玛结的后裔。Malchielite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Malchiel; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 玛基雅（mǎ jī yǎ），《思》玛耳基雅。利未支派人，伊特尼的儿子，亚萨的先祖。Malchijah

Terms.Localization: son of Ethni; ancestor of Asaph; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 玛基雅（mǎ jī yǎ），《思》玛耳基雅。祭司，巴施户珥的父亲，亚大雅的先祖。Malchijah

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Adaiah, priest

Localization.Gloss: 玛基雅（mǎ jī yǎ），《思》玛耳基雅。亚伦的后裔，大卫时期利未人家族的族长之一。Malchijah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 玛基雅（mǎ jī yǎ），《思》玛耳基雅。被掳归回后的三个人：(1)巴录的子孙，其中一个听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人（拉10.25上）；(2)巴录的另一个子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子（拉10.25下）；(3)哈琳的子孙，休了其外邦妻子的以色列人之一（拉10.31）。Malchijah

Terms.Localization: various men; married foreign wives; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 玛基雅（mǎ jī yǎ），《思》玛耳基雅。哈琳的儿子，被掳归回时期协助重建耶路撒冷城墙的人之一。Malchijah

Terms.Localization: son of Harim; repairer of wall; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 玛基雅（mǎ jī yǎ），《思》玛耳基雅。被掳归回时期协助重建粪厂门的人，利甲的儿子。Malchijah

Terms.Localization: son of Rechab; repairer of Dung Gate; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 玛基雅（mǎ jī yǎ），《思》玛尔基雅。被掳归回后协助重建耶路撒冷城墙的一个金匠。Malchijah

Terms.Localization: goldsmith; repairer of wall; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 玛基雅（mǎ jī yǎ），《思》玛耳基雅。被掳归回后的三个利未支派人：(1)以斯拉宣读律法时站在他左边的其中一人；(2)随同尼希米签约遵守上帝律法的祭司之一；(3)在耶路撒冷城墙告成礼中负责唱歌的祭司之一。Malchijah

Terms.Localization: various men; tribe of Levi; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 玛基雅（mǎ jī yǎ），《思》玛耳基雅。耶利米时期，西底家王的儿子。Malchijah

Terms.Localization: son of king Zedekiah; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 玛基兰（mǎ jī lan），《思》玛尔基兰。犹大支派大卫的后裔，犹大王耶哥尼雅（约雅斤）的儿子。Malchiram

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 玛拉干（mǎ lā gān），《思》玛耳干。便雅悯支派的族长之一，沙哈连和贺得的儿子。Malcam

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《现》摩洛（神）（mo luo (shen)）/米勒公（mǐ le gōng），《和》米勒公（mǐ le gōng），《思》米耳公。亚扪人敬拜的神明，小孩常被当作祭物献给它。Milcom

Terms.Localization: Ammonite deity, to whom young children used to be sacrificed

Localization.Gloss: 天后 , 女神天后。字面意思：天上的女王；是一个女性神明的名字，可能就是伊斯塔（音译；Ishtar）或亚斯她录；受以色列人敬拜。Queen of Heaven

Terms.Localization: literally: "queen of heaven"; name of a female deity, possibly to be identified with Ishtar or Ashtoreth; worshipped by the Israelites

Localization.Gloss: 米拉莱（mǐ lā lai），《思》米拉来。被掳归回后的利未人祭司之一。Milalai

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 刺棒／棍子。长约 1-2 米的木棒，有时附有一个金属尖头；用来操控拉车的役畜或赶逐牧放的牲畜群。goad

Terms.Localization: wooden stick with a length of about 1-2 m, sometimes tipped with a metal point; used in driving draft animals or herds of domestic animals

Localization.Gloss: 《现》米慕干（mĭ mu gān），《和》米母干（mǐ mǔ gān），《思》默慕干。亚哈随鲁王的顾问之一。Memucan

Terms.Localization: adviser to Ahasuerus

Localization.Gloss: 幔利（man li），《思》玛默勒。亚摩利人，亚伯拉罕的盟友。Mamre

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 幔利（man li），《思》玛默勒。在希伯仑境内或附近的一个地方。Mamre

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 玛挪亚（mǎ nuo ya），《思》玛诺亚。但支派人，士师参孙的父亲。Manoah

Terms.Localization: father of juge Samson

Localization.Gloss: 《现》织布机的轴，《和》织布的机轴。木棍，直径约有5-6厘米，是织布机的一部分，用来上经线，和卷起已织成的布匹；常指厚重的东西。weaver's beam

Terms.Localization: wooden bar, approximately 5-6 cm in diameter; part of weaving equiment; used for attaching the warp threads to and to roll up the finished cloth as it grows in length; associated with thickness and heaviness

Localization.Gloss: 礼物；贡物；祭物；素祭。献给神明的礼物或祭物，通常是谷物或动物。gift; tribute; offering; grain-offering

Terms.Localization: gift; tribute; offering; grain-offering

Localization.Gloss: 米努哈人（mǐ nǔ hā ren），《思》玛纳哈特人。可能是指位于耶路撒冷西南方的“玛拿辖”的居民。Menuhoth

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Manahath (?)

Localization.Gloss: 堡垒；营塞；要塞。一种大型防御工事；用作保卫城镇；用石头建成；可能包括一个特别坚固的建筑物或一个由坚固墙保卫的建筑群；与保护和安全有关。fortress, refuge

Terms.Localization: large fortification; for defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; associated with protection and security

Localization.Gloss: 玛俄（mǎ e），《思》玛敖客。迦特王，亚吉的父亲。Maoch

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 锤子／锤子。一种工具，长约30厘米，手柄通常为木制，末端连接着一块石头、木头，或（较不常见）金属的头；用途很广，包括凿开或修整建筑用的大石，钉钉子或木桩；铁匠也会用它来敲打烧热的金属，使之成型。hammer

Terms.Localization: instrument of about 30 cm long, consisting of a handle, usually made of wood, to which was attached a stone, wooden, or (less frequently) metal head; used for many purposes, including the breaking or dressing of building stones, pounding nails or pegs into wood, or pounding pegs into the ground; also used by blacksmiths to shape hot metal

Terms.Localization: village; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 玛吉希录（mǎ ji xī lu），《思》玛刻黑罗特。在出埃及的路上，以色列人在旷野安营之地，位置不详。Makheloth

Terms.Localization: location along route of exile

Localization.Gloss: （牧人的）杖。牧人所用的直木棍，长约1－2米，直径的宽度是刚好适合用手握住。(shepherd's) staff

Terms.Localization: straight wooden stick about 1-2 m long; its diameter allowed it to fit comfortably in a person’s hand; used by shepherds

Localization.Gloss: 米基罗（mǐ jī luo），《思》米刻罗特。便雅悯支派人，耶利的后裔，示米暗的父亲。Mikloth

Localization.Gloss: 密基罗（mi jī luo），《思》厄肋阿匝尔。大卫统治时期的官员，亚哈希人朵代的副官。Mikloth

Localization.Gloss: 庇护城，逃城。庇护城，逃城。refuge, asylum

Localization.Gloss: 雕刻。用尖锐的工具在木头或其它材料上刻成的图案。carving; engraving

Terms.Localization: figure carved on wood or other material, with a sharp tool

Localization.Gloss: 被驯养的牲畜。所有家养动物或作为财产所有物的牲畜的统称，包括牛、绵羊、山羊、骆驼、驴，或以家庭和商业目的而大量饲养的任何动物；可以衡量一个人的财富。domestic animals, livestock

Terms.Localization: general term for all kinds of domestic animals or livestock held as possessions; includes cattle, sheep, goats, camels, and donkeys or any animals kept in large numbers for both domestic and commercial purposes; measure of a man’s wealth

Localization.Gloss: 弥克尼雅（mi ke ni yǎ），《思》米刻乃雅。大卫时期的利未人之一。Mikneiah

Localization.Gloss: 占卜，算命。占卜或算命的行为或结果，通常被视为邪恶行为。oracle, divination

Localization.Gloss: 玛迦斯。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇。Makaz

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 凿子；刨子。有一尖锐刀刃的金属工具，用来使木头成型。chisel; plane

Terms.Localization: metal tool with a sharp edge used to shape wood

Localization.Gloss: 锤出来的物品。原意为锻造的作品，就是用锤子敲打成形的金属物品。hammered work; beaten work

Terms.Localization: metal object that has been beaten into shape with a hammer

Localization.Gloss: 瓜田。用来种植青瓜的农田。cucumber field

Terms.Localization: field used for the cultivation of cucumbers

Localization.Gloss: 没药。一种灌木或矮树的树胶，这种树有浓密多刺的树枝，树枝伸展和弯曲的角度奇特；每片树叶有三瓣叶片；果实呈椭圆形，像李子；木头和树皮带有一种宜人的气味；从树枝上自然渗出树胶清澈透明或黄褐色；树胶变干后，颜色也会变深；是膏油和香水的一种成份；很珍贵。myrrh

Terms.Localization: gum of a bush or shrub with thick thorny branches that project and bend at odd angles; leaves come in sets of three; fruit is oval like a plum; wood and bark have a pleasant smell; Commiphora myrrha, abyssinica or schimperi; gum oozes naturally from the branches; clear or yellowish brown when it comes out, but gets darker as it dries; an ingredient of anointing oil and perfume; precious

Terms.Localization: short bar, usually made of metal, placed in the mouth of a horse; its ends project from the mouth of the animal and are attached to ropes or leather straps that fit over the head as the bridle; used to steer the horse; associated with control and, indirectly, with lack of wisdom

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Nehelam

Localization.Gloss: 拿含（na han），《思》纳罕。犹大支派的人，荷第雅妻子的兄长。Naham

Terms.Localization: brother of Hodiah

Localization.Gloss: 尼希米（ni xī mǐ），《思》乃赫米雅。随同所罗巴伯从被掳之地归回巴勒斯坦的其中一人。Nehemiah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 尼希米（ni xī mǐ），《思》乃赫米雅。波斯王亚达薛西的酒政，被掳归回时期的犹太人领袖，哈迦利亚的儿子。Nehemiah

Terms.Localization: son of Hacaliah; governor of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 尼希米（ni xī mǐ），《思》乃赫米雅。被掳归回的押卜的儿子，伯夙一半地区的官长。Nehemiah

Terms.Localization: son of Azbuk; ruler of half the district of Beth-Zur; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 拿哈玛尼（na hā mǎ ni），《思》纳哈玛尼。与所罗巴伯一同从被掳之地归回的人之一。Nahamani

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 拿哈莱（na hā lai），《思》纳赫赖。比录人，替约押拿兵器的人；大卫的三十勇士之一。Naharai

Terms.Localization: warrior; armour-bearer of Joab; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 蛇。体长无脚、没有眼睑或外耳的爬行动物；通过蠕动或滑动来前行；有些品种撕咬时会产生毒液；象征潜藏的、意想不到的危险；与谎言，欺骗和误导性的宣讲有关。snake

Terms.Localization: long legless reptile; no eyelids or external ears; moves by wriggling or gliding; some species have a poisonous bite; symbol of lurking, unexpected danger; associated with lies, deception, and misleading teaching

Localization.Gloss: 拿辖（na xia），《思》纳哈士。扫罗时期的亚扪王。Nahash

Terms.Localization: king of Ammon; time of Saul

Localization.Gloss: 拿辖（《七十士译本》作“耶稣”）。亚比该和洗鲁雅的父亲。Nahash

Terms.Localization: father of Abigail and Zeruiah

Localization.Gloss: 拿顺（na shun），《思》纳赫雄。摩西时期犹大支派的族长之一，亚米拿达的儿子，亚伦妻子以利沙巴的兄弟。Nahshon

Terms.Localization: son of Amminadab; chief; tribe of Judah; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 尼护施她（ni hu shī tā），《思》乃胡市达。犹大王约雅敬的妻子，耶路撒冷人以利拿单的女儿。Nehushta

Terms.Localization: daughter of Elnathan; wife of king Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 铜蛇。摩西所做的铜蛇；后来被人当偶像敬拜。Nehushtan

Terms.Localization: name given to the bronze serpent that Moses made (NUM 21:9)

Localization.Gloss: 拿哈。流珥的儿子，扫罗的孙子。Nahath

Terms.Localization: son of Reuel, son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 拿哈。利未支派人，琐菲的儿子，以利加拿的后裔，撒母耳的先祖。Nahath

Terms.Localization: son of Zophai, Zuph; descendant of Elkanah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 拿哈（na hā），《思》纳哈特。利未支派人，希西家时期的圣殿督理之一。Nahath

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 尼陀法（ni tuo fǎ），《思》乃托法。犹大支派的城镇之一，位于伯利恒的东南方。Netophah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 尼陀法人（ni tuo fǎ ren），《思》乃托法人。住在位于伯利恒的东南方的尼陀法的居民。Netophathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Netophah

Localization.Gloss: 尼他应（ni tā ying），《思》乃塔因。犹大支派地业中的一个地方。Netaim

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》苏合香，《和》拿他弗。枫香树或苏合香树的树胶 （ 或树液 ）; 树液带芳香气味。storax, gum resin

Terms.Localization: type of gum resin (or sap) of the Liquidambar or storax tree; Liquidambar orientalis; sap is aromatic

Localization.Gloss: 尼拜（ni bai），《思》乃拜。随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的民众领袖之一。Nebai

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 拿约（na yuē），《思》纳约特。拉玛附近的一个地方，位置不详。Naioth

Terms.Localization: location; near Ramah

Localization.Gloss: 尼尼微（ni ni wēi），《思》尼尼微。古代亚述帝国的首都，位于底格里斯河上游东岸，是美索不达米亚地区最古老的大城市之一。Nineveh

Terms.Localization: city in Mesopotamia; capital of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 尼哥（ni gē），《思》乃苛。埃及26王朝第二任君王尼哥二世的名字。Neco

Terms.Localization: king of Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 尼母利（ni mǔ li），《思》乃慕耳。吕便支派人，以利押的儿子。Nemuel

Terms.Localization: son of Eliab; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 尼母利（ni mǔ li），《思》乃慕耳。西缅的儿子。Nemuel

Terms.Localization: son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 尼母利族（ni mǔ li zu），《思》乃慕耳家族。西缅的儿子尼母利的后裔。Nemuelite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jemuel, Nemuel, son of Simoen

Localization.Gloss: 蚂蚁。黑棕色的小昆虫；地底下的蚁巢有蚁后、工蚁，和保护蚁巢的兵蚁；蚂蚁能负重数倍于自身的重量；象征勤劳，辛勤工作，和智慧。ant

Terms.Localization: small dark brown insect; Messor semirufus - Harvester ant; underground nest holds a queen ant, workers, and soldier ants that protect the nest; ant is capable of carrying many times its own weight; symbol of diligence and hard work

Localization.Gloss: 豹，猎豹。指两种大型猫科动物：（1）豹；体长约 2 米，呈黄褐色，全身到尾巴有呈花形格子排列的黑色斑点，通过跟踪猎物来捕猎；（2）猎豹；有斑点，但体型比豹子稍小，腿更长；速度极快；象征暴力危险或速度。leopard, cheetah

Terms.Localization: refers to two members of the large cat family: Panthera pardus - leopard; about 2 m in length and yellowish brown with black spots arranged in rosettes all over the body and tail; hunts by stalking prey; and Acinonyx jubatus - cheetah; spotted but are slightly smaller and have longer legs than leopards; extremely fast; symbol of violent danger or of speed (cheetah)

Localization.Gloss: 豹，猎豹。指两种大型猫科动物：（1）豹；体长约 2 米，呈黄褐色，全身到尾巴有呈花形格子排列的黑色斑点，通过跟踪猎物来捕猎；（2）猎豹；有斑点，但体型比豹子稍小，腿更长；速度极快；象征暴力危险或速度。cheetah, leopard

Terms.Localization: refers to two members of the large cat family: Panthera pardus - leopard; about 2 m in length and yellowish brown with black spots arranged in rosettes all over the body and tail; hunts by stalking prey; and Acinonyx jubatus - cheetah; spotted but are slightly smaller and have longer legs than leopards; extremely fast; symbol of violent danger or of speed (cheetah)

Localization.Gloss: 宁录（ning lu），《思》尼默洛得。含的后裔，古实的儿子。Nimrod

Terms.Localization: son of Cush; descendant of Ham

Localization.Gloss: 宁拉（ning lā），《思》尼默辣。迦得支派地业内的一座城镇，位于耶利哥的东北方。Nimrah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 宁林（ning lin），《思》尼默陵。位于摩押的一座城镇。Nimrim

Terms.Localization: town; Moab

Localization.Gloss: 宁示（ning shi），《思》尼默史。以色列王耶户的祖父。Nimshi

Terms.Localization: grandfather of Jehu, king of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 旌旗；旗帜。一个独特的装置，形状像旗或板，以金属装置或像（如鹰或狮子的头）的形式连在一只棍子上，用来辨识特别的团体，或战争时士兵的集合地点。banner; flag

Terms.Localization: a distinctive device in the form of a flag or board, metal device or image (such as an eagle or the head of a lion) fitted on the end of a pole; used to identify a particular group; rallying point for soldiers in war

Localization.Gloss: 帆。连在船的上方的一块大布，用来兜住风，使船在水上航行。sail

Terms.Localization: large sheet of fabric attached above a boat to catch the wind and thus move the boat forward through the water

Localization.Gloss: 奠酒祭。奠酒祭。libation, drink-offering

Terms.Localization: libation, drink-offering

Localization.Gloss: 尼斯洛（ni sī luo），《思》尼色洛客。亚述的神明。Nisroch

Localization.Gloss: 尼亚（ni ya），《思》乃阿。西布伦支派属地的城镇之一。Neah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Zevulon

Localization.Gloss: 挪阿（nuo ā），《思》诺阿。玛拿西支派西罗非哈的第二个女儿。Noah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zelophehad; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 尼业（ni ye），《思》乃耶耳。亚设支派属地的城镇之一，位于亚柯以东。Neiel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 拿安（na ān），《思》纳罕。犹大支派人，迦勒的儿子。Naam

Terms.Localization: son of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拿玛（na mǎ），《思》纳阿玛。该隐的后裔，拉麦的女儿，土八该隐的妹子。Naamah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Lamech; descendant of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 拿玛（na mǎ），《思》纳阿玛。一个女子。Naamah

Terms.Localization: woman

Localization.Gloss: 拿玛（na mǎ），《思》纳阿玛。犹大支派地业的高原城镇之一。Naamah

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 乃幔族（nǎi man zu），《思》纳阿曼家族。便雅悯支派人，比拉的儿子乃幔的后裔。Naamite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Naaman; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《现》拿娥美（na e měi），《和》拿俄米（na e mǐ），《思》纳敖米。犹大伯利恒的以法他人以利米勒的妻子。Naomi

Terms.Localization: wife of Elimelech

Localization.Gloss: 乃幔（nǎi man），《思》纳阿曼。便雅悯的孙子，比拉的儿子。Naaman

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 乃缦（nǎi man），《思》纳阿曼。以利沙时代亚兰王的元帅。Naaman

Terms.Localization: commander of army of king of Syrie

Localization.Gloss: 乃幔（nǎi man），《思》纳阿曼。便雅悯支派人，以忽的儿子。Naaman

Terms.Localization: son of Ehud; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 拿玛人（na mǎ ren），《思》纳阿玛人。拿玛的居民。Naamathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Naamah

Localization.Gloss: 拿拉（na lā），《思》纳阿辣。以法莲支派地业的城镇之一，位于约旦河谷。Naarah

Terms.Localization: location; Jordan Valley; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 拿拉（na lā），《思》纳阿辣。提哥亚之祖亚施户的两位妻子之一。Naarah

Terms.Localization: wife of Ashhur, founder of Tekoa

Localization.Gloss: 拿莱（na lai），《思》纳阿赖。伊斯拜的儿子，大卫的勇士之一。Naarai

Terms.Localization: son of Ezbai; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 尼利雅（ni li yǎ），《思》乃阿黎雅。犹大支派人，所罗巴伯的后裔。Neariah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 尼利雅（ni li yǎ），《思》乃阿黎雅。犹大王希西家时期的西缅支派人，以示的儿子。Neariah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 拿兰（na lan），《思》纳阿郎。以法莲支派地业的城镇之一，位于约旦河谷。Naaran

Terms.Localization: location; Jordan Valley; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 《现》孟斐斯（meng fěi sī）／挪弗（nuo fu）／摩弗（mo fu），《和》挪弗（nuo fu）／摩弗（mo fu），《思》诺夫／摩夫。埃及的一座城镇，古代重要的政治和宗教中心。Memphis

Terms.Localization: town; Egypt; Memphis; מֹף

Localization.Gloss: 尼斐（ni fěi），《思》乃斐格。利未支派人，以斯哈的儿子。Nepheg

Terms.Localization: son of Izhar; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 尼斐（ni fěi），《思》乃费格。犹大支派人，大卫王的儿子。Nepheg

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 筛子。一种扁圆的浅容器，底部有筛孔，用稻草、细绳、树皮，或芦苇制成，用来过滤谷物的微粒，是簸谷的最后一个步骤。在修辞手法上，簸谷常用来比喻区别好坏。sieve

Terms.Localization: shallow, flat circular container with a mesh bottom made of straw, cord, strips of bark, or reed, through which fine particles can pass while the grain retained; used in the final stage of the winnowing process; winnowing is often used as a figure of speech to denote the process of distinguishing between good and bad

Localization.Gloss: 尼普心（ni pǔ xīn），《思》乃非心。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Nephisim

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 尼普心（ni pǔ xīn），《思》乃非心。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Nephushesim

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 挪法（nuo fǎ），《思》诺法黑。亚摩利王战胜摩押之后所毁灭之地，位置不详。Nophah

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 巨人？巨人？giants?

Localization.Gloss: 拿非施人（na fēi shī ren），《思》纳菲士人。以实玛利的儿子及其后裔的族名。Naphish

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael; people

Localization.Gloss: 蓝玉。蓝色的半宝石，可能是蓝玉。turquoise

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone with a blue color, possibly turquoise

Localization.Gloss: 尼弗多亚。在犹大、便雅悯支派地业内的一个地方。Nephtoah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah, Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 拿弗土希人（na fu tǔ xī ren），《思》纳斐突歆人。一个族群；麦西的后裔。Naphtuhim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 拿弗他利。雅各的儿子，拿弗他利支派的始祖。Naphtali

Terms.Localization: son of Jacob; founder of tribe of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 小猎鹰或食雀鹰。鹰类中最小的一种猛禽，包括雀鹰和小猎鹰；飞行速度很快；捕食大鼠、老鼠和其他鸟类；以俯冲和敏锐的视力而闻名；不洁净，因此不能吃。small falcon or sparrow hawk

Terms.Localization: bird of prey in the smallest category of hawk, including sparrow hawks: Accipiter Brevipes - Levant Sparrow Hawk; and small falcons; Falco concolor - Sooty Falcon and Falco tinnunculus - Lesser Kestrel; fast flying; prey on rats, mice and other birds; known for swooping and keen eyesight; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 尼悉（ni xī），《思》乃漆布。犹大支派属地的城镇之一，位于希伯仑的西北。Nezib

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 尼细亚。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Neziah

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 无可指责；免受惩罚。无可指责；免受惩罚。be blameless, free of punishment

Terms.Localization: be blameless, free of punishment

Localization.Gloss: 宣告无罪；无罪释放。宣告无罪；无罪释放。pronounce innocent; to let go unpunished

Terms.Localization: pronounce innocent; to let go unpunished

Localization.Gloss: 尼哥大（ni gē da），《思》乃科达。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Nekoda

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 尼哥大（ni gē da），《思》乃科达。随同所罗巴伯回归以色列的族长之一。Nekoda

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 免除，释放，拯救。免除，释放，拯救。exempt, free from; free from guilt

Terms.Localization: exempt, free from; free from guilt

Localization.Gloss: 清白无辜／问心无愧。清白无辜／问心无愧。innocence

Terms.Localization: innocence

Localization.Gloss: 尼珥（ni ěr），《思》乃尔。便雅悯支派人，扫罗王的祖父，押尼珥的父亲。Ner

Terms.Localization: grandfather of king Saul; father of Abner; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 匿甲（ni jiǎ），《思》乃尔加耳。古他人的偶像。Nergal

Terms.Localization: deity of Cuth

Localization.Gloss: 尼甲．沙利薛（ni jiǎ-shā li xuē），《思》乃尔加耳沙勒责尔。尼布甲尼撒王的官员。Nergal-Sharezer

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Nebuchadnezzar

Localization.Gloss: 哪哒；甘香哪哒。一种叶状灌木，不到一米高，具有芳香的气味，茎短， 茎的尖端有一丛三叶的小叶；开伞状的粉红色花；根状茎被捣碎磨成辛辣、淡橘色或黄色的油；油是奢侈的物品。nard, spikenard

Terms.Localization: a leafy bush less than a meter high, with fragrant-smelling, short stems and a tuft of three narrow leaflets at the tip of each stem; pink flowers are umbrella-shaped; rhizomes (tubers) are pounded to extract pungent, pale orange or yellow oil; the oil was a luxury item

Localization.Gloss: 尼利亚（ni li ya），《思》乃黎雅。耶利米的文士巴录和王宫大臣西莱雅的父亲，玛西雅的儿子。Neriah

Terms.Localization: son of Mahseiah; father of Baruch and Seraiah

Localization.Gloss: 尼利亚（ni li ya），《思》乃黎雅。耶利米的文士巴录和王宫大臣西莱雅的父亲，玛西雅的儿子。Neriah

Terms.Localization: son of Mahseiah; father of Baruch and Seraiah

Localization.Gloss: 承担后果。承担后果。bear the consequences of

Terms.Localization: bear the consequences of

Localization.Gloss: 担当，承担 = 赦免。担当以得赦免。carry, bear = to forgive

Terms.Localization: carry, bear to forgive

Localization.Gloss: 举手；发誓。举起某人的手来发誓。lift up (one's hand) = to swear

Terms.Localization: lift up (one's hand) to swear

Localization.Gloss: 族长，首领。族长，首领。chief, prince

Terms.Localization: chief, prince

Localization.Gloss: 大型猛禽；秃鹰。既指特定的鸟类（秃鹫——最大的猛禽），也指一般类别的鸟类（大型猛禽）；它们有锐利的视力，体型大，力量大，能高速飞行很远的距离；象征保护，用来比喻上帝，但 也象征战争中的死亡；不洁净，因此不能吃。large bird of prey; vulture

Terms.Localization: refers both to particular bird (Gyps fulvus - Griffon vulture, largest bird of prey) and general class of birds (large birds of prey); keen eyesight; associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 已被献上的人；圣殿工人。字面意思：“已被献上的人”，因而指在圣殿固定工作和服事祭司的人。he who has been given; temple servant

Terms.Localization: literally: 'he who has been given'; hence: temple servant

Localization.Gloss: 拿单（na dān），《思》纳堂。犹大支派人，耶拉篾的后裔，亚太的儿子，撒拔的父亲。Nathan

Localization.Gloss: 拿单（na dān），《思》纳堂。大卫的勇士约珥的兄弟。Nathan

Terms.Localization: brother of Joel, warrior, time of David

Localization.Gloss: 拿单（na dān），《思》纳堂。被掳归回后的两个人：(1)与以斯拉一同回归耶路撒冷的人（拉8.16）；(2)应许休弃外邦妻子的人（拉10.39）。Nathan

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 拿单．米勒（na dān-mǐ le），《思》乃堂默肋客。犹大王约西亚时期的官长之一。Nathan-Melech

Localization.Gloss: 拿坦业（na tǎn ye），《思》乃塔乃耳。苏押的儿子，摩西时代以萨迦支派的首领之一。Nethanel

Terms.Localization: son of Zuar; chief; tribe of Issachar; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 拿坦业（na tǎn ye），《思》乃塔乃耳。犹大支派人，耶西的第四子，大卫的兄长。Nethanel

Terms.Localization: son of Jesse; brother of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拿坦业（na tǎn ye），《思》乃塔乃耳。大卫王时代的几个祭司和文士。Nethanel

Terms.Localization: various priests and scribes; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 拿坦业（na tǎn ye），《思》乃塔乃耳。犹大王约沙法的官员之一。Nethanel

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 拿坦业（na tǎn ye），《思》乃塔乃耳。犹大王约西亚时期利未支派的族长之一。Nethanel

Terms.Localization: chief; tribe of Levi; time of king Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 拿坦业（na tǎn ye），《思》乃塔乃耳。被掳归回后的三个人：(1)巴施户珥的儿子，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的祭司之一（拉10.22）；(2)约雅金时期，耶大雅家族的祭司和族长（尼12.21）；(3)尼希米时期，庆祝重建耶路撒冷城墙时负责玩乐器的祭司（尼12.36）。Nethanel

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 尼探雅（ni tan yǎ），《思》乃塔尼雅。被掳之后，杀了基大利的以实玛利的父亲。Nethaniah

Terms.Localization: father of Ishmael, officer

Localization.Gloss: 尼探雅（ni tan yǎ），《思》乃塔尼雅。亚萨的儿子，大卫时代的圣殿乐师之一。Nethaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Asaph; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 尼探雅（ni tan yǎ），《思》乃塔尼雅。亚萨的儿子，大卫时代的圣殿乐师之一。Nethaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Asaph; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 尼探雅（ni tan yǎ），《思》乃塔尼雅。犹大王约沙法时期的利未人之一。Nethaniah
