Localization.Gloss: 刻／雕刻。用锋利的工具在硬物如石头或金属上刻出图案或文字。to engrave

Terms.Localization: to carve figures or characters on the surface of a hard object, such as stone or metal, with a sharp tool

Localization.Gloss: 《现》比他希雅（bǐ tā xī yǎ），《和》毗他希雅（pi tā xī yǎ），《思》培塔希雅。大卫时代在圣殿供职的第19班次祭司首领。Pethahiah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 《现》比他希雅（bǐ tā xī yǎ），《和》毗他希雅（pi tā xī yǎ），《思》培塔希雅。被掳归回后听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的利未人之一。Pethahiah

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《现》比他希雅（bǐ tā xī yǎ），《和》毗他希雅（pi tā xī yǎ），《思》培塔希雅。犹大支派人，米示萨别的儿子，被掳归回后辅助王办理犹大民的事。Pethahiah

Terms.Localization: son of Meshezabel; assistant of the king; tribe of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 简单的人；简单，无知，愚昧。因自身缺乏智慧和经验，容易受他人、言论思想或个人情感影响的人；或处于缺乏智慧和经验的状态。simple person; simpleness, ignorance

Terms.Localization: person who is easily influenced by other people, ideas or one's own passions, because of his/her lack of wisdom and experience; or the state of lacking wisdom and experience

Localization.Gloss: 绳，线。用棉、羊毛、亚麻或贵金属制成的细绳；用来把物件系在衣服上或挂在颈项上，也用来量度和捆扎。cord, thread

Terms.Localization: relatively thin cord made of cotton, wool, flax or precious metal; used for attaching objects to clothes, hanging small objects around the neck, measuring, tying, etc.

Localization.Gloss: （用于丈量的）麻绳。（用于丈量的）麻绳。linen cord (used for measuring)

Terms.Localization: linen cord (used for measuring)

Localization.Gloss: 比东（bǐ dōng），《思》丕通。埃及人的一座积货城。Pithom

Terms.Localization: town in Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 毒蛇，虺蛇。毒蛇，虺蛇。cobra

Terms.Localization: cobra

Localization.Gloss: 《现》巴特罗（bā te luo）／埃及南部，《和》巴忒罗（bā te luo），《思》帕特洛斯。位于埃及南部的一个地区。Pathrus

Terms.Localization: region; south of Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 帕斯鲁细人。巴忒罗的居民；麦西的后裔。Pathrusim

Terms.Localization: inhabitants of Pathrus, descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 群。一群共同走动和喂食的小型家畜；由绵羊和山羊组成；剪下的羊毛可织成布；雌羊的奶做食物；可以宰杀食用；也用作献祭；跟数量庞大有关；也可以指上帝的百姓，他们经常被视为羊群，以上帝为它们的牧羊人。flock

Terms.Localization: quantity of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; consisting of sheep and goats; hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; females milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animals; associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

Localization.Gloss: 撒南（sā nan），《思》匝南。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇。Zaanan

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 达布蜥蝪；刺尾蜥蝪。体型较大的蜥蝪，长约 65 厘米，外形厚实矮胖，短粗的尾巴有尖刺；以沙漠植物为食；常见于沙漠地区；不洁净的动物。dab lizard; thorn-tailed lizard

Terms.Localization: relatively large type of lizard, with a length of about 65 cm, a fairly thick, squat appearance, and a thick, short tail covered with spikes; feeds on desert plants; uromastyx aegyptius or uromastyx ornatus, found in desert areas; unclean animal

Localization.Gloss: 车；马车。两轮或四轮的木车，由牛、驴，或马驮拉，用作旅行或运送货物。cart; wagon

Terms.Localization: two or four-wheeled vehicle; made of wood; pulled by oxen, donkeys, or horses; used for travel or the transport of loads

Localization.Gloss: 天上的万象（太阳、月亮和星辰）。所有发光天体的统称；由上帝所创造；很多时受人敬拜，这种做法有违于上帝的律法；在《但以理书》第 8 章，这词可能用来隐喻上帝的子民。host of heaven (= sun, moon, and stars)

Terms.Localization: collective of all celestial bodies that give light; created by God; often worshiped by people, contrary to God's law; in Daniel 8 possibly used as a metaphor for the people of God

Localization.Gloss: 天军（天上的创造物）。字面意思：“耶和华军队的元帅”或“天上的万军”；因而指：围绕在上帝宝座周围的天上的生物，它们颂赞上帝，并在地上执行他的意旨。host of heaven (= heavenly creatures)

Terms.Localization: literally: "host of YHWH" or "host of heaven"; hence: heavenly beings surrounding God's throne, praising him and carrying out his will on earth

Localization.Gloss: 万军之，万军的。字面意思：“万军之耶和华（或任何一个上帝其他名称或这些名称的组合）”；因而指：上帝的称号；焦点是：他统领天上围绕他宝座周围的生物；它们颂赞上帝、在地上执行他的意旨；这称号关乎上帝的能力，以及他作为神圣君王和战士对宇宙的掌控。hosts (in: Lord, LORD, God of hosts)

Terms.Localization: literally: "YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts"; hence: epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

Localization.Gloss: 《现》洗遍（xǐ bian）／洗扁（xǐ biǎn），《和》洗扁，《思》责波殷。与所多玛、蛾摩拉一同被灭的五座城之一。Zeboiim

Terms.Localization: one of the 5 cities in the plain which included Sodom and Gomorrah

Localization.Gloss: 鬣狗。野生哺乳动物，头大，前腿比后腿长；灰褐色的身上有模糊的深色条纹；颈部的条纹呈斑点和斑块状；鬃毛坚硬直立，从两耳中间延伸整个背部，直至尾巴的末端；主要以腐肉为食，偶尔也自行捕猎；居住在洞穴和塌木下的空隙，但也有人认为它们会住在废弃的房屋或墓穴中；发出哀号声；可能属不洁的动物。hyena

Terms.Localization: wild mammal with big head and front feet longer than hind feet; brownish grey color with dark indistinct stripes that become spots and blotches on its neck; stiff, upright mane that stretches from between its ears all the way down its back until the end of its tail; feeds mainly on carrion and but occasionally goes hunting itself; lives in holes and hollows under logs but is also known to inhabit abandoned houses or tombs; produces wailing sounds; Hyaena hyaena; probably unclean

Localization.Gloss: 公羚羊。小型到中型的草原羚羊，栖息在稀树草原和半沙漠地区，呈红褐色，胸部和腹部发白；长腿，高雅，跳跃高手；一小群生活一起；属洁净的动物，可食用；与速度、高雅、美丽、男性的精壮和繁殖相关。male gazelle

Terms.Localization: small- to medium-sized antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts; reddish brown in color with small horns; long-legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; Gazella dorcas or Gazella arabica; clean and can be eaten; associated with speed, grace, beauty, male virility, and fertility

Localization.Gloss: 洗比雅（xǐ bǐ yǎ），《思》漆彼雅。便雅悯支派的族长之一，沙哈连和贺得的儿子。Zibia

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 西比亚（xī bǐ ya），《思》漆彼雅。别是巴人，亚哈谢的妻子，犹大王约阿施的母亲。Zibiah

Terms.Localization: of Beersheba; wife of Ahaziah; mother of Joash, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 母羚羊。小型到中型的草原羚羊，栖息在稀树草原和半沙漠地区，呈红褐色，胸部和腹部发白；长腿，高雅，跳跃高手；一小群生活一起；母羚羊在一岁时性活跃，高繁殖；属洁净的动物，可食用；与速度、高雅、美丽、男性的精壮和繁殖相关。female gazelle

Terms.Localization: small- to medium-sized antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts; reddish brown in color with small horns (with exception of female impala); long-legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; female is sexually active at one year; high rate of reproduction; Gazella dorcas or Gazella arabica; clean and can be eaten; associated with speed, grace, beauty, female sexuality, and fertility

Localization.Gloss: 染的布。高品质的染色衣料，十分珍贵。dyed cloth

Terms.Localization: dyed cloth of high quality; highly valued

Localization.Gloss: 祭便（ji bian），《思》漆贝红。希未人，亚雅和亚拿的父亲。Zibeon

Terms.Localization: father of Anah; Hivite

Localization.Gloss: 祭便（ji bian），《思》漆贝红。西珥的儿子。Zibeon

Terms.Localization: son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 洗波音（谷）（xǐ bō yīn (gǔ)）／洗编（xǐ biān），《思》袋狼（山谷）／责波殷。便雅悯支派的地业之一，在耶路撒冷的东北方。Zeboim

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 西达达（xī da da），《思》责辣得／责达得。位于以色列北部边境的一个地点。Zedad

Terms.Localization: location along northern boundary of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。利未支派人，大卫时期的祭司，亚希突的儿子，亚希玛斯的父亲。Zadok

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitub; priest; tribe of Levi; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。犹大王约坦的母亲耶路沙的父亲。Zadok

Terms.Localization: father of Jerushah, mother of Jotham

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。利未支派人，大祭司，亚希突的儿子。Zadok

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitub; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。米书兰的父亲，米拉约的儿子，祭司亚萨利雅、西莱雅的先祖。Zadok

Terms.Localization: son of Meraioth; ancestor of Azariah, Seraiah, priest

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。被掳归回后的几个人：(1)巴拿的后裔，(2)音麦的后裔，(3)在尼希米约上签名的民众的首领之一，(4)管理库房的文士。Zadok

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西丁（xī dīng），《思》漆丁。拿弗他利支派属地的坚固城之一，位于加利利湖的南端西岸。Ziddim

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 公义；公正；义人。公义；公正；义人。just, righteous person

Terms.Localization: just, righteous person

Localization.Gloss: 公义的；证明是正直的；公正的。公义的；证明是正直的；公正的。be (or show oneself) just, in the right

Terms.Localization: be (or show oneself) just, in the right

Localization.Gloss: 澄清；证明；导致正义。澄清；证明；导致正义。justify

Terms.Localization: justify

Localization.Gloss: 使为义，称为义。使为义，称为义。make righteous, pronounce just

Terms.Localization: make righteous, pronounce just

Localization.Gloss: 公义，公平。公义，公平。right, justice

Terms.Localization: right, justice

Localization.Gloss: 公义，公平。公义，公平。right, justice

Terms.Localization: right, justice

Localization.Gloss: 西底家。基拿拿的儿子；亚哈王时期的假先知。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Chenaanah; false prophet; time of king Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。犹大国最后一个君王（公元前597-587年在位），约西亚的第三个儿子，原名“玛探雅”，约雅斤的叔叔。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Josiah; king of Judah (597-587)

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。犹大王约雅斤的儿子。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》希底家（xī dǐ jiā），《和》西底家，《思》漆德克雅。被掳归回后随同尼希米签约遵守神律法的犹大首领之一。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。基拿拿的儿子，亚哈时期的假先知之一。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Chenaanah; false prophet; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。犹大国最后一个君王（公元前597-587年在位），约西亚的第三个儿子，原名“玛探雅”，约雅斤的叔叔。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Josiah; king of Judah (597-587)

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。玛西雅的儿子，耶利米时期的假先知。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: false prophet; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。哈拿尼雅的儿子，约雅敬时期犹大的首领。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Hananiah; official; time of Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 琐巴（suǒ bā），《思》祚巴。位于叙利亚的一个王国。Zobah

Terms.Localization: land; in Syria

Localization.Gloss: 苏押（sū yā），《思》族阿尔。以萨迦支派的族长拿坦业的父亲。Zuar

Terms.Localization: father of Nethanel; tribe of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 苏弗（sū fu），《思》族弗。以利加拿的儿子；希幔的祖先；利未支派人。Zuph

Terms.Localization: son of Elkanah; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 琐法（suǒ fǎ），《思》祚法黑。亚设支派一个宗族的族长，希连的儿子。Zophah

Terms.Localization: son of Helem; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 琐菲。以利加拿的儿子；利未支派人。Zophai

Terms.Localization: son of Elkanah; descendant of Elkanah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 琐法（suǒ fǎ），《思》左法尔。拿玛人；约伯的三个朋友之一。Zophar

Terms.Localization: Naamathite; friend of Job

Localization.Gloss: 岩石，保护者。字面意思：岩石；因而指：保护者（上帝的别号）。literally: rock; hence: protector (epithet of God)

Terms.Localization: literally: rock; hence: protector (epithet of God)

Localization.Gloss: 苏珥（sū ěr），《思》族尔。米甸的族长之一，哥斯比的父亲。Zur

Terms.Localization: king of Midian

Localization.Gloss: 苏珥（sū ěr），《思》族尔。基遍的便雅悯人，耶利的儿子。Zur

Terms.Localization: son of Jeiel; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 泰尔（tai ěr），《旧》推罗，《思》提洛。腓尼基海岸的港口城镇，在西顿以南，属亚设支派。Tyre

Terms.Localization: town; Phoenicia

Localization.Gloss: 苏列（sū lie），《思》族黎耳。利未支派米拉利宗族的首领之一，亚比亥的儿子。Zuriel

Terms.Localization: son of Abihail; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 苏利沙代（sū li shā dai），《思》族黎沙待。西缅支派的首领示路蔑的父亲。Zurishaddai

Terms.Localization: father of Shelumiel; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 琐辖（suǒ xia），《思》祚哈尔。赫人弗仑的父亲。Zohar

Terms.Localization: father of Ephron; Hittite

Localization.Gloss: 琐辖（suǒ xia），《思》祚哈尔。西缅的儿子。Zohar

Terms.Localization: son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 琐辖（suǒ xia），《思》祚哈尔。犹大支派人，希拉的儿子。Zohar

Terms.Localization: son of Helah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 鬣狗。野生哺乳动物，头大，前腿比后腿长；灰褐色的身上有模糊的深色条纹；颈部的条纹呈斑点和斑块状；鬃毛坚硬直立，从两耳中间延伸整个背部，直至尾巴的末端；主要以腐肉为食，偶尔也自行捕猎；居住在洞穴和塌木下的空隙，但也有人认为它们会住在废弃的房屋或墓穴中；发出哀号声；可能属不洁的动物。hyena

Terms.Localization: wild mammal with big head and front feet longer than hind feet; brownish grey color with dark indistinct stripes that become spots and blotches on its neck; stiff, upright mane that stretches from between its ears all the way down its back until the end of its tail; feeds mainly on carrion and but occasionally goes hunting itself; lives in holes and hollows under logs but is also known to inhabit abandoned houses or tombs; produces wailing sounds; Hyaena hyaena; probably unclean

Localization.Gloss: 洗巴（xǐ bā），《思》漆巴。扫罗王的仆人。Ziba

Terms.Localization: servant of king Saul

Localization.Gloss: 西顿（xī dun），《思》漆冬。迦南的儿子；位于腓尼基的一座城镇。Sidon

Terms.Localization: son of Canaan; town in Phoenicia

Localization.Gloss: 西顿人（xī dun ren），《思》漆冬人。住在西顿的居民。Sidonian

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Sidon

Localization.Gloss: 锡安。圣殿所在地；也用来指住在那里的百姓。Zion

Terms.Localization: mountain; on which the temple has been built; also used to refer to the people living there

Localization.Gloss: 西哈（xī hā），《思》漆哈。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Ziha

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 寻（xun），《思》亲。尼革夫的旷野，后来成为犹大支派的南界。Zin

Terms.Localization: location; Negeb

Localization.Gloss: 洗珥（xǐ ěr），《思》漆敖尔。犹大支派属地的山地城镇之一，位于希伯仑的东北方。Zior

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 洗斯（xǐ sī），《思》漆兹。隐．基底附近的一个地方。Ziz

Terms.Localization: location; near En-Gedi

Localization.Gloss: 洗拉（xǐ lā），《思》漆拉。拉麦的第二个妻子，土八该隐和拿玛的母亲。Zillah

Terms.Localization: wife of Lamech

Localization.Gloss: 外表，形象。人的外表呈现。semblance, likeness

Terms.Localization: collection of attributes serving to represent a person

Localization.Gloss: 偶像。作为崇拜对象而造出来代表神明的物品；呈人或动物的形状；用木头、金属或石头制成。idol

Terms.Localization: object made to represent a god as an object of worship; in the shape of human or animal; made of wood, metal, or stone

Localization.Gloss: 影子；幻影。没有实质的动物，是真实事物的表象。shadow, phantom

Terms.Localization: a thing without substance that is a semblance of something real

Localization.Gloss: 撒们山。示剑附件的一座山。Zalmon

Terms.Localization: mountain; near Shechem

Localization.Gloss: 撒们（sā men），《思》匝耳孟。亚合的后裔，大卫的三十勇士之一。Zalmon

Terms.Localization: descendant of Ahoah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 撒摩拿（sā mo na），《思》匝耳摩纳。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野安营之地，位于普嫩的西北，别是巴的东南。Zalmonah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 撒慕拿（sā mu na），《思》匝耳慕纳。士师基甸时期的米甸王。Zalmunna

Terms.Localization: king of Midian

Localization.Gloss: 洗拉（xǐ lā），《思》责拉。便雅悯支派的城镇之一，位于耶路撒冷的西北方。Zela

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 洗拉以利弗。便雅悯支派地业内的一座城镇。Zela Haeleph

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 萨拉。哈嫩的父亲，被掳归回时期的一个祭司。Zalaph

Terms.Localization: father of Hanun, priest, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西罗非哈（xī luo fēi hā），《思》责罗斐哈得。玛拿西支派人，希弗的儿子。Zelophehad

Terms.Localization: son of Hepher; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 泄撒（xie sā）。便雅悯支派地业内的一个地点。Zelzah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 鱼钩，鱼叉。约与一个人高度相等的木棒；一端有锋利的金属或骨尖，上面有倒勾，另一端绑着一条绳子，用来抛向鱼或其他海洋生物，以捕杀它们。harpoon; fishing spear

Terms.Localization: wooden rod about the length of a man, with a metal or bone point with barbs on one end, and a rope on the other end; thrown at fish or aquatic animals to kill and catch them

Localization.Gloss: 蝗虫；蚱蜢。一种成群会跳的昆虫，可能是某种蝗虫或蚱蜢。locust

Terms.Localization: a type of swarming hopping insect, probably some sort of locust or grasshopper

Localization.Gloss: 洗勒（xǐ le），《思》责肋克。亚扪人，大卫的勇士之一。Zelek

Terms.Localization: Ammonite; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 洗勒太（xǐ le tai），《思》漆耳泰。便雅悯支派的族长之一，示每的儿子。Zillethai

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 洗勒太（xǐ le tai），《思》漆肋泰。玛拿西支派人，大卫时期的官长之一。Zillethai

Terms.Localization: officer; tribe of Manasseh; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 圈套，网罗。某种织物或网罗，能缠住脚跟，用来捕捉野兽；常指攻击和控制。snare; trap

Terms.Localization: some kind of woven material or mesh that entangles the feet; used for catching animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 羊毛。绵羊等多毛动物的波浪形柔软绒毛，可用来纺线造衣服；与洁白、纯洁，和柔软有关。wool

Terms.Localization: soft wavy undercoat of hairy animals such as sheep; used to weave a fabric from which clothing was made; associated with whiteness, purity, and softness

Localization.Gloss: 洗玛利人（xǐ mǎ li ren），《思》责玛黎人。迦南的儿子洗玛利的后裔。Zemarite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 洗玛脸（xǐ mǎ liǎn），《思》责玛辣因。便雅悯支派的城镇之一，位于伯特利的东北方。Zemaraim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 鱼钩。用金属、骨头，甚至硬刺制成的小弯钩，在锋利的尖端通常有倒钩，另一端成环状，可以系上鱼丝；在钩子上放上鱼饵以诱捕鱼儿；与攻击和控制有关。fishhook

Terms.Localization: small, curved piece of metal or bone or even a strong thorn, with a sharp point on one end, usually with a barb just behind the point, and a loop or bend on the other end to which a fishing line can be attached; used with some bait attached to it in order to attract a fish; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 洗楠（xǐ nan），《思》责南。犹大支派的高原城镇之一。Zenan

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 撒益（sā yi），《思》匝依尔。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇，在希伯仑东北方。Zair

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 琐安（suǒ ān），《思》左罕。埃及尼罗河三角洲东部的城镇，曾是下埃及的行政中心。Zoan

Terms.Localization: town, located in Nile delta of Egypt; Egyptian capital during 21st and 22nd dynasties; administrative centre of Lower Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 撒拿音（sā na yīn），《思》匝纳宁／匝阿纳宁。拿弗他利支派地业的边界城镇，位于伯善以北。Zaanannim

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 琐珥（suǒ ěr），《思》左哈尔。迦南地某个平原的五座城之一，所多玛和蛾摩拉也在该平原上；在耶利哥谷以南、以东境内的撒烈谷南岸。Zoar

Terms.Localization: one of the 5 cities in the plain which included Sodom and Gomorrah; in the south of Jericho Valley; on south bank of Wadi-Zered in Edomite territory

Localization.Gloss: 洗玻（xǐ bō），《思》则缶／则非。以利法的儿子，以扫的孙子，以东的族长之一。Zepho

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau Zephi in 1CH 1.36

Localization.Gloss: 撒分（sā fēn），《思》匝丰。迦得支派地业的城镇之一，位于伯善的东南方。Zaphon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 洗分（xǐ fēn），《思》责丰。迦得的儿子。Zephon

Terms.Localization: son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 洗分（族）（xǐ fēn (zu)），《思》责丰家族。迦得的长子洗分的后裔。Zephonite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zephon, son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 小鸟；麻雀。麻雀大小的鸟的统称。bird; sparrow

Terms.Localization: general term for a small bird about the size of a sparrow

Localization.Gloss: 西拨。摩押王巴勒的父亲。Zippor

Terms.Localization: father of Balak, king of Moab

Localization.Gloss: 洗玻。以扫的孙子、以利法的儿子。Zephi

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau Zepho in Gen 36.11, 15

Localization.Gloss: 洗非芸（xǐ fēi yun），《思》漆斐雍。迦得的长子。Ziphion

Terms.Localization: son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 公山羊。雄性家畜，通常为黑色，有长毛和短毛的品种；有角；常与绵羊一起牧放；洁净的动物，皮，羊毛和角的来源，可用来献祭；有时与鬼魔有关，被认为有侵略性。he-goat

Terms.Localization: male domestic animal, generally black in color, found in both shorthaired and longhaired varieties, with horns, usually herded together with sheep; Capra hircus mambrica or Capra hircus angorensis; clean animal; source of hides, hair, and horns; may be used for sacrifice; sometimes associated with demons, regarded as aggressive

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》责法尼雅。利未支派人，他哈的儿子，希幔的祖先。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Tahath; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》责法尼雅。西底家时期的祭司，利未支派人。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi; time of Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》索福尼亚。古示的儿子，犹大王约西亚时的先知。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Cushi; prophet

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》责法尼雅。先知撒迦利亚时期，约西亚（贤 ）的父亲。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: father of Josiah, Hen, time of Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》责法尼雅。玛西雅的儿子，西底家王时期的祭司之一。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi; time of Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》撒发那特．巴内亚（sā fā na te – bā nei ya），《和》撒发那忒．巴内亚（sā fā na te – bā nei ya），《思》匝斐纳特帕乃亚。约瑟的埃及名字。Zaphenath-Paneah

Terms.Localization: Egyptian name of Joseph

Localization.Gloss: 沙漠眼镜蛇；埃及眼镜蛇。一种剧毒的蛇，肋骨能够伸展到颈部，从而形成一个扁平的轮廓；深棕色，底部为黄色（有时是黄色带状）；不洁净的动物；与侵略和潜伏的危险有关；צִפְעֹנִי。desert cobra; Egyptian cobra

Terms.Localization: extremely poisonous snake with the ability to spread the ribs in the neck area so as to form a broad, flat profile; dark brown in color with a yellowish underside (and sometimes yellowish bands); Desert Cobra (Walterinnesia aegyptia) or Egyptian Cobra (Naja haje); unclean animal; associated with aggression and lurking danger; צִפְעֹנִי

Localization.Gloss: 沙漠眼镜蛇；埃及眼镜蛇。一种剧毒的蛇，肋骨能够伸展到颈部，从而形成一个扁平的轮廓；深棕色，底部为黄色（有时是黄色带状）；不洁净的动物；与侵略和潜伏的危险有关；צֶפַע。desert cobra; Egyptian cobra

Terms.Localization: extremely poisonous snake with the ability to spread the ribs in the neck area so as to form a broad, flat profile; dark brown in color with a yellowish underside (and sometimes yellowish bands); Desert Cobra (Walterinnesia aegyptia) or Egyptian Cobra (Naja haje); unclean animal; associated with aggression and lurking danger; צֶפַע

Localization.Gloss: 杨柳。靠水边生长的一种树，可能是柳树或胡杨树。willow

Terms.Localization: tree that grows by water; either willow or Euphrates poplar: Salix alba, Salix acmophylla, or Populus euphratica

Localization.Gloss: 青蛙。无尾两栖动物，身体采蹲坐姿势，皮肤湿润光滑，长后腿用于跳跃；身长约 70 毫米；棕色或橄榄绿色；食用蛙或斑点蛙；不洁净，因此不可吃。frog

Terms.Localization: tailless amphibian with a squat body, moist smooth skin, and long hind legs for jumping; about 70 mm long; brown or olive-green; Rana esculenta (Edible frog) or Rana punctata (Spotted frog); unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 西坡拉（xī pō lā），《思》漆颇辣。米甸祭司流珥或叶忒罗的女儿，摩西的妻子。Zipporah

Terms.Localization: wife of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 洗法（xǐ fǎ），《思》责法特。一座被摧毁的迦南城镇，位于别是巴以东。Zephath

Terms.Localization: town; Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 洗法谷（xǐ fǎ (gǔ)），《思》责法达山谷。位于谢非拉的玛利沙附近的一个山谷。Zephathah

Terms.Localization: valley; near Mareshah

Localization.Gloss: 洗革拉（xǐ ge lā），《思》漆刻拉格。西缅支派地业内的一个地点，位于别是巴的西北。Ziklag

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 口袋，行囊。用来携带食物的袋子。sack, bag

Terms.Localization: sack or bag for carrying food

Localization.Gloss: 侧耳（ce ěr），《思》责尔。拿弗他利支派地业中的坚固城之一，在加利利湖西面。Zer

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 洗利达（xǐ li da），《思》》责勒达。以法莲支派地业内的一座城镇。Zeredah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 《现》洗璐雅（xĭ lu yǎ），《和》洗鲁雅（xǐ lǔ yǎ），《思》责鲁雅／史默亚。约押、亚比筛、亚撒黑的母亲，拿辖的女儿，大卫的姊妹。Zeruiah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Nahash; sister of David

Localization.Gloss: 《现》洗鲁雅（xĭ lǔ yǎ），《和》洗鲁阿（xǐ lǔ ā），《思》责鲁阿。以色列王耶罗波安的母亲。Zeruah

Terms.Localization: mother of king Jeroboam I of Isral

Localization.Gloss: 洗罗（xǐ luo），《思》责洛尔。便雅悯人比歌拉的儿子，亚别的父亲，扫罗王的先祖。Zeror

Terms.Localization: son of Becorath; ancestor of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 袋子，口袋，锦囊。用布制成的小袋子，用来携带金钱，或装香料放在衣服里面；常指人所珍惜的财物。bag, bundle, purse, sachet

Terms.Localization: small container made of cloth, used for carrying money, packing fragrant spices in order to put between one's clothes, etc.; associated with treasured possessions

Localization.Gloss: 《现》泰尔人（tai ěr ren）／泰尔的人民／泰尔城来的人，《和》泰尔人，《旧》推罗人，《思》提洛人／提洛的。亚设支派地业的城镇泰尔的居民。Tyrian

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Tyre

Localization.Gloss: 西利（xī li），《思》责黎。大卫时期圣殿的乐师，耶杜顿的儿子。Zeri

Terms.Localization: son of Jeduthun; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 香膏。从沙漠植物中提取出来，具有治疗作用的芳香药膏。Jericho balm

Terms.Localization: sweet-smelling healing ointment from a desert plant

Localization.Gloss: 换传染性皮肤病。罹患传染性皮肤治病。have an infectious skin disease

Terms.Localization: suffer from an infectious skin disease

Localization.Gloss: 琐拉（suǒ lā），《思》祚辣。但支派地业内的一座城镇。Zora

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 黄蜂；胡蜂。一种有刺的飞行昆虫，有透明、膜状的翅膀；大黄蜂通常为黑色或棕色；胡蜂通常为绿色；较大的黄蜂可达 30-40 毫米长；黄蜂和胡蜂都有刺，被螫到很痛且危险；象征危险的敌人或进攻的军队。hornet, wasp

Terms.Localization: flying stinging insect with transparent, membrane-like wings; hornets are usually black or brown; wasps are often greenish; larger hornets can be 30-40 mm long; both have a sting that can be very painful, even dangerous; symbol for a dangerous enemy or an attacking army

Localization.Gloss: 琐拉人。琐拉的居民。Zorite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Zora

Localization.Gloss: 传染性皮肤病。一种传染性的皮肤疾病；统称，可能包括牛皮癣、毛囊癣和白斑病。infectious skin disease

Terms.Localization: an infectious skin disease; general term which probably covers diseases as psoriasis, favus, and leucoderma (Hulse)

Localization.Gloss: 琐拉人。琐拉的居民。Zorathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Zora

Localization.Gloss: 镕化；炼净；试炼。镕化；炼净；试炼。melt; refine; test

Terms.Localization: melt; refine; test

Localization.Gloss: 金匠。金匠。goldsmith

Terms.Localization: goldsmith

Localization.Gloss: 撒勒法（sā le fǎ），《思》匝尔法特。腓尼基的一座城镇，在西顿和推罗之间。Zarephath

Terms.Localization: town; Phoenicia; near Sidon

Localization.Gloss: 西利拉（xī li lā），《思》责勒达。以法莲支派的城镇之一，位于疏割的西北。Zererah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 洗列（xǐ lie），《思》责勒特。犹大支派人，亚施户和妻子希拉所生的长子。Zereth

Terms.Localization: son of Ashhur; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 细列哈．沙辖（xi lie hā-shā xia），《思》责勒特沙哈尔。吕便支派地业的城镇之一，位于死海的东岸。Zereth-Shahar

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 《现》撒拉旦（sā lā dan），《和》撒拉但（sā lā dan）／撒拉他拿（sā lā tā na），《思》匝尔堂。以法莲支派地业内的一座城镇。Zarethan

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 穴鸟。形体相对较小的黑鸟，不洁净，不能吃；与孤独、破坏、毁灭有关，可能也指死亡。jackdaw

Terms.Localization: relatively small black bird; unclean, not to be eaten; associated with loneliness, devastation, destruction, and possibly death

Localization.Gloss: 咒诅。咒诅。curse

Terms.Localization: curse

Localization.Gloss: 甲薛（jiǎ xuē），《思》卡贝责耳。犹大支派属地的城镇之一，位于别是巴的东北。Kabzeel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基伯先（jī bo xiān），《思》克贝匝殷。以法莲支派地业内的城镇之一，分配给利未人，位于示剑的东南方。Kibzaim

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 《现》基博罗．哈他瓦（jī bo luo-hā tā wǎ）／贪欲的坟墓，《和》基博罗．哈他瓦（jī bo luo-hā tā wǎ），《思》克贝洛特阿塔瓦／克贝洛特塔瓦。以色列人出埃及的安营之地，位于西奈山和哈洗录之间的地方。Kibroth Hattaavah

Terms.Localization: location along route of Exodus

Localization.Gloss: 肉桂。用肉桂树的内树皮制成的芳香物质；肉桂树常见于印度和斯里兰卡，用来制作香薰和膏油；这种树的花苞用作调味料；叶子和豆荚可能有药用价值。cassia tree

Terms.Localization: fragrant substance made from the inner bark of the cassia tree (Cinnamomum cassia), found in India and Sri Lanka, and used for the preparation of perfume and anointing oil; the buds of this tree are used to flavor and season food; its leaves and pods may have medicinal qualities

Localization.Gloss: 圣洁。圣洁。holy

Terms.Localization: holy

Localization.Gloss: 基底玛（jī dǐ mǎ），《思》刻德玛。以实玛利的儿子。Kedemah

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael

Localization.Gloss: 基底莫（jī dǐ mo），《思》刻德摩特。吕便支派地业内的一座城镇，分配给利未人，位于底本的东北方。Kedemoth

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 甲篾（jiǎ mie），《思》卡德米耳。利未支派人，与所罗巴伯一同从被掳之地回归的族长之一。Kadmiel

Terms.Localization: family head; Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 甲摩尼人（jiǎ mo ni ren），《思》卡德摩尼人。居住在幼发拉底河以西的一族人，可能代表来自东方的游牧民族。Kadmonite

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 基达（jī da），《思》刻达尔。以实玛利的儿子；基达的后代、阿拉伯的游牧民族的族名及其所居之地。Kedar

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 汲沦（ji lun），《思》克德龙。耶路撒冷和橄榄山之间的溪谷，位于耶路撒冷以东。Kidron

Terms.Localization: river; east of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: （使）成为圣的，证明自己是圣洁的，宣布是神圣的，被视为圣的。（使）成为圣的，证明自己是圣洁的，宣布是神圣的，被视为圣的。be holy, prove oneself holy, declare holy, be consecrated

Terms.Localization: be holy, prove oneself holy, declare holy, be consecrated

Localization.Gloss: 男妓。神庙中的男娼妓。male temple prostitute

Terms.Localization: male temple prostitute

Localization.Gloss: 妓女。神庙中的女娼妓。female temple prostitute

Terms.Localization: female temple prostitute

Localization.Gloss: 加低斯（jiā dī sī），《思》卡德士／刻德士。一个重要的赫人城镇，也叫安．密巴。Kadesh

Terms.Localization: location; En Mishpat

Localization.Gloss: 《现》基低斯（jī dī sī）／加低斯（jiā dī sī），《和》基低斯（jī dī sī），《思》刻德士／卡德士。拿弗他利支派地业内的一座坚固城；分配给利未人。Kedesh

Terms.Localization: fortified; town; for Levites; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 基低斯（jī dī sī），《思》刻德士。犹大支派的城镇之一。Kedesh

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基低斯。以萨迦支派的城镇之一，分配给利未人。Kedesh

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 基希拉他（jī xī lā tā），《思》刻黑拉达。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野安营之地，位置不详。Kehelathah

Terms.Localization: line used for measuring the size of an object; sometimes used in a figurative sense in the context of moral and ethical standards

Localization.Gloss: 哥赖雅。玛西雅的儿子，撒路的祖先；被掳归回时期的一个便雅悯人。Kolaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Maaseiah; ancestor of Sallu, tribe of Benjamin, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 哥赖雅（gē lai yǎ），《思》科拉雅。耶利米时代的假先知亚哈的父亲。Kolaiah

Terms.Localization: father of Ahab, false prophet, time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 哥亚人（gē ya ren），《思》科亚人。先知以西结预言所提到的民族，所居位置不详，可能是在巴比伦的北部。Koa

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 猿猴。大型灵长类动物，尾巴长，鼻口与狗相似；体型有如一只大狗；通常是浅棕色，但较年长的雄性有时变成灰色；有些体型大的公猴会长出像狮子一般的鬃毛；它们大部分时间生活在地面，以根、茎、果实、叶子、昆虫和小型爬虫类动物为食；狒狒属的多个不同亚物种；从他施运到以色列。baboon

Terms.Localization: large primate with long tail and doglike muzzle, the size of a large dog; usually light brown in color, but older males sometimes turn gray; some large males develop a mane like a lion; they spend most of their time on the ground and eat a variety of roots, shoots, fruits, leaves, insects, and small reptiles; various subspecies of papio; brought to Israel from Tarsis

Localization.Gloss: 哥斯（gē sī），《思》科兹。犹大支派的一个人。Koz

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈哥斯（hā gē sī），《思》哈科兹。大卫时代在圣殿供职的第七班次祭司首领。Koz, Hakkoz

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 可利（kě li），《思》科勒。大卫时期的利未人，可拉的后裔，以比雅撒的儿子，沙龙的父亲；圣幕守门人。Kore

Terms.Localization: son of Ebiasaph; father of Shallum, gatekeeper

Localization.Gloss: 可利（kě li），《思》科辣黑。大卫时期的守门人，亚萨的儿子，米施利米雅的父亲。Kore

Terms.Localization: son of Asaph; gatekeeper; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 可利（kě li），《思》科勒。希西家时期的利未支派人，看守东门的音拿的儿子。Kore

Terms.Localization: son of Jimnah; gatekeeper; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 设网罗，设圈套。字面意思：设下陷阱或网罗；因此常用来形容人们用不义的方法来控制别人的行为。to entrap, ensare

Terms.Localization: literally: to lay a trap or snare; hence: to try to gain control over someone else in an unjust way

Localization.Gloss: 古沙雅（gǔ shā yǎ），《思》谷沙雅。米拉利族的利未人之一，圣殿的乐师以探的父亲。Kushaiah

Terms.Localization: father of Ethan, temple singer; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 基土拉（jī tǔ lā），《思》刻突辣。亚伯拉罕的妾。Keturah

Localization.Gloss: 基伦（jī lun），《思》克特龙。西布伦支派地业的城镇之一；迦南人居住的地方。Kitron

Localization.Gloss: 基尼人（jī ni ren），《思》刻尼人。散住在迦南地的民族，主要在死海西岸附近的地区。Cain, Kain, Kenite

Localization.Gloss: 该隐（gāi yǐn），《思》卡因。犹大支派属地的山地城镇之一，位于希伯仑的东南方。Cain, Kain, Kenite

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哀歌，挽歌。哀歌，挽歌。lamentation, elegy

Terms.Localization: lamentation, elegy

Localization.Gloss: 基拿（jī na），《思》克纳。犹大支派地业的城镇之一。Kinah

Localization.Gloss: 基尼人（jī ni ren），《思》刻尼人。散住在迦南地的民族，主要在死海西岸附近的地区。Kenite

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 该南（gāi nan），《思》刻南。塞特的孙子，以挪士的儿子。Kenan

Terms.Localization: son of Enosh; descendant of Seth

Localization.Gloss: 蓖麻。菊科有花植物；可长至 3 米高；深绿色的扇形叶片可达半米宽；茎上长有一簇簇多刺的圆形种子；豆油可用作药物，常作泻药。castor oil plant

Terms.Localization: flowering plant in the spurge family; can grow to 3 m high; dark green fan-like leaves can reach half a meter across; produces bunches of prickly round seeds on a stalk; Ricinus communis - castor oil plant; oil of the bean was used for medicine, often as a purgative

Localization.Gloss: 吉珥（ji ěr），《思》克尔。亚述境内的一个地区，确切位置不详。Kir

Terms.Localization: exact location unknown; region; Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 吉珥．哈列设（ji ěr-hā lie she），《思》克尔哈勒斯／克尔赫勒斯。位于摩押的一座城镇。Kir-Heres, Kir-Hareseth

Terms.Localization: town in Moab Kir-Hareseth

Localization.Gloss: 吉珥．哈列设（ji ěr-hā lie she），《思》克尔哈勒斯／克尔赫勒斯。位于摩押的一座城镇。Kir-Heres, Kir-Hareseth

Terms.Localization: town in Moab; Kir-Heres

Localization.Gloss: 吉珥．哈列设（ji ěr-hā lie she），《思》克尔哈勒斯／克尔赫勒斯。位于摩押的一座城镇。Kir-Heres, Kir-Hareseth

Terms.Localization: town in Moab; Kir-Heres

Localization.Gloss: 摩押（mo yā）的基珥（jī ĕr），《思》摩阿布的克尔。位于摩押的一座城镇，可能就是“吉珥哈列设”。Kir-Moab

Terms.Localization: town in Moab; probably identical to Kir-Heres (Kir-Hareseth)

Localization.Gloss: 基绿（jī lǜ），《思》刻洛斯。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Keros

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 基士（jī shi），《思》克士。便雅悯支派人，扫罗的父亲，亚别的儿子。Kish

Terms.Localization: father of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 基士（jī shi），《思》克士。便雅悯支派人，扫罗的先祖，耶利的儿子。Kish

Terms.Localization: son of Jeiel; ancestor of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 基士（jī shi），《思》克士。大卫时期的利未人，抹利的儿子。Kish

Terms.Localization: son of Mahli; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 基士（jī shi），《思》克士。希西家时期，利未支派的一个米拉利人，亚伯底的儿子。Kish

Terms.Localization: son of Abdi; Levite; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 基士（jī shi），《思》克士。便雅悯支派人，末底改的曾祖父。Kish

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Mordecai; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 基顺（jī shun），《思》克雄。沿迦密山之东北麓，流经米吉多平原的一条河流。Kishon

Terms.Localization: river

Localization.Gloss: 基示（jī shi），《思》克史。利未支派亚伯底的儿子，圣殿的乐师以探的父亲。Kishi

Terms.Localization: father of Ethan, temple singer; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 加莱（jiā lai），《思》卡来。撒来族的家族首领，与所罗巴伯一同归回犹大的祭司。Kallai

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 基拉雅（jī lā yǎ），《思》刻拉雅。利未支派人，被掳归回后听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的祭司之一。Kelaiah

Terms.Localization: Levite; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 基利他（jī li tā），《思》刻里达。被掳归回之后的利未人“基拉雅”（Kelaiah）的另称。Kelita

Terms.Localization: Levite(s); after exile

Localization.Gloss: 咒诅。咒诅。curse

Terms.Localization: curse

Localization.Gloss: 雕刻。用尖锐的工具在木头或其它材料上刻图案。to carve

Terms.Localization: to carve figures on wood or other material, with a sharp tool

Localization.Gloss: 站着的禾稼。成熟、但未收割的庄稼。standing grain

Terms.Localization: ripe, uncut grain plants

Localization.Gloss: 基母利（jī mǔ li），《思》刻慕耳。亚伯拉罕的侄子，亚兰的父亲，拿鹤的儿子。Kemuel

Terms.Localization: son of Nahor; father of Aram

Localization.Gloss: 基母利（jī mǔ li），《思》刻慕耳。以法莲支派的首领之一，拾弗但的儿子。Kemuel

Terms.Localization: son of Shiphtan; chief; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 基母利（jī mǔ li），《思》刻慕耳。大卫时期的利未人首领，哈沙比雅的父亲。Kemuel

Terms.Localization: father of Hashabiah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 加们（jiā men），《思》卡孟。位于基列的一座城镇，士师睚珥埋葬在此。Kamon

Terms.Localization: town; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 热心，关心，激动，嫉妒。为他人的缘故而感到愤怒或强烈的关心，因为那人没有得到应得的待遇；因他人拥有某种特质、特权或财产，觉得自己也应该拥有而对他人感到愤怒的一种情绪。be zealous, be concerned; be envious, be jealous

Terms.Localization: to experience a sentiment of anger or strong concern for the sake of someone else because that person does not receive the treatment they are entitled to; to experience a sentiment of anger toward someone else because that person has qualities, privileges, or possessions that one feels one should have as well

Localization.Gloss: 嫉妒，忌邪。坚持要得到与自己的地位匹配的关注和承诺。zealous, jealous

Terms.Localization: insisting on receiving the attention and commitment that is in keeping with one's status

Localization.Gloss: 热心，热情，激动，嫉妒。为他人的缘故而感到愤怒或强烈的关心，因为那人没有得到应得的待遇；因他人拥有某种特质、特权或财产，觉得自己也应该拥有而对他人感到愤怒的一种情绪。ardour, passion, zeal; envy, jealousy

Terms.Localization: a feeling of anger or strong concern for the sake of someone else because that person does not receive the treatment they are entitled to; a feeling of anger toward someone else because that person has qualities, privileges, or possessions that one feels one should have as well

Localization.Gloss: 加拿（jiā na），《思》卡纳。位于以法莲境内的一条溪流。Kanah

Terms.Localization: brook; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 加拿（jiā na），《思》卡纳。亚设支派属地的城镇之一，位于亚设地业的北端，推罗的东南方。Kanah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 芦苇／芦荻。一种高大的草，有硬挺尖削叶子和羽毛状头形的花，可长至超过 2 米高；生长在湖泊和溪流中，根部横越湖的底部，长出新叶子和茎；或生长在河畔；用于制造篮子、草席、笛子、笔、箭和房顶遮盖物；象征软弱和不能靠赖，但也象征有弹性。reed

Terms.Localization: a tall grass with stiff, sharply-pointed leaves and a plume-like flower head that reaches to more than 2 m; grows in lakes and streams, the roots creeping across the bottom of the lake to produce new leaves and stalks; or on riverbanks; used for baskets, mats, flutes, pens, arrows, and roof-coverings; symbol of weakness and undependability, but also flexibility

Localization.Gloss: 香菖蒲。一种芳香的草，一丛一丛生长至高约一米，有硬挺、剑状的叶子；或是一种芦苇，有硬挺的叶子，其特征是别具一格绿色的球状花，长在高约 50 厘米的茎上；通过煮沸和蒸馏叶子来提取油份；用作膏抹祭司的膏油。aromatic cane; calamus

Terms.Localization: sweet-smelling grass that grows in clumps to more than a meter high and has stiff leaves like sword grass; Cymbopogon martinii - ginger grass; or, a type of reed with stiff leaves, distinguished by its green flower head that grows on a stalk to about 50 cm high; Acorus calamus - calumus; oil is extracted by boiling and distilling the leaves; used in the oil for anointing priests

Localization.Gloss: 天平。有绳子绑在木棒的中央，两端各连接着一个盘子的一种装置；用来称物件的重量。balance; scales

Terms.Localization: contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; used for weighing objects

Localization.Gloss: 《现》木尺，《和》量度的竿。用作量度单位为六肘，即 3.1 米的芦苇。measuring reed, stick

Terms.Localization: reed used as a linear measure six royal cubits, i.e. of 3.1 meters

Localization.Gloss: 嫉妒，忌邪。坚持要得到与自己的地位匹配的关注和承诺。zealous, jealous

Terms.Localization: insisting on receiving the attention and commitment that is in keeping with one's status

Localization.Gloss: 基纳斯。以扫的长子以利法的儿子。Kenaz

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 基纳斯（jī na sī），《思》刻纳次。以东人的族长，以扫的孙子。Kenaz

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 基纳斯（jī na sī），《思》刻纳次。犹大支派迦勒的兄弟，俄陀聂的父亲。Kenaz

Terms.Localization: father of Othniel; brother of Caleb

Localization.Gloss: 基纳斯（jī na sī），《思》刻纳次。犹大支派人，迦勒的孙子，以拉的儿子。Kenaz

Terms.Localization: son of Elah, son of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基尼洗人（jī ni xǐ ren），《思》刻纳次人。散居于迦南各地的居民，是基纳斯的后代，后来被列入犹大支派。Kenizzite

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 《现》基尼洗（族）人（jī ni xǐ (zu) ren），《和》基尼洗族（jī ni xǐ zu），《思》刻纳次人。散居于迦南各地的居民，是基纳斯的后代，后来被列入犹大支派。Kenizzite

Terms.Localization: clan; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 桂皮／香肉桂。肉桂树，内树皮用来制成香肉桂。cinnamon

Terms.Localization: cinnamon tree, of which the inner bark is used for the preparation of the spice cinnamon

Localization.Gloss: 基纳（jī na），《思》刻纳特。位于加利利湖东面的一座城镇。Kenath

Terms.Localization: town; east of sea of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 行法术／占卜。用各种各样的方法与灵界沟通，例如检查动物的肝脏、摇箭、问神、抽签等；通常被视为一种恶行，应受到谴责。practice divination; be a fortune-teller

Terms.Localization: communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots, usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned

Localization.Gloss: 占卜，算命。占卜或算命的行为或结果，通常被视为邪恶行为。oracle, divination

Terms.Localization: practice or result of divination or fortune-telling, usually regarded as an evil practice

Localization.Gloss: 占卜的费用。交给占卜者作为工作报酬的物品。fee for divination

Terms.Localization: object that is given to a diviner in return for his work

Localization.Gloss: 笔墨盒。用来装笔和墨的一种小盒子。writing case

Terms.Localization: small box for carrying pens and ink

Localization.Gloss: 基伊拉。位于犹大支派地业内的一座城镇。Keilah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 猫头鹰。身份不确定；可能指：猫头鹰的一种；与黑暗和毁灭有关；有些译本作“刺猬”或“豪猪”。owl

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; possibly a type of owl; associated with doom and destruction; Some translations have "hedgehog" or "porcupine."

Localization.Gloss: 猫头鹰。身份不确定；可能指：猫头鹰的一种；参 קִפֹּד。owl

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; perhaps a type of owl; cf. קִפֹּד

Localization.Gloss: 肉豆蔻花；黑小茴香。一种种植植物，可长到30公分高，有像大茴香或胡萝卜的叶子，开五个花瓣蓝绿色的花；花的基部变成花荚，含有许多圆、黑、味道辛辣的种子；用于烹饪。nutmeg flower (black cummin)

Terms.Localization: a cultivated plant that grows to around 30 cm high and has a lacy leaf like dill or carrot and a greenish-blue flower with five petals; base of the flower becomes a seedpod that contains many round, black, sharp-smelling seeds; used in cooking

Localization.Gloss: 肉桂树。一种生长在印度和斯里兰卡的树，树皮可用来制作香薰和膏油；这种树的花苞用作调味料；叶子和豆荚可能有药用价值。cassia tree

Terms.Localization: tree found in India and Sri Lanka; Cinnamomum cassia - cassia tree; bark is used as spice and for the preparation of perfume and anointing oil; the buds are used to flavor and season food; its leaves and pods may have medicinal qualities

Localization.Gloss: 基洗亚（jī xǐ ya），《思》刻漆雅。约伯的女儿。Keziah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Job

Localization.Gloss: 鹧鸪。岩鹧鸪、黑鹧鸪和沙鹧鸪这三种鹧鸪中的任何一种；名字的意思是“呼叫者”，指雄鸟鸣叫的声音，它们通常站在岩石上鸣叫；群居在一种叫鹌鹑的小鸟中，下很多蛋，遇到危险时更倾向于奔跑，只在必要时才飞行。partridge

Terms.Localization: any one of three types of partridge: Alectoris graeca (rock partridge), Francolinus francolinus (black francolin), or Ammoperdix heyi (sand partridge); name means “the caller,” a reference to the ringing crowing of the males, typically while standing on top of a rock; lives in small flocks called coveys, lays a great many eggs, and prefers to run when in danger, flying only when necessary

Localization.Gloss: 奉献；供物；礼物。奉献；供物；礼物。offering, gift

Terms.Localization: offering, gift

Localization.Gloss: 斧子。有金属刀头连在木柄上，一边有刀刃，与木柄垂直；用来砍树和修整木材。adze

Terms.Localization: wooden handle with a metal blade, sharpened on one face, perpendicular to the handle; used for cutting down trees and shaping timber

Localization.Gloss: 加利亚（jiā li ya），《思》卡勒亚。被掳归回后，犹大的官长约哈难和约拿单的父亲。Kareah

Terms.Localization: father of Johanan, army officer of Judah, time of exile

Localization.Gloss: 可拉（kě lā），《思》科辣黑。以扫的儿子。Korah

Terms.Localization: son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 可拉（kě lā），《思》科辣黑。以东的族长之一。Korah

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 可拉（kě lā），《思》科辣黑。利未支派哥辖的后裔，以斯哈的儿子。Korah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 可拉人，《思》科辣黑人。利未支派哥辖的子孙。Korahite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Korah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 加略。位于摩押的一座城镇。Kerioth

Localization.Gloss: 基列．巴力（jī lie-bā li），《思》克黎雅特巴耳。犹大支派的城镇之一，位于耶路撒冷以西。Kiriath-Baal

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Terms.Localization: town; Moab

Localization.Gloss: 基列．耶琳。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇；קִרְיַת עָרִים。Kiriath-Jearim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah; קִרְיַת עָרִים

Localization.Gloss: 基列．萨拿。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇；分配给利未支派的亚伦宗族。Kiriath-Sannah

Terms.Localization: town; for priests; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基列．西弗（jī lie-xī fu），《思》克黎雅特色费尔。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇；分配给利未人。Kiriath-Sepher

Terms.Localization: town; for priests; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基列．耶琳。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇；קִרְיַת יְעָרִים。Kiriath-Jearim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah; קִרְיַת יְעָרִים

Localization.Gloss: 基列亭。吕便支派地业内的一座城镇，位于约旦河东岸；后归摩押。Kiriathaim

Terms.Localization: town east of Jordan; territory of Reuben, Moab

Localization.Gloss: 基列亭（jī lie ting），《思》克黎雅特塔殷。拿弗他利支派地业内的城镇之一，分配给利未支派的革顺族，位于基低斯以西。Kiriathaim

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 角。力量和勇气的象征。horn

Terms.Localization: horn, as symbol of: strength, courage

Terms.Localization: daughter of Job

Localization.Gloss: 《现》加宁（jiā ning），《和》角（jiǎo），《思》卡尔纳殷。基列以北的城镇；“两个角”。Karnaim

Terms.Localization: location; "two horns"

Localization.Gloss: 牛虻。一种蝇，以人和其他温血动物的血为生；代表一种成功制造麻烦的小敌人。gadfly

Terms.Localization: fly that feeds on the blood of humans and other warm-blooded animals; represents a minor enemy that succeeds in creating trouble

Localization.Gloss: 甲加（jiǎ jiā），《思》卡尔卡。犹大支派属地的城镇之一，位于别是巴的西南。Karka

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 加各（jiā ge），《思》卡尔科尔。位于约旦河东岸的一座小城。Karkor

Localization.Gloss: 加珥他（jiā ěr tā），《思》卡尔达。西布伦支派属地的城镇之一，分配给利未支派的米利拉族。Kartah

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 加珥坦（jiā ěr tǎn），《思》卡尔堂。拿弗他利支派属地的坚固城，为利未支派的革顺族所得。Kartan

Terms.Localization: town of refuge; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 甜瓜，香瓜。一种生长在藤蔓上的果实，这种植物有圆形叶子和沿着地面生长的卷须，就像南瓜或青瓜一般；植物有藤蔓和黄色花朵；果实直径可达 10-40 厘米，成熟后变成黄色或浅绿色。muskmelon, cantaloupe

Terms.Localization: fruit that grows on a vine with round leaves and tendrils that creeps along the ground like a pumpkin or cucumber; vine has tendrils and yellow flowers; fruit grows to 10-40 cm in diameter and becomes yellowish or light green when ripe

Localization.Gloss: 顽固，悖逆。字面意思：硬着颈项；因而指顽固和悖逆。stubborn, rebellious

Terms.Localization: literally: stiff-necked; hence: stubborn, rebellious

Localization.Gloss: 基善（jī shan），《思》克史雍。以萨迦支派地业内的一座城镇，分配给利未支派人，位于伯善的西北方。Kishion

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 先见；异象。先见；异象。seer, vision

Terms.Localization: seer, vision

Localization.Gloss: 吕便人（lǚ bian ren），《旧》吕便人，《思》勒乌本人。雅各的儿子，吕便支派的始祖。Reuben

Terms.Localization: son of Jacob; founder of tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 吕便支派（lǚ bian zhī pai），《思》勒乌本支派。吕便支派的成员。Reubenite

Terms.Localization: member of tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 流玛（liu mǎ），《思》勒乌玛。亚伯拉罕的兄弟拿鹤之妾。Reumah

Terms.Localization: concubine of Nahor

Localization.Gloss: 利亚雅（li ya yǎ），《思》勒阿雅。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Reaiah

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 利亚雅（li ya yǎ），《思》勒阿雅。犹大支派人，朔巴的儿子，雅哈的父亲。Reaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Shobal; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 利亚雅（li ya yǎ），《思》勒阿雅。吕便支派人，米迦的儿子，巴力的父亲。Reaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Micah; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 野牛。具体身份不确定，指一种野生、不可驯服的有角动物，而且非常强壮；可能是野牛、水牛或犀牛；象征力量、野性和权力。wild ox

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain, but designates a wild, untameable animal with horns, and very strong; perhaps wild ox, buffalo, or rhinocerus; symbol of strength, wildness, and power

Localization.Gloss: 拉末（lā mo），《思》辣摩特。迦得支派地业内的一座逃城，分配给利未人。Ramoth

Terms.Localization: town of refuge; for Levites; Gilead; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 拉末（lā mo），《思》辣摩特。以萨迦支派地业内的一座城镇。Ramoth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 雅提珥的拉末；拉末．雅提珥。西缅支派地业内的一座城镇。Ramah of the Negeb

Terms.Localization: village; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 铁杉；有毒植物；毒草。一种有毒植物，可能是毒芹，属于伞形科植物；也可能是网眼莲；也用来泛指毒药。hemlock; poisonous plant; poison

Terms.Localization: a poisonous plant; perhaps either Conium maculatum (poison hemlock), a member of the carrot family; or Hyoscyamus reticulatus (veined henbane); also used to denote poison in a more generic sense

Localization.Gloss: 罗实（luo shi），《思》洛士。便雅悯的儿子。Rosh

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 罗施（luo shī）。一个地点；另有一些人把这个词语理解为普通的名词，意为“首领”。Rosh

Terms.Localization: location; others understand the word as a common noun meaning "chief"

Localization.Gloss: 将军，拉墨。亚述帝国重要的政治或军事官员的官职头衔。chief officer, Rabmag

Terms.Localization: Title of an important political or military official in Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 将军，拉伯．撒利。亚述帝国重要的政治或军事官员的官职头衔；另见סָרִיס。chief officer, Rabsaris

Terms.Localization: Title of an important political or military official in Assyria; see also סָרִיס

Localization.Gloss: 将军，首席顾问，拉伯．沙基。亚述和巴比伦宫廷或军队中的高级官员。chief officer, chief adviser, Rabshakeh

Terms.Localization: high official in the Assyrian and Babylonian court or army

Localization.Gloss: 拉巴。一座城镇，亚扪人的都城。Rabbah

Localization.Gloss: 拉巴（lā bā），《思》阿辣巴。犹大支派属地的山地城镇之一，位于耶路撒冷以西。Rabbah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拉璧（lā bi），《思》多贝辣特。以萨迦支派地业内的城镇之一。Rabbith

Localization.Gloss: 利比拉（li bǐ lā），《思》黎贝拉。神所定应许之地的东方边界。Riblah

Localization.Gloss: 利比拉（li bǐ lā），《思》黎贝拉。古代军事重镇，在巴比伦的奥朗特斯（Orontes）河岸。Riblah

Terms.Localization: town; on the Orontes river

Localization.Gloss: 利巴（li bā），《思》勒巴。摩西时期的五个米甸王之一。Reba

Terms.Localization: wife of Isaac

Localization.Gloss: 罗基琳（luo jī lin），《思》洛革林。位于基列的乡村。Rogelim

Localization.Gloss: 利健（li jian），《思》勒根。雅代的儿子，犹大支派迦勒家族的族长之一。Regem
