Localization.Gloss: 罗迦（luo jiā），《思》洛赫加。亚设支派人，朔默的儿子。Rohgah

Terms.Localization: son of Shemer; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 《现》罗德人（luo de ren），《和》多单（duō dān）／底但人（dǐ dan ren），《思》多丹／德丹人。雅弗之孙，雅完之子多单的后裔。Rodanim

Terms.Localization: descendants of Javan, son of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 鲁玛（lǔ mǎ）／度玛（du mǎ），《思》鲁玛／杜玛。以法莲支派地业内的一座城镇。Rumah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 罗幔提．以谢（luo man ti-yǐ xie），《思》洛玛默提厄则尔。希幔的儿子，大卫时代圣殿第24班次的乐师首领。Romamti-Ezer

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 路得（lu de），《思》卢德。摩押女子，以利米勒和拿俄米的儿媳，玛伦的妻子。Ruth

Terms.Localization: from Moab; wife of Mahlon, son of Elimelech

Localization.Gloss: 利逊（li xun），《思》勒宗。以利亚大的儿子，所罗门时期的亚兰王，以色列的敌人。Rezon

Terms.Localization: son of Eliada; king of Syria; adversary of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 喇合（lǎ he），《思》辣哈布。耶利哥城的妓女。Rahab

Terms.Localization: prostitute from Jericho

Localization.Gloss: 利河伯（li he bo），《思》宽大。以撒的仆人所挖的一口井的名字，位于别是巴的西南方。Rehoboth

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 利河伯（li he bo），《思》勒曷波特。位于美索不达米亚的一个城镇，宁录所建的城镇之一，尼尼微遗址的附近。Rehoboth

Terms.Localization: Rehoboth-Ir; town in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 利河伯（li he bo），《思》勒曷波特。大河上的利河伯；位于美索不达米亚上的一座城镇。Rehoboth

Terms.Localization: Rehoboth on the River; town in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 利哈比雅（li hā bǐ yǎ），《思》勒哈彼雅。以利以谢的儿子，摩西的孙儿，利未家族的族长之一。Rehabiah

Terms.Localization: son of Eliezer; chief; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 利哈比雅（li hā bǐ yǎ），《思》勒哈彼雅。以利以谢的儿子，摩西的孙儿，利未家族的族长之一。Rehabiah

Terms.Localization: son of Eliezer; chief; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 罗波安（luo bō ān），《思》勒哈贝罕。南国犹大的君王（公元前931/930-913年在位），所罗门的儿子。Rehoboam

Terms.Localization: son of Solomon; king of Judah (931/30-913)

Localization.Gloss: 利合（li he），《思》勒曷布。位于但与亚兰边境上的一座城镇。Rehob

Terms.Localization: town; on border bewteen Dan and Syria

Localization.Gloss: 利合（li he），《思》勒曷布。亚设支派地业内的一座城镇，分配给利未人。Rehob

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 利合（li he），《思》勒曷布。琐巴王，哈大底谢的父亲。Rehob

Terms.Localization: father of Hadadezer, king of Zobah

Localization.Gloss: 利合（li he），《思》勒曷布。被掳归回时期的利未人之一。Rehob

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 利合。亚设支派地业内的一座城镇，分配给利未人。Rehob

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 利宏。被掳归回时期的一个省长。Rehum

Terms.Localization: governor; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 怜悯的，关爱的。上帝的属性；充满母性的温柔。compassionate, loving

Terms.Localization: attribute of God; full of maternal tenderness

Localization.Gloss: 利宏。被掳归回后的一个男子。Rehum

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 母绵羊。אַיִל 的母羊；与顺服相关。ewe

Terms.Localization: female of אַיִל; associated with submissiveness

Localization.Gloss: 《现》蕾洁（lěi jie），《和》拉结（lā jie），《思》辣黑耳。拉班的女儿，雅各的妻子，约瑟和便雅悯的母亲。Rachel

Terms.Localization: daughter of Laban; wife of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 拉含（lā han），《思》辣罕。迦勒的后裔；犹大支派人。Raham

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 埃及秃鹰。一种黑色和白色的猛禽；可能是埃及秃鹰或鱼鹰；不洁净，所以不可吃。Egyptian vulture

Terms.Localization: refers to a bird of prey that is black and white; either the Neophron percnopterus (Egyptian vulture) or the Pandion haliatus (osprey); unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 扬净谷物的铲子。一种木制工具，长手柄上连着一个又长又扁的刀片，用来把谷物抛到空中，借住风力把谷粒和茎、谷壳分开；扬净谷物常用来比喻区分好与坏的过程。winnowing shovel

Terms.Localization: wooden implement with a long, flat blade attached to a long handle, for throwing threshed grain into the air so that the wind might separate the straw and chaff from the grain; winnowing is often used as a figure of speech to denote the process of distinguishing between good and bad

Localization.Gloss: 利拜（li bai），《思》黎拜。便雅悯支派基比亚人，大卫的勇士以太的父亲。Ribai

Terms.Localization: father of Ithai, Ittai, warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 馨香之气；令人愉悦的气味。用火所献的祭物所发出的馨香气味。pleasing odor; soothing aroma

Terms.Localization: the pleasing aroma of offerings and sacrifices made by fire

Localization.Gloss: 利法。歌篾的儿子；雅弗的后代；另见דִּיפַת。Riphath

Terms.Localization: son of Gomer; descendant of Japheth; see also דִּיפַת

Localization.Gloss: 利甲（li jiǎ），《思》勒加布。临门的儿子，伊施波设的谋杀者。Rechab

Terms.Localization: son of Rimmon; murderer of king Ishbosheth

Localization.Gloss: 利甲（li jiǎ），《思》勒加布。约拿达的父亲，利甲人的先祖。Rechab

Terms.Localization: father of Jehonadab; ancestor of Rechabites

Localization.Gloss: 利甲（li jiǎ），《思》勒加布。尼希米时期的官长之一玛基雅的父亲或先祖。Rechab

Terms.Localization: father of Malchijah, ruler of district; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 利甲族人（li jiǎ zu ren）／利甲人，《思》勒加布人。利甲的后裔。Rechabite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Rechab

Localization.Gloss: 利迦（li jiā），《思》勒加布。犹大支派地业内的一座城镇，确实位置不详。Recah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拉哈勒（lā hā le），《思》加尔默耳。犹大南部的城镇之一，位置不详。Racal

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 快马。为求速度而选择性地繁殖的一种快马。fast horse

Terms.Localization: a fast horse, selectively bred for speed

Localization.Gloss: 兰（lan），《思》兰。犹大支派人，希斯仑的儿子。Ram

Terms.Localization: son of Hezron; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 兰（lan），《思》兰。犹大支派人，希斯仑的长子耶拉篾的儿子。Ram

Terms.Localization: son of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 兰（lan），《思》兰。布西人以利户所属家族的族长。Ram

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Elihu

Localization.Gloss: 欺骗，背叛。使某人相信不真实的事情，或对某人实施欺骗行为。deceive, betray

Terms.Localization: cause someone to believe something that is not true, or commit an act of deception against someone

Localization.Gloss: 拉玛（lā mǎ），《思》辣玛。便雅悯支派的城镇，位于耶路撒冷以北。Ramah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 拉玛（lā mǎ），《思》辣玛。以法莲山区的城镇，位于示罗以西。Ramah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 拉玛（lā mǎ），《思》辣玛。亚设支派的城镇，位于推罗的东南方。Ramah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 拉玛（lā mǎ），《思》辣玛。拿弗他利支派的坚固城，位于基尼烈城的西北方。Ramah

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 拉末（lā mo），《思》辣摩特。位于基列的一座城镇。Ramah

Terms.Localization: town; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 《现》蛆虫，《和》虫子。一种柔软、无脚、管状的小生物，没有骨头或壳；他们通常吃用过熟的水果、腐烂的肉和类似的东西；大多数是由苍蝇或甲虫产下的卵孵化而成的幼虫；象征不洁净、腐朽和死亡。worm, maggot

Terms.Localization: small, soft, legless, tube-shaped creatures that have no bones or shells. They typically feed on overripe fruit, rotting meat, and similar things; most are larvae that hatch from the eggs laid by flies or some beetles; symbols of uncleanness, decay, and death

Localization.Gloss: 石榴。一种小树，生长至高 3-5 米，叶窄，深绿色；树枝有刺；开红色花朵，圆形的果子有坚硬的果皮，里面挤满一囊囊种子；种子有时被制成酒；是以色列人在迦南地找到的其中“特别”食物中的一种；石榴的末端呈花朵状，在石上和圣殿中都是一种很有吸引力的装饰图形。pomegranate

Terms.Localization: small tree 3-5 m tall, with narrow, dark green leaves and thorny branches; Punica granatum; red flower; round fruit has a hard skin, with tightly-packed pockets of seeds inside; seeds were sometimes made into wine; one of the seven “special” foods mentioned that the Israelites would find in Canaan; flower-shaped end of the pomegranate fruit made it an attractive decoration on stone and in the temple

Localization.Gloss: 临门（lin men）／利门（li men），《思》黎孟。西缅支派的城镇之一，位于别是巴以北。Rimmon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 临门（lin men）／临摩挪（lin mo nuo），《思》黎孟。西布伦支派地业内的城镇之一，分配给利未人。Rimmon

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 临门（lin men），《思》黎孟。便雅悯支派比录人，伊施波设的谋杀者巴拿和利甲的父亲。Rimmon

Terms.Localization: father of Baanah and Rechab, murderers of king Ish-Bosheth

Localization.Gloss: 临门（lin men），《思》黎孟。叙利亚人的神明。Rimmon

Terms.Localization: Syrian deity

Localization.Gloss: 拉末（Qere)；耶列末（Ketib）。巴尼的后裔；娶了外邦女子为妻；被掳归回时期的人物。Ramoth (Qere); Jeremoth (Ketib)

Terms.Localization: descendant of Bani; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 尼革夫的拉末。位于尼革夫的一个地点；可能就是巴拉．比珥。Ramoth of the Negeb

Terms.Localization: location; Negeb; perhaps Baalath-beer

Localization.Gloss: 懒惰，懒散，懒惰的行为。懒惰，懒散，懒惰的行为。laziness, slackness, sluggish behaviour

Terms.Localization: laziness, slackness, sluggish behaviour

Localization.Gloss: 拉米（lā mǐ），《思》辣米雅。巴录的子孙，被掳归回后听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Ramiah

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 欺骗，背叛。欺骗某人的行为。deceit, betrayal

Terms.Localization: act of deception against someone

Localization.Gloss: 利玛利。以色列王比加的父亲。Remaliah

Terms.Localization: father of Pekah, king of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 临门．帕烈（lin men-pa lie），《思》黎孟培勒兹。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野安营之地，位置不详。Rimmon-Perez

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 爬虫，爬行动物。爬行的东西，指不洁净的小动物，尤其是爬行动物。reptiles, creeping things

Terms.Localization: creeping [things], referring to small unclean creatures, reptiles in particular.

Localization.Gloss: 利篾（li mie），《思》勒默特。以萨迦支派属地的城镇之一，位于伯善以北。Remeth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 拉末．利希。位于非利士边界上的一个地点；לְחִי。Ramath-Lehi

Terms.Localization: location; on the boundary of Philistea; לְחִי

Localization.Gloss: 拉玛。拉玛的居民。Ramathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Ramah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》拉玛城（的苏弗人）（lā mă cheng (de sū fu ren)），《和》拉玛．琐非（lā mă-suŏ fēi），《思》辣玛（的族弗人）。以法莲山地的一个城镇，位于示罗以西。Ramathaim-Zophim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 林拿（lin na），《思》陵纳。犹大支派人，示门的儿子。Rinnah

Terms.Localization: son of Shimon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 鸵鸟。现存最大型的鸟类；双翼不发达，因而不能飞；脖子和双脚很长，约 2 米高；雄鸟的身体呈黑色，翅膀上有白色的长羽毛；雌鸟呈灰棕色；主要吃种子、落果，和嫩芽，有时也吃蜥蜴、青蛙；它们以二十只左右的小群生活；与残忍无情有关，因为大多数雌鸟不孵化自己下的蛋，也不照顾幼鸟。ostrich

Terms.Localization: largest living bird; with underdeveloped wings so that it cannot fly; long neck and legs; about 2 m tall; male's body is black with long white feathers on its wings; females are a uniform grayish brown; feeds mainly on seeds, fallen fruit, and shoots, occasionally lizards or frogs; lives in small flocks of about twenty; Struthio camelus; associated with heartless cruelty because most females do not hatch their own eggs and do not take care of their own young

Localization.Gloss: 勒撒（le sā），《思》黎撒。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野安营之地，位置不详。Rissah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 嚼环／辔头。一套由绳子或皮带编成的器具；连于嚼环套在马头上，用来控制马匹前行的方向。bridle

Terms.Localization: set of ropes or leather straps; fitted over the head of a horse and connected to the bit; used to steer the horse

Localization.Gloss: 利鲜（li xiān），《思》勒森。宁录所建造的城镇之一，在美索不达米亚。Resen

Terms.Localization: town in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 拉吴（lā wu），《思》勒伍。闪的后裔，法勒的儿子，西鹿的父亲。Reu

Terms.Localization: son of Peleg; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 流珥（liu ěr），《思》勒乌耳。以扫的儿子。Reuel

Terms.Localization: son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 流珥（liu ěr），《思》勒乌耳。米甸的祭司，摩西的岳父。Reuel

Terms.Localization: father-in-law of Moses; Midianite

Localization.Gloss: 丢珥（diū ěr），《思》勒乌耳。迦得支派首领以利雅萨的父亲。Reuel

Terms.Localization: father of Eliasaph; tribe of Gad; see also [d.uveel]

Localization.Gloss: 流珥（liu ěr），《思》勒乌耳。便雅悯支派人，米书兰的先祖，伊比尼雅的儿子，示法提雅的父亲。Reuel

Terms.Localization: son of Ibnijah; ancestor of Meshullam; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利以（li yǐ），《思》勒依。大卫王朝的官员之一。Rei

Terms.Localization: official; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 利来雅（li lai yǎ），《思》勒厄拉雅。与所罗巴伯一同返回巴勒斯坦的以色列人之一。Reelaiah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 拉玛（lā mǎ），《思》辣阿玛。含的后裔，古实的儿子，示巴和但底的父亲。Raamah

Terms.Localization: son of Cush; descendant of Ham

Localization.Gloss: 《现》拉末（lā mo），《和》拉米（lā mǐ），《思》乃赫米雅。与所罗巴伯一同从巴比伦返回巴勒斯坦的以色列人之一。Raamiah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 兰塞（lan sāi），《思》辣默色斯。埃及的一个地区和城镇；位于尼罗河三角洲的东北部。Rameses

Terms.Localization: region, town; in Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 拉法。便雅悯的儿子。Rapha

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 拉法；巨人。一个巨人族的祖先。Raphah

Terms.Localization: giant, ancestor of Rephaites

Localization.Gloss: 利乏音人。拉法的后裔；巨人族。Rephaim

Terms.Localization: descendants of Raphah; tribe of giants

Localization.Gloss: 阴魂。死者的灵魂。shades

Terms.Localization: spirits of the dead

Localization.Gloss: 利法益。示玛雅的儿子；守门人；属利未支派。Rephael

Terms.Localization: son of Shemaiah; gatekeeper; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《现》巨人(ju ren)，《和》伟人(wěi ren)，《思》辣法巨人。迦特的巨人族的祖先。Raphah

Terms.Localization: ancestor of tribe of giants

Localization.Gloss: 拉法（lā fǎ），《思》勒法雅。比尼亚的儿子，以利亚萨的父亲，便雅悯支派扫罗的后裔。Raphah

Terms.Localization: son of Binea; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 拉孚（lā fu），《思》辣富。便雅悯支派的探子帕提的父亲。Raphu

Terms.Localization: father of Palti, spy; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利法（li fǎ），《思》勒法黑。以法莲的子孙，约书亚的先祖。Rephah

Terms.Localization: son of Ephraim; ancestor of Joshua

Localization.Gloss: 利非订（li fēi ding），《思》勒非丁。以色列人出埃及时安营之地，位于汛旷野和西奈旷野之间。Rephidim

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 利法雅（li fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。犹大支派人，耶筛亚的儿子，亚珥难的父亲，所罗巴伯的后裔。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 利法雅（li fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。西缅支派人，以示的儿子。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 利法雅（li fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。以萨迦支派人，陀拉的儿子。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Tola; tribe of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 《现》拉法（lā fǎ），《和》利法雅（li fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。便雅悯支派扫罗的后裔，比尼亚的儿子，以利亚萨的父亲。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Binea; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利法雅（li fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。户珥的儿子，尼希米时期管理半个耶路撒冷区和协助修筑耶路撒冷城墙的人。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Hur; chief of half of the district of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 圈；牲畜棚。畜舍内喂饲牲口的地方（谷仓的一部分）；或：户外喂饲牲口的地方，一般在一个半圆形的围栏内，通常在房子附近，甚或在里面。stall; animal pen

Terms.Localization: (part of a) barn where animals are fed; or: place where animals are fed outside, often in a semi-circular enclosure; usually located near, or even inside, the house

Localization.Gloss: 悦纳／喜悦／满足／善意。悦纳／喜悦／满足／善意。delight, satisfaction; will, pleasure; goodwill, favour

Terms.Localization: delight, satisfaction; will, pleasure; goodwill, favour

Localization.Gloss: 利写（li xiě），《思》黎兹雅。亚设支派的族长，乌拉的儿子。Riziah

Terms.Localization: son of Ulla; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 利汛（li xun），《思》勒斤。公元前8世纪大马士革的亚兰王。Rezin

Terms.Localization: king of Syria

Localization.Gloss: 利汛（li xun），《思》勒斤。从被掳之地归回的尼提宁（殿役）的家族族长之一。Rezin

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 利色（li se），《思》勒责夫。亚述王所征服的一座城镇，位于哈马的东北。Rezeph

Terms.Localization: town; conquered by king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 利斯巴（li sī bā），《思》黎兹帕。爱亚〔爱雅〕的女儿，扫罗的妃嫔。Rizpah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Aiah; concubine of king Saul

Localization.Gloss: 拉昆（lā kūn），《思》辣孔。但支派属地的城镇之一。Rakkon

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 利坚（li jiān），《思》勒耿。便雅悯支派属地的城镇之一。Rakem, Rekem

Terms.Localization: town; Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利金（li jin），《思》勒耿。摩西时期的米甸首领之一。Rakem, Rekem

Terms.Localization: king of Midian

Localization.Gloss: 利肯（li kěn），《思》勒耿。犹大支派人，迦勒的后裔。Rakem, Rekem

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 利金（li jīn），《思》勒耿。毗利施的儿子；玛拿西支派人。Rakem, Rekem

Terms.Localization: son of Peresh; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 绣花的衣服；刺绣。有人手刺绣之图案的布料，所以是昂贵的；被视为漂亮和珍贵的物品。embroidered cloth; needlework

Terms.Localization: cloth with decorative patterns sewn into it by hand and therefore expensive; regarded as beautiful and valuable

Localization.Gloss: 拉甲（lā jiǎ），《思》辣卡特。拿弗他利支派属地中的坚固城之一，位于加利利湖的西岸。Rakkath

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 有罪。由于（据称）做了一些违背律法的事，因而在上帝或在人面前被认为有罪。to be guilty

Terms.Localization: to be or be considered guilty before God or humans, as a result of (alleggedly) having acted in a way that is contrary to the law

Localization.Gloss: 定罪。由于（据称）某人做了一些违背律法的事，因而在上帝或在人面前宣布他为有罪。to declare guilty; to condemn as guilty

Terms.Localization: to declare someone guilty before God or humans, as a result of (alleggedly) having acted in a way that is contrary to the law

Localization.Gloss: 有罪的人；邪恶的；不敬神的。与义人相对，指因拒绝遵守上帝的律法而永远活在罪愆中的人。wicked; godless

Terms.Localization: person who lives in a perpetual state of guilt because of refusing to heed God's laws; opposite of righteous

Localization.Gloss: 作恶／行恶。行为与（上帝的）律法相反，因而处于有罪的状态。to act wickedly

Terms.Localization: to act in a way that is contrary to (God's) law, resulting in a state of guilt

Localization.Gloss: 利悉（li xī），《思》勒舍夫。以法莲支派人，比利亚的儿子，他拉的父亲，约书亚的祖先。Resheph

Terms.Localization: son of Beriah; ancestor of Joshua; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 网。形状和大小不详，用来捕猎雀鸟和其他野兽，也用来打渔；常指攻击和控制。net

Terms.Localization: net of unknown size and shape; used for hunting birds and other animals, and also for fishing; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 罗腾。一种在沙漠生长的粗壮灌木，约高 2 米；有许多细小枝干，叶子稀少，长出一簇簇白色的花。broom

Terms.Localization: a tough desert shrub, up to 2 m tall; many small branches, few leaves, clusters of white flowers; Retama raetam

Localization.Gloss: 利提玛（li ti mǎ），《思》黎特玛。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野中安营之地，位于加低斯。Rithmah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 网罗。一种陷阱，用粗细不一的树枝遮盖和隐藏一个地洞或深坑；用来捕猎野兽；常指攻击和控制。pitfall

Terms.Localization: network of branches and twigs which covers and hides a hole or pit; used for catching animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 示班（shi bān），《思》色班。吕便支派的城镇之一，位于希实本的西南。Sebam

Terms.Localization: village; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 西比玛（xī bǐ mǎ），《思》息贝玛。吕便支派属地的城镇之一，位于希实本的西南。Sibmah

Terms.Localization: village; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 西割（xī gē），《思》色古布。重建耶利哥城的伯特利人希伊勒的幼子。Segub

Terms.Localization: son of Hiel, rebuilder of Jericho

Localization.Gloss: 西割（xī gē），《思》色古布。犹大支派人，希斯仑的儿子，睚珥的父亲。Segub

Terms.Localization: son of Hezron; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 羊。羊群中单独的个体，可以指绵羊或山羊。sheep

Terms.Localization: the individual animal of a flock, whether sheep or goat

Localization.Gloss: 梭哥（suō gē），《思》索苛／索哥。犹大支派在高原的城镇之一，位于希伯仑的西北。Soco

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 梭哥（suō gē），《思》索苛。犹大支派在高原的城镇之一，位于希伯仑的西南。Soco

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 苏甲（族）人（sū jiǎ (zu) ren），《思》稣加人。居于雅比斯的文士家族名称。Sucathite

Terms.Localization: clan of scribes of Jabez

Localization.Gloss: 西提拿（xī ti na），《思》仇恨。以撒的仆人挖的一口水井。Sitnah

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 《现》西连山（xī lian shān），《和》西云山（xī yun shān），《思》息尔翁（山）。以色列东北部的一座山，即黑门山。Sion

Terms.Localization: range of mountains, north-east of Israel; Hermon; Sirion

Localization.Gloss: 涂上，粉刷。用石灰水刷在墙上，使之变白以遮盖其难看的表面。to whitewash

Terms.Localization: to cover a surface with whitewash, to make it white and cover ugly rough surfaces

Localization.Gloss: 石灰水。石灰与水的混合物；刷在墙上，使之变白以遮盖其难看的表面。whitewash

Terms.Localization: lime mixed with water; painted on walls to make them white and cover ugly rough surfaces

Localization.Gloss: 鱼叉，长矛，倒钩枪。约与一个人高度相等的木棒；一端有锐利和带倒钩的金属或骨尖，另一端绑着一条绳子，用来抛向海里的鱼或海洋生物以捕杀它们。harpoon; fishing spear

Terms.Localization: wooden rod about the length of a man, with a metal or bone point with barbs on one end, and a rope on the other end; thrown at fish or aquatic animals to kill and catch them

Localization.Gloss: 西沽（xī gū），《思》色雇。便雅悯支派的地业之一，位于拉玛北面的一个小山上。Secu

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 雄鸡。意思不确定；家养的公鸡；一大早就啼叫，宣告黎明的来临；还有人提出这是一种天象，或心思。rooster

Terms.Localization: meaning uncertain; male of the domestic chicken; crows very early in the morning, announcing the coming dawn; others propose: celestial phenomenon; mind

Localization.Gloss: 沙迦（shā jiā），《思》撒基雅。便雅悯支派的族长之一，沙哈连和贺得的儿子。Sachia

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 洞察，明辨。有超强的辨别的理解能力。have insight, prudence

Terms.Localization: have a superior mental power of discernment and understanding

Localization.Gloss: 智慧，精明。超强的辨别和理解能力。insight, sense

Terms.Localization: superior power of discernment and understanding

Localization.Gloss: 沙甲。亚希暗的父亲，大卫王时期的战士。Sachar

Terms.Localization: father of Ahiam, warrior, time of king David; שָׁרָר

Localization.Gloss: 沙甲（shā jiǎ），《思》撒加尔。大卫时期利未支派的可拉人，俄别以东的儿子。Sachar

Terms.Localization: son of Obed-Edom; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 鹌鹑。黄白相间的褐色小鸟，最小的狩猎鸟；像是小型的鹧鸪，喙下端有白色的斑点，眼睛和颈部也各有一条白色条纹；与出埃及期间上帝仁慈的供应有关。quail

Terms.Localization: small brown bird streaked with white, smallest of the game birds; looks like a miniature partridge, with a small white patch beneath its beak, a white stripe above its eye, and another around its neck; Coturnix coturnix; associated with God’s merciful provision during the Exodus from Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 撒们（sā men），《思》撒耳玛。犹大支派人，拿顺的儿子。Salma

Terms.Localization: son of Nahshon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 萨玛（sa mǎ），《思》撒耳玛。犹大支派迦勒的后裔，伯利恒的始祖。Salma

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah; founder of Bethlehem

Localization.Gloss: 撒门（sā men），《思》撒耳孟。犹大支派人，拿顺的儿子。Salmon

Terms.Localization: son of Nahshon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 撒门（sā men），《思》撒耳孟。犹大支派人，拿顺的儿子，波阿斯的父亲。Salmon

Terms.Localization: son of Nahshon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 桑拉（sāng lā），《思》撒默拉。古代以色列人未有君王时，以东的一个君王。Samlah

Terms.Localization: king of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 《现》壁虎，《和》守宫。一种小型蜥蜴，约长 10 厘米，脚趾的吸盘长有细毛，使它可以倒立走在天花板；是唯一会发出声音的蜥蜴；以昆虫为食；各种壁虎的统称；有些种类的壁虎也常出现在屋内；不洁净的动物，因此不能吃。gecko

Terms.Localization: small type of lizard about 10 centimeters (4 inches) long with pads at the end of its toes with small hairs, enabling it to walk upside down on ceilings and overhangs; only type of lizard that produces sound; feeds on insects; Hemidactylus turcicus, or a general word for all kinds of gecko; some varieties of geckos are often found inside buildings; unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 示尼珥 （shi ni ěr），《思》色尼尔。以色列北部的一座山脉。Senir

Terms.Localization: range of mountains, north-east of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 公山羊。公山羊，通常用于献祭；在《以赛亚书》13:21和34:14中，可能指野山羊；其余见 שָׂעִיר-2 的解释。he-goat

Terms.Localization: male goat, usually in the context of being used as a sacrifice; ISA 13:21; 34:14 may refer to goats that have become wild; others interpret as שָׂעִיר-2

Localization.Gloss: 鬼魔；山羊鬼魔。山羊形状的鬼魔，或根据山羊形状制成的偶像；有些人把《以赛亚书》13:21和34:14也包括在这里。见שָׂעִיר-1。satyr, goat idol

Terms.Localization: a demon with the shape of a goat, or an idol made in the shape of a goat; some include ISA 13:21; 34:14 here. See שָׂעִיר-1.

Localization.Gloss: 西珥，《思》色依尔。人，民族，地点。Seir

Terms.Localization: man, people, location

Localization.Gloss: 《现》以东（山区）（yĭ dōng (shān qū)），《和》西珥（山）（xī ěr (shān)），《思》色依尔（山）。犹大支派北界的山地，可能是在耶琳山与巴拉之间的小山。Seir

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 母山羊。用于献祭的母山羊；见שָׂעִיר。she-goat

Terms.Localization: female goat as sacrificial animal; see שָׂעִיר

Localization.Gloss: 西伊拉（xī yī lā），《思》色依辣。便雅悯支派的城镇之一。Seirah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 大麦。一种像麦或水稻耕作的植物；不到 1 米高；每根茎上都有一个穗，穗上有几排子粒；谷物被用来做面包、啤酒或动物饲料。barley

Terms.Localization: type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; has a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed

Localization.Gloss: 梭琳（suō lin），《思》色敖陵。大卫时代在圣殿供职的第四班次祭司首领。Seorim

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 息末（xī mo），《思》息弗摩特。犹大支派的地业之一，位置不详，可能在南地之内。Siphmoth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 袋子／口袋／布袋。比较大的容器，用皮革或布料制成，用来贮藏及运送食物和其他物品。bag, sack

Terms.Localization: relatively large receptacle, made out of leather or cloth, used for the storage and transportation of food and possibly other objects as well

Localization.Gloss: 臣宰，军长，护卫长，首领。臣宰，军长，护卫长，首领。chief, prince

Terms.Localization: chief, prince

Localization.Gloss: 元帅；守护天使；天上的元帅。地位高的超自然生物；有时指上帝。patron-angel; guardian angel; heavenly commander; (God as) prince

Terms.Localization: supernatural being of high status; sometimes denoting God Himself

Localization.Gloss: 撒西金。巴比伦王尼布甲尼撒的首领之一。Sarsechim

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Nebuchadnezzar

Localization.Gloss: 沙利色（shā li se），《思》沙勒责尔。亚述王西拿基立的儿子。Sharezer

Terms.Localization: son of Sennacherib, king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 《现》沙利色（shā li se），《和》沙利亚（shā li ya），《思》撒辣责尔。先知撒迦利亚时期的伯特利人。Sharezer

Terms.Localization: man; from Bethel; time of prophet Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 尖笔，标记。一件削尖的工具或一种红色粉笔；可以用来在木上做记号，帮助木匠计划他希望制作之物品的形状。stylus; marker

Terms.Localization: either a tool with a sharp point or a type of red chalk; used to make marks on wood to help the carpenter plan out the shape of the object he wants to make

Localization.Gloss: 《现》莎拉（shā lā），《和》撒拉（sā lā），《思》撒辣。亚伯拉罕的妻子，以撒的母亲。Sarah

Terms.Localization: wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 西鹿（xī lu），《思》色鲁格。闪的后裔，拉吴的儿子。Serug

Terms.Localization: son of Reu; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 西拉（xī lā），《思》色辣黑。亚设的女儿。Serah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 《现》莎莱（shā lai），《和》撒莱（sā lai），《思》撒辣依。亚伯拉罕妻子撒拉的原名。Sarai

Terms.Localization: wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 枝子；藤蔓。从植物的树干或茎部延伸出来的一部分。branch, tendril

Terms.Localization: small extension from the trunk or stem of a plant

Localization.Gloss: 撒立（sā li），《思》沙杜得。西布伦支派地业的城镇之一，位于米吉多的东北方。Sarid

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 西莱雅（xī lai yǎ），《思》沙委沙。大卫时期的书记。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: secretary; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 西莱雅（xī lai yǎ），《思》色辣雅。西底家时期的祭司长，亚撒利雅的儿子，希勒家的孙子。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Azariah; high priest; time of king Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 西莱雅（xī lai yǎ），《思》色辣雅。犹大支派人，尼陀法人单户蔑的儿子，接受基大利管治的军长之一。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Tanhumeth; army officer of Judah; time of exile

Localization.Gloss: 西莱雅（xī lai yǎ），《思》色辣雅。希勒家的儿子，圣被掳归回后的一个祭司。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Hilkiah; priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西莱雅（xī lai yǎ），《思》色辣雅。犹大支派人，基纳斯的儿子，约押的父亲。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Kenaz; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 西莱雅（xī lai yǎ），《思》色辣雅。西缅支派人，耶户的祖父，亚薛的儿子。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Asiel; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 西莱雅（xī lai yǎ），《思》色辣雅。被掳归回后的三个人：(1)随同所罗巴伯归回巴勒斯坦的人（拉2.2），极可能是“亚撒利雅”（尼7.7）；(2)签署了以斯拉之约的祭司之一（尼10.2）；(3)希勒家的儿子，圣殿的祭司之一。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西莱雅（xī lai yǎ），《思》色辣雅。犹大支派人，尼利亚的儿子，巴录的兄弟，西底家时期的官长之一。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Neriah; official; time of king Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 西莱雅（xī lai yǎ），《思》色辣雅。亚斯列的儿子，约雅敬时期的官长之一。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Azriel; official; time of Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 《现》西连（xī lian）／黑门山（hēi men shān），《和》西连（xī lian），《思》息尔翁。以色列东北部的一座山，即黑门山。Sirion

Terms.Localization: range of mountains, north-east of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 毒蛇。一种毒蛇；不洁净的动物；与潜伏的危险和生育能力关联。。viper

Terms.Localization: a kind of venemous snake (viper); unclean animal; associated with lurking danger and with fertility, since the young are carried alive inside the female viper, which then gives birth to large numbers of well-developed young, all at the same time

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉弗。撒拉弗。seraph

Terms.Localization: seraph

Localization.Gloss: 萨拉（sa lā），《思》撒辣弗。犹大的后裔，示拉的儿子。Saraph

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄树。备受青睐的葡萄藤；שֹׂרֵקָה。vine

Terms.Localization: highly valued grapevine; שֹׂרֵקָה

Localization.Gloss: 梭烈（suō lie），《思》芍勒克。位于非利士地的一处山谷。Sorek

Terms.Localization: valley; Philistia

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄树。备受青睐的葡萄藤；שֹׂרֵק。vine

Terms.Localization: highly valued grapevine; שֹׂרֵק

Localization.Gloss: 扫罗。基士的儿子；便雅悯支派人；以色列第一个王。Saul, Shaul

Terms.Localization: son of Kish; king of Israel; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《现》少罗（shao luo），《和》扫罗（sǎo luo），《思》沙乌耳。以色列有君王前，古代以东君王之一。Saul, Shaul

Terms.Localization: king of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 《现》少罗（shao luo），《和》扫罗（sǎo luo），《思》沙乌耳。西缅和迦南女子所生的儿子。Saul, Shaul

Terms.Localization: son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 少罗（shao luo），《思》沙乌耳。利未支派人，哥辖的后裔，乌西雅的儿子。Saul, Shaul

Terms.Localization: son of Uzziel; descendant of Kohath; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《现》少罗宗族（shao luo zōng zu），《和》扫罗族（sǎo luo zu），《思》沙乌耳家族。西缅和迦南女子所生的儿子扫罗的后裔。Shaulite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shaul, son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 示押（shi yā），《思》舍阿耳。巴尼的子孙，被掳归回后听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Sheal

Terms.Localization: descendant of Bani; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉铁。约雅斤的儿子；所罗巴伯的父亲；犹大支派人。Shealtiel

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin; father of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉铁。约雅斤的儿子；所罗巴伯的父亲；犹大支派人。Shealtiel

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin; father of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 施亚雅述（shī ya yǎ shu），《思》舍阿尔雅叔布。以赛亚长子的名字，希伯来文的意思是“余民将要归回”。Shear-Jashub

Terms.Localization: son of Isaiah; "A remnant shall return"

Localization.Gloss: 舍伊拉（she yī lā），《思》舍厄辣。以法莲的女儿。Sheerah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 示巴；示巴人。(1)含的后裔，拉玛的儿子（创10.7）；(2)闪的后裔，约坍的儿子（创10.28）；(3)闪的后裔，亚伯拉罕与妾基土拉所生的子孙，约珊的儿子；(4)所罗门时代的一个国家，确实地点有几个可能性，最可能是阿拉伯半岛西南岸的也门，但也有可能是埃塞俄比亚的地区。Sheba, Sabeans

Terms.Localization: son of Raamah, Jokshan, Joktan; descendant of Shem, Ham; land

Localization.Gloss: 示巴人（shi bā ren），《思》舍巴人。示巴地的居民或示巴的后裔。Sabean

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Sheba

Localization.Gloss: 玛瑙。（半）宝石，有几层不同的颜色；可能是玉髓的一种；玛瑙。agate

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone with various curved layers of different colors; possibly variety of chalcedony: agate

Localization.Gloss: 细布业。革舜的儿子，暗兰的后裔，利未支派人，管理库房；与书巴业（שְׁבוּאֵל-1）是同一个人。Shebuel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Gershom; chief; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 细布业（xi bu ye），《思》叔巴耳。利未支派希幔的儿子，大卫王时期的圣殿乐师，与书巴业（שְׁבוּאֵל-2）是同一个人。。Shebuel

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 誓言。一个庄严的承诺。oath

Terms.Localization: a solemn promise

Localization.Gloss: 《现》支族，《和》支派。在同一位领袖的带领下团结起来的氏族群。tribe

Terms.Localization: group of clans united by a common leader

Localization.Gloss: （牧羊人的）杖。牧人所用的直木棍，长约1－2米，直径的宽度刚好适合用手握住。(shepherd's) staff

Terms.Localization: straight wooden stick of about 1-2 meters in length; its diameter allowed it to fit comfortably in a person’s hand; used by shepherds

Localization.Gloss: 朔拜（shuo bai），《思》芍拜。利未支派的族长之一，被掳归回后负责看守殿门。Shobai

Terms.Localization: family head; gatekeepers; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 朔比（shuo bǐ），《思》芍彼。亚扪王，拿辖的儿子。Shobi

Terms.Localization: son of Nahash, king of Ammon

Localization.Gloss: 蜗牛。一种陆栖软体动物，通常有螺旋状的壳；身体的一部分叫足，从壳中伸出，使蜗牛前进；沿路会留下分泌出来的黏液。snail

Terms.Localization: a land mollusk, usually with a spiral shell; part of the body called the foot extends out of the shell and propels the snail; excretes a slime along which it travels

Localization.Gloss: 舍伯那（she bo na），《思》舍布纳。犹大王希西家的书记。Shebna, Shebnah

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 示巴尼（shi bā ni），《思》舍巴尼雅。被掳归回后的三个人：(1)尼希米时代的利未人之一；(2)两个在以斯拉之约上签名的利未人。Shebaniah

Terms.Localization: various Levites; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示巴尼（shi bā ni），《思》舍巴尼雅。被掳归回后的祭司之一。Shebaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示巴尼。大卫王时期的一个祭司。Shebaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 起誓。庄严地承诺。swear

Terms.Localization: to promise solemnly

Localization.Gloss: 示巴（shi bā），《思》舍巴。西缅支派地业内的一座城镇。Sheba

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 示巴（shi bā），《思》舍巴。大卫时期的便雅悯支派人，比基利的儿子。Sheba

Terms.Localization: son of Bichri; tribe of Benjamin; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示巴（shi bā），《思》舍巴。迦得支派人，亚比孩的儿子，巴珊地的领袖之一。Sheba

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 示巴（shi bā），《思》誓约。以撒的仆人所挖的井。Shibah

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 七七收获节。以色列人在逾越节的七个星期后庆祝的节日，也叫初熟节。Feast of Weeks; feast of firstfruits

Terms.Localization: Israelite festival celebrating the firstfruits of the crops, seven weeks after Passover

Localization.Gloss: 示别（shi bie），《思》舍贝尔。犹大支派人，迦勒和他的妾玛迦所生的儿子。Sheber

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 安息日。休息的圣日；一周的第七日，以色列人在这天不做工。sabbath, (day of) rest

Terms.Localization: a holy day of rest; seventh day of the week, on which no work is to be done

Localization.Gloss: 沙比太（shā bǐ tai），《思》沙贝泰。被掳归回时期的利未人族长之一，也是管理神殿外事的其中一人。Shabbethai

Terms.Localization: Levite(s); after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙基（shā jī），《思》沙革。哈拉人，大卫的勇士约拿单的父亲。Shagee

Terms.Localization: Hararite; father of Jonathan, warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 《现》假神，《和》鬼魔。鬼魔。demon

Terms.Localization: demon

Localization.Gloss: 全能者；全足者。传统译为：全能者；最好译为：全足者（一切美善与完全的恩赐都是从他而来）。Almighty One; All-sufficient One

Terms.Localization: traditionally: Almighty One; better: All-sufficient One (the One every good and perfect gift comes from)

Localization.Gloss: 示丢珥（shi diū ěr），《思》舍德乌尔。旷野漂流时吕便支派的首领以利蓿的父亲。Shedeur

Terms.Localization: father of Elizur, chief; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 沙得拉。但以理的朋友哈拿尼雅的迦勒底名字。Shadrach

Terms.Localization: Chaldean name of Hananiah, friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 沙得拉。但以理的朋友哈拿尼雅的迦勒底名字。Shadrach

Terms.Localization: Chaldean name of Hananiah, friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 宝石；缟玛瑙。一种（半）宝石，具有白色直纹分层，也有黑色、棕色和红色分层的品种；可能是玉玺的变种：缟玛瑙。onyx

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone with straight layers of a white color, alternating with black, brown, or red; possibly variety of chalcedony: onyx

Localization.Gloss: 朔含。米拉利的后代；利未支派人。Shoham

Terms.Localization: descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 示法。大卫时期的书记。Sheva

Terms.Localization: secretary; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示法（shi fǎ），《思》舍瓦。迦勒与妾玛迦生的儿子，抹比拿和基比亚的祖先。Sheva

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah; founder of Machbenah and Gibea

Localization.Gloss: 书巴业（shū bā ye），《思》叔巴耳。暗兰的后裔，利未支派人；与（שְׁבוּאֵל-1）是同一个人。Shubael

Terms.Localization: descendant of Amram; tribe of Levi; apparently the same person as שְׁבוּאֵל-1.

Localization.Gloss: 书巴业（shū bā ye），《思》叔巴耳。利未支派希幔的儿子，大卫时期负责圣殿音乐的第13班首领；与（שְׁבוּאֵל-2）是同一个人。Shubael

Terms.Localization: from the tribe of Levi; temple musician; time of king David; apparently the same person as שְׁבוּאֵל-2.

Localization.Gloss: 朔罢（shuo ba），《思》芍巴布。犹大支派人，大卫的儿子之一。Shobab

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 朔罢（shuo ba），《思》芍巴布。犹大支派人，迦勒与妻子阿苏巴所生的儿子。Shobab

Terms.Localization: son of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 朔法（shuo fǎ），《思》芍巴客。大卫时期琐巴王哈大底谢的将军。Shobach

Terms.Localization: army commander of Hadadezer, king of Zobah

Localization.Gloss: 朔巴（shuo bā），《思》芍巴耳。西珥的第二儿子，何利人家族的族长。Shobal

Terms.Localization: son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 朔巴（shuo bā），《思》芍巴耳。犹大支派迦勒的子孙，户珥的儿子，基列耶琳的创建者。Shobal

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah; founder of Kiriath-Jearim

Localization.Gloss: 朔百（shuo bǎi），《思》芍贝克。被掳归回后在尼希米的带领下立约签名的民众首领之一。Shobek

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙微谷（shā wēi gǔ），《思》沙委山谷。靠近耶路撒冷的东面的一个地点，又名“王谷”。Shaveh

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 书亚。亚伯拉罕和基土拉所生的儿子。Shuah

Terms.Localization: son of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 书哈。基绿的兄弟；犹大支派人。Shuhah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 书亚人（shū ya ren），《思》叔亚人。书亚的后裔。Shuhite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shuah

Localization.Gloss: 书含（shū han），《思》叔罕。但的儿子，书含族的先祖。Shuham

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 书含族（shū han zu），《思》叔罕家族。但支派人，书含的后裔。Shuhamite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shuham; tribe of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 官长／领班。官长／领班。officer, foreman, supervisor

Terms.Localization: officer, foreman, supervisor

Localization.Gloss: 《现》书拉蜜（的女子）（shū lā mi (de nǚ zǐ)），《和》书拉密女（shū lā mi nǚ），《思》叔拉米特。《雅歌》提及的女子，所居地位置不详。Shulammite

Terms.Localization: woman; inhabitant of Shulem (Shunem?)

Localization.Gloss: 蒜。一种有类似于洋葱的球茎的植物，但比洋葱小，分为四、五瓣；有特殊的味道和气味；用作食品调味和药物。garlic

Terms.Localization: plant with a bulb something like that of an onion, but smaller, and divided into four or five parts; Allium sativum; distinctive taste and smell; used for seasoning food and as medicine

Localization.Gloss: 朔默。希别的儿子，亚设支派人。Shomer

Terms.Localization: son of Heber; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 书尼。迦得的儿子。Shuni

Terms.Localization: son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 书尼支族（shū ni zhī zu），《思》叔尼家族。迦得的第三个儿子书尼的子孙。Shunite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shuni, son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 书念（shū nian），《思》叔能。以萨迦支派地业的城镇之一，位于耶斯列谷的东北方。Shunem

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 书念妇人（shū nian fu ren）／书念女子（shū nian nǚ zǐ），《思》叔能女子／叔能妇人。指书念地区的女子，旧约中有二人：(1)大卫年老时伺候他的亚比煞（王上1.3及下）；(2)接待先知以利沙的妇人（王下4.12, 25, 36）。Shunammite

Terms.Localization: woman; inhabitant of Shunem

Localization.Gloss: 书亚（shū ya），《思》叔亚。迦南人，犹大的妻子的父亲。Shua

Terms.Localization: father of wife of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 书亚人（shū ya ren），《思》芍亚人。先知以西结预言中所提及的名字，所指地方不详，可能是美索不达米亚一个游牧民族的名称。Shoa

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 书雅（shū yǎ），《思》叔亚。亚设支派人，希别的女儿。Shua

Terms.Localization: daughter of Heber; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 狐狸；豺狼。一种看起来像长毛狗的动物，有尖鼻子和毛茸茸的尾巴；颜色是红背白肚子（狐狸），或背毛黄褐色而毛尖带红色（豺）；食腐动物；令人联想到毁灭与破坏，以及微不足道而妄自尊大；聪明机敏但也狡猾。jackal, fox

Terms.Localization: animal looking like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose and a bushy tail; either reddish with white underparts (fox) or yellowish brown with red tips to the fur on the back (jackal); scavenger; associated with destruction and devastation, and also with being insignificant but self-important

Localization.Gloss: 书亚（shū ya），《思》叔阿耳。便雅悯支派所得的城镇之一，位于密抹以北。Shual

Terms.Localization: region; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 书阿勒（shū ā le），《思》叔阿耳。亚设支派人，琐法的第三儿子。Shual

Terms.Localization: son of Zophah; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 朔法（shuo fǎ），《思》芍法客。大卫时期的琐巴王哈大底谢的将军。Shophach

Terms.Localization: army commander of Hadadezer, king of Zobah

Localization.Gloss: 书反（宗）族（shū fǎn (zōng) zu），《思》舍孚番家族。便雅悯人，书反的后裔。Shuphamite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shephupham; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 书珥（shū ěr），《思》叔尔。埃及东部地区，是古代以埃及的安城为起点的大道。Shur

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 公牛。牛的统称，包括公牛和母牛。cow, bull

Terms.Localization: general word for individual cattle; may be male or female

Localization.Gloss: 沙威沙（shā wēi shā），《思》沙委沙。大卫的书记。Shavsha

Terms.Localization: secretary; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 百合花。开花的植物，茎笔直，叶子长而窄；可长到 1.5 米高；有球状的根和椎体形状的花，通常有五六个花瓣，从茎直直突出或微微向下；跟无与伦比的美有关。lily

Terms.Localization: flowering plant with erect stem and long narrow leaves; can grow to 1.5 m high; bulbous root; cone-shaped flowers, usually with 5-6 petals, protrude straight out or slightly downward from the stem; Lilium candidum; associated with unsurpassed beauty

Localization.Gloss: 书珊（shū shān），《思》稣撒。波斯帝国的首都。Susa

Terms.Localization: town; capital of Persia

Localization.Gloss: 书珊（shū shān），《思》稣撒。书珊城的居民。Susa

Terms.Localization: inhabitants of Susa

Localization.Gloss: 书提拉。以法莲的儿子。Shuthelah

Terms.Localization: son of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 书提拉（shū ti lā），《思》叔特拉。以法莲支派人，撒拔的儿子。Shuthelah

Terms.Localization: son of Zabad; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 书提拉族（shū ti lā zu），《思》叔特拉家族。以法莲的儿子书提拉的后裔。Shuthelahite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shuthelah, son of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 猛狮／公狮。确切含义不明；可能指：不再威风凛凛地生活，而是独自游荡的公狮子。wandering male lion

Terms.Localization: exact meaning uncertain; possibly: male lion that is no longer living with its pride and wanders around alone

Localization.Gloss: 《现》香螺，《和》施喜列。一种用在香料混合物中的东西，可能是软体动物脚上好像指甲的覆盖物，或某种花朵。onycha

Terms.Localization: something used in mixture of spices, either nail-like covering on foot of mollusk, or a type of flower (see Plants and Trees in the Bible 4.2.5)

Localization.Gloss: 海鸥。海鸟，包括海鸥、燕鸥、贼鸥等；大多数为白色，背部和上翼面为灰色或黑色；有灵活的长翅膀；以鱼类或浮游动物为食；不洁净，因此不能吃。seagull

Terms.Localization: seabird, including gull, tern, skua, courser, shearwater; most are white with gray or black backs and upper wing surfaces; long flexible wings; feeds on fish or plankton; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 狂傲的野；狮子。狂傲行走的动物（可能是狮子）。proud beast; lion

Terms.Localization: proudly walking animal (possibly lion)

Localization.Gloss: 沙哈洗玛（shā hā xǐ mǎ），《思》沙哈漆玛。以萨迦支派地业边区的城镇之一，位于他泊山东面。Shahazumah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 示哈利（shi hā li），《思》舍哈黎雅。耶罗罕的儿子，便雅悯人的族长之一。Shehariah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 沙哈连（shā hā lian），《思》沙哈辣殷。便雅悯支派人。Shaharaim

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《现》金合欢木，《和》皂荚木。沙漠中的一种矮树，高 3-5 米，树冠宽阔；有锋利的刺，细致分开的叶子，白黄色的小花整串下垂；花朵会长出豆荚，干燥后可编成圈环。acacia tree

Terms.Localization: short desert tree, reaching 3-5 m tall, with a wide crown; has sharp spines, finely divided leaves, and tiny pale yellow flowers arranged in drooping bunches; produces a bean pod that is twisted and looped when dry; member of Mimosa family, Acacia tortilis or Acacia raddiana

Localization.Gloss: 什亭（shi ting），《思》史廷。位于约旦河谷的一个地点。Shittim

Terms.Localization: location; Jordan Valley

Localization.Gloss: 施提赉（shī ti lai），《思》史特赖。沙仑人，大卫时期掌管牧放牛群的官长。Shitrai

Terms.Localization: official; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示按（shi an），《思》史雍。以萨迦支派属地的城镇之一，位置不详。Shion

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 示撒（shi sā），《思》史匝。吕便支派人，大卫的勇士亚第拿的父亲。Shiza

Terms.Localization: father of Adina, chief, tribe of Reuben, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 希曷．立纳（xī he-li na），《思》里贝纳特河。亚设支派属地的南界，源自迦密山，向西流入地中海。Shihor-Libnath

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: （供物？）。见词典的讨论。(tribute?)

Terms.Localization: see discussion in dictionary

Localization.Gloss: 示罗。以法莲支派地业内的一座城镇。Shiloh

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 示罗人。示罗的居民。Shilonite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Shiloh

Localization.Gloss: 示罗人。示罗的后裔，犹大支派人。Shilonite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shelah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示门（shi men），《思》史孟。犹大支派的族长之一。Shimon

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示沙（shi shā），《思》史沙。大卫王的高级官员，所罗门的书记以利何烈和亚希亚的父亲。Shisha

Terms.Localization: father of Elihoreph, official, time of king Salomon

Localization.Gloss: 示撒（shi sā），《思》史沙克。埃及第22王朝的法老。Shishak

Terms.Localization: king of Egypt; time of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 示剑（shi jian），《思》舍根。玛拿西支派人，基列的后裔。Shechem

Terms.Localization: son of Gilead; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 示剑（shi jian），《思》舍根。玛拿西支派示米大的儿子。Shechem

Terms.Localization: son of Shemida; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 示剑（shi jian），《思》舍根。以法莲支派地业内的一座城镇，分配给利未人，位于耶路撒冷以北。Shechem

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 示剑（shi jian），《思》舍根。希未人哈抹的儿子；示剑的族长。Shechem

Terms.Localization: son of Hamor; chief of Shechem

Localization.Gloss: 示剑族（shi jian (zu)），《思》舍根家族。玛拿西支派示剑的后裔。Shechemite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shechem; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼（shi jiā ni），《思》舍加尼雅。犹大支派大卫的后裔，所罗巴伯的子孙。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼（shi jiā ni），《思》则加黎雅／舍加尼雅。被掳归回后的四个人：(1)与以斯拉一起归回的雅哈悉所属的家族；(2)以拦的子孙，耶歇的儿子；(3)尼希米时期示玛雅的父亲；(4)与所罗巴伯一起归回的一个祭司家族的族长。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼（shi jiā ni），《思》舍加尼雅。亚扪人多比雅的岳父，亚拉的儿子。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Arah; father-in-law to Tobiah

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼（shi jiā ni），《思》舍加尼雅。大卫时期的祭司之一。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼雅（shi jiā ni yǎ），《思》舍加尼雅。希西家时期的祭司之一。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 施基仑（shī jī lun），《思》史加龙。犹大支派地业北边的城镇，位于约帕的东南方。Shikkeron

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示拉（shi lā），《思》舍拉。犹大与书亚所生的第三个儿子。Shelah

Terms.Localization: son of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。北国以色列的君王（公元前752年在位），雅比的儿子。Shallum

Terms.Localization: son of Jabesh; king of Israel (752)

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。特瓦的儿子，女先知户勒大的丈夫。Shallum

Terms.Localization: husband of Huldah, prophetess

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。西斯买的儿子，耶加米雅的父亲，耶拉篾的后裔，犹大支派人。Shallum

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。西缅支派人，扫罗的儿子，米比衫的父亲。Shallum

Terms.Localization: son of Saul; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。犹大王约西亚的儿子，即“约哈斯”（公元前609年在位）。Shallum

Terms.Localization: son of Josiah; king of Judah (609)

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。先知耶利米的叔叔，哈拿篾的父亲。Shallum

Terms.Localization: father of Hanamel; uncle of prophet Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆／撒隆。撒督的儿子，希勒家的父亲，祭司长，利未支派人。Shallum

Terms.Localization: son of Zadok; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。拿弗他利的儿子。Shallum

Terms.Localization: son of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。被掳归回后守门的利未人，可利的儿子。Shallum

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper(s); after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。利未支派的可拉人，玛他提雅的父亲。Shallum

Terms.Localization: father of Mattitiah, Levite

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。希西家的父亲，亚哈斯时期以法莲人的族长之一。Shallum

Terms.Localization: father of Hezekiah, chief; tribe of Ephraim; time of Ahaz

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。被掳归回之后的四个人：(1)可拉人，可利的儿子，守门人；(2)听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的利未人之一；(3)听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一；(4)哈罗黑的儿子。Shallum

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙龙（shā long），《思》沙隆。先知耶利米时期的利未支派人，玛西雅的父亲。Shallum

Terms.Localization: father of Maaseiah; tribe of Levi; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 完好的状态；不担心；兴旺；平安；和平；友好；救恩。完好的状态；不担心；兴旺；平安；和平；友好；救恩。intact state; unconcern, ease; prosperity; welfare, condition; peace; friendship; peace, salvation

Terms.Localization: intact state; unconcern, ease; prosperity; welfare, condition; peace; friendship; peace, salvation

Localization.Gloss: 示罗摩（shi luo mo），《思》舍罗摩特。大卫时期的利未支派人，以斯哈的子孙。Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: descendant of Izhar; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 示罗密（shi luo mi），《思》舍罗米特。示每的儿子。Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei

Localization.Gloss: 示罗米（shi luo mǐ），《思》舍罗米。细基利的儿子，大卫王时期的利未支派人。Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: son of Zichri; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 示罗密。底伯利的女儿。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: daughter of Dibri

Localization.Gloss: 示罗密（shi luo mi），《思》舍罗米特。犹大支派人，所罗巴伯的女儿。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示罗密（shi luo mi），《思》舍罗米特。大卫时期利未支派革顺的子孙，示每的儿子。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 示罗密（shi luo mi），《思》舍罗米特。大卫时期的利未支派人，以斯哈的子孙。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: descendant de Izhar; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 示罗密（shi luo mi），《思》舍罗米特。大卫时期的利未人之一，细基利的儿子。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: son of Zichri; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 示罗密（shi luo mi），《思》舍罗米特。罗波安和押沙龙的女儿玛迦所生的儿子。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: son of king Rehoboam

Localization.Gloss: 示罗密（shi luo mi），《思》舍罗米特。巴尼的子孙，约细斐的儿子，被掳后归回的族长之一。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉。亚法撒的儿子；闪的后裔。Shelah

Localization.Gloss: 西罗亚池。位于耶路撒冷的一个水池。Shelah

Localization.Gloss: 西罗亚池。位于耶路撒冷的一个水池。Shiloah

Localization.Gloss: 示利希（shi li xī），《思》史肋希。犹大王约沙法的母亲阿苏巴的父亲。Shilhi

Localization.Gloss: 鸬鹚或鱼鹰。鹰类飞禽。身份不确定；一种不洁净的禽鸟，不可吃；可能是一种像鹰的鸟类，以鱼为食。osprey or cormorant

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; one of the unclean birds of prey, not to be eaten; perhaps: an eagle-like bird that feeds on fish; Pandion haliaetus - osprey

Localization.Gloss: 平安祭。平安祭。peace offering

Localization.Gloss: 示玛雅（shi mǎ yǎ），《思》舍玛雅。希西家时期的利未人之一，耶杜顿的子孙。Shemaiah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 示玛雅（shi mǎ yǎ），《思》舍玛雅。被掳归回之后的几个人：(1)和以斯拉一起归回以色列的亚多尼干家族族长之一；(2)受以斯拉差遣的首领之一；(3)哈琳的两个子孙，听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的两个人；(4)示迦尼的儿子；(5)第来雅的儿子，米希大别的后裔；(6)在公约上签名的祭司之一；(7)与所罗巴伯一同归回以色列的祭司家族之一；(8)重建耶路撒冷城墙之告成典礼上游行队伍里的一人；(9)玛他尼的儿子，亚萨的后裔，祭司撒迦利亚的先祖；(10)在城墙告成典礼的游行中负责奏乐的祭司或利未人；(11)参与城墙告成典礼的游行的祭司之一。Shemaiah

Localization.Gloss: 示玛雅（shi mǎ yǎ），《思》舍玛雅。耶利米时期被掳到巴比伦的假先知，尼希兰人。Shemaiah

Localization.Gloss: 沙麦（shā mai），《思》舍默尔。利未支派人，米拉利的子孙，末力的儿子，以探的祖先。Shemer

Localization.Gloss: 伸仑．米仑（shēn lun-mǐ lun），《思》史默龙。西布伦支派的一座城镇，位于米吉多以北。Shimron Meron

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 申利（shēn li），《思》史默黎。西缅族的族长之一，示玛雅的儿子，耶大雅的父亲。Shimri

Localization.Gloss: 伸帅。被掳归回时期的书记。Shimshai

Localization.Gloss: 善（shan），《思》耶撒纳。米斯巴附近的一个地点。Shen

Localization.Gloss: 示拿萨（shi na sa），《思》舍纳匝尔。犹大支派人，耶哥尼雅（约雅斤）的儿子，所罗巴伯的叔伯。Shenazzar

Localization.Gloss: 沙宾（shā bīn），《思》沙耳宾。但支派地业内的一座城镇。Shaalbim

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah; founder of Madmannah

Localization.Gloss: 示亚利雅（shi ya li yǎ），《思》沙黎雅。便雅悯支派人，扫罗王儿子约拿单的后裔，亚悉的儿子。Sheariah

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉音（shā lā yīn），《思》沙阿辣因。犹太支派属地的城镇，位于梭哥附近。Shaaraim

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉音（shā lā yīn），《思》沙阿辣因。西缅支派地业内的一座城镇，位于别是巴的西部。Shaaraim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙甲（shā jiǎ），《思》沙市加次。波斯王亚哈随鲁时期掌管妃嫔的太监。Shaashgaz

Terms.Localization: eunuch; time of king Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 示玻（shi bō），《思》舍佛。朔巴的儿子，西珥的后裔。Shepho

Terms.Localization: son of Shobal, son of of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 书反（shū fǎn），《思》舍孚番。便雅悯支派人，比拉的儿子。Shephupham

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 示孚汛（shi fu xun），《思》舍孚番。便雅悯支派人，比拉的儿子。Shephuphan

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。西缅支派的探子，何利的儿子。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: son of Hori; spy; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。先知以利沙的父亲，亚伯米何拉人。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: father of prophet Elisha

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。犹大支派所罗巴伯的后裔，示玛雅的儿子。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。迦得支派人。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。大卫王的官长亚第赉的儿子。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: son of Adlai; official; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shi fǎ ti yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。大卫的儿子。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shi fǎ ti yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。便雅悯支派人，米书兰的父亲。Shephatiah

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shi fǎ ti yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。被掳后跟随所罗巴伯一同从巴比伦回归以色列的家族族长之一。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shi fǎ ti yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。跟随所罗巴伯回到犹大的所罗门仆人家族的族长之一。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: family head; Solomon's servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shi fǎ ti yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。犹大支派法勒斯的子孙。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shi fǎ ti yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。西底家王时期的首领之一，玛坦的儿子。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: son of Mattan; official; time of king Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shi fǎ ti yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。便雅悯支派的哈律弗人，大卫的勇士之一。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shi fǎ ti yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。大卫时期西缅支派的首领之一，玛迦的儿子。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: son of Maacah; chief; tribe of Simeon; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shi fǎ ti yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。犹大王约沙法的儿子。Shephatiah

Localization.Gloss: 拾弗但（shi fu dan），《思》色弗堂。以法莲支派的首领基母利的父亲。Shiphtan

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 《现》示玻（shi bō），《和》示非（shi fēi），《思》舍非。何利人首领朔巴的第四个儿子，西珥的后裔，以东一个族的族长。Shephi

Terms.Localization: son of Shobal, son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 书品（shū pǐn），《思》叔平。便雅悯支派人，以珥的儿子。Shuppim

Localization.Gloss: 书聘（shū pin）。大卫时期负责看守圣殿西边沙利基门的利未人。Shuppim

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper; tribe of Levi; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 《现》毒蛇，《和》虺。蝰蛇科的一种蛇。viper

Terms.Localization: type of snake in the viper family

Localization.Gloss: 沙斐（shā fěi），《思》沙非尔。以法莲支派的城镇之一。Shaphir

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 沙番（shā fān），《思》沙凡。迦得支派的一个人。Shapham

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 示番（shi fān），《思》舍番。以色列地东部边界上的一个地点。Shepham

Terms.Localization: location along eastern boundary of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 实弗米人（shi fu mǐ ren），《思》史斐米人。示番的居民。Shiphmite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Shepham

Localization.Gloss: 《现》獾，《和》沙番。一种动物，耳朵小而圆，尾巴不明显，腿短；以树叶和草为生；两颗门牙发育成小长牙；能够在几乎垂直的岩石上面奔跑，也能轻松爬上树；不洁净的动物；与身材矮小和智慧有关。hyrax or rock badger

Terms.Localization: animal with small round ears, no visible tail, and short legs; lives on leaves and herbs; two of the front teeth develop into small tusks; can run up almost vertical rock faces and climb trees with ease; Syrian Rock Hyrax - Procavia capensis syriaca; unclean animal; associated with small size and wisdom

Localization.Gloss: 沙番（shā fān），《思》沙番。亚萨利的儿子，犹大王约西亚的王室书记。Shaphan

Terms.Localization: son of Azaliah; secretary; time of king Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 示非（shi fēi），《思》史非。西缅支派的族长之一，亚龙的儿子，细撒的父亲。Shiphi

Terms.Localization: son of Allon; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙斐山（shā fěi (shān)），《思》舍斐尔山。在出埃及之路上的一座山，以色列人在旷野安营之地，位置不详。Shepher

Terms.Localization: mountain along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 施弗拉（shī fu lā），《思》史斐辣。出埃地两个希伯来的接生婆之一。Shiphrah

Terms.Localization: midwife

Localization.Gloss: 羊圈。用石墙或篱笆围封的区域，是羊群晚上休息的地方，以保护它们免遭盗贼或野兽的伤害。sheep pen; sheepfold

Terms.Localization: area enclosed by a stone wall or hedge, to protect sheep at night from thieves or wild animals; מִשְׁפְּתַיִם

Localization.Gloss: 杏树。一种树，属于桃科；生长在野外，可高达 4.5 至 6 米，叶子呈椭圆形；冬天落叶，开白色或粉红色的花朵，而且花期很早；叶子更晚才长出来；肉质果实里面包着坚硬的果核；果核中的百分之五十含油，可以生吃或烤着吃。almond (tree)

Terms.Localization: tree belonging to the peach family; grows wild, reaching a height of 4.5 to 6 m; Prunis dulcis; sheds its oblong leaves in winter; produces white or pink flowers and blooms as early as January; the leaves appear much later; the seed is fifty percent oil, and can be eaten raw or roasted

Localization.Gloss: 可憎的事物，偶像。可憎的，通常指的是偶像。detested thing, idol

Terms.Localization: abomination, something detestable; usually referring to idol

Localization.Gloss: 桑树。树高可达 10 米，从很低的树干处开始分枝，树枝很大，往外延伸；果实可吃，但不如常见的无花果那般多汁；果实一簇簇长在树枝和树干上，而不是在树叶中；有富裕丰饶的意象。sycomore tree

Terms.Localization: tree up to 10 m high with large low, spreading branches; Ficus sycomorus; fruit is edible but not as juicy or sweet as the more common variety of fig; fruit grows in bunches on the trunk and branches of the tree rather than among the leaves; image of something plentiful

Localization.Gloss: 示利比（shi li bǐ），《思》舍勒彼雅／舍肋彼雅。被掳之后的几个利未人：(1)抹利的后裔，被掳后和家人跟随以斯拉归回以色列（拉8.18, 24-25）；(2)协助讲解律法，带领百姓认罪，并且在以斯拉的约上签名（尼8.7，9.4-5，10.12）；(3)属利未家族，被掳后与所罗巴伯一同归回以色列（尼12.8）；这是在约雅金时期的利未人首领的名字（尼12.24）。Sherebiah

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙鲁险（shā lǔ xiǎn），《思》沙鲁恒。西缅支派自犹大支派地业中所得的城镇，位于别是巴以西。Sharuhen

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙仑（shā lun）／拉沙仑（lā shā lun），《思》沙龙／原野／拉沙龙。地中海沿岸的一个平原。Sharon

Terms.Localization: plain along the coast of the Mediterranean

Localization.Gloss: 沙仑（shā lun），《思》息黎雍。迦得的后裔所住之地。Sharon

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 沙仑人（shā lun ren），《思》沙龙人。沙仑的居民。Sharonite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Sharon

Localization.Gloss: 施提赉（shī ti lai），《思》史特赖。沙仑人，大卫时期掌管牧放牛群的官长。Shitrai

Terms.Localization: Sharonite; official; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 沙赖（shā lai），《思》沙赖。被掳归回后听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Sharai

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 成群移动的生物。字面意思：成群移动的东西；指成群靠近地面的哺乳动物或爬行动物。swarming creatures

Terms.Localization: literally: swarming things; refers to mammals and reptiles that move close to the ground in groups or swarms

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉（shā lā），《思》沙辣尔。哈拉人，大卫的勇士亚希暗的父亲；1- שָׂכָר。Sharar

Terms.Localization: father of Ahiam, warrior, time of king David; 1- שָׂכָר

Localization.Gloss: 示利施（shi li shī），《思》舍勒士。玛吉的儿子，玛拿西支派一个家族的族长。Sheresh

Terms.Localization: son of Machir; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 《现》麻纱，《和》细麻布。用亚麻植物的茎部纤维制成的高品质编织材料；比许多其他布料更吸汗，用来生产布料和做衣服，由富人和祭司所穿；也用于建造帐幕；与优质、韧性和凉快有关。fine linen

Terms.Localization: high quality woven material made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; used for production of cloth and clothes; worn by the rich and by priests; used for the construction of the tabernacle; associated with quality, strength, and coolness

Localization.Gloss: 设巴萨。被掳归回后的犹大省长，居鲁士任命他送圣殿的器皿回耶路撒冷。Sheshbazzar

Terms.Localization: governor of Israel; tribe of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 设巴萨。被掳归回后的犹大省长，居鲁士任命他送圣殿的器皿回耶路撒冷。Sheshbazzar

Terms.Localization: governor of Israel; tribe of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙赛（shā sai），《思》沙瑟。被掳归回后听从以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Shashai

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示筛（shi shāi），《思》舍瑟。亚衲族人的后裔，是巨人。Sheshai

Terms.Localization: giant; descendant of Anak

Localization.Gloss: 《现》巴比伦（bā bĭ lun），《和》示沙克（shi shā ke），《思》舍沙客。美索不达米亚的城镇，巴比伦的象征名字。Sheshach

Terms.Localization: town in Mesopotamia; app. symbolic name for Babylon

Localization.Gloss: 示珊（shi shān），《思》舍商。犹大支派人，耶拉蔑的后裔。Sheshan

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙煞（shā shā），《思》沙沙克。便雅悯支派的族长之一，比利亚的儿子。Shashak

Terms.Localization: son of Beria; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 塞特（sāi te），《思》舍特。亚当的儿子。Seth

Terms.Localization: son of Adam

Localization.Gloss: 《现》西珥人(xī ěr (ren))，《和》塞特人，《思》舍特子民。巴兰的预言中所提到的人或民族。Seth

Terms.Localization: man or nation, mentioned in one of the oracles of Balaam

Localization.Gloss: 编织或针织材料。确实意义不详；某种布料，可能是编织或针织而成的。woven or knitted material

Terms.Localization: exact meaning uncertain: type of cloth, either woven or knitted

Localization.Gloss: 示达（shi da），《思》舍塔尔。亚哈随鲁王时代，波斯和玛代的七个大臣之一。Shethar

Terms.Localization: adviser to Ahasuerus

Localization.Gloss: 示他．波斯乃（shi tā-bō sī nǎi），《思》舍达波则乃。被掳归回时期的一个官员。Shethar-Bozenai

Terms.Localization: official; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 羚羊。中等大小的羚羊，约驴子大小；细长的角通常超过一米；浅褐色，面部有深褐色斑纹；擅于奔跑；以力量和勇敢而闻名；属洁净的动物，因而可以吃。oryx

Terms.Localization: medium-sized antelope, about the size of a donkey; slender horns over a meter long; light color with dark markings on face; strong runner; Oryx leucoryx; known for strength and bravery; clean animal, may be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 无花果树，无花果。一种树，可高达 5 - 8 米，树冠呈圆形，树根很深；约鸡蛋大小的果实，根据种类不同，有绿色、黄色、紫色或棕色，果实香甜软糯；在以色列中，是和平幸福的象征：“人人都要在自己的葡萄园中，在无花果树下”。fig tree, fig

Terms.Localization: grows 5-8 m high; round crown and very deep roots; Ficus carica; fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type, and is sweet and soft; image of peace and happiness in Israel was “every man under his vine and under his fig tree

Localization.Gloss: 他纳．示罗（tā na-shi luo），《思》塔纳特史罗。以法莲支派属地的城镇之一，位于示罗的西北方。Taanath-Shiloh

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 他利亚（tā li ya），《思》塔勒亚。便雅悯支派扫罗的后裔，米迦的儿子。Tarea

Terms.Localization: son of Micah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 松树／黄杨树。身份不确定，可能是一种常绿乔木，9-15 米高，枝子分散，叶子呈小鳞片状，果实是一个肉质的圆锥；产出耐用的木材，适用于建筑用途。box-tree, cypress

Terms.Localization: exact identification unknown; possibly: evergreen tree, 9 to 15 m high, with spreading branches, small scale-like leaves and round cones; produces durable wood, suitable for building purposes

Localization.Gloss: 理解。理解的行为和能力。understanding

Terms.Localization: the act or faculty of understanding

Localization.Gloss: 他泊。西布伦支派地业内的一座城镇。Tabor

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 他泊山（tā bo shān），《思》大博尔（山）。拿弗他利支派地业内的一座山。Tabor

Terms.Localization: mountain; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 提比尼（ti bǐ ni），《思》提贝尼。基纳的儿子，北国以色列的君王（公元前885/884-880年在位）。Tibni

Terms.Localization: son of Ginath; king of Israel (885/84-880)

Localization.Gloss: 他备拉（tā bei lā），《思》塔贝辣。在出埃及的路线上，因以色列人在旷野中发怨言引致上帝降火焚烧而命名的地方。Taberah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 提备斯（ti bei sī），《思》特贝兹。示剑附近的一座城镇。Thebez

Terms.Localization: town; near Shechem

Localization.Gloss: 《现》提革拉．比列色（ti ge lā-bǐ lie se），《和》提革拉．毗列色（ti ge lā-pi lie se），《思》提革拉特丕肋色尔。亚述君王提革拉毗列色三世（公元前744-727年在位）。Tiglath-Pileser

Terms.Localization: Tiglath-Pileser III; king of Assyria (744-727)

Localization.Gloss: 陀迦玛（tuo jiā mǎ），《思》托加尔玛。雅弗之孙，歌篾的儿子。Togarmah

Terms.Localization: son of Gomer; descendant of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 松树／黄杨树。常绿灌木，可高达3.5米高；叶子呈深绿色、有光泽，花朵呈白色，紫色的浆果有毒；一种原产于地中海地区的树木。laurustinus; or, pine tree

Terms.Localization: sturdy evergreen shrub that reaches 3.5 m in height, with dark green, shiny leaves, white flowers, and poisonous purple berries; Viburnum tinus - laurustinus; or, Pinus brutia - Brutian pine, a pine tree native to the Mediterranean region

Localization.Gloss: 达莫（da mo），《思》塔德摩尔／塔玛尔。位于大马士革和幼发拉底之间的一座城镇。Tadmor

Terms.Localization: town; between Damascus and Euphrates

Localization.Gloss: 提达（ti da），《思》提达耳。戈印王。Tidal

Terms.Localization: king of Goiim

Localization.Gloss: 土巴（tǔ bā），《思》突巴耳。雅弗的儿子之一。Tubal

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 土八．该隐（tǔ bā-gāi yǐn），《思》突巴耳加音。该隐的后裔，拉麦和洗拉的儿子。Tubal-Cain

Terms.Localization: son of Lamech; descendant of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 称谢，赞美；合唱团；感恩祭。公开感谢上帝所作的一切；一个赞美的合唱团；在殿中表示感谢而献上的祭物。praise; choir; thank-offering

Terms.Localization: a public profession of thanks for what God has done; a praise choir; a temple offering to give thanks

Localization.Gloss: 陀亚（tuo ya），《思》托亚。利未支派人，哥辖的后裔，苏弗的儿子，撒母耳和希幔之先祖。Toah

Terms.Localization: son of Zuph; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 陀腊（tuo la），《思》托拉得。西缅支派的城镇之一，位置不详。Tolad

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 陀拉（tuo lā），《思》托拉。以萨迦的儿子。Tola

Terms.Localization: son of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 陀拉（tuo lā），《思》托拉。以萨迦支派人，朵多的孙子，普瓦的儿子，以色列的士师（公元前1126年-1103年）。Tola

Terms.Localization: judge of Israel (1126-1103)

Localization.Gloss: 蛆虫。各类蠕虫的统称；象征不洁净、腐朽和无意义。worm, maggot

Terms.Localization: general term for worms of all kinds; symbol of uncleanness, decay, and insignificance

Localization.Gloss: 陀拉支族（tuo lā zhī zu），《思》托拉家族。以萨迦的儿子陀拉的后裔。Tolaite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Tola, son of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 可憎的或可厌恶的事物。可憎的或可厌恶的事物。horror, abomination

Terms.Localization: horror, abomination

Localization.Gloss: 牛。牛的统称；可以是公牛或母牛。bull, cow

Terms.Localization: general word for individual cattle; may be male or female

Localization.Gloss: 斑鸠。一种比乌鸫略大、灰蓝色的鸟，胸部呈粉色；属候鸟，每年四月来到以色列；主要吃种子；象征和平和温柔；属洁净的动物，可以吃；用作祭品。turtle dove

Terms.Localization: bird slightly larger than blackbird; blue-gray with a pinkish chest; migratory, arrives in Israel in April; eats seeds; Streptopelia turtur - turtle dove; symbol of peace and gentleness; clean, may be eaten; used for sacrifices

Localization.Gloss: 寄居者。寄居者。sojourner

Terms.Localization: sojourner

Localization.Gloss: 谋划，智慧，知识。谋划，智慧，知识。sound wisdom

Terms.Localization: sound wisdom

Localization.Gloss: 淫乱。淫乱。fornication

Terms.Localization: fornication

Localization.Gloss: 指引，开导，策略，智谋。指引，开导，策略，智谋。guidance

Terms.Localization: guidance

Localization.Gloss: 托户（tuō hu），《思》托胡。利未支派人，苏弗的儿子，撒母耳的先祖。Tohu

Terms.Localization: son of Zuph; ancestor of Samuel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 他革扪人（tā ge men ren），《思》哈革摩尼人。他革扪的居民。Tahkemonite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Tachemon

Localization.Gloss: 短耳猫头鹰；夜鹰；猫头鹰。身份不确定；可能指猫头鹰的一种——短耳猫头鹰，一种中等大小的棕色猫头鹰；不洁净，因此不可吃。short-eared owl

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; perhaps: type of owl, possibly Asio flammeus - short-eared owl, a medium-sized brown owl; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 他罕（tā hǎn），《思》塔罕。以法莲支派人，约书亚的先祖，他拉的儿子，拉但的父亲。Tahan

Terms.Localization: son of Telah; ancestor of Joshua; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 恳求，祈求。以一种非常谦卑的方式接近某人，以赢得对方的好感。supplication

Terms.Localization: effort to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else by approaching that person in a very humble way

Localization.Gloss: 提欣拿。伊施屯的儿子；珥拿辖（拿辖）的始祖；犹大支派人。Tehinnah

Terms.Localization: son of Eshton; founder of Ir-Nahash; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 恳求，祈求。以一种非常谦卑的方式接近某人，以赢得对方的好感。supplication

Terms.Localization: effort to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else by approaching that person in a very humble way

Localization.Gloss: 他罕宗族（tā hǎn zōng zu），《思》塔罕家族。以法莲的儿子他罕的后裔。Tahanite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Tahan; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 答比匿（da bǐ ni），《思》塔黑培乃斯。埃及地的一个城镇。Tahpanhes, Tehaphnehes

Terms.Localization: town; Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 《现》答比妮（da bǐ nī），《和》答比匿（da bǐ ni），《思》塔培乃斯。所罗门时期的埃及王后。Tahpenes

Terms.Localization: queen of Egypt; time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 他利亚（tā li ya），《思》塔勒亚。便雅悯人扫罗的后裔，米迦的儿子。Tahrea

Terms.Localization: son of Micah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 海狗。大型水生哺乳动物，长约 3 米，有脚蹼和柔软的绒毛；游得很慢，以水下的杂草为食；十二至十五只一起成群生活；它们的皮可制作成很好的皮料。dugong

Terms.Localization: large water mammal about 3 m long; has flippers; soft fur; Dugong dugong; swims slowly and feeds on underwater weeds; lives in small herds of twelve to fifteen animals; skins make high-quality leather

Localization.Gloss: 他辖（tā xia），《思》塔哈士。拿鹤的儿子。Tahash

Terms.Localization: son of Nahor

Localization.Gloss: 他哈（tā hā），《思》塔哈特。在出埃及的路线上，以色列人在旷野中的营地之一，位置不详。Tahath

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 他哈（tā hā），《思》塔哈特。利未支派的哥辖人，亚惜的儿子，乌列的父亲，希幔的先祖。Tahath

Terms.Localization: son of Assir; descendant of Kohath; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 他哈（tā hā），《思》塔哈特。以法莲支派人，比列的儿子。Tahath

Terms.Localization: son of Bered; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 他哈（tā hā），《思》塔哈特。以法莲支派人，以拉大的儿子。Tahath

Terms.Localization: son of Eleadah; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 提伦（ti lun），《思》提隆。示门的儿子，犹大支派的族长之一。Tilon

Terms.Localization: son of Shimon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 提玛（ti mǎ），《思》特玛。以实玛利的儿子；民族和土地。Tema

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 《现》提幔（ti man）／以东（yĭ dōng），《和》提幔，《思》特曼。以扫的孙子，以利法的儿子；民族及土地。Teman

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 提幔（ti man），《思》特曼。以利法的儿子，以扫和亚大的后裔，以东的族长之一。Teman

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 《现》提幔人（ti man ren）／提幔地区的，《和》提幔人（ti man ren）／提幔地的人，《思》特曼人／特曼地人。提幔的居民，或提幔的后裔。Temanite

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Teman

Localization.Gloss: 提米尼（ti mǐ ni），《思》特曼人。犹大支派人，亚施户和拿拉所生的儿子。Temeni

Terms.Localization: son of Ashhur; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 提洗人（ti xǐ ren），《思》提漆人。提洗的居民。Tizite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Tiz

Localization.Gloss: 提利（ti li），《思》提黎雅。犹大支派人，耶哈利勒的儿子。Tiria

Terms.Localization: son of Jehallelel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 提拉（ti lā），《思》提辣斯。雅弗之子。Tiras

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 公山羊。公山羊。male goat

Terms.Localization: male goat

Localization.Gloss: 猿猴。体型相对较小的长尾猴，灰色皮毛略带浅绿色或蓝色；以水果和嫩叶等素食为主，偶尔吃昆虫和蜘蛛；它们大部分时间生活在树上，但也会在地上寻找草籽和掉落的水果；被当成宠物饲养；从塔西斯引入以色列。monkey

Terms.Localization: relatively small, long-tailed monkey; gray fur with a greenish or bluish tinge; mainly vegetarian, eating fruit and young leaves with occasional insects and spiders; spends most of its time in trees, but also forages for grass seeds and fallen fruit on the ground; Guenon; kept as pet; brought to Israel from Tarsis

Localization.Gloss: 陀健（tuo jian），《思》托庚。西缅支派的城镇之一。Tochen

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 《现》提勒亚笔（ti le ya bǐ），《和》提勒．亚毕（ti le-ya bi），《思》特耳阿彼布。巴比伦古城以东，迦巴鲁河边的一个地方。Tel-Abib

Terms.Localization: location; near river Chebar; Babylonia

Localization.Gloss: 特．哈萨（te-hā sa），《思》特耳哈尔沙。犹太人被掳至巴比伦后所居住的城镇之一。Tel-Harsha

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 特．米拉（te-mǐ lā），《思》特耳默拉。犹太人被掳至巴比伦后所居住的城镇之一。Tel-Melah

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 《现》提拉撒（ti lā sā），《和》提．拉撒（ti-lā sā），《思》特拉撒尔。亚述帝国曾毁灭之地，位于哈兰以西的独立王国。Telassar

Terms.Localization: land; conquered by king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 《现》提革拉．比列色（ti ge lā-bǐ lie se），《和》提革拉．毗列色（ti ge lā-pi lie se），《思》提革拉特丕肋色尔。亚述君王提革拉毗列色三世（公元前744-727年在位）。Tilgath-Pilneser

Terms.Localization: Tiglath-Pileser III; king of Assyria (744-727)

Localization.Gloss: 他拉（tā lā），《思》特拉黑。以法莲支派人，利悉的儿子，约书亚的先祖。Telah

Terms.Localization: son of Resheph; ancestor of Joshua; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 挞买（ta mǎi），《思》塔耳买。亚衲的后裔；巨人。Talmai

Terms.Localization: giant; descendant of Anak

Localization.Gloss: 达买（da mǎi），《思》塔耳买。基述王，大卫的妻子玛迦的父亲。Talmai

Terms.Localization: king of Geshur

Localization.Gloss: 《现》提拉撒（ti lā sā），《和》提．拉撒（ti-lā sā），《思》特拉撒尔。亚述帝国曾毁灭之地，位于哈兰以西的独立王国。Telassar

Terms.Localization: land; conquered by king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 搭模斯（dā mo sī），《思》塔慕次。美索不达米亚的神明。Tammuz

Terms.Localization: Mesopotamian deity

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 枣椰树。棕榈科开花植物，高达 10-20 米，顶部有一簇大叶子；种植目的是为了获得它可食用的甜水果，果子约拇指大小，成串生长；象征优雅；棕榈枝象征和平和胜利。date palm

Terms.Localization: flowering plant species in the palm family Arecaceae; grows to 10-20 m tall; cluster of large leaves at top; Phoenix dactylifera - date palm; cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb; symbol of elegance and grace; palm branch is symbol of peace and also victory

Localization.Gloss: 《现》塔玛（tǎ mǎ），《和》她玛（tā mǎ），《旧》他玛，《思》塔玛尔。犹大的儿子珥的妻子，法勒斯和谢拉的母亲。Tamar

Terms.Localization: wife of Er, son of Judah; mother of Perez and Zerah

Localization.Gloss: 《现》塔玛（tǎ mǎ），《和》她玛（tā mǎ），《旧》他玛，《思》塔玛尔。大卫的女儿，押沙龙的妹妹。Tamar

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 椰枣。1- תָּמָר。date palm
＜阴＞狐狸；豺狼。一种看起来像长毛狗的动物，长着长鼻子；棕黄色，背部的毛发尖端有为红色，尾巴浓密；会发出哀鸣的声音；主要在诗歌中出现，与死亡、毁灭和破坏有关，但也与哀悼和哭泣有关。jackal

Terms.Localization: animal that resembles a long-haired dog with a pointed nose; yellowish brown in color with red tips to the fur on the back and a bushy tail; produces mournful sounds; used mainly in poetry and associated with death, destruction, and devastation, but also with mourning and weeping

Localization.Gloss: 摇祭。摇祭。wave-offering

Terms.Localization: wave-offering

Localization.Gloss: 《现》单户默（dān hu mo），《和》单户蔑（dān hu mie），《思》堂胡默特。被掳时期犹大的军长西莱雅的父亲。Tanhumeth

Terms.Localization: father of Seraiah, army officer of Judah, time of exile

Localization.Gloss: 蛇。蛇的一种，或是蛇的通用词汇。serpent, snake

Terms.Localization: a type of snake, or generic word for snake

Localization.Gloss: 《现》海兽／海怪，《和》大鱼。神话中的海怪的统称；巨兽和力威亚探是这种怪物的两个名字；与创世之初的混乱有关，也与与以色列为敌的国家有关。sea monster

Terms.Localization: generic word for mythical sea monster; behemoth and livyathan are the names of two such monsters; associated with the chaos that existed in the primary stages of creation, and with the nations that were enemies of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 苍鹭／白鹭／角鸱。猫头鹰的一种，颜色较浅，翅膀和背部呈浅黄褐色或灰色，胸部和翅膀下面几乎是白色；眼睛很小，相对于自身体型来说，头很大，面部有一个非常醒目、白色的心形形状，心形边缘为棕色；经常栖息于谷仓、废弃的房屋、洞穴和坟墓；发出各种奇怪的声音，包括尖叫声、嘶嘶声、啾啾声和呼噜声；主要以大鼠、老鼠和其他夜间活动的小动物为食；不洁净，因而不可吃；与坟墓和死亡有关。barn owl

Terms.Localization: type of owl; pale color, light fawn or gray on wings and back, almost white on chest and under the wings; small eyes, large head for its size, and a striking heart-shaped white facial disk outlined in brown; Tyto alba - barn owl; often roosts in barns, deserted houses, caves, and tombs; utters a variety of strange sounds, from a screech to various hissing, chirruping, and snoring sounds; feeds on rats, mice, and other small nocturnal creatures; unclean, not to be eaten; associated with tombs and death

Localization.Gloss: 《现》蜥蜴，《和》蝘蜓／守宫。一种蜥蜴，大体呈绿色，但能根据环境改变颜色；坚硬的皮肤上有小鳞片和肿块状疙瘩，脊柱上有一排尖尖的鳞片；有些品种的头部和面部有角状的突起物；住在植被之中；以昆虫为食；不洁净，因而不可吃。chameleon

Terms.Localization: a type of lizard; green but can change color to match its environment; has small scales and small wart-like lumps on its tough skin; has a row of pointed scales down its spine; some species have horn-like protrusions on their heads and faces; Chamaeleo chamaeleon; lives in vegetation; feeds on insects; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 《现》陀以（tuo yĭ），《和》陀乌（tuo wū），《思》托乌。大卫时期的哈马王。Tou

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 剃头刀；刀。利刀，用来刮去皮肤上的毛发；也用来把笔削尖。razor; knife

Terms.Localization: sharp knife, used to shave hair from the skin; also used to sharpen a pen

Localization.Gloss: 刀鞘；护套。与刀剑形状大小相约的盒子或袋子，用皮革、布、金属，甚或木制成；系在一个圆形的皮条或皮带上，皮条或皮带又可以挂在肩上或系在腰带上；用来保护和携带刀剑。sheath, scabbard

Terms.Localization: case or bag about the size and shape of a sword; made of leather, cloth, metal, or wood; attached to a circular strap or belt that could be hung over the shoulder or tied around the waist; used to cover and to carry a sword

Localization.Gloss: 杏；苹果。身份不确定；可能是野生苹果树或杏树的果子；是一种圆形、香甜的肉质水果；被认为美丽，是一种特殊的款待。apricot, apple

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; perhaps either the fruit of the wild apple tree (Malus sylvestris) or of the apricot tree; round, fleshy, sweet fruit; considered beautiful and a special treat

Localization.Gloss: 他普亚。犹大支派地业内的一个地点。Tappuah

Localization.Gloss: 他普亚。犹大支派地业内的一个地点。Tappuah

Localization.Gloss: 石灰水，粉饰。石灰与水的混合物，刷在墙壁上使其变成白色，并覆盖墙壁粗糙的表面；它不强化结构，仅起美化作用，因此常与使事物看起来与实际不同的努力有关。whitewash

Terms.Localization: lime mixed with water; painted on walls to make them white and cover ugly rough surfaces; it does not strengthen a structure but only beautifies it; for that reason it is often associated with efforts to make something appear different from what it actually is

Localization.Gloss: 陀弗（tuo fu），《思》托费耳。以东某地，位置不详。Tophel

Localization.Gloss: 提弗萨。位于所罗门王国东北边界的一座城镇。Tiphsah

Localization.Gloss: 石松，松树。松树的一种；可高达 10 米，通常呈伞状，因此得名“伞松”；唯一一种能结出可食用种子的松树。stone pine

Terms.Localization: type of pine tree; grows to 10 m tall; often shaped like an umbrella, which gives it the nickname “umbrella pine”; only pine to produce edible seeds; Pinus pinea

Localization.Gloss: 亚巴顿（ya bā dun），《思》阿巴冬。音译自希伯来字，意思是“毁灭者”，指地狱或无底坑的天使／掌权者的名字。Abaddon; Destroyer

Terms.Localization: the Hebrew name for the ruling angel in Hell

Localization.Gloss: 阿爸；父亲。（上帝的称号；字面意思：父亲）一个结合了超自然权威和对子民的关怀的称号。abba; father

Localization.Gloss: 亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。耶稣家谱中的一员。Abijah

Localization.Gloss: 亚比雅（ya bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。二十四个祭司家族的其中一个创始人。Abijah

Localization.Gloss: 亚比利尼（ya bǐ li ni），《思》阿彼肋乃。在大马士革的西北边，亚比拉城附近的地区，由吕撒聂统治。Abilene

Terms.Localization: a territory around the city of Abila, northwest of Damascus and ruled over by Lysanias

Localization.Gloss: 亚比玉（ya bǐ yu），《思》阿彼乌得。耶稣家谱中的一员。Abiud

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亚伯拉罕（ya bo lā hǎn），又名亚伯兰，《思》亚巴辣罕，又名亚巴郎。是以色列民族的祖先，信心之父。亚伯兰的意思是“尊贵的父亲”。亚伯拉罕的意思是“多国的父亲”。Abraham

Terms.Localization: the patriarch of the Israelite nation and father of the faithful

Terms.Localization: a feeling of love for someone or something, based on sincere appreciation and high regard

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞爱筵；爱席。早期基督徒集体享用的一种特别聚餐，他们以此表达相互的关爱和关心。fellowship meal

Localization.Gloss: 夏甲（xia jiǎ），《思》哈加尔。埃及人，撒拉的女仆，亚伯拉罕的妾，以实玛利的母亲。Hagar

Localization.Gloss: 祝圣；视为圣洁。崇敬或尊崇为圣洁。hallow, regard as holy

Terms.Localization: to feel reverence for or to honor as holy

Localization.Gloss: 圣洁。圣洁的品质，表达与人性品质相对比的神性品质。holiness

Terms.Localization: the quality of holiness as an expression of the divine in contrast with the human

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞圣洁；圣善。圣洁的品质，表达与人性品质相对比的神性品质。holiness

Terms.Localization: the quality of holiness as an expression of the divine in contrast with the human

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞道德上没有缺点；纯洁。道德纯洁的品质。being without moral defect; purity

Terms.Localization: the quality of moral purity

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞洁净礼。按照仪式去洁净的过程，以致在礼仪上成为可接纳的。purification

Terms.Localization: process of being purified and cleansed ritually and thus acquire a state of ritual acceptability

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞使纯洁，洁净。按照仪式去洁净，以致在礼仪上成为可接纳的。to purify

Terms.Localization: to purify and cleanse ritually and thus acquire a state of ritual acceptability

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞纯洁的；没有缺陷的。指没有道德上的缺陷或污点，因此是纯洁的。pure; without defect

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without moral defect or blemish and hence pure

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞道德上没有缺点；纯洁。道德纯洁的品质。being without moral defect; purity

Terms.Localization: the quality of moral purity

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞法庭；法院；（在街市中心公开举行的）审判庭。一个地方或社会机构；在这里，人被带到法官面前，以判定其在某件事情上有罪或无罪。court; court of justice

Terms.Localization: a place or social institution that involves a person being brought before a judge to determine that person's guilt or innocence in a matter

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞买赎，救赎；释放，使自由。字面意思：以一定的价格来买；因而指：用一个对被释放的人来说代价高昂的方法，使其得到释放或自由。redeem; set free

Terms.Localization: literally: to buy for a price; hence: to cause the release or freedom of someone by a means which proves costly to the individual causing the release

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞野橄榄树。有些人（也许是错误地）认为这是果园种植之橄榄树的原种；树形较细小，果实较细小，油量也较少。wild olive tree

Terms.Localization: a tree regarded by some (though probably wrongly) as the ancestor of the domestic olive tree; smaller, produces smaller fruit with less oil than domestic variety; Olea europaea sylvestris

Localization.Gloss: 亚基帕（ya jī pa），《思》阿格黎帕。希律亚基帕二世，是希律亚基帕一世的儿子，大希律的曾孙，公元 1 世纪希律家族的统治者。Agrippa

Terms.Localization: Herod Agrippa II, the son of Herod Agrippa I

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞生活态度，行事为人；行为表现；品行。一个人的行为方式，焦点显然放在外显的日常行为上。behavior; conduct

Terms.Localization: a person's way of behaving, with apparent focus upon overt daily behavior

Localization.Gloss: 亚当（ya dāng），《思》亚当。人类的始祖。希伯来文的意思是“人”或“人类”。Adam

Terms.Localization: ancestor of the human race

Localization.Gloss: 亚底（ya dǐ），《思》阿狄。耶稣家谱中的一员；哥桑的儿子，麦基的父亲。Addi

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞（在基督里）的姊妹。字面意思：与所提到的人有同父同母关系的女性；因而也指：在基督里同作信徒的人。sister (in Christ)

Terms.Localization: literally: a female having the same father and mother as the reference person; hence also: fellow believer in Christ

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞（在基督里）的弟兄。群体中的亲密伙伴，群体的成员均有清楚界定的身份和资格（在《新约》中，指在基督里同作信徒的人）。brother (in Christ)

Terms.Localization: a close associate of a group of persons having a well-defined membership (in the NT, fellow believers in Christ)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞兄弟；教中的弟兄。有强烈的合一意识的社群。brotherhood

Terms.Localization: an association of persons having a strong sense of unity

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞不公正地做事；做错误的事；虐待，亏待。做不公正或不公义的事；亏待某人，不公正地对待他。act unjustly; do what is wrong; mistreat

Terms.Localization: to do that which is unjust or unrighteous; to mistreat by acting unjustly toward someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞不公正的行为；不义；行不正义的事。不公正的行为。unjust deed; unrighteousness; doing what is unjust

Terms.Localization: an activity which is unjust

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞不义的行为；过犯；罪恶。以不公义或不公正的方式所做的事。unrighteous act; crime

Terms.Localization: what is done in an unrighteous or unjust manner

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞不公正的；不公正地；不义的。形容不正确或不公正。unjust; unjustly; unrighteous

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being right or just

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚民（ya min），《思》阿得明；耶稣家谱中的一员。由于所根据的原文版本不同，《和合本》没有记载这个名字。Admin

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亚大米田（ya da mǐ tian）的；《思》阿得辣米特的。（Ἀδραμύττιον“亚大米田”的衍生词；原词没有出现在《新约》中）与每西亚省的重要港口亚大米田有关的；位于今日土耳其的西岸北方。保罗曾乘这地方的船自耶路撒冷往罗马去。of Adramyttium

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Ἀδραμύττιον Adramyttium, not occurring in the NT) pertaining to Adramyttium, a seaport in Mysia

Localization.Gloss: 亚得里亚海（ya de lǐ ya hăi），《思》亚得里亚海。保罗被解往罗马途中，船遇暴风后漂流所经之海域，是在马耳他和克里特岛之间的一段地中海。Adriatic Sea

Terms.Localization: Adriatic Sea, Map 4 B-2

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞老鹰，兀鹰。大型捕食鸟的统称；也可能包括其他的鸟，尤其是秃鹫。eagle; vulture

Terms.Localization: generic word for a large bird of prey; genus Aquila, but may include others, esp. vulture

Localization.Gloss: 亚所（ya suǒ），《思》阿左尔。耶稣家谱中的一员，以利亚敬的儿子。Azor

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞令人憎恶的；坏的。指坏的和令人憎恶的，因为不被允许。disgusting; bad

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being bad and disgusting on the basis of not being allowed

Localization.Gloss: 《现》雅典人（yǎ diǎn ren）／雅典的居民，《和》雅典人，《思》雅典人。在雅典居住或是出生的人；或是属于雅典的人。Athenian; person from Athens

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Athens; or: pertaining to Athens

Localization.Gloss: 雅典（yǎ diǎn），《思》雅典。希腊的主要城市；位于罗马帝国亚该亚省，是现今希腊的首都。希腊帝国被罗马帝国取代以后，雅典一直是艺术、文学和哲学的中心。Athens

Terms.Localization: a principal city of Greece

Localization.Gloss: 埃及人（āi ji ren），《思》埃及人。埃及本地的人；出生或居住于埃及的人。Egyptian; person from Egypt

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 《和2010》埃塞俄比亚人；《现》衣索匹亚人；《和》埃提阿伯人；《思》厄提约丕雅人。（Αἰθιωπία“埃塞俄比亚”的衍生词；原词没有出现在《新约》中）埃塞俄比亚的本地人；在埃塞俄比亚出生或居住的人。Ethiopian

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Αἰθιωπία Ethiopia, not occurring in the NT) a person who is a native of Ethiopia

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞流血。使血流出来的过程。shedding of blood

Terms.Localization: the process of causing blood to flow out

Localization.Gloss: 流血；患血漏；患血崩。经受失血之苦。bleed

Terms.Localization: to experience or suffer a loss of blood

Localization.Gloss: 以尼雅（Yǐ ni yǎ）；《思》艾乃阿。彼得施行神迹治好的一个人。Aeneas

Terms.Localization: a person who was healed by Peter

Localization.Gloss: 哀嫩（āi nen），《思》艾农。施洗约翰施洗的地方，可能是耶路撒冷以南的一处水泉，在约旦河附近。Aenon

Terms.Localization: a place where John the Baptist was baptizing

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞宇宙；时代，世代。宇宙，或许带有“万古”或“世代”的相关含义，因为宇宙是短暂性的。universe; age; era

Terms.Localization: the universe, perhaps with some associated meaning of eon or age in the sense of the transitory nature of the universe

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞永恒的（尤指品质上的）；无始无终的，永久的，永远的。指一段无限地持续的时间。eternal
