Terms.Localization: pertaining to an unlimited duration of time

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞山羊的。（αἴξ“山羊”的衍生词，原词没有出现在《新约》）与山羊相关或由山羊构成的（山羊是较细小的四足有蹄驯养动物；山羊属；给人类提供肉、奶、皮、毛和角）。of a goat

Terms.Localization: (derivative of αἴξ goat, not occurring in the NT) pertaining to or consisting of a goat (smaller domesticated four-footed animal with hooves; genus Capra; source of meat, milk, hides, hair, and horns)

Localization.Gloss: 埃及（āi ji），《思》埃及。古代文明帝国之一，位于非洲大陆的东北部，尼罗河流入地中海所途经的地区。Egypt

Terms.Localization: Egypt, Maps 3 B-4 and 4 F-5

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞永恒的；永远的；永久的；永存的。指一段无限地持续的时间。eternal

Terms.Localization: pertaining to an unlimited duration of time

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞血；杀害，谋杀；死亡。（a）血；（b）引申义：一个人的死亡，通常由于暴力或死刑所致；（c）引申义：为献祭的目的而死；（d）字面意思：肉和血，指与神相对而言的人。blood; murder; death

Terms.Localization: (a) blood; (b) figuratively: the death of a person, generally as the result of violence or execution; (c) figuratively: death for a sacrificial purpose; (d) literally: flesh and blood, i.e. a human being in contrast with a divine being

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞不纯洁，不道德；污秽。不道德，尤其与淫乱的罪有关。impurity; uncleanness

Terms.Localization: the state of moral impurity, especially in relationship to sexual sin

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无可指责的。指不能批评的事物。beyond reproach

Terms.Localization: pertaining to what cannot be criticized

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不洁的，污秽的。在礼仪上不被接纳的，或者是因为被玷污，或者是因为本身的性质（例如礼仪上不洁净的牲畜）。unclean; impure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being ritually unacceptable, either as the result of defilement or because of the nature of the object itself (for example, ritually unacceptable animals)

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞荆棘的。（ἄκανθα“有刺植物”的衍生词）指用荆棘做成的物件，或带刺的物件。thorny; of thorns

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ἄκανθα, thorn plant) pertaining to, being made of, or consisting of thorns

Localization.Gloss: 亚革大马（ya ɡe da mǎ），《思》哈刻达玛。（亚兰语，意思是“血田”）祭司们用犹大出卖耶稣得来的银子买下的地，传统认为就在耶路撒冷城外、欣嫩子谷的南侧。Akeldama

Terms.Localization: (an Aramaic term meaning field of blood) a piece of land, probably south of the valley of Hinnom outside Jerusalem, which was bought with Judas' money

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞纯洁的。形容没有混合邪恶，因此是纯洁的。pure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without a mixture of evil and hence to being pure

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞蝗虫，蚱蜢。六腿有翅的昆虫，其特征是第三对腿特别长，适合跳跃；成群迁徙并开拓新的领域；其他时候是单独或三五成群地生活；人们用烧烤油炸等方法烹煮，但在某些地方也会生吃；由于数目庞大和成群出动的特性，蝗虫常用来象征庞大的军队，难以防御，同时也象征上帝的惩罚。grasshopper; locust

Terms.Localization: six-legged winged insect characterized by the fact that its third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; Acrididae family; moves in swarms that migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times lives solitary or in small groups; eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; because of their large numbers and swarming characteristics, locusts were a symbol of a vast attacking army against which there was no defense and also a symbol of divine punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞大厅；会堂；礼堂。比较大的建筑物，通常用来进行审讯，但可能也用作一般的用途。audience hall; auditorium

Terms.Localization: a relatively large building normally used for legal hearings, though possibly also employed for more general purposes

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞未受割礼的人；外邦人；外邦世界。对未受割礼之人的统称。uncircumcised; Gentiles; the Gentile world

Terms.Localization: a collective for those who are uncircumcised

Localization.Gloss: ＜名＞建筑物的房角石（奠基石）或压顶石，对其结构至关重要（在《新约》中，这词只用来比喻基督）cornerstone; important stone

Terms.Localization: the cornerstone or capstone of a building, essential to its construction (these terms occur in the NT only figuratively in reference to Christ)

Localization.Gloss: 亚居拉（ya jū lā），《思》阿桂拉。哥林多的犹太基督徒，保罗的好友及同工；他的妻子是百基拉。Aquila

Terms.Localization: a friend of Paul and the husband of Priscilla

Localization.Gloss: 玉瓶。用雪花石造成的瓶子。alabaster jar

Terms.Localization: a jar made of alabaster stone

Localization.Gloss: 抹油；用油涂抹；用香膏抹。用液体（通常是油或香液）倒在某人身上，通常是在头上、脸上或脚上，作为礼仪的一部分，或以礼仪的方式进行。anoint

Terms.Localization: to pour a liquid, normally oil or perfume, on someone's body, often on the head, face, or feet, as part of a ritual or in a ritual manner

Localization.Gloss: 亚历山大（ya li shān da）人，《思》亚历山大里亚人。（Ἀλεξανδρία “亚历山大”的衍生词，原词没有出现在《新约》中）亚历山大城的本地人或住在该城的人。Alexandrian

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Ἀλεξανδρία Alexandria, not occurring in the NT) a person who lives in or is a native of Alexandria

Localization.Gloss: 亚历山大（ya li shān da）的，从亚历山大来的，《思》亚历山大里亚的。（Ἀλεξανδρία “亚历山大”的衍生词，原词没有出现在《新约》中）指与亚历山大相关的。Alexandrian

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Ἀλεξανδρία Alexandria, not occurring in the NT) pertaining to Alexandria

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞公鸡。雄性家禽，颜色是深棕红，颈部有橙红色的羽毛，头顶上是红色的小肉冠，嘴两边有红色的垂肉；母鸡是较浅的棕红色，肉冠细小；在《圣经》中的重要性，似乎在于公鸡会晨早啼叫，宣布黎明即将到来。rooster; cock

Terms.Localization: male domestic fowl, dark brownish red, with orange-red neck hackles, a smallish red comb on the top of the head, and red lappets on each side under the beak; the hen is a lighter brownish red and has a smaller comb; significance in the Bible seems related to the fact that cocks crow very early in the morning, announcing the coming dawn

Localization.Gloss: 亚历山大（ya li shān da），《思》亚历山大。为耶稣背十字架的古利奈人西门的儿子。Alexander

Terms.Localization: the son of Simon of Cyrene

Localization.Gloss: 亚历山大（ya li shān da），《思》亚历山大。犹太人的大祭司，负责审讯彼得和约翰。Alexander

Terms.Localization: a member of the high-priestly family

Localization.Gloss: 亚历山大（ya li shān da），《思》亚历山大。以弗所城一名犹太人，在以弗所的暴乱中被推出来向群众发言。Alexander

Terms.Localization: a Jew of Ephesus

Localization.Gloss: 亚历山大（ya li shān da），《思》亚历山大。以弗所教会的一名异端教师，与舒米乃（《和》许米乃）一同被保罗指斥。有学者认为他与提后 4.14 的亚历山大为同一人，但却不能肯定。Alexander

Terms.Localization: a false teacher in the church of Ephesus; some scholars have suggested that (4) and (5) refer to the same person, but this is by no means certain

Localization.Gloss: 亚历山大（ya li shān da），《思》亚历山大。反对和加害保罗的一个铜匠。有学者认为他与提前 1.20 的亚历山大为同一人，但却不能肯定。Alexander

Terms.Localization: a coppersmith and opponent of Paul; some scholars have suggested that (4) and (5) refer to the same person, but this is by no means certain

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞说实话；持守真理。传达真实的消息。speak the truth; hold to the truth

Terms.Localization: to communicate what is true

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞真实的；诚实的，可信的。形容人诚实可信。true; truthful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being truthful and honest

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞真的；真实的；真正；确实。是真实的，而不是想象出来的；与历史事实相符的。true; real

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being real and not imaginary, or in accordance with historical fact

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞真的，实在地，确实地。是真实的，而不是想象出来的。truly; genuine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being real and not imaginary

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞真理；真实；真相。那内容是真实的，因此与实际发生的事情一致。truth; truthfulness

Terms.Localization: the content of that which is true and thus in accordance with what actually happened

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞被玷污的物；不洁净的东西；污秽。一些已经献给偶像因而变得污秽、不洁净的东西。a thing defiled

Terms.Localization: something that has been devoted to idols and so made unclean

Localization.Gloss: 异族人；外邦人；别国的人。一个不属于所谈论的民族的人（从犹太人的观点看，即不是犹太人，而是外邦人）。foreigner, Gentile, heathen, pagan

Terms.Localization: a person not belonging to the ethnic group in question (from the specifically Jewish point of view, one who is not a Jew, but a Gentile)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞沉香，芦荟。百合花属植物的芳香树脂，常用于尸体防腐。aloes

Terms.Localization: an aromatic resin of a lily-like plant, often used for embalming a corpse

Localization.Gloss: 亚勒腓（ya le fei），《思》阿耳斐。耶稣的门徒雅各的父亲。Alphaeus

Terms.Localization: the father of James

Localization.Gloss: 亚勒腓（ya le fei），《思》阿耳斐。税吏利未（即使徒马太）的父亲。Alphaeus

Terms.Localization: the father of Levi

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞狐狸；豺狼。一种看起来像长毛狗的动物，有尖鼻子和毛茸茸的尾巴；颜色是红背白肚子（狐狸），或背毛黄褐色而毛尖带红色（豺）；食腐动物；令人联想到毁灭与破坏，以及微不足道而妄自尊大；聪明机敏但也狡猾。fox, jackal

Terms.Localization: animal looking like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose and a bushy tail; either reddish with white underparts (fox) or yellowish brown with red tips to the fur on the back (jackal); scavenger; associated with destruction and devastation, and also with being insignificant but self-important; also intelligent and quick-witted, crafty

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞犯罪，做错，得罪。行事为人违背上帝的旨意和律法。sin, do wrong

Terms.Localization: to act contrary to the will and law of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞罪；过犯。违背上帝的旨意和律法的行为。sin, wrongdoing

Terms.Localization: an act that is contrary to the will and law of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞有罪的；罪人。违背上帝的旨意和律法的罪恶行为；有这种行为的人。sinful; sinner

Terms.Localization: pertaining to behavior that is contrary to the will and law of God; a person who practices such behavior

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞罪；罪行。某人违背上帝的旨意和律法所做的事。sin, wrongdoing

Terms.Localization: that which someone has done in violating the will and law of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不后悔的。不因自己所做的事情感到后悔的。not to be regretted, not regretful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not feeling regret as the result of what one has done

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞无可指责地。指没有过犯或可责之处。blamelessly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without fault or blame

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞真实地；实在；确实地；阿们，诚心所愿（祷告后）。强烈地肯定所宣告或声明的。truly, indeed; amen

Terms.Localization: strong affirmation of what is declared

Localization.Gloss: 亚米拿达（ya mǐ na da），《思》阿米纳达布。大卫的先祖，亚兰的儿子，他的女儿以利沙巴是亚伦的妻子，儿子拿顺是犹大支派的族长。Amminadab

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞纯洁的，没有玷污的；没有污秽的。没有在礼仪上被玷污的，暗示伴随着道德污秽。undefiled

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being ritually defiled, with implications of accompanying moral defilement

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞羔羊，小羊。绵羊的幼崽；常作献祭之用。lamb

Terms.Localization: young of sheep; often used for ritual sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞葡萄园。（ἄμπελος“葡萄树”的衍生词）在果园或田地种植的一些葡萄树。vineyard; orchard of grapevines

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ἄμπελος, grapevine) a number of grapevines growing in a garden or field

Localization.Gloss: 暗伯利（an bo li），《思》安仆里雅。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒，保罗称他为“在主里面所亲爱的”。这是当时罗马皇帝宫中的奴仆常用的名字。Ampliatus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞渔网。一种圆形的网，附有重物，边缘有拉绳；是捕鱼的工具。casting-net

Terms.Localization: a circular net with weights and a draw rope around its edge; used in fishing

Localization.Gloss: 暗妃坡里（an fēi pō lǐ），《思》安非颇里。马其顿东南面的一个重镇，爱琴海以北重要的军事和商业中心。保罗往帖撒罗尼迦的途中曾经过此城。Amphipolis

Terms.Localization: the capital of southeast Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无可指责的，无缺点的。指没有可责之处，因此道德上无可指摘。blameless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being subject to blame and hence morally irreproachable

Localization.Gloss: 亚们（ya men），《思》阿孟。约西亚的父亲。犹大王，22岁时继承父亲玛拿西的王位，在位两年，即公元前642至640年。他和父亲一样行恶，拜偶像。Amon

Terms.Localization: the father of Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 亚摩斯（ya mo sī），《思》阿摩斯。玛他提亚的父亲。Amos

Terms.Localization: the father of Mattathias (Ματταθίας 1)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞台阶，阶梯。单数指一段阶梯的一个台阶，复数指多级的台阶。step; flight of steps; stairs

Terms.Localization: in the singular, a step in a flight of steps, and in the plural, a series of steps

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞查考，查问；判断；审讯，审问。尝试通过仔细研究、评价和判断来了解某事物的本质或真相。examine, question, discern, judge; be discerned (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to try to learn the nature or truth of something by the process of careful study, evaluation and judgment

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无罪的，清白的。形容没有罪责。without sin, guiltless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without guilt

Localization.Gloss: 亚拿尼亚（ya na ni ya），《思》阿纳尼雅。撒非喇的丈夫。耶路撒冷的基督徒。他和妻子撒非喇卖了田产后，欺骗使徒已奉献所有。使徒彼得责备他欺哄圣灵，他就被神击杀而死。Ananias

Terms.Localization: the husband of Sapphira

Localization.Gloss: 亚拿尼亚（ya na ni ya），《思》阿纳尼雅。大马士革的基督徒。主差遣他去按手在扫罗身上，使扫罗恢复视力，并为他施行洗礼。Ananias

Terms.Localization: a Christian in Damascus

Localization.Gloss: 亚拿尼亚（ya na ni ya），《思》阿纳尼雅。希律王任命的大祭司。他曾在总督腓力斯面前控告保罗。Ananias

Terms.Localization: a Jewish high priest

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞活态度；行事为人；行为表现。行事为人，焦点显然放在外显的日常行为上。conduct oneself; behave

Terms.Localization: to conduct oneself, with apparent focus upon overt daily behavior

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞行事为人；生活方式。一个人的行为方式，焦点显然放在外显的日常行为上。conduct; manner of life

Terms.Localization: the way that one conducts oneself, with apparent focus upon overt daily behavior

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞楼上的房间。在首层以上的房间（美式用法称为二楼，在许多其他语言中称为一楼）。upstairs room

Terms.Localization: a room on the level above the ground floor (second story in American usage and first story in most other languages)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞初步审问或听取说明，调查。进行司法调查的行为。investigation

Terms.Localization: the act of conducting a judicial inquiry

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞复活。人死了之后又复活的事件。resurrection

Terms.Localization: the event of coming back to life after having once died

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞贩卖奴隶的人；绑架者；拐卖人口的人。把人卖为奴隶的人，包括绑架人并将其售卖的人。slave dealer

Terms.Localization: one who sells persons as slaves, including one who kidnaps persons and sells them

Localization.Gloss: 安得烈（ān de lie），《思》安德肋。西门彼得的兄弟，耶稣的十二门徒之一。伯赛大人，约翰的儿子。Andrew

Terms.Localization: the brother of Simon Peter and one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 安多尼古（ān duō ni gǔ），《思》安得洛尼科。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒，与犹尼亚同被称为保罗在罗马的亲属，可能是指他们有密切的血缘关系或亲密的基督徒同伴关系。Andronicus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不怜悯的，不同情的。形容没有怜悯或者拒绝发怜悯。merciless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the lack of mercy or the refusal to be merciful

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无可指责的；无可非议的。指完美、美好、不能批评的事物。without fault; beyond reproach

Terms.Localization: pertaining to what is so perfect or good it cannot be criticized

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无可指责的，没有过错的。指不能指责他有任何错误的人。without reproach; blameless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to one who cannot be accused of anything wrong

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无怜悯的；不仁慈的。形容没有怜悯或者拒绝发怜悯。merciless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the lack of mercy or the refusal to be merciful

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞邪恶，不法，恶行。完全无视社会法律法规的行为。lawlessness; lawless deeds

Terms.Localization: behavior that completely disregards the laws or regulations of a society

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞没有“律法”；在律法之外。没有“律法”（尤指《旧约》首五卷书）。without the Law

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without the Law (specifically the first five books of the OT)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞法律上的互告者，对头；仇敌。魔鬼，被形容为一个活跃而持续地与别人敌对的人。adversary; enemy

Terms.Localization: the Devil, described as someone who is actively and continuously hostile towards others

Localization.Gloss: 安提阿人（ān ti ā ren），《思》安提约基雅人。安提阿城的本地人或住在该城的人Antiochean

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Antioch

Localization.Gloss: 安提阿（ān ti ā），《思》安提约基雅。叙利亚的一个城市。建于公元前三百年。在新约时代，它是罗马帝国叙利亚省的首都，位于现今土耳其的东南部。它仅次于罗马和亚历山大，是罗马帝国中的第三大城市。Antioch

Terms.Localization: a city in Syria

Localization.Gloss: 安提阿（ān ti ā），《思》安提约基雅（丕息狄雅的）。彼西底的一个城市，属于新约时代的弗吕家，位于现今的土耳其，是希腊文化的中心。Antioch

Terms.Localization: a city in Pisidia

Localization.Gloss: 安提帕底（ān ti pa dǐ），《思》安提帕特。犹太境内的一个城，位于巴勒斯坦海边、约帕的东北。保罗从耶路撒冷被押送至该撒利亚途中，某夜里曾停留于此。Antipatris

Terms.Localization: a city in Judea

Localization.Gloss: 安提帕（ān ti pa），《思》安提帕。别迦摩教会的殉道者。Antipas

Terms.Localization: a martyr in Pergamum

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞赎金，赎价；换取自由的代价（方法）。使人得以获释或得救的方法或途径。ransom, means of release

Terms.Localization: the means or instrument by which release or deliverance is made possible

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞敌基督者；敌基督的；敌对基督者。与基督为敌的人，意思是要夺取基督地位的人。antichrist

Terms.Localization: one who is opposed to Christ, in the sense of usurping the role of Christ

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞没有虚假的；真诚的，真实的。真挚诚恳的，因此是没有假装或做作的。unhypocritical; without hypocrisy; genuine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being genuine and sincere, and hence lacking in pretense or show

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞斧头。由一个手柄和一个锋利刀头组成的用具，用来砍木头。axe

Terms.Localization: an instrument with a sharp-edged head and a handle, used in chopping wood

Localization.Id: ἀπ᾽ αἰῶνος, (ἀπὸ) τῶν αἰώνων, ἐκ τοῦ αἰῶνος
Localization.Gloss: 从古时，创世以来，历代以来。一段极长的时间，从一个假定的开始，直至现在。since all time; from all ages past; from the beginning of time

Terms.Localization: an exceedingly long period of time from an assumed beginning up to the present

Localization.Gloss: 解脱；释放；解决，和解。解除控制，释放（通用的含义适用于各种各样的情况，包括监禁、政治控制、罪恶、疾病）。set free; release; settle with

Terms.Localization: to release from control, to set free (generic meaning for a wide variety of circumstances, including confinement, political domination, sin, sickness)

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不能被试诱的。指不能被试探或诱惑。not tempted

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being able to be tempted

Localization.Gloss: 亚比利（ya bǐ li），《思》阿培肋。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒，他被形容为“在基督里经过试验的”。Apelles

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞不信；不信任。相信某事不是真的；拒绝信任或依靠某事或某人。disbelieve; be unfaithful

Terms.Localization: to believe that something is not true; to refuse to put one's trust or reliance in something or someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞不信；不信实。拒绝信任或依靠某事或某人的一种态度。unbelief

Terms.Localization: the attitude of refusing to put one's trust or reliance in something or someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞登记，户口登记。与人口普查一起进行的户口登记。census

Terms.Localization: the event of registering persons in connection with taking a census

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞登记，列入人口普查名单。登记某人，通常与人口普查有关。register, put on a census list

Terms.Localization: to register someone, often in connection with taking a census

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞制造纷争。造成或煽动人与人之间的分裂、不和。creating divisions

Terms.Localization: to cause or instigate divisions between people

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞拒绝；弃绝；丢弃。判断某人或某物为不真诚或不值得的，因而被弃绝。reject

Terms.Localization: to judge someone or something as not being worthy or genuine and thus something to be rejected

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞谷仓，仓库。储存农作物的小型建筑物；通常用石头搭建而成。barn; storehouse

Terms.Localization: small structure for storing agricultural produce; normally made of stone

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞和解，和好。在人际关系受到扰乱或破坏后，重新建立恰当的友好关系。reconcile

Terms.Localization: to reestablish proper friendly interpersonal relations after these have been disrupted or broken

Localization.Gloss: 亚玻伦（ya bō lun），《思》阿颇隆。掌管地狱或无底坑的天使的希腊名字；意思是“毁灭者”。Apollyon; Destroyer

Terms.Localization: the Greek name for the ruling angel in Hell; name means Destroyer

Localization.Gloss: 亚波罗尼亚（ya bō luo ni ya），《思》阿颇罗尼雅。马其顿境内的一个城市，属于罗马帝国。保罗与西拉在传道旅程中曾经过此地，位于帖撒罗尼迦东面，在今日希腊的北部。Apollonia

Terms.Localization: a city in Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 亚波罗（ya bō luo），《思》阿颇罗。亚历山太城的犹太基督徒，早期教会的领袖，热心事奉，擅长讲解圣经，先后在以弗所、哥林多等地传道。Apollos

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Alexandria who worked in Ephesus and Corinth

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞释放，救赎，拯救。释放的行为，与释放奴隶的过程相类似。liberation, deliverance, redemption

Terms.Localization: the act of releasing or setting free, with the implied analogy to the process of freeing a slave

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞释放，使自由；解散，叫人走开；离婚；饶恕；＜中间＞离开。forgive, pardon

Terms.Localization: to remove the guilt resulting from wrongdoing

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞使徒的职份。被委任并差派作特派信使的人所担当的角色。apostleship

Terms.Localization: the role of one who has been commissioned and sent as a special messenger

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞被开除的或被赶出会堂的。被逐出会堂、开除教籍的状态。expelled from the synagogue

Terms.Localization: a state of having been excommunicated from membership in a synagogue

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞宣判或判决。正式的判决，经常涉及法律裁决。verdict, sentence

Terms.Localization: an official decision, frequently involving a legal verdict

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞使徒；使者。被差遣去发送消息的人；指直接跟随耶稣的信徒：履行特派信使职责的人。messenger; apostle

Terms.Localization: one who is sent with a message; referring to the immediate followers of Jesus: one who fulfills the role of being a special messenger

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚比乌市场（ya bǐ wū shi chǎnɡ），《和》亚比乌市（ya bǐ wū shi），《思》阿丕约市场。罗马南部的一个集镇；位于罗马帝国亚比乌大道第43号里程碑处，即罗马以南63.5公里。Forum of Appius

Terms.Localization: a market town south of Rome

Localization.Gloss: 亚腓亚（ya fei ya），《思》阿丕雅。歌罗西的女信徒，可能是腓利门的妻子；保罗称呼她为“妹子”。传说她是与腓利门一同殉道而死的，希腊教会定11月22日为她的纪念日。Apphia

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman, probably the wife of Philemon

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞毁灭；浪费。造成人、物或机构的破坏。destruction

Terms.Localization: an act causing the ruin of persons, objects, or institutions

Localization.Gloss: 阿拉伯（ā lā bo），《旧》亚拉伯，《思》阿剌伯。（大概是指西奈半岛）位于埃及和亚洲之间，即今日的阿拉伯半岛，在约旦河以东。Arabia

Terms.Localization: Arabia (probably a reference to the Sinai Peninsula)

Localization.Gloss: 亚兰（ya lan），《思》阿兰。耶稣家谱中的一员。Aram

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无所事事；懒惰的；闲，废（话）；无效的，无用的。不工作的，无效的，或形容人惯常地拒绝工作；没有仔细考虑某事的idle, unemployed, lazy, useless; careless, ineffective

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not working or habitually refusing to work; pertaining to not giving careful consideration to something

Localization.Gloss: 亚哩达（ya lǐ da），《思》阿勒达。指亚哩达四世斐罗帕特里（Aretas IV Philopatris），他是希律安提帕的岳父，约在公元前9年至公元40年管辖拿巴提人的地区。罗马凯撒可能曾把大马士革交给他管理。Aretas

Terms.Localization: a king of Nabatean Arabia

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞小羊，羔羊。绵羊的幼崽；完全依赖母羊的滋养和牧羊人的保护；无助、无防备、无辜。lamb

Terms.Localization: the young of sheep; fully dependent on its mother for nourishment and on the shepherd for protection; helpless, defenseless, innocent

Localization.Gloss: 亚利马太（ya li mǎ tai），《思》阿黎玛特雅。犹太境内的一个城，位于示罗以西的地方，即旧约时代撒母耳的故乡拉玛琐非，简称“拉玛”。Arimathea

Terms.Localization: a city in Judea

Localization.Gloss: 亚利多布（ya li duō bu），《思》阿黎斯托步罗。在《罗马书》16 章出现的基督徒，保罗向他一家问安。Aristobulus

Terms.Localization: a person whose family is greeted in |sROM.16:10|s*

Localization.Gloss: 亚里达古（ya lǐ da ɡǔ），《思》阿黎斯塔苛。帖撒罗尼迦人，初期教会的外邦基督徒，保罗的忠心同工。Aristarchus

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 哈米吉多顿（hā mǐ ji duō dun），《思》阿玛革冬。一个神秘的地方，《启示录》预言世界末日众王将聚集在这里进行一场善恶较量的大战。它的位置不详，可能是指著名的古战场米吉多山（Mount Megiddo）。Armageddon

Terms.Localization: a cryptic place name designating the territory which will be the scene of the final battle of the forces of good and evil

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞许配婚嫁。和某人订下婚约。promise in marriage; betrothe

Terms.Localization: to promise a person for marriage

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞羔羊，羊。绵羊的幼崽；完全依赖母羊的滋养和牧羊人的保护；无助、无防备、无辜；常作献祭之用。lamb

Terms.Localization: the young of sheep; fully dependent on its mother for nourishment and on the shepherd for protection; helpless, defenseless, innocent; often used for ritual sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: 《现》亚尼（ya ni），《和》亚兰（ya lan），《思》阿尔乃。耶稣家谱中的一员，希斯仑的儿子。在某些译本中，英文拼写为 Aram。Arni

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亚提马（ya ti mǎ），《思》阿尔特玛。保罗的同伴，保罗计划把他差遣去革哩底接替提多。Artemas

Terms.Localization: a friend of Paul

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞头蓬，船头的帆。一块布，系于船的上方，藉以兜风，让风来推动船只在水中前行。sail

Terms.Localization: a cloth attached above a boat in such a way as to catch the wind and thus propel the boat through the water

Localization.Gloss: 亚法撒（ya fǎ sā），《思》阿帕革沙得。耶稣家谱中的一员，是闪的儿子。Arphaxad

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亚基老（ya jī lǎo），《思》阿尔赫劳。公元1世纪希律家族的统治者，他是大希律的儿子，继承父位统治犹大和撒马利亚。Archelaus

Terms.Localization: the son of Herod I

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞统治者；治理者。统治者或治理者。ruler

Terms.Localization: one who rules or governs

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞大祭司，祭司长；主要祭司，祭司长家族的人。chief priest; high priest

Terms.Localization: a principal priest, in view of belonging to one of the high-priestly families

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞会堂主管。领导会堂、负责管理会堂事务的人。leader of a synagogue

Terms.Localization: one who is the head of and who directs the affairs of a synagogue

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞税吏长。税吏长，意指监管其他税吏工作的人。chief tax collector

Terms.Localization: chief tax collector, in the sense of one who controlled activities of certain other tax collectors

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞总管；主管筵席的人。负责管理所有在宴席或宴会中服务的人员的总管。head steward, master of feast

Terms.Localization: the head servant in charge of all those who served at meals or feasts

Localization.Gloss: 亚撒（ya sā），《思》阿撒。耶稣家谱中的一员，犹大王，在以色列王耶罗波安第20年时登位，在耶路撒冷统治41年（公元前913-873年）。他行耶和华眼中看为正的事。Asaph

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亚设（ya she），《思》阿协尔。雅各与利亚的使女悉帕所生的儿子，也是亚设支族的先祖。Asher

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 亚细亚人（ya xi ya ren），《旧》亚西亚人，《思》亚细亚人。亚细亚本地的人；在亚细亚出生或居住的人。Asian

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Asia

Localization.Gloss: 亚细亚（ya xi ya），《旧》亚西亚，《思》亚细亚。罗马帝国的省份，在现今土耳其的西部。保罗在第三次旅程期间住在以弗所超过两年，使福音传遍亚细亚。Asia

Terms.Localization: the Roman province of Asia, primarily the western part of present-day Turkey

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞皮制酒袋。用动物皮或皮革制成的袋子；用于暂时贮存和携带葡萄酒。wineskin

Terms.Localization: a bag made of skin or leather; used for temporarily storing and carrying wine

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞小毒蛇；眼镜蛇；毒蛇。毒蛇类；令人联想到潜伏的危险。asp; cobra; viper

Terms.Localization: kind of poisonous snake; associated with lurking danger

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞铜钱。罗马帝国的铜币，约值一个银币（得拿利）的十六分之一。assarion; penny

Terms.Localization: a Roman copper coin worth 1/16 of a denarius

Localization.Gloss: 亚朔（ya shuo），《思》阿索。是亚细亚省每西亚地区的重要港口城市，位于今日土耳其境内。Assos

Terms.Localization: a city of Mysia

Localization.Gloss: 亚逊其土（ya xun qi tǔ），《思》阿松黎托。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒。Asyncritus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞确实的；安全的。指确定的，因此完全可信。something definite; secure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being certain and thus completely believable

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞确实地；安全地。指确定的，因此完全可信。something definite; secure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being certain and thus completely believable

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞确实，毫无疑问。一种对信仰或信念的确定。certainty; being without doubt

Terms.Localization: a state of certainty with regard to a belief

Localization.Gloss: 亚大利（ya da li），《思》阿塔肋雅。旁非利亚的海港城市，在今日土耳其境内。Attalia

Terms.Localization: a seaport in Pamphylia

Localization.Gloss: 奥古斯都（ao ɡǔ sī dū），《旧》亚古士督，《思》奥古斯都。罗马皇帝奥大维（Gaius Octavian）的拉丁名称，相当于一个专有名词；他的统治时期是从公元前 27 年至公元 14 年。Augustus

Terms.Localization: a Latin title given to Emperor Octavian and equivalent to a proper name

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞管辖，控制，压制。专横地控制。have authority, control

Terms.Localization: to control in a domineering manner

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞吹笛。αὐλός“笛子”的衍生词。play a flute

Terms.Localization: derivative of αὐλός flute

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞吹笛的人。αὐλέω“吹笛”的衍生词。flutist

Terms.Localization: (derivative of αὐλέω to play a flute) one who plays the flute

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞院子，羊圈。有围墙或围栏的地方，为的是围住人类的活动场所或保护牲畜。sheepfold

Terms.Localization: a walled enclosure to protect livestock

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞庭院；住宅；宫殿；大宅。庙宇、宫殿、大宅等建筑群内用建筑物围起来的露天区域；或指任何有这种围蔽之露天区域的住宅（通常是比较讲究的建筑）。courtyard; or dwelling, palace, mansion

Terms.Localization: an open area enclosed by structures within a building complex, such as the temple, a palace, or a house; or any dwelling having such an enclosed open area (often a relatively elaborate structure)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞笛子。吹奏乐器，开有多个指孔用以改变音调的长管。flute

Terms.Localization: a musical wind instrument consisting of a tube with a series of finger holes used to alter the tone

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞自己给自己定罪的。因自己的行为而受到谴责的。self-condemned

Terms.Localization: pertaining to one who is condemned as the result of his own actions

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞厕所，便坑。latrine; toilet

Terms.Localization: latrine, toilet

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不灭的；不朽坏的。指不会朽坏和死亡。imperishable; immortal

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being not subject to decay and death

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不贪财的；不贪婪的。不渴慕或贪爱金钱的。not a lover of money; not greedy

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being desirous or greedy for money

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞赦免，饶恕，除去（罪或债）。除去作恶所带来的罪责；免去某人偿还债务的义务。forgive; forgive a debt

Terms.Localization: to remove the guilt resulting from wrongdoing; to release a person from the obligation of repaying what is owed

Localization.Gloss: 亚该亚（ya ɡāi ya），《思》阿哈雅。希腊哥林多湾南岸地区，曾经是一个独立的国家，新约时代是罗马帝国的一个省，包括希腊最重要的地区；位于马其顿以南，首府是哥林多城。Achaia

Terms.Localization: a Roman province including the most important parts of Greece

Localization.Gloss: 亚该古（ya gāi gǔ），《思》阿哈依科。哥林多教会的一名基督徒。Achaicus

Terms.Localization: a Christian at Corinth

Localization.Gloss: 亚哈斯（ya hā sī），《思》阿哈次。耶稣家谱中的一员，犹大王约坦的儿子，南国犹大的君王，约在公元前735至716/5年在位。Ahaz

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亚金（ya jīn），《思》阿歆。耶稣家谱中的一员，所罗巴伯的后裔。Achim

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亚伯（ya bo），《思》亚伯尔。亚当和夏娃的第二个儿子，该隐的兄弟。Abel

Terms.Localization: the second son of Adam and Eve and the brother of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 无底坑，深渊，阴间。是死人所在的地方，也是囚禁魔鬼的处所，是作为敌基督的兽以及阴间使者亚巴顿的住处。abyss; abode of evil spirits; very deep place

Terms.Localization: a location of the dead and a place where the Devil is kept, the abode of the beast as the antichrist, and of Abaddon, as the angel of the underworld

Localization.Gloss: 亚迦布（ya jiā bu），《思》阿加波。来自犹太的基督徒先知。Agabus

Terms.Localization: a Christian prophet from Judea

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞天使；使者。超自然的存在者，至高超自然存在者的差役和使者。angel

Terms.Localization: a supernatural being that attends upon or serves as a messenger of a superior supernatural entity

Localization.Gloss: 容器；器皿；桶。主要用来盛载液体或湿的物件；体积相对较大，容量约 15 至 19 公升。container; vessel

Terms.Localization: a container, primarily for liquids or wet objects; rather large, containing 15-19 liters

Localization.Gloss: 圣洁的；纯洁的；神圣的。圣洁的，意思是具有高超的道德品格，并且拥有一些本质上神圣的品格，与人的品格相对。holy; pure; divine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being holy in the sense of superior moral qualities and possessing certain essentially divine qualities in contrast with what is human

Localization.Gloss: 圣所。可移动的会幕或耶路撒冷的圣殿，作为一个神圣的场所。sanctuary

Terms.Localization: the movable tabernacle or the temple in Jerusalem as a consecrated place

Localization.Gloss: （至）圣所。耶路撒冷圣殿或早期的会幕、或相应的属灵圣地的内部，可指其中的外室（圣所）或内室（至圣所），可能被认为是在天堂。(Most) Holy Place

Terms.Localization: the interior (either the outer or the inner of the two rooms) of the sanctuary of the Jerusalem Temple or of the earlier tabernacle or of a corresponding spiritual holy place, perhaps regarded as being in heaven

Localization.Gloss: 鱼钩。细小的弧形金属片或骨头，甚或是一根硬刺，一端是尖的，通常带有倒钩，另一端是环状或弯曲的，用以系钓丝；在尖钩上穿上鱼饵，吸引鱼儿上钓。fish hook

Terms.Localization: small, curved piece of metal or bone or even a strong thorn, with a sharp point on one end, usually with a barb just behind the point, and a loop or bend on the other end to which a fishing line can be attached; used with some bait attached to it in order to attract a fish

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞锚。用绳子或铁链系在船上的重物，这重物坠到水底之后，可以防止或限制船只的移动。anchor

Terms.Localization: a heavy object attached to a boat by a rope or chain and dropped to the bottom of a body of water in order to prevent or restrict the movement of the boat

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞非信徒；不是基督的追随者。不属于基督徒群体的人，其含义可能是不义的人或没有与上帝建立正确关系的人。unbeliever; not a follower of Christ

Terms.Localization: a person who is not a member of the Christian community and by implication possibly unjust or not in a right relation with God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞纯净的；无杂质的。是纯洁的，有未被掺入杂质的含意。unadulterated; pure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being pure, with the implication of not being adulterated

Localization.Gloss: 亚锁都（ya suǒ dū），《思》阿左托。是古代的“亚实突”城（Ashdod），位于耶路撒冷以西，巴勒斯坦南部沿岸的一个城市。Azotus

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of southern Palestine

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无神的，没有上帝的。指与上帝没有任何关系。without God

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without any relationship to God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不法的；不遵守法律的；不服约束的。形容拒绝服从法律要求。lawless; unruly; not complying with law

Terms.Localization: pertaining to refusing to be subjected to legal requirements

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞有刺植物；荆棘；蒺藜。任何在茎部和／或枝条上有尖刺的植物；被视为无用的；象征艰难困苦。thorn plant; thistle; brier

Terms.Localization: any kind of plant with sharp projections on its stem and/or branches; regarded as useless; symbol of hardship

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞铁链，锁链。一串连接着的金属链环；用来捆绑物件或约束囚犯。chain

Terms.Localization: a series of connected metal links; used for binding objects together or restraining prisoners

Localization.Gloss: 打谷场，碾禾场。坚硬地面或石头地的表面，人们通过拍打或让牲畜踩在上面把谷物脱粒。threshing floor

Terms.Localization: a surface of hard ground or stone where grain was threshed out, either by beating or having animals trample upon it

Localization.Gloss: 无可指责的；无过失的；无辜的。指没有过犯或可责之处。faultless, blameless, innocent

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without fault or blame

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄，葡萄树。匍匐植物，成熟时会形成木质的梗；沿着地面生长，直至找到可以用卷须攀附的树或其他物件；会长出一挂一挂的圆形小果，果实甜而多汁；象征祝福、繁荣和幸福grapevine

Terms.Localization: creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; Vitis vinifera; grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils; bears bunches of small round fruit that are sweet and juicy; symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无缺点的；无可指责的。没有缺陷或瑕疵的；引申义：形容没有缺点，因此在道德上无可指责。unblemished; blameless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having no defect or blemish; figuratively: pertaining to being without fault and hence morally blameless

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞大茴香，莳萝。一年生植物，高度可达 50 厘米；叶子纤细；黄色花朵，花形像盖杯；叶子和种子有宜人的辛辣气味；园子栽种的草本植物，用于烹饪。dill

Terms.Localization: annual plant that can reach 50 cm in height; has fine leaves; yellow flowers form a shape like a covered cup; leaves and seeds have a pleasant, spicy smell; Anethum graveolens; garden herb, used in cooking

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞花。植物上的花flower

Terms.Localization: the blossom of a plant

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞木炭。一种炭，在很少空气或没有空气的环境中加热木头或骨头而产生；用作燃料。charcoal

Terms.Localization: A form of carbon produced by heating wood or bone in little or no air; used as a fuel

Localization.Gloss: 亚那（ya na），《思》亚纳斯。叙利亚总督委任的耶路撒冷大祭司。Annas

Terms.Localization: a Jewish high priest

Localization.Gloss: 安娜（ān na），《和》亚拿（ya na），《思》亚纳。女先知，是亚设族人法内力的女儿。Anna

Terms.Localization: a prophetess

Localization.Gloss: 不法的。指无视法律的生活，意思是拒绝遵守法律。lawless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to living without regard to law, in the sense of refusing to obey laws

Localization.Gloss: 外邦人；异教徒。一个完全不遵守犹太律法的非犹太人。Gentile, heathen, pagan

Terms.Localization: a non-Jew who lives completely without reference to the Jewish Law

Localization.Gloss: 桶。用来汲水的容器或器具。pail, bucket

Terms.Localization: a container or vessel for drawing water

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不信实的，不信的；无法相信的。指不信，有拒绝相信的含义。faithless; unbelieving

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not believing, with the implication of refusing to believe

Localization.Gloss: 阿拉伯人（ā lā bo ren），《思》阿剌伯人。来自阿拉伯本地的人，居住或出生在阿拉伯的人。Arab; person from Arabia

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Arabia

Localization.Gloss: 《和2010》《和》亚略巴古（Ya lue bā gǔ），《现》亚略．巴古，《思》阿勒约帕哥；亚略·巴古的议会。（直译：战神之山）雅典法院的所在地，传统认为亚略巴古是靠近雅典卫城的一座石山，但它更可能是在山脚下的集市上；或：雅典城的顾问委员会，负责处理道德、文化和宗教的事务。Areopagus; council of the Areopagus

Terms.Localization: (literally hill of Mars) the location of an Athenian court, traditionally associated with a rocky hill close to the Acropolis, though probably located in the marketplace at the foot of the hill; or, an advisory council of Athens dealing with ethical, cultural, and religious matters

Localization.Gloss: 熊。野生的大型四足哺乳动物，有厚厚的皮毛和狗的脸；用四足走路，也可以用后足站立起来以取得更阔的视野；站着约有两米高，体重超过二百公斤；以树根、浆果、野果、老鼠和蜥蜴为食，偶尔也吃小家畜；被激怒或幼崽被抢走时，会变成一种危险的动物；令人联想到暴力和危险。bear

Terms.Localization: large wild four-footed mammal with thick fur and doglike face; walks on all fours but may stand up on its back legs to get a better view; may be 2 m. tall when standing up and weigh over 200 kilos; feeds on roots, berries, wild fruit, mice, and lizards, and, occasionally, small livestock; Ursus arctos syriacus; dangerous when provoked or robbed of cubs; associated with violence and danger

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞战车。两轮或四轮的敞篷车；用轭与马匹套在一起，并由马匹拉动；用于战争或旅行。chariot

Terms.Localization: open vehicle with two or four wheels; harnessed to and pulled by horses; used in war or for travelling

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞犁。用硬质木材或金属制成的三角形平刀（犁头），连于手柄；用来破土，作为播种或种植幼苗的准备。plow

Terms.Localization: a flat triangular blade (the “plowshare”) made of hard wood or metal, connected to a handle; used to cut the soil in preparation for the sowing of seed or the planting of seedlings

Localization.Gloss: 亚底米（ya dǐ mĭ），《思》阿尔特米。新约时代的希腊女神，在小亚细亚地区广受供奉敬拜。Artemis

Terms.Localization: a Greek goddess worshiped especially in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 亚基布（ya jī bu），《思》阿尔希颇。保罗的同工，歌罗西的犹太基督徒。Archippus

Terms.Localization: a Christian in Colossae

Localization.Gloss: 统治者；领袖；掌权者。统治者或治理者。ruler; leader; authority

Terms.Localization: one who rules or governs

Localization.Gloss: 官员；法官；审判官。担任法官的小官吏。official; judge; magistrate

Terms.Localization: a minor government official serving as a judge

Localization.Gloss: 芳香的药膏；香膏。百合属植物的芳香树脂，通常用来给尸体防腐。aromatic salves; perfumed ointment

Terms.Localization: aromatic oils or salves used especially in embalming the dead

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无可指责的；无可非议的。指无可批评或挑剔的东西。above criticism; beyond reproach

Terms.Localization: pertaining to what cannot be criticized

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不肯和解的；不愿意与人和睦相处的。不愿意与他人和解。irreconcilable; unwilling to be at peace with others

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being unwilling to be reconciled to others

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞饶恕；宽恕。消除因犯罪行为而产生的内疚和罪责。forgiveness

Terms.Localization: the act of removing the guilt resulting from wrongdoing

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞糠秕，谷壳。谷粒的外壳。chaff

Terms.Localization: the outer cover or husk of grain

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞或＜阴＞苦艾，茵陈。一种有药用价值的特别苦的草本植物。wormwood

Terms.Localization: a particularly bitter herb with medicinal value

Localization.Gloss: 地狱；阴间。死人（包括义人和不义的人）的住处（在大多数情况下，ᾅδης[a] 相等于希伯来语的 Sheol）。world of the dead; Hades

Terms.Localization: a place or abode of the dead, including both the righteous and the unrighteous (in most contexts ᾅδης[a] is equivalent to the Hebrew term Sheol)

Localization.Gloss: 巴比伦。巴比伦的首都 ；也象征恶魔似的世界强国。Babylon

Terms.Localization: the capital of Babylonia; it also occurs as a symbol of demonic world power

Localization.Gloss: 巴兰（bā lan），《思》巴郎。摩西时代亚兰的先知，受摩押王巴勒委托诅咒以色列人，使他们不能得胜；在计谋失败之后，引诱以色列人偏离正路，叫以色列人得罪上帝。Balaam

Terms.Localization: a sorcerer and prophet summoned by Balak to curse Israel

Localization.Gloss: 巴勒（bā le），《思》巴拉克。与亚兰先知巴兰狼狈为奸的摩押王；在以色列人离开埃及向迦南进发期间，他要求先知巴兰诅咒以色列人，上帝却使巴兰三次祝福以色列人。Balak

Terms.Localization: a king of Moab involved with Balaam

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞钱包；钱袋。用皮革或布料制作的袋子，用来放置金钱或其他财物。purse; money bag

Terms.Localization: a receptacle for carrying money or other possessions; made of leather or cloth

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞洁净仪式，洗礼。用水清洁的礼仪，以便使物品在礼仪上成为可接纳的。(ritual) washing; baptism

Terms.Localization: a ritual washing with water to make objects ritually acceptable

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞施洗者；施洗的。给人施洗的人，约翰专用的头衔。Baptist

Terms.Localization: one who baptizes, a title used exclusively for John

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞施洗；洗。在宗教仪式中使用水，象征基于真诚悔改带来的洁净和加入群体。baptize

Terms.Localization: to employ water in a religious ceremony designed to symbolize purification and initiation on the basis of repentance

Localization.Gloss: 巴拉巴（bā lā bā），《思》巴辣巴。在耶稣受审期间，彼拉多应犹太人的要求释放的一个囚犯。Barabbas

Terms.Localization: a prisoner released by Pilate at the request of the Jews during the trial of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 巴拉加（bā lā jiā），《思》贝勒基雅。马太福音提到他是在殿和坛中间被杀的撒迦利亚的父亲，这可能是指历代志下记载的事件，后者记载撒迦利亚的父亲是耶何耶大。学者一般认为，《马太福音》的记载是笔误。Barachiah

Terms.Localization: the father of a man killed in the Temple

Localization.Gloss: 巴拉（bā lā），《思》巴辣克。亚比挪庵的儿子，士师时代以色列人的领袖。他和女先知底波拉一同打败迦南王耶宾的统帅西西拉。Barak

Terms.Localization: an Israelite general

Localization.Gloss: 巴多罗买（bā duō luo mǎi），《思》巴尔多禄茂。耶稣的十二门徒之一。圣经中甚少提到他，而且他的名字只出现在符类福音中。Bartholomew

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 巴．耶稣（bā-yē sū），《思》巴尔耶稣。帕弗一个行法术和假充先知的犹太人。希腊名字是以吕马。Bar-Jesus

Terms.Localization: a false prophet

Localization.Gloss: 约翰的儿子（yuē han de er zǐ），《和》巴．约拿（bā-yuē na），《思》约纳的儿子。“巴．约拿”是西门彼得的亚兰姓氏，意思是“约拿的儿子”或“约翰的儿子”。Bar-Jona; Bar-Jonas

Terms.Localization: the family name of the apostle Simon Peter

Localization.Gloss: 巴拿巴（bā na bā），《思》巴尔纳伯。原名约瑟，塞浦路斯的利未人，保罗最早期的传道同工。Barnabas

Terms.Localization: an additional name of a certain Joseph, a Levite from Cyprus who was an associate of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 巴撒巴（bā sā bā），《思》巴尔撒巴。通常称为“犹士都”的约瑟，巴撒巴是他的姓氏或别号，他是替补加略人犹大作使徒的两名候选人之一。Barsabbas

Terms.Localization: the family name of a certain Joseph (often called Justus) who was one of two candidates for the place of Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 巴撒巴（bā sā bā），《思》巴尔撒巴。耶路撒冷教会的领袖犹大的别号。他和西拉被选派跟从保罗和巴拿巴，到安提阿、叙利亚、基利家的教会去宣告耶路撒冷大会的决定。Barsabbas

Terms.Localization: the family name of a certain Judas who was appointed as a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 巴底买（bā dǐ mǎi），《思》巴尔提买。一个讨饭的瞎子。耶稣离开耶利哥城时医好他，说是他的信心救了他。Bartimaeus

Terms.Localization: a blind man

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞王国；统治，王权。国王统治的地区；引申义：作王（或由上帝）统治和掌权的行为。kingdom; rule, reign

Terms.Localization: an area or district ruled by a king; by extension, the act of ruling or reigning by a king (or God)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞王；君王；国王。一个国家或地区的男性统治者；有时用来指上帝、耶稣或撒但等具有王的能力和权威的存在者。king

Terms.Localization: male ruler of a nation or area; sometimes used to refer to God, Jesus, or Satan as beings with the power and authority of a king

Localization.Gloss: 皇宫。君王或统治者的居所；通常比普通人的居所大和讲究。palace

Terms.Localization: the dwelling of a king or ruler; usually larger and more elaborate than the dwelling of an average person

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞女王；王后。一个国家或地区的女性统治者。queen

Terms.Localization: female ruler of a nation or area

Localization.Gloss: 巴力（bā li），《思》巴耳。一个闪族的神，是古代近东迦南民族敬拜的对象，专司繁殖生育；它是众神中最重要的神灵，其名字的意思是“主”。Baal

Terms.Localization: a Semitic deity

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞棕树枝；棕榈枝。棕榈树的枝子。palm branch

Terms.Localization: branch of the palm tree

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞洗礼。用水进行清洗的宗教仪式，象征基于真诚悔改带来的洁净和加入群体。baptism

Terms.Localization: a religious ceremony involving washing with water, symbolizing purification and initiation on the basis of repentance

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞外国人，非希腊人的；未开化的人。不参与希腊文化和文明的人；某个地区的土人，他们不说希腊语或拉丁语；在新约时代，人们认为这些人是未开化的。foreigner, non-Greek; uncivilized

Terms.Localization: a person not participating in Greek culture and civilization; person from an area in which a language other than Greek or Latin was spoken; regarded as being outside the civilized world of NT times

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞树丛；荆棘丛。任何种类的荆棘丛林或灌木。thorn bush; bush

Terms.Localization: any type of thorn bush or shrub

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞青蛙。无尾两栖动物，身体采蹲坐姿势，皮肤湿润光滑，长后腿用于跳跃；身长约 70 毫米；棕色或橄榄绿色；蝌蚪长大而成青蛙。frog

Terms.Localization: tailless amphibian with a squat body, moist smooth skin, and long hind legs for jumping; about 70 mm long; brown or olive-green; develops from tadpole; Rana esculenta (Edible frog) or Rana punctata (Spotted frog)

Localization.Gloss: 可憎之物。极其可憎可恶的行为。abomination

Terms.Localization: an act that is utterly detestable and abhorrent

Localization.Gloss: 玷污；亵渎；冒犯。使某事物变成不洁净的、污秽的，或在礼仪上不可接受的。desecrate

Terms.Localization: to cause something to become unclean, profane, or ritually unacceptable

Localization.Gloss: 别西卜（bie xī bǔ），《思》贝耳则步。鬼王别西卜，是魔鬼的名字。Beelzebul

Terms.Localization: the name of the Devil as the prince of the demons

Localization.Gloss: 《现》魔鬼（mo ɡuǐ），《和》彼列（bǐ lie），《思》贝里雅耳。魔鬼撒但或敌基督的称谓。旧约中原称为“匪类”（士20:13），在两约中间时期，犹太启示文学中逐渐指撒但，保罗在新约中按此意使用。Beliar

Terms.Localization: a name given to the Devil or to the Antichrist

Localization.Gloss: 针。细长的缝纫工具，一端是尖的，另一端有穿线的孔，用来把线穿过布料。needle

Terms.Localization: a small, slender tool, pointed on one end and with a hole at the other end, used in passing thread through cloth in sewing

Localization.Gloss: 便雅悯；《思》本雅明。雅各的小儿子，是便雅悯支族的先祖。Benjamin

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 《现》贝妮丝（bei nī sī），《和》百妮基（bǎi nī jī），《旧》百尼基，《思》贝勒尼切。希律亚基帕一世的女儿，约生于公元28年。她与兄弟亚基帕二世发生乱伦关系。Bernice

Terms.Localization: the daughter of Herod Agrippa I and sister of Herod Agrippa II

Localization.Gloss: 庇哩亚人（bi lǐ ya ren），《思》贝洛雅人。庇哩亚本地人；出生或居住在庇哩亚的人。Berean

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Berea

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不敬虔的人，荒唐的，贪恋世俗的。指世俗的，意思是贪恋世界或不敬上帝。profane; irreligious (person)

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being profane in the sense of worldly or godless

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞箭；标枪。尖头的细直竿；（箭）可以用弓或（标枪）用手来推动；用作打猎或打仗的武器。arrow; dart

Terms.Localization: thin straight rod with a sharp point; may be propelled by a bow (arrow) or by hand (dart); used as a weapon in hunting or battle

Localization.Gloss: 庇哩亚（bi lǐ ya），《思》贝洛雅。马其顿的一个小城，在今希腊境内，是保罗与西拉曾到之地。Berea

Terms.Localization: a city in Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 伯大尼（bo da ni），《思》伯达尼。约旦河东面的一处地方，约翰曾在那里施洗。Bethany

Terms.Localization: a place on the east side of the Jordan where John baptized

Localization.Gloss: 伯大尼（bo da ni），《思》伯达尼。耶路撒冷城外的一个乡镇，在橄榄山东南坡，是通往耶利哥城的必经之地。Bethany

Terms.Localization: a village on the Mount of Olives

Localization.Gloss: 毕士大（bi shi da），《思》贝特匝达。耶路撒冷东北面、羊门附近的一个水池，池边有五个走廊，能容纳大量群众。传说天使会按时搅动池水，这时第一个下水的人，无论患什么病都会得着痊愈，所以那里躺着很多病人。Bethzatha

Terms.Localization: a pool in the northeast part of Old Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 伯利恒（bo li heng），《思》白冷。字面意思是“粮食之家”，是一个山区小镇，位于耶路撒冷南方约8公里处。Bethlehem

Terms.Localization: a town south of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 伯赛大（bo sai da），《思》贝特赛达。字面的意思是“渔乡”。新约时代，它是加利利北岸的一座城；该城的西侧有约旦河流入加利利海。Bethsaida

Terms.Localization: a place northeast of the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 伯法其（bo fǎ qi），《思》贝特法革。耶路撒冷附近的一个村庄，可能在伯大尼以东；是耶路撒冷通往耶利哥的必经之地。Bethphage

Terms.Localization: a village near Jerusalem, perhaps east of Bethany

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞审判台，法庭。有台阶的高台，通常有座位；官员用这种高台向群众讲话，一般涉及司法事务，尤其是审判。judgement seat

Terms.Localization: a raised platform mounted by steps and usually furnished with a seat; used by officials to address an assembly, often on judicial matters, with a focus on judgement

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小书卷。从 βιβλίον[a] 衍生出来的指小词，指小尺寸的卷轴。small scroll

Terms.Localization: a diminutive derivative of βιβλίον[a], thus, a scroll of small size

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞书册；卷轴；文书。以卷轴或书册展现的文件。scroll; roll; book

Terms.Localization: a document in the form of a scroll or book

Localization.Gloss: 庇推尼（bi tuī ni），《思》彼提尼雅。小亚细亚北面的一个省。Bithynia

Terms.Localization: a province in northern Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞度日子，生活。行事为人，焦点放在日常的活动上。live

Terms.Localization: to conduct oneself, with focus upon everyday activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞今生的（事情）。与日常生活或生存有关的。(things of) of this life

Terms.Localization: pertaining to daily life or existence

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞书册；卷轴；文书。以卷轴或书册展现的文件。scroll; roll; book

Terms.Localization: a document in the form of a scroll or book

Localization.Gloss: 财产；产业。人赖以维生的资源。property; means

Terms.Localization: the resources which one has as a means of living

Localization.Gloss: 日常生活。行事为人，焦点放在日常的活动上。daily life

Terms.Localization: a person's conduct, with a focus upon everyday activity

Localization.Gloss: 生活，生存。一个人生存的时间长度。life, existence

Terms.Localization: the span of a person's existence

Localization.Gloss: 生活方式，行为。行事为人，焦点放在日常的活动上。manner of life, conduct, way of living

Terms.Localization: a person's conduct, with a focus upon everyday activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞亵渎；毁谤，侮辱。说别人的坏话，藉以伤害或毁坏其名誉（可以是针对人或针对神明）。blaspheme; revile; defame

Terms.Localization: to speak against someone in such a way as to harm or injure his or her reputation (occurring in relation to persons as well as to divine beings)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞亵渎；毁谤，侮辱。说别人坏话的行为，藉以伤害或毁坏其名誉（可以是针对人或针对神明）slander; blasphemy

Terms.Localization: the act of speaking against someone in such a way as to harm or injure his or her reputation (occurring in relation to persons as well as to divine beings)

Localization.Gloss: 伯拉斯都（bo lā sī dū），《思》布拉斯托。希律王亚基帕一世的宫廷总管，泰尔和西顿的人托他向王求和。Blastus

Terms.Localization: a court official of Herod Agrippa I

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞亵渎的，诽谤的；亵渎者，诽谤者。指具有侮辱性和诽谤性；诽谤某人或某事的人。blasphemous, slanderous; blasphemer, slanderer

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being insulting and slanderous; a person who defames someone or something

Localization.Gloss: 半尼其（ban ni qi），《思》波纳尔革。耶稣给西庇太的儿子雅各和约翰取的绰号，意思是“雷霆之子”，可能是因为他们性情暴烈。Boanerges; Sons of Thunder

Terms.Localization: a nickname given by Jesus to the sons of Zebedee

Localization.Gloss: 比珥（bǐ ěr），《思》贝敖尔。先知巴兰的父亲（民22.5）。Beor; Bosor

Terms.Localization: the father of Balaam (Numbers 22.5)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞植物，草。任何细小的绿色植物（在通用希腊化时期的希腊文中，这词往往指那些用作动物饲料的植物）。plant; grass

Terms.Localization: any of the smaller green plants (in Hellenistic Greek often used in contexts referring to plants as fodder for animals)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞或＜阴＞公牛，母牛，牛。牛的通用词；可指雄性或雌性。bull; ox; cow; cattle

Terms.Localization: general word for individual cattle; may be male or female

Localization.Gloss: 波阿斯（bō ā sī），《思》波阿次。耶稣家谱中的一员；伯利恒城的财主，拿俄米的丈夫以利米勒的亲族。他尽了亲属的本分，娶路得为妻，为她死去的丈夫留名。他和路得所生的儿子俄备得成为大卫的祖父。Boaz

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞葡萄，葡萄串。葡萄树的果子。grape; bunch of grapes

Terms.Localization: the fruit of grapevines

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞硝皮匠；皮革匠；皮匠。鞣兽皮以制作皮革的人。tanner; maker of leather

Terms.Localization: one who tans hides to make leather

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞细麻布的。（βύσσος“细麻布”的衍生词）用亚麻布制成的布匹。cloth of fine linen

Terms.Localization: (derivative of βύσσος fine linen) cloth consisting of fine linen

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞细麻布。一种用亚麻植物的茎制成的高品质布料，以其坚韧耐磨和凉爽而闻名。fine linen

Terms.Localization: a high quality cloth made from the stems of the flax plant, known for its strength and coolness

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞祭坛。有底座的祭坛。altar

Terms.Localization: an altar with a base or pedestal

Localization.Gloss: 《现》加巴大（jiā bā da），《和》厄巴大（e bā da），《思》加巴达。亚兰名字，意思是“石砌阶”（《和》称之为“铺华石处”），指彼拉多府邸外一片铺石的区域，是耶稣接受公开审讯的地方。Gabbatha

Terms.Localization: the Aramaic name for a paved area outside the residence of Pontius Pilate and the setting for the public trial of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 加百列（jiā bǎi lie），《思》加俾额尔。犹太教传统的天使长之一。加百列在旧约中两次向但以理讲解异象，在新约中则宣布施洗约翰和耶稣的诞生。Gabriel

Terms.Localization: an archangel

Localization.Gloss: 加大拉人（jiā da lā ren），《思》加达辣人。出生或居住在加大拉的人；加大拉是加利利湖东岸的城镇，另称“格拉森”。Gadarene

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Gadara

Localization.Gloss: 奉献箱。用以投放奉献的大箱子。offering box

Terms.Localization: a large box in which offerings were placed

Localization.Gloss: 库房；圣殿库房。圣殿当中用作库房的房间。treasury, Temple treasury

Terms.Localization: a room in the Temple used as a treasury

Localization.Gloss: 加拉太的（jiā lā tai）；《思》迦拉达的。与加拉太相关的。Galatian

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Galatia

Localization.Gloss: 加拉太（jiā lā tai），《思》迦拉达。罗马帝国亚细亚省的一个地区，在现今的土耳其境内，省内有一些重要的城市，例如彼西底的安提阿、以哥念、特庇、路司得等。Galatia

Terms.Localization: a district in the Roman province of Asia

Localization.Gloss: 加拉太人（jiā lā tai ren），《思》迦拉达人。出生或居住在加拉太的人。Galatian

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Galatia

Localization.Gloss: 加利利（jiā li li），《思》加里肋亚。巴勒斯坦北部的一个地区，罗马帝国的一省。在新约时代，加利利属于罗马帝国叙利亚省的一区。Galilee

Terms.Localization: a district in the northern part of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: 《现》加利利湖（jiā li li hu），《和》加利利海，《思》加里肋亚海。位于加利利境内、约旦河流域的一个内陆淡水湖，又称为“革尼撒勒湖”或“提比哩亚海”，旧约时代称为“基尼烈海”。Galilee

Terms.Localization: the Lake of Galilee, also called Tiberias and Gennesaret

Localization.Gloss: 加利利人（jiā li li ren），《思》加里肋亚人。居住或出生于加利利地区的人。Galilean

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 迦流（jiā liu），《思》加里雍。罗马帝国派驻亚该亚省的总督（《和》译作“方伯”）。Gallio

Terms.Localization: a Roman proconsul of Achaia

Localization.Gloss: 迦玛列（jiā mǎ lie），《思》加玛里耳。他是法利赛人，希列的孙子，耶路撒冷公会的议员，精通犹太律法，也是保罗的老师。Gamaliel

Terms.Localization: a renowned Pharisee in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 好吃懒做，又馋又懒，贪口腹的懒汉。字面意思：懒惰的胃；因而指：只对食物感兴趣的懒人。lazy gluttons

Terms.Localization: literally: "lazy stomachs"; hence: lazy people who are only interested in food

Localization.Gloss: 迦得（jiā de），《思》加得。雅各的第七子，是他和利亚的女仆悉帕所生的儿子，是迦得支族（Gadites）的先祖，其后裔居住在约旦河东的地方。Gad

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 迦萨（jiā sa），《思》迦萨。巴勒斯坦西南部的城镇，在通往埃及的一条要道上、希伯仑以西，距离地中海海岸大约5公里，是迦南地的南界。Gaza

Terms.Localization: a city in southwest Palestine on a principal road to Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 结婚礼堂。比较大的房间，常常用作婚礼场地。wedding hall

Terms.Localization: a relatively large room, often serving as a place for a wedding

Localization.Gloss: 该犹（gāi you）；《思》加约。跟随保罗旅行传道的马其顿人。Gaius

Terms.Localization: a Macedonian companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 该犹（gāi you），《思》加约。跟随保罗旅行传道的特庇人。Gaius

Terms.Localization: a Christian from Derbe

Localization.Gloss: 该犹（gāi you），《思》加约。接受保罗施洗的一个哥林多基督徒，当地教会在他家中聚会；他也是在保罗撰写《罗马书》期间接待保罗的人。Gaius

Terms.Localization: a man from Corinth who was baptized by Paul

Localization.Gloss: 该犹（gāi you），《思》加约。《约翰三书》的收信人，作者称他按真理而行，忠心接待客旅。Gaius

Terms.Localization: the recipient of 3 John

Localization.Gloss: 基甸（jī dian），《思》基德红。以色列的士师，约阿施的儿子，另称“耶路巴力”或“耶路比设”。Gideon

Terms.Localization: a military leader and hero of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 客西马尼（ke xī mǎ ni），《思》革责玛尼。橄榄山上的一个园子，在耶路撒冷汲沦溪的对面，确切位置不详。Gethsemane

Terms.Localization: a garden at the foot of the Mount of Olives

Localization.Gloss: 革尼撒勒（ge ni sā le），《思》革乃撒勒。迦百农以南一块肥沃的平原。Gennesaret

Terms.Localization: a fertile plain south of Capernaum

Localization.Gloss: 革尼撒勒湖（ge ni sā le hu），《思》革乃撒勒湖。“加利利海”的别称，因靠近革尼撒勒城而得名，亦名“基尼烈海”或“提比哩亚海”。Gennesaret

Terms.Localization: a name for the Lake of Galilee, also called the Lake of Tiberias

Localization.Gloss: 格拉森人（ge lā sēn ren），《思》革辣撒人。居住或出生于格拉森的人。格拉森是约旦河东、加利利湖东岸的城镇，另称“加大拉”（Gadara）。Gerasene

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Gerasa, a city in Peraea, east of the Jordan

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞地狱；欣嫩子谷。惩罚死人的地方。Gehenna, hell

Terms.Localization: a place of punishment for the dead

Localization.Gloss: 陆地；土地；地面；大地。人类居住的地面，对比于上面的天空和下面的世界。land; soil; ground; earth

Terms.Localization: the surface of the earth as the dwelling place of mankind, in contrast with the heavens above and the world below the surface

Localization.Gloss: 陆地。旱地，对比于海。land

Terms.Localization: dry land, in contrast with the sea

Localization.Gloss: 泥土；土地。用于种植的土壤、植物生长的土地或人脚下的自然表面。soil, ground

Terms.Localization: soil for planting, or ground for plants, or the natural surface beneath one's feet

Localization.Gloss: 区域，领土，土地。地上某个或某些地区，通常与某一民族或地理中心有关，但不一定构成政府的行政单位。region, territory, land

Terms.Localization: region or regions of the earth, normally in relation to some ethnic group or geographical center, but not necessarily constituting a unit of governmental administration

Localization.Gloss: 甜酒。发酵过程中一种新的甜酒。sweet wine

Terms.Localization: a new, sweet wine in process of fermentation

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞钱箱。存放金钱的盒子。money box

Terms.Localization: a box in which money was kept

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞真正地，真实地。形容拥有传闻中的良好品格或素质的。genuinely, truly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to possessing purported good character or quality

Localization.Gloss: 各各他（ge ge tā），《思》哥耳哥达。亚兰名称，意思是“髑髅地”，耶路撒冷城外的一处山丘地，是处决死囚的地方，其确切位置有很多不同的传统说法。Golgotha

Terms.Localization: the Aramaic name of a hill near Jerusalem where executions took place

Localization.Gloss: 蛾摩拉（e mo lā），《思》哈摩辣。位于死海南面的一个城，因罪恶盈贯被上帝毁灭。Gomorrah

Terms.Localization: a city located at the southern part of the Dead Sea and destroyed because of its evil

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞学者，经学教师；精通摩西律法的人。在某类文学或学科领域受过高等教育的人，包括犹太律法（圣经正典及律法传统）。scholar, teacher; expert in the Law (traditionally: scribe)

Terms.Localization: a person who has acquired a high level of education in a certain body of literature or discipline, including Jewish law (both canonical and traditional laws and regulations)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞书记。负责城镇或城市记录的市政官员，显然对维护法律和秩序也有一定的责任。town clerk

Terms.Localization: a city official with responsibility for the records of a town or city and apparently certain responsibilities for maintaining law and order

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞经文（单数），旧约圣经（复数）。＜阴＞经文。《旧约》或《旧约》的某个段落。Scripture, Scripture passage

Terms.Localization: the writings of the OT, or a particular passage of the OT

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞字母，文字；写作；圣经；信件。任何一种书面文件，无论是书还是手稿，焦点在于其内容；写给一人或多人的、包含文字的物件。letter; writing; Scripture

Terms.Localization: any kind of written document, whether in book or manuscript form, with focus upon the content; an object containing writing addressed to one or more persons

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞写；记录；著作。用钢笔或类似的工具，和墨或类似的材料，在纸张等平面上标记字母、数字或词语。write

Terms.Localization: to mark letters, numbers, or words on a surface such as paper, using a pen or similar instrument and ink or similar material

Localization.Gloss: 歌革（gē ge），《思》哥格。一个神秘的名字，用来指明一个将被弥赛亚征服的敌人；这名字含有隐意，先知以西结预言歌革要领导北方的侵略者来攻击以色列，但她的力量敌不过有上帝保护的以色列。在历史上，我们无法确定歌革是何者，只视她为敌对上帝和逼迫以色列选民的恶势力。Gog

Terms.Localization: a cryptic name to designate an enemy to be conquered by the Messiah

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞属恶魔的；邪恶的。与恶魔有关的。demonic, devilish

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a demon

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞被邪灵附身。被魔鬼附身和控制。be demon possessed

Terms.Localization: to be possessed by a demon

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鬼，邪灵；鬼神。邪恶的超自然生物或灵体。demon, evil spirit

Terms.Localization: an evil supernatural being or spirit

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞鬼，邪灵。邪恶的超自然生物或灵体。demon, evil spirit

Terms.Localization: an evil supernatural being or spirit

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞戒指。指环，通常用金或银制成，一般刻有物主的印章，用来标记所有权以及在公文上盖章。ring

Terms.Localization: a ring for the finger, normally made of gold or silver and usually containing the signet of the owner by which he could mark ownership and seal documents

Localization.Gloss: 大玛努他（da mǎ nǔ tā），《思》达玛奴达。靠近加利利湖西岸的一个地方，地点不能确定。Dalmanutha

Terms.Localization: a place of uncertain location near the western shore of the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 挞马太（ta mǎ tai），《思》达耳玛提雅。以利哩古南部；罗马帝国的一省，在今日的南斯拉夫、阿尔巴尼亚的北部，亚底亚海东岸的一个地区。Dalmatia

Terms.Localization: the southern part of Illyricum

Localization.Gloss: 《和》大马士革（da mǎ shi ge）人，《旧》大马色人，《思》大马士革人，《现》没有把这词译出。在大马士革居住或出生的人。Damascene

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Damascus

Localization.Gloss: 大马士革（da mǎ shi ge），《旧》大马色，《思》大马士革。叙利亚的首府；在新约时代，大马士革属于罗马的叙利亚省。Damascus

Terms.Localization: the capital of Syria

Localization.Gloss: 但以理（dan yǐ lǐ），《思》达尼尔。旧约一位大先知，其名字的意义是“上帝是我的审判”。Daniel

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 大卫（da wei），《思》达味。以色列的第二位君王，耶稣基督的先祖，其名字的意义是“所爱的”。David

Terms.Localization: a king of Israel and an ancestor in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞小母牛。雌性牛犊。heifer

Terms.Localization: the young female of cattle

Localization.Gloss: 大马哩（da mǎ lǐ），《思》达玛黎。听保罗讲道后信主的一个雅典妇人。Damaris

Terms.Localization: an Athenian woman converted by Paul

Localization.Gloss: 《现》十邑（shi yi），《和》低加坡里（dī jiā pō lĭ），《旧》低加波利，《思》十城区。这是罗马帝国的行政区，位于约旦河东，由十个希腊文化城市组成。主要的城市有希波斯、西古提波利、大马士革、加大拉等。Decapolis

Terms.Localization: a league of ten cities in a region east of the Jordan

Localization.Gloss: 特庇人（te bi ren），《思》德尔贝人。居住在或出生于特庇的人。Derbe

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Derbe

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞皮革的。（δέρμα“皮”的衍生词）指用毛皮或皮革制作的。leather; of leather

Terms.Localization: (derivative of δέρμα skin) pertaining to being made of skin or leather

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞捆锁；锁链；脚镣。任何捆绑的工具或途径。bonds; chains; fetters

Terms.Localization: any instrument or means of binding or tying

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞监牢。拘留囚犯的地方。jail; prison

Terms.Localization: a place of detention

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞祈求；请求；祷告。基于假定的需求而进行紧急请求的行为。prayer; supplication; petition

Terms.Localization: the act of asking with urgency based on presumed need

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞树；灌木。任何一种相对较大的木质植物。tree; bush

Terms.Localization: any kind of relatively large woody plant

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞要求，乞求；祈求；恳求。迫切地求，暗示有假定的需要。ask, beg; pray

Terms.Localization: to ask for with urgency, with the implication of presumed need

Localization.Gloss: 特庇（te bi），《思》德尔贝。在吕高尼境内，位于大数以西、小亚细亚中部、加拉太省边境上的一个城。Derbe

Terms.Localization: a city in Lycaonia

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞皮；兽皮；皮革。动物的皮，通常包括附着的毛发，有时会用鞣酸来处理。skin; hide

Terms.Localization: skin of an animal, normally including attached hair and sometimes tanned

Localization.Gloss: 底马（dǐ mǎ），《思》德玛斯。原是保罗的同工，后来因“贪爱现今的世界”而跟保罗分手，到帖撒罗尼迦去。Demas

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 《现》底米特（dĭ mĭ te），《和》底米丢（dǐ mǐ diū），《思》德默特琉。在以弗所制造亚底米女神庙模型的银匠。Demetrius

Terms.Localization: a silversmith in Ephesus

Localization.Gloss: 《现》底米特（dĭ mĭ te），《和》低米丢（dī mǐ diū），《思》德默特琉。一个热心行善的基督徒，也是教会领袖。Demetrius

Terms.Localization: a church leader

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞得拿利；一钱银子。一种罗马银币，约值一般工人一天的工资。denarius

Terms.Localization: a Roman silver coin equivalent to a days wage of a common laborer

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞详细审查；决定，判决。获得准确和全面的信息；对法律事务作出判断，带有彻底审查的含义。examine thoroughly; determine, decide a case

Terms.Localization: to obtain accurate and thorough information about; to make a judgment on legal matters, with the implication of thorough examination

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞约，契约；＜复＞契约条文或单指契约。两人或两方之间协议的口头内容，指明相互的利益和责任。covenant

Terms.Localization: the verbal content of an agreement between two persons or parties specifying reciprocal benefits and responsibilities

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞扬净，打扫干净。彻底清理或清洁。clean out

Terms.Localization: to clean out or to clean off thoroughly

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞扬净，打扫干净。彻底清理或清洁。clean out

Terms.Localization: to clean out or to clean off thoroughly

Localization.Gloss: 服事，服务，照顾，管理；服事的人，执事。通过提供服事来照顾；提供食物和饮料；以特别的方式事奉上帝。serve, care for, administer; one who serves, minister

Terms.Localization: to take care of by rendering service to; to serve food or drink; to serve God in some special way

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞服侍，服务；贡献，帮助，支持；宣教事工；事奉。服侍的角色或位置；照顾人们的需要的行为。service; ministry; support

Terms.Localization: the role or position of serving; act of taking care of the needs of people

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞辨认，分辨，区别；疑惑，动摇，犹豫。判断为有分别或区别。discern, distinguish; doubt, waver, hesitate

Terms.Localization: to judge that there is a difference or distinction

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞和解；和好；与……讲和。在与某人争执或决裂后，重新建立友好的人际关系。be reconciled

Terms.Localization: to reestablish friendly interpersonal relations with someone after a dispute or rupture

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞声明，坚称，作证；郑重劝告；警告；坚持。基于假定的个人知识作出严肃的声明；针对将来发生的事情或行动进行告诫或指导，暗示出于个人的知识或经验；以加强的语气说出观点或愿望。declare, assert, charge under solemn oath; warn; insist

Terms.Localization: to make a serious declaration on the basis of presumed personal knowledge; to admonish or instruct with regard to some future happening or action, with the implication of personal knowledge or experience; to be emphatic in stating an opinion or desire

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞拯救，救援；医治，治愈，使痊愈，救治。从危险，包括疾病中完全解救出来；save; cure

Terms.Localization: to rescue completely from danger, including illness

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞保护，保障安全。保护某物以保证其安全或免受伤害。protect, keep safe

Terms.Localization: to guard or protect something in order to keep it safe or free from harm

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞魔鬼。邪恶超自然生物的首脑；有许多魔鬼撒但的特征的邪恶的人。devil

Terms.Localization: the principal supernatural evil being (with article); a wicked person who has a number of characteristics typical of the Devil

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞诽谤者；好说闲话的，散播谣言的，搬弄是非的。（διαβάλλω“诽谤”的衍生词）爱诽谤别人的人；与诽谤者有关的。slanderer; slanderous

Terms.Localization: (derivative of διαβάλλω to slander) one who engages in slander; pertaining to slander

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞断定，审判。对法律事务作出判断，带有彻底审查的含义。decision, verdict

Terms.Localization: the act of making a judgment on legal matters, with the implication of thorough examination

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞王冠，冠冕。一种王冠，用以象征在某个特定地区的最高统治权，因此往往令人联想到王权。diadem crown

Terms.Localization: a type of crown employed as a symbol of the highest ruling power in a particular area and therefore often associated with kingship

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞或＜阴＞仆人，佣人；执事；服侍者。担任执事的人，负责照顾信徒的需要。servant; deacon; minister

Terms.Localization: one who serves as a deacon, with responsibility to care for the needs of believers

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞辨别的能力；分辨；主张。评估和判断的能力。discernment; distinguishing; opinion

Terms.Localization: the ability to evaluate and judge

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞心思，理智；思想；计谋；意念。理解、推理、思考和决定的心理能力；思考和推理的内容。mind; understanding; thoughts

Terms.Localization: the psychological faculty of understanding, reasoning, thinking, and deciding; the content of thinking and reasoning

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞公义的审判。正确或公正的裁决或审判。righteous judgment

Terms.Localization: a right or just verdict or judgment

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞做上帝要求的事，做正确的事；义，公义；使……与上帝和好。做上帝要求的事情或得以与上帝和好。doing what God requires, doing what is right; righteousness, justice; being put right with God

Terms.Localization: the act of doing what God requires or of being put right with God

Localization.Gloss: 恢复正常关系。使某人与另一个人（通常指上帝）保持适当或正确的关系。put right with

Terms.Localization: to cause someone to be in a proper or right relation with someone else (usually God)

Localization.Gloss: 显为公义，证明为公义。证明某事在道德上是正确的。show to be right, prove to be right

Terms.Localization: to demonstrate that something is morally right

Localization.Gloss: 宣判无罪，除去罪名；被判为义；释放，无罪释放。除去过犯；使脱离某种状态或情况的控制，而这些状态或情况涉及道德问题。acquit, remove guilt; release, set free

Terms.Localization: to clear of transgression or cause to be released from some state or situation involving moral issues

Localization.Gloss: 服从义的命令。遵守正义、公正的命令。obey righteous commands

Terms.Localization: to conform to righteous, just commands

Localization.Gloss: 诫命，公义的要求；称义；公义的成为。关于正确或正义行为的规则；符合上帝要求的行为。regulations, just requirements, justification; righteous act

Terms.Localization: a regulation concerning right or just action; an act which is in accordance with what God requires

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞活该的，理所当然的，公正地，正当地。形容是正义的，因为是合理的和应得的。justly; righteously

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being right as the result of being justified and deserved

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞宣判无罪，释放。清除某人的过犯。acquittal, setting free

Terms.Localization: the act of clearing someone of transgression

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞审判者，法官。主持法庭审讯并宣布判决的人。judge

Terms.Localization: one who presides over a court session and pronounces judgment

Localization.Gloss: （现》杜尼修（du ni xiū），《和》丢尼修（diū ni xiū），《思》狄约尼削。雅典人，亚略．巴古议会的成员，听保罗讲道而信主。Dionysius

Terms.Localization: an Athenian and a member of the Areopagus who was converted by Paul

Localization.Gloss: 《现》狄特腓（di te fei），《和》丢特腓（diū te fei），《思》狄约勒斐。想作教会领袖又不行善、在《约翰三书》1:9中受使徒约翰责备的一个基督徒。Diotrephes

Terms.Localization: a Christian who is criticized in 3 John

Localization.Gloss: 《现》双神（shuāng shen），《和》宙斯双子（zhou sī shuāng zǐ），《思》雕斯雇黎。宙斯双子是希腊罗马神话中的双生兄弟卡斯妥和波陆可斯，他们被称为航海者的神明。Twin Brothers

Terms.Localization: a joint name for Castor and Pollux, pagan deities of an Alexandrian ship, meaning heavenly twins

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞圣殿税，丁税。每个犹太男子二十岁以上都需要缴纳的税；用以资助圣殿的运作；字面义是两个希腊银币，约等于两个罗马银币。two-drachma piece; temple tax

Terms.Localization: the tax required of every male Jew from the age of twenty onward; to support the temple

Localization.Gloss: 双胞胎（shuāng bāo tāi），《和》低土马（dī tŭ mă），《思》狄狄摩。是使徒多马的希腊名字。Didymus

Terms.Localization: the Greek name of the apostle Thomas (93.155)

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞公义的，公正的；与……有正确的关系。与上帝的要求相符或与某人（通常指上帝）有正确的关系。just, righteous; being right with

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being in accordance with what God requires or being in a right relationship with someone (usually God)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞天理（上天的公理）；天理（女神）。根据应得的基础施行奖赏或惩罚；希腊神话中的正义女神，她找到有罪者并加以惩罚。justice; (the goddess) Justice

Terms.Localization: reward or punishment on the basis of what is rightly deserved; the goddess who delivers such action in seeking out and punishing the guilty

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞网；渔网。指任何一种网，但在《新约》只用来指捕鱼的网。net; fishnet

Terms.Localization: any kind of net, but in the NT referring only to nets used for catching fish

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞一口两舌的，不诚实的，假冒为善的。形容基于伪装或伪善的矛盾行为。double-tongued, hypocritical

Terms.Localization: pertaining to contradictory behavior based upon pretense or hypocrisy

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞省察，察验；试验，考验；明辨，洞察；认为对的，认可。尝试通过检验和测试来了解事物的真实程度，通常透过实际使用来进行测试；根据试验而认为某事物是真实的。interpret, examine, test; judge to be genuine, approve

Terms.Localization: to try to learn the genuineness of something by examination and testing, often through actual use; to regard something as genuine on the basis of testing

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞试验，察验，考验；真实，真实的，坚定的。试验以确定某事的真实性；或，经过试验证明是真实的。testing, proving; genuineness

Terms.Localization: the act of testing to determine is something is genuine; or, genuineness on the basis of having been tested

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞大梁，梁木。粗木柱；用来支撑屋顶。beam

Terms.Localization: thick wooden poles; used to support a roof

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞赞美，颂赞；荣耀；尊崇，敬重。说某事异常美好，值得赞美；使某人拥有荣耀；通过尊崇某人而赋予他很高的地位。praise; glorify; honor

Terms.Localization: to speak of something as being unusually fine and deserving honor; to cause someone to have glorious greatness; attribute high status to someone by honoring

Localization.Gloss: 多加（duō jiā），《思》多尔卡。希腊名字，意思是“羚羊”，亚兰名字是“大比大”。一个女基督徒，住在约帕，为人十分慷慨，热心行善。她害病而死，后来经彼得祷告而复活。Dorcas

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman in Joppa who was known for charitable works; meaning gazelle, deer; her Aramaic name was Ταβιθά

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞为服务做好准备。准备好某物或使某物可以用来提供服务。make ready for service

Terms.Localization: to prepare or make something available for service

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞奴役，奴隶。屈从的状态或情况slavery

Terms.Localization: a state or condition of subservience

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞伺候，事奉，服事；作奴隶，受奴役。作某人的 奴隶或仆人而工作；或喻指受某种影响的控制。serve; be enslaved

Terms.Localization: to do work as a slave or servant of someone; or (figuratively) to be under the control of some influence

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞奴役，使…作奴隶。使某人成为奴隶。enslave

Terms.Localization: to cause someone to become a slave

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞婢女，使女，女仆。受约束服务于某人的女性。bondmaid; female slave

Terms.Localization: a woman or girl who is bound in service to someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞奴仆，臣仆，仆人，奴隶。作奴仆有成为主人的财产的含义，但古时候奴仆经常都可以重获自由。slave; servant

Terms.Localization: one who is a slave in the sense of becoming the property of an owner (though in ancient times it was frequently possible for a slave to earn his freedom)

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞作奴仆的，屈从的，受控制。指一种完全受某人或某事控制的状态。subservient to; controlled by

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a state of being completely controlled by someone or something

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞值得称赞的，经得起考验的；被认为是有价值的，可敬的，受尊敬的。根据试验被判断为有价值的。approved; regarded as worthy, respected

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being judged worthy or genuine on the basis of testing

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞荣耀，灿烂，荣华显赫；光荣，明亮，光辉；伟大，荣耀。辉煌的品质、引人注目的外观；明亮或发光的状态；伟大而美妙的状态。glory, splendor; brightness, radiance; greatness

Terms.Localization: the quality of splendid, remarkable appearance; state of brightness or shining; state of being great and wonderful

Localization.Gloss: 荣耀的大能，奇妙的力量；奇妙的存在者。荣耀的能力的超自然彰显。glorious power, amazing might; glorious being

Terms.Localization: a supernatural manifestation of power characterized by glory

Localization.Gloss: 赞美，颂扬；尊荣，尊敬。说某事异常美好，值得赞美；显示尊荣，作为确定某人身分的一个要素。praise; honor, respect

Terms.Localization: the act of speaking of something as being unusually fine and deserving honor; the act of showing honor as an element in the assignment of status to a person

Localization.Gloss: 银币（音译：德拉克马）。希腊银币，价值与罗马钱币得拿利大致相同。drachma

Terms.Localization: a Greek silver coin with approximately the same value as the denarius

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞龙。传说中的动物，通常被认为是一种丑陋的翼蛇或蜥蜴。dragon

Terms.Localization: a legendary animal, usually regarded as being a kind of monstrous winged serpent or lizard

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞镰刀。一种大弯刀，用来收割成熟的谷物。sickle

Terms.Localization: a large, curved knife employed in cutting ripe grain

Localization.Gloss: 土西拉（tǔ xī lā），《思》得鲁息拉。希律亚基帕一世的小女儿，犹太巡抚腓力斯的妻子，圣经称她为“犹太的女子”。据历史学家约瑟夫的记载，她大约生于公元38年，腓力斯是她第二任丈夫。Drusilla

Terms.Localization: the youngest daughter of Herod Agrippa I who was married to Felix the procurator

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞重要的，有影响力的人。重要人士，基于他们的权力或影响力。prominent man

Terms.Localization: important person, based upon power or influence

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞统治者；主宰；高级官员。处于指挥别人的权威地位的人。ruler; court official; sovereign

Terms.Localization: one who is in a position of authority to command others

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞中伤，毁谤，侮辱。使人得着坏名声。defame, slander

Terms.Localization: to attribute ill repute or bad reputation to

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞大能的作为；神迹，奇事。大能、奇妙的作为。mighty work; miracle

Terms.Localization: act of power, miracle

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞能力；权能，大能，力量；统治者，有能者。做某一特定活动或经历一些事情的能力；在执行某种功能时施加力量的潜力。ability; power; ruler

Terms.Localization: the ability to perform a particular activity or to undergo some experience; the potential to exert force in performing some function

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞屋顶。平顶房屋的屋顶。housetop

Terms.Localization: the area on the top of a flat-roof house

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞礼物；供物，祭物；捐款，所赐的。所给或授予的东西。gift, offering

Terms.Localization: that which is given or granted

Localization.Gloss: 希伯来语（xī bo lai yǔ），《思》希伯来话。以色列的通用语言。希伯来语是以色列人在旧约时代所用的语言，属于西北闪族语系的一支，与古代乌加列、腓尼基等语言关系密切。传统希伯来字体包括22个辅音字母，书写方向是从右至左。Hebrew (language)

Terms.Localization: language of the Hebrews Hebrew language

Localization.Gloss: 希伯来人（xī bo lai ren），《思》希伯来人。圣经中的民族犹太人最古老的种族名称，原文字义是“从那方来的”，指亚伯拉罕从迦南的东方过来。在旧约里，希伯来人是以色列人的另一个名称，圣经用这词来形容亚伯拉罕和经以撒及雅各而出的后裔。《现》在徒6.1 译作“希伯来土话的犹太人”。Hebrew (person)

Terms.Localization: the oldest ethnic name for a Jew or the Jewish people

Localization.Gloss: 希伯来话（xī bo lai hua），《思》希伯来话。以色列的通用语言，希伯来文原是以色列人在旧约时代所用的语言，属于西北闪族语系的一支，与古代乌加列、腓尼基等语言关系密切。传统希伯来字体包括22个辅音字母，书写方向是从右至左。in Hebrew

Terms.Localization: expressed in the Hebrew language, in Hebrew

Localization.Gloss: ＜主动＞（死而）复活；＜被动＞使复活，使活过来。使人死而复活。act.: raise (from the dead); pass.: be raised (from the dead)

Terms.Localization: cause someone who is dead to come back to life

Localization.Gloss: 擦上；涂抹。擦上、涂抹药膏或油之类的物质。rub on

Terms.Localization: to smear or rub on substances such as salve or oil ‎

Localization.Gloss: 希西家（xī xī jiā），《思》希则克雅。耶稣家谱中的一员。南国犹大的王，公元前715至687年统治犹大国，在耶路撒冷作王29年。Hezekiah

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞自定的宗教；自己想出来的宗教；随己意敬拜。出于某人自己的愿望和意念的一套宗教信念和做法。self-imposed religion, self-created religion

Terms.Localization: a set of religious beliefs and practices resulting from one's own desires and initiative

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞异教徒的，不信上帝的，外邦人的。指不是犹太人的人。Gentile, heathen, pagan

Terms.Localization: pertaining to one who is not a Jew

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞偶像的庙。安放偶像的庙宇或圣所。temple of an idol

Terms.Localization: a temple or sanctuary which houses an idol

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞拜偶像的事。敬拜偶像。idolatry

Terms.Localization: the worship of idols

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞拜偶像的人。idolater

Terms.Localization: a person who worships idols

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞祭过偶像的肉。献祭给偶像的动物的肉。sacrificial meat

Terms.Localization: the meat of animals sacrificed to idols

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞像，形像。造成人、神明、动物等形象的物件（不一定是立体的）。likeness; image

Terms.Localization: an object (not necessarily three-dimensional) which has been formed to resemble a person, god, animal, etc.

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞纯洁的；真诚的；诚实的。形容真诚，意即动机纯洁。pure; sincere

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being sincere in the sense of having pure motivation

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞和平相处，和睦。与别人和平相处。be at peace; live in peace

Terms.Localization: to live in peace with others

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞平安的，和平的；爱好和平的。从焦虑和内心混乱中解脱出来的。peaceful; peace-loving

Terms.Localization: pertaining to freedom from anxiety and inner turmoil

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞成就和平。使人处于和平或和解的状态。make peace

Terms.Localization: to cause a state of peace or reconciliation between persons

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞使人和睦的人，促进和平的人。使人与人之间恢复和平的人。peacemaker

Terms.Localization: a person who restores peace between people

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞和平，平安，和睦；安全。和平、安宁的有利环境；从焦虑中解脱出来。peace

Terms.Localization: a set of favorable circumstances involving peace and tranquility, freedom from anxiety

Localization.Id: εἰς αἰῶνα, εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα, εἰς τοὺς αἰῶνας, εἰς ἡμέραν αἰῶνος, εἰς τοὺς αἰῶνας τῶν αἰώνων, εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα τοῦ αἰῶνος, εἰς αἰῶνας αἰώνων, εἰς πάντας τοῦ αἰῶνας, τοῦ αἰῶνος τῶν αἰώνων
Localization.Gloss: 时常，永远，永恒。无限的时间，特别聚焦于未来。always; forever; forever and ever; eternally

Terms.Localization: unlimited duration of time, with particular focus upon the future

Localization.Gloss: 落空的，徒然的。指完全没有目的。in vain

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being totally without purpose

Localization.Gloss: 带入；使，带进，导致。搬运或携带物件进入某个地区或建筑物；使某人进入特定的事件或状态。bring in, carry in; cause to, bring in to, lead to

Terms.Localization: carry or bring something into an area or structure; cause someone to enter into a particular event or state

Localization.Gloss: 引起注意，说起。通过言语引起人们的注意，但可能不是以正式或公开的方式。bring to the attention of, speak about to

Terms.Localization: bring something to the attention of people by means of speech, but probably not in a formal or open manner

Localization.Gloss: 在基督里。一种表达。in Christ

Terms.Localization: expression

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞偶像，像，假神。仿照人、动物、神明等造成的物件，是人所敬拜的对象。idol

Terms.Localization: an object which resembles a person, animal, god, etc. and which is an object of worship

Localization.Gloss: 命令，要求。命令式有时具有命令或请求的效果（通常译为“说”、“讲”、“告诉”）。to command, to bid, to request

Terms.Localization: The imperative sometimes has the force of commanding or requesting (usually rendered "say", "speak", "tell")

Localization.Gloss: 百夫长；队长；军官。指挥大约一百个士兵的罗马军官。centurion; captain

Terms.Localization: a Roman officer in command of about one hundred men

Localization.Gloss: 为某人伸冤，公正对待某人；报复，报偿。为受冤枉的人讨回公道。grant justice; avenge

Terms.Localization: to give justice to someone who has been wronged

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞公义；伸冤；惩罚，报应。为受冤枉的人讨回公道的过程；以伤害还伤害，假定最初的伤害是不合理的，因此该受惩罚。justice; vengeance; punishment

Terms.Localization: the process of giving justice to someone who has been wronged; the act of repaying harm with harm, on the assumption that the initial harm was unjustified and that retribution is therefore called for

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞除掉，除净；清理，洁净。除去不洁净的东西，从而使某物变得洁净。purge out; cleanse

Terms.Localization: to make clean by removing that which is unclean

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞教会；会众；大会。基督徒的集会群众，暗示其成员是交流互动的；或，全体基督徒会众。church; assembly; congregation

Terms.Localization: a group of Christians, implying interacting membership; or, the totality of Christian groups

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞被拣选的；精选的，贵重的；杰出的。已被拣选的。chosen; chosen one

Terms.Localization: that which has been chosen or selected

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞拣选，选。从可能的选项中作出选择。choose

Terms.Localization: to make a selection from among possible alternatives

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞拣选；所拣选的人。从可能的选项中作出选择，或，基于显著的偏好而作出特别的选择。selection; elect; election

Terms.Localization: act or result of making a selection from possible alternatives, or of making a special selection based upon significant preference

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞试验，试探；设圈套。通过全面和广泛的试验，尝试了解某人的品格或某事物的性质；试图使某人犯错。put to the test; entrap

Terms.Localization: to try to learn the nature or character of someone or something by submitting such to thorough and extensive testing; to try to cause someone to make a mistake

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞橄榄林；橄榄园。ἐλαία“橄榄树”的衍生词，指种着许多橄榄树的园子或果树园。olive grove; olive orchard

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ἐλαία[a] olive tree) a number of olive trees planted in a garden or grove

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞橄榄树。可以生长至高达十米的树，但通常会修剪到五米左右；叶子表面呈灰绿色，叶底呈白色；橄榄果实长约二厘米，厚约一厘米多一点，果核坚硬，果皮柔软，果肉多油；橄榄果实用作食物，橄榄油用来煮食、点灯、擦身，也可作药用，以及在宗教仪式中使用（抹油）。olive tree

Terms.Localization: tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; fruit of the olive is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than a cm thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and in religion (anointing)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞橄榄。橄榄树的果子。橄榄树的果子；果实长约二厘米，厚约一厘米多一点，果核坚硬，果皮柔软，果肉多油；橄榄果实用作食物，橄榄油用来煮食、点灯、擦身，也可作药用，以及在宗教仪式中使用（抹油）。olive

Terms.Localization: fruit of the olive tree; about 2 cm. long and a bit more than a cm thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and in religion (anointing)

Localization.Gloss: 以拦人（yǐ lan ren），《思》厄蓝人。出生或居住在以拦本地的人。以拦是挪亚的孙子、闪的长子及其后裔的领土，即古代的以拦。Elamite; person from Elam

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Elam

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚撒（yǐ li ya sā），《思》厄肋阿匝尔。耶稣家谱中的一员。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 发怜悯，怜悯，得怜悯。对于有极大需要的人给予怜悯或关怀。have, show, or receive mercy

Terms.Localization: to show kindness or concern for someone in serious need

Localization.Gloss: 可怜的。指值得同情，因为某人的境遇可怜。pitiful; be pitied

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being deserving of pity in view of one's miserable condition

Localization.Gloss: 发怜悯，怜悯，得怜悯。对于有极大需要的人给予怜悯或关怀。have, show, or receive mercy

Terms.Localization: to show kindness or concern for someone in serious need

Localization.Gloss: ＜所有＞仁慈的。对亟需帮助的人表示善意或关心。merciful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to showing kindness or concern for someone in serious need

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚敬（yǐ li ya jing），《思》厄里雅金。《马太福音》记载耶稣家谱中的一员，亚比玉的儿子。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: the son of Abiud in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚敬（yǐ li ya jing），《思》厄里雅金。《路加福音》记载耶稣家谱中的一员，米利亚的儿子。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: the son of Melea in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 以利以谢（yǐ li yǐ xie），《思》厄里厄则尔。《路加福音》记载耶稣家谱中的一员。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 以律（yǐ lǜ），《思》厄里乌得。《马太福音》记载耶稣家谱中的一员。Eliud

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus
