Localization.Gloss: 以利沙（yǐ li shā），《思》厄里叟。沙法的儿子，公元前9世纪北国以色列的先知。他继承以利亚为先知，其传道工作约有50年，历经几朝君王，一生充满神迹。他也是先知团体的领袖。Elisha

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 伊利莎白（yī li shā bai），《旧》以利沙伯，《思》依撒伯尔。施洗约翰的母亲，撒迦利亚的妻子，亦是祭司家亚伦的后裔。Elizabeth

Terms.Localization: the wife of Zechariah the priest and mother of John the Baptist

Localization.Gloss: 希腊（xī la），《思》希腊。欧洲最东南的一个国家。公元前第8世纪开始，由许多城邦组成；到公元前第4世纪，马其顿王腓利浦二世才统一各城邦。腓利浦二世的儿子亚历山大继承王位后，远征埃及、伊朗和印度，建立了希腊帝国。Greece

Terms.Localization: Greece

Localization.Gloss: 希腊人（xī la ren）／说希腊话的犹太人（shuō xī la hua de you tai ren），《思》希腊化的犹太人／希腊人。有犹太血统但住在希腊、受希腊文化影响，又讲希腊话的人，对比于说闪族语言的犹太人。Hellenist; Greek-speaking Jew

Terms.Localization: a Greek-speaking Jew in contrast to one speaking a Semitic language

Localization.Gloss: 希腊（文）（xī la (wen)），《思》希腊（文）。希腊文字；希腊语文。Greek (language)

Terms.Localization: in the Greek language, in Greek

Localization.Gloss: 希腊妇女；异教妇女。承袭希腊文化和语言的女人；引申义：身为希腊人而被视作异教徒的人。Greek woman; Gentile woman

Terms.Localization: a woman of Greek culture and language; or, by extension, a woman who is Greek, therefore a Gentile

Localization.Gloss: 以摩当（yǐ mo dāng），《思》厄耳玛丹。《路加福音》记载耶稣家谱中的一员。Elmadam

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞希望，盼望；指望；仰望。满怀信心地期待那美好和有益的。hope

Terms.Localization: to look forward with confidence to that which is good and beneficial

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞盼望，希望；所希望的。所盼望的。hope; what is hoped for

Terms.Localization: that which is hoped for

Localization.Gloss: 以吕马（yǐ lǚ mǎ），《思》厄吕玛。塞浦路斯的犹太术士，敌挡保罗。这个希腊名字的意思是“术士”，他的犹太名字是“巴耶稣”。Elymas

Terms.Localization: a magician of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: 虚己；自愿放弃一切，放弃自己所拥有的。通过放弃崇高身分或地位的所有特权，来完全除去该身分或地位的全部涵义。give up or lay aside what one possesses

Terms.Localization: to completely remove or eliminate elements of high status or rank by eliminating all privileges or prerogatives associated with such status or rank

Localization.Gloss: 以马内利（yǐ mǎ nei li），《思》厄玛奴耳。希伯来文音译字，意为“上帝与我们同在”，源自旧约以赛亚书的预言，是给耶稣基督的名字。“以马内利”成为了犹太教和基督教信徒的问安语。Emmanuel

Terms.Localization: a name attributed to Jesus Christ

Localization.Gloss: 以马忤斯（yǐ mǎ wǔ sī），《思》厄玛乌。离耶路撒冷不远的一个犹太乡镇。Emmaus

Terms.Localization: a village in Judea, not far from Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 哈抹（hā mo），《思》哈摩尔。示剑的父亲，亚伯拉罕向他的子孙买了一块坟地；示剑人被称为“哈抹的后裔”。Hamor

Terms.Localization: a man from whose sons Abraham bought a burial place

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞水族；鱼。任何活在海里的生物。sea creature; fish

Terms.Localization: any creature living in the sea

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞得荣耀，受尊重。成为得到极大尊荣的对象。be glorified, be honored

Terms.Localization: to be the object of great honor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞建筑材料。建造房屋所用的物料。building material

Terms.Localization: material used in the construction of buildings

Localization.Gloss: 吩咐，命令，嘱付。发出明确的命令，暗示权威或官方的批准。to command

Terms.Localization: to give definite orders, implying authority or official sanction

Localization.Gloss: 诫命，吩咐，命令。权威的命令。commandment, order

Terms.Localization: that which is authoritatively commanded

Localization.Gloss: 以挪士（Yǐ nuo shi）；《思》厄诺士。耶稣家谱中的一员，是塞特的儿子，该南的父亲。Enos

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 以诺（yǐ nuo），《思》哈诺客。耶稣家谱中的一员，是信心与顺服的榜样。亚当的七世孙，雅列之子，玛土撒拉之父。Enoch

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus and an example of obedience and faith

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞买回，救赎，释放。付出高昂的代价以取得某人的释放或自由。redeem; set free

Terms.Localization: to cause the release or freedom of someone by a means which proves costly to the individual causing the release

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞拯救，救拔。从困境中把某人解救出来。rescue, deliver

Terms.Localization: to take someone out of a bad situation

Localization.Gloss: 使复活，使活过来。使人死而复活。raise (from the dead)

Terms.Localization: to cause someone who is dead to return to life

Localization.Gloss: 统治，治理，管辖。藉着行使权力来统治。be in authority; rule

Terms.Localization: to rule or reign by exercising authority over

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞权柄，权利；控制。控制或管治的权柄；控制某人或某事物的状态。authority; control

Terms.Localization: the right to control or govern over; a state of control over someone or something

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞应许；所答应的（事物）；同意或决定，答应。所同意或批准的事情。a promise; agreement

Terms.Localization: the content of one's agreement or approval

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞应许；断言，声称，宣称。肯定地宣布自己将会做的事。to promise; profess

Terms.Localization: to announce with certainty as to what one will do

Localization.Gloss: 以拜尼土（yǐ bai ni tǔ），《思》厄派乃托。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒，他是小亚细亚第一个归信主的人。Epaenetus

Terms.Localization: the first Christian in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 以巴弗（yǐ bā fu），《思》厄帕夫辣。保罗的同工，曾和保罗一起坐牢。他是歌罗西教会的基督徒，在歌罗西、老底嘉和希拉坡里等城市辛劳工作。Epaphras

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Colossae

Localization.Gloss: 以巴弗提（yǐ bā fu ti），《思》厄帕洛狄托。腓立比教会的基督徒。当保罗在罗马坐牢时，腓立比教会派以巴弗提把教会的礼物带给保罗。Epaphroditus

Terms.Localization: a messenger sent to Paul from the Philippian church

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞应许。所应许的事情，承诺了的事情a promise

Terms.Localization: the content of what is promised

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞斗篷，外套，长袍。任何样式的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞温和的，谦让的，和平的。形容仁慈宽容。gentle; forbearing; considerate

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being gracious and forbearing

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞慈祥，宽容，恩惠。仁慈宽容的品格。kindness; forbearance; graciousness

Terms.Localization: the quality of gracious forbearing

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞称呼，命名；祈求，上诉。以一个人的属性来谈及这个人；叫唤名字。call upon, appeal to

Terms.Localization: to use an attribution in speaking of or to a person; to call by name

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞赦免，饶恕。使罪得赦免。forgive

Terms.Localization: to cause sin to be forgiven

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞决定，宣判。在思考的过程中得出结论，因而可以作出决定。decided

Terms.Localization: to come to a conclusion in the process of thinking and thus to be in a position to make a decision

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞渴望；切慕，渴慕。渴望某些东西，暗示意识到有缺乏。long for; desire deeply

Terms.Localization: to long for something, with the implication of recognizing a lack

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞肩负责任的职位；服事的职分。负责照顾某些人的人的职位。position of responsibility; position of service

Terms.Localization: the position of one who has responsibility for the care of someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞权柄，职权。指挥的权力或权柄。authority

Terms.Localization: the right or authority to command

Localization.Gloss: 斥责；责备。表达强烈反对某人。to rebuke, denounce

Terms.Localization: to express strong disapproval of someone

Localization.Gloss: 命令，吩咐，嘱咐。命令某人做某时候，带有威胁的意味。to command

Terms.Localization: to tell someone to do something, with the implication of a threat

Localization.Gloss: 膏抹，涂抹。擦上、涂抹药膏或油之类的物质。anoint

Terms.Localization: to smear or rub on substances such as salve or oil ‎

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞布，补丁。缝在衣服上以遮盖破洞的一块布片。patch

Terms.Localization: a piece of cloth sewed on clothing to repair a hole or tear

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞监督，教会领袖，监护者。有责任去关心别人属灵需要的人；在教会中作领袖的人。guardian, overseer; church leader

Terms.Localization: one who has the responsibility of caring for spiritual concerns; one who serves as a leader in a church

Localization.Gloss: 天上的，天空的；天体。位于天上的或与天空有关的；天空中的发光体：太阳、月亮，以及其他行星和恒星。heavenly body, celestial body

Terms.Localization: related to or located in the sky; the luminous objects in the sky: sun, moon, and other planets and stars

Localization.Gloss: 天上的，在天上，属天的；从天上来的，从上帝来的。与天堂有关的或位于天上的；指源于上帝的。heavenly, in heaven; from heaven, from God

Terms.Localization: related to or located in heaven; pertaining to being derived from God

Localization.Gloss: 小山羊，雄山羊，山羊。单数词是小山羊或雄山羊，复数词是山羊（复数形式的时候，所指的就包括雄性和雌性山羊）。kid; he-goat; goat

Terms.Localization: kid, he-goat in the singular and goats in the plural (in the plural form both male and female goats are included in the reference)

Localization.Gloss: 黑马（Hēi mǎ），《思》赫尔玛。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的基督徒。Hermas

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 希耳米（xī ěr mǐ），《思》赫尔默斯。希腊希腊的神，具有流利的口才，司商业、发明、运动及旅行。Hermes

Terms.Localization: a Greek god

Localization.Gloss: 黑米（hēi mǐ），《思》赫尔默斯。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒。Hermes

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 黑摩其尼（hēi mo qi ni），《思》赫摩革乃。小亚细亚的基督徒领袖。Hermogenes

Terms.Localization: a Christian from Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞爬行动物，爬虫，蛇。creeping animal; reptile; snake

Terms.Localization: general word for reptile that includes snakes and lizards

Localization.Gloss: 问；请求，要求。资料询问；问问题；请求。ask; request

Terms.Localization: ask for information; ask a question; ask for

Localization.Gloss: 衣服；服装。任何种类的衣服。clothing; apparel

Terms.Localization: any kind of clothing

Localization.Gloss: 以斯利（Yǐ sī li），《思》厄斯理。耶稣家谱中的一员。Esli

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 没药调和的酒。加了没药的酒，用作麻醉药。myrrhed wine

Terms.Localization: wine drugged with myrrh and used as a stupefying potion

Localization.Gloss: 没药调和的酒。加了没药的酒，用作麻醉药。myrrhed wine

Terms.Localization: wine drugged with myrrh and used as a stupefying potion

Localization.Gloss: 希斯仑（Xī sī lun）；《思》赫兹龙。耶稣家谱中的一员。Hezron

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞配合错误，不相配者同负一轭。错误地或不协调地联合在一起。be unequally yoked

Terms.Localization: to be wrongly or poorly matched in an association

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞传好消息；传福音。传达关于耶稣的好消息。tell the good news; announce the gospel

Terms.Localization: to communicate the good news about Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞好消息；福音，佳音。关乎耶稣之好消息的内容。good news; gospel

Terms.Localization: the content of good news about Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞鼓起勇气，得到鼓励，保持喜乐。得到鼓励，因此感到高兴。be encouraged, cheerful, happy

Terms.Localization: to be or to become encouraged and hence cheerful

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞直的；正直的，对的。直的，与弯曲的对比；公正的和公义的。straight; upright

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being straight in contrast to what is crooked; pertaining to being just and right

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞公义。正直的品格。righteousness

Terms.Localization: the quality of uprightness

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞祝福，恩待，赐福；颂赞；感谢。祈求上帝给予恩惠，也暗示口头祝福本身已经是一个极大的恩惠。bless (act.); be blessed (pass.); praise, give thanks

Terms.Localization: to ask God to bestow divine favor on, with the implication that the verbal act itself constitutes a significant benefit

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞受祝福的；配受赞美的，受颂赞的。指值得赞扬或表扬的。blessed; worthy of praise

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being worthy of praise or commendation

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞该受称颂的那位。上帝的一个称谓。Blessed One

Terms.Localization: a title that refers to God

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞福气，恩典；颂赞，感谢。祝福的内容。blessing; praise

Terms.Localization: the content of the act of blessing

Localization.Gloss: 友妮基（yǒu nī jī），《旧》友尼基，《思》欧尼刻。提摩太的母亲，本身是犹太人，嫁给了希腊人。Eunice

Terms.Localization: the mother of Timothy

Localization.Gloss: 友阿蝶（yǒu ā die），《旧》友阿爹，《思》厄敖狄雅。腓立比教会的女基督徒，曾在福音的事工上与保罗同工。Euodia

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman in the church of Philippi

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞敬拜。用态度和礼仪来表明自己对神明的效忠和尊敬。to worship

Terms.Localization: to express in attitude and ritual one's allegiance to and regard for deity

Localization.Gloss: 幼发拉底（you fā lā dǐ），《旧》伯拉，《思》幼发拉的。美索不达米亚平原西界的一条大河，是亚洲西部最长的河流，约长2800公里。Euphrates

Terms.Localization: a major river in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞祷告，祈祷。向上帝说话或祈求的行为或内容。prayer

Terms.Localization: the act or content of speaking to or making requests of God

Localization.Gloss: 夏娃（xia wa），《思》厄娃。字音跟希伯来语的“生命”相近，是人类的先祖。Eve

Terms.Localization: ancestor of the human race

Localization.Gloss: 友布罗（yǒu bu luo），《思》欧步罗。罗马的基督徒，保罗在《提摩太后书》中代他向提摩太问安。Eubulus

Terms.Localization: a Christian who sent greetings in 2 Timothy

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞富有同情心的，怜悯的，仁慈的。富有爱心和同情心的。tenderhearted

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being affectionate and compassionate

Localization.Gloss: 犹推古（you tuī gǔ），《思》厄乌提曷。在特罗亚听保罗讲道到半夜的少年人，他打盹的时候从三层楼的高处掉下来死了，后来保罗使他从死里复活。Eutychus

Terms.Localization: a young man who fell out of a window in Troas

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞盼望，愿意；祈求；祷告。向上帝说话或提出请求。to wish; pray

Terms.Localization: to speak to or to make requests of God

Localization.Gloss: 以弗所人（yǐ fu suǒ ren），《思》厄弗所人。以弗所本地的人，在以弗所居住或出生的人；或属于以弗所的人。Ephesian; person from Ephesus

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Ephesus; or: pertaining to Ephesus

Localization.Gloss: 以法莲（yǐ fǎ lian），《思》厄弗辣因。位置不确定的一个城镇。以法莲支族分得的土地，位于耶路撒冷北方的山区，在境内有伯特利、示剑等主要城市。Ephraim

Terms.Localization: a city of uncertain location

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞敌人，仇敌。与人为敌的。enemy

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being at enmity with someone

Localization.Gloss: 希伯（xī bo），《思》厄贝尔。耶稣家谱中的一员。是闪的后代，法勒和约坍的父亲。Eber

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞复活。死而复活。resurrection

Terms.Localization: the event of coming back to life after having once died

Localization.Gloss: 国家，民族，人民。划分全世界的人的最大单位，以他们所构成的社会政治群体为依据。nation; people

Terms.Localization: the largest unit into which the people of the world are divided on the basis of their constituting a socio-political community

Localization.Gloss: 外邦人，异教徒。不相信犹太教的人。Gentiles; heathen

Terms.Localization: those who do not belong to the Jewish community of faith

Localization.Gloss: 橄榄油。从橄榄树果实中提取的油，可用作食物、药物，用来点灯，或混合一些芳香的物质造成香水或香膏。olive oil

Terms.Localization: oil extracted from the fruit of olive trees, used as food; medicine; for burning in lamps; and as perfume when mixed with sweet-smelling substances

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞仁慈，怜悯。对于有极大需要的人给予怜悯或关怀。mercy

Terms.Localization: the act of showing kindness or concern for someone in serious need

Localization.Gloss: 希腊人；异教徒，非犹太人。欧洲东南部的古代民族。一个参与希腊文化并且会说希腊语的人，但不一定是个有希腊民族背景的人；引申义：因身为希腊人而被视作异教徒的人。Greek; Gentile, non-Jew

Terms.Localization: a person who participates in Greek culture and in so doing would speak the Greek language, but not necessarily a person of Greek ethnic background; or, by extension, a person who is Greek, therefore a Gentile

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞应该的，应得的；正义的，公正的。形容是正义的，因为是合理的和应得的。deserved; just

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being right as the result of being justified and deserved

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞荣耀的，荣美的，奇妙的，华丽的；有尊荣的，受敬重的。辉煌的、荣耀的；形容身分地位很高，受人尊崇和敬重。glorious; honorable

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being splendid or glorious; pertaining to high status, involving both honor and respect

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞衣服，服装。任何种类的衣服。clothing; apparel

Terms.Localization: any kind of clothing

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞合法的；在法律之下的，受法律约束的。指依照法律的。lawful; within the law

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being in accordance with law

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞代求，代祷。代表其他人向某人说话。intercession

Terms.Localization: the act of speaking to someone on behalf of someone else

Localization.Gloss: 可能；许可的，准许的，允许的。标记某事件从通常意义上来说有可能发生。be possible; be permissible

Terms.Localization: to mark an event as being possible in a highly generic sense

Localization.Gloss: 合法的。必须履行的；合法的。be lawful

Terms.Localization: to be obligatory or required by law

Localization.Gloss: 宅地；房子；住宅。预期有人居住的物业，居住者具有物业的拥有权，或持有相关的法律契约。homestead; house; residence

Terms.Localization: property in which a person was expected to reside, either as the result of ownership or legal contract

Localization.Gloss: 以拉都（yǐ lā dū），《思》厄辣斯托。保罗的助手，和提摩太一起往马其顿去。Erastus

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 以拉都（yǐ lā dū），《思》厄辣斯托。哥林多城内管银库的基督徒。Erastus

Terms.Localization: a city treasurer

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞小山羊；雄山羊；山羊。单数词是小山羊或雄山羊，复数词所指的就包括雄性和雌性山羊；常用作家庭膳食中肉类。kid; he-goat; goat

Terms.Localization: the young of a goat; kid he-goat in the singular and in the plural both male and female goats are included in the reference; commonly used to supply meat for household meals

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞镜子。高度抛光的平面金属，利用反射作用做成影像。mirror

Terms.Localization: a flat piece of highly polished metal used to reflect an image

Localization.Gloss: 以弗所（yǐ fu suǒ），《思》厄弗所。罗马帝国亚细亚省的一个港口，是最大的城市，为商路的交汇地，当地教会是启示录作者致函的小亚细亚七个教会之一。Ephesus

Terms.Localization: a seaport in the western part of the Roman province of Asia

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞蛇，眼镜蛇，毒蛇。各种有毒的蛇；令人联想到潜伏的危险。asp; cobra; viper

Terms.Localization: a kind of venemous snake; associated with lurking danger

Localization.Gloss: 西布伦（xī bu lun），《思》则步隆。雅各和利亚所生的第六子，以色列其中一个支族的先祖；或：西布伦支族的领地。Zebulun

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe; or: the territory of the tribe of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 撒该（sā gāi），《思》匝凯。耶利哥城一个很有钱的税务长，身材矮小。Zacchaeus

Terms.Localization: a chief tax collector of Jericho

Localization.Gloss: 撒迦利亚（sā jiā li ya），《思》匝加利亚。施洗约翰的父亲，是祭司，热心事奉上帝。Zechariah

Terms.Localization: a priest who was the father of John the Baptist

Localization.Gloss: 撒迦利亚（sā jiā li ya），《思》则加黎雅。旧约时代，犹大王约阿施时期的一个先知（大约在公元前837-800年），是祭司耶何耶大的儿子。约阿施王不欢迎他的信息，于是命令群众在圣殿内用石头打死他。Zechariah

Terms.Localization: an OT prophet killed in the Temple

Localization.Gloss: 谢拉（xie lā），《思》则辣黑。耶稣家谱中的一员，犹大从塔玛生的双生兄弟之一。Zerah

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞（缩写为 ζῶ；＜过未完＞ἔζην）活，活着，生活；复活。活着或继续或者；从死里复活。to live; to come back to life

Terms.Localization: to be or continue to be alive; to come back to life after having once died

Localization.Gloss: 西庇太（xī bi tai），《思》载伯德。耶稣的门徒雅各和约翰的父亲，是一名渔夫。Zebedee

Terms.Localization: the father of the apostles James and John

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞绳子。把物件（通常两件）绑起来的用具。bands

Terms.Localization: an instrument for joining together objects (normally two)

Localization.Gloss: 宙斯（zhou sī），《旧》丢斯，《思》则乌斯。希腊神话中的众神之首。人们视他为雷电之神，负责掌管天气。Zeus

Terms.Localization: the chief Greek deity

Localization.Gloss: 狂热者，热心的人。致力于某事并因此变得热心的人。enthusiast, zealous person

Terms.Localization: one who is deeply committed to something and therefore zealous

Localization.Gloss: 奋锐党，激进党。某个犹太民族主义群体的成员，该群体寻求脱离罗马统治而独立。Zealot

Terms.Localization: a member of a Jewish nationalistic group seeking independence from Rome

Localization.Gloss: 西纳（Xī na），《思》则纳。一位基督徒律师。Zenas

Terms.Localization: a Christian lawyer

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞忌恨；嫉妒。对某人特别强烈的怨恨和嫉妒情绪。resentment; jealousy

Terms.Localization: a particularly strong feeling of resentment and jealousy against someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞极度，激烈，剧烈，烈。在程度量表上的一个高点，暗示涉及强度。extremely, intensely, fierce

Terms.Localization: a high point on a scale of extent and implying intensity of involvement

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞毒麦，稗子（看似麦子）。一种极不受欢迎的野草，它看似麦子，但种子却是有毒的。darnel grass

Terms.Localization: a particularly undesirable weed resembling wheat and possessing a seed which is poisonous

Localization.Gloss: 所罗巴伯（suǒ luo bā bo），《思》则鲁巴贝耳。耶稣家谱中的一员，是被掳归回时期、波斯大利乌王年间（公元前522-486年）的一个犹大省长。他回到耶路撒冷后，和大祭司约书亚一同负责重建圣殿的工作。Zerubbabel

Terms.Localization: a governor in postexilic Jerusalem who was mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞轭。一根横木或一个木框，架在两只役畜头上或颈上，让它们有效地拉动犁、耙，或运货车。yoke

Terms.Localization: a bar or frame of wood by which two draft animals are joined at the head or neck in order to work together effectively in pulling a plow, harrow, or wagon

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞天平。用来称物件的用具。balance scale

Terms.Localization: an instrument for weighing objects

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞生命。区别有生命躯体和死去的尸体的特性或力量。life

Terms.Localization: the quality or force that distinguishes animate bodies from dead ones

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞带；腰带。绑在腰间的皮带或布带，露在衣服外面。belt; girdle

Terms.Localization: a band of leather or cloth worn around the waist outside of one's clothing

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞保全，存活 ；赐给生命。使活着或使继续或者。preserve; give life

Terms.Localization: to cause to live or continue to live

Localization.Gloss: 使活着；赐生命，带来生命。使活着。make alive; give life

Terms.Localization: to cause to live

Localization.Gloss: 牲畜，野兽；动物。 任何动物，野生的或驯养的（对比于植物）。living creature; animal

Terms.Localization: any living creature, whether wild or domesticated (in contrast with plants)

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞活物。围绕着上帝宝座的天上的活物，出现在《启示录》的异象中。living being

Terms.Localization: a supernatural being surrounding the throne of God in visions of the book of Revelation

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞薄荷。芳香植物（薄荷属）；高达两米；叶子细小柔软，边缘呈锯齿状；用于煮食、泡茶，或作药用。mint

Terms.Localization: fragrant plant (genus Mentha); up to 2 m high; small, soft leaves with sawlike margins; used in cooking, tea, medicine

Localization.Gloss: 以利亚（yǐ li ya），《思》厄里亚。公元前第九世纪，北国以色列亚哈王和亚哈谢王时代的先知。Elijah

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 希里（xī lǐ），《思》赫里。耶稣家谱中的一员。Heli

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 希律党人。在政治上追随和拥护大希律及其家族的人。Herodians

Terms.Localization: the political followers and adherents to Herod the Great and his family

Localization.Gloss: 希罗底（Xī luo dǐ）；《思》黑落狄雅。大希律的孙女，希律安提帕的妻子。Herodias

Terms.Localization: a granddaughter of Herod I and wife of Herod Antipas

Localization.Gloss: 希罗天（xī luo tiān），《思》黑落狄雍。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒。Herodion

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 希律（xī lǜ），《思》黑落德。希律王，就是大希律。从公元前40年至4年统治加利利和撒马利亚。Herod

Terms.Localization: Herod I, known as Herod the Great

Localization.Gloss: 希律（xī lǜ），《思》黑落德。希律安提帕，大希律的儿子，从公元前4年至公元39年统治加利利。把施洗约翰处决的希律就是他。Herod

Terms.Localization: Herod Antipas, son of Herod I, who had John the Baptist executed

Localization.Gloss: 希律（xī lǜ），《思》黑落德。希律亚基帕一世，大希律的孙子，公元41至44年统治巴勒斯坦。Herod

Terms.Localization: Herod Agrippa I, grandson of Herod I

Localization.Gloss: 以赛亚（yǐ sai ya），《思》依撒意亚。旧约时代一位重要的先知，名字的意义是：“耶和华是拯救者”。他大约在公元前742年乌西雅王至公元前701年希西家王统治期间，作南国犹大的先知。Isaiah

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 以扫（yǐ sǎo），《思》厄撒乌。以撒和利百加的长子，和雅各是双胞胎兄弟，得父亲的偏爱。Esau

Terms.Localization: a son of Isaac and the elder twin brother of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞平安的，安宁的，和平的。形容安宁的、和平的状态或态度。tranquil, quiet, peaceful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a quiet, peaceful existence or attitude

Localization.Gloss: 珥（ěr），《思》厄尔。耶稣家谱中的一员。Er

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞钉子，大钉。一根细长的金属（通常是铁），其中一头是削尖的（在《新约》中只用来指钉十字架的钉子）。nail, spike

Terms.Localization: a thin piece of metal (usually iron) sharpened on one end (in the NT used only in connection with nails employed in the crucifixion)

Localization.Gloss: 达太（da tai），《思》达陡。耶稣的十二门徒之一，很可能就是雅各的儿子犹大。Thaddaeus

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 《现》塔玛（tǎ mǎ），《和》她玛（tā mǎ），《旧》他玛，《思》塔玛尔。雅各的儿子犹大的媳妇，耶稣家谱中的一员。Tamar

Terms.Localization: the daughter-in-law of Judah in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞勇敢；有勇气；坦然无惧；充满信心；放心；打起精神；鼓起勇气。在危险和考验面前有信心和坚定的目标。cheer up; have courage; be cheerful; be courageous

Terms.Localization: to have confidence and firmness of purpose in the face of danger or testing

Localization.Gloss: 他拉（tā lā），《思》特辣黑。亚伯拉罕的父亲，耶稣家谱中的一员。Terah

Terms.Localization: the father of Abraham in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞女神。女性神明。goddess

Terms.Localization: a female deity

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞神祇，神性。上帝的本性或状态。divinity

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having the nature of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞上帝的，神圣的。指有着上帝的本质。divine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having the nature of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞立根基。铺设或建造地基。lay a foundation; found something upon

Terms.Localization: to lay or construct a foundation

Localization.Gloss: 基石。用作建筑物地基的石头。foundation stone

Terms.Localization: a stone used in the construction of a foundation

Localization.Gloss: 根基。建筑物的地基。foundation

Terms.Localization: that on which a structure is built

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞基础，根基；基石。用作建筑物地基的石头。foundation stone

Terms.Localization: a stone used in the construction of a foundation

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞由上帝教导，受教于上帝。指由上帝教导。taught by God, instructed by God

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being taught by God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞攻击上帝的，敌对上帝，与上帝为敌。攻击上帝的。opposing God

Terms.Localization: pertaining to fighting against God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞虔诚的，敬虔的，敬拜上帝的。竭力正确地表达自己的宗教信仰。God-fearing, devout, pious

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being devoted to a proper expression of religious beliefs

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞敬虔，敬上帝；虔诚。对神明和超自然力量的适当信念并虔诚地履行相关义务。godly reverence; piety

Terms.Localization: appropriate beliefs and devout practice of obligations relating to supernatural persons and powers

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞憎恨上帝，憎恨上帝的人。形容对上帝存着恨意。God-hater

Terms.Localization: pertaining to hatred towards God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞受上帝的灵感动的。指一种受上帝的灵感动而有的信息。God-breathed

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a communication which has been inspired by God

Localization.Gloss: 上帝。那唯一至高的超自然存在者，是宇宙的创造者和维持者。God

Terms.Localization: the one supreme supernatural being as creator and sustainer of the universe

Localization.Gloss: 神。撒但的称号，它被称为这个时代的神。god

Terms.Localization: a title applied to Satan as the god of this age

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞神格，神性。上帝的本性或状态。godhead, divine nature

Terms.Localization: the nature or state of being God

Localization.Gloss: 提阿非罗（ti ā fēi luo），《思》德敖斐罗。一名德高望重的基督徒，《路加福音》和《使徒行传》的受信人，其名字的意义为“上帝所爱的”或“上帝的朋友”。Theophilus

Terms.Localization: an important Christian to whom the books of Luke and Acts were dedicated; his names means: friend of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞家仆，仆人。在特定家庭中工作的一群仆人。group of servants

Terms.Localization: the group of servants working in a particular household

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞医治，使痊愈，治疗；照顾；服事，服务，供奉。使某人恢复健康，通常意味着照顾这样的人；藉着履行某些职责来提供帮助，通常是一些卑微或低贱的工作。heal, cure, take care of; serve, render service, help

Terms.Localization: cause someone to recover health often with the implication of having taken care of such a person; render assistance or help by performing certain duties, often of a humble or menial nature

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞仆人。提供服务的人。servant

Terms.Localization: a person who renders service

Localization.Gloss: 帖撒罗尼迦人（tiē sā luo ni jiā ren）／帖撒罗尼迦的（tiē sā luo ni jiā de），《思》得撒洛尼人。在帖撒罗尼迦居住或出生的人。Thessalonican

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Thessalonica

Localization.Gloss: 帖撒罗尼迦（tiē sā luo ni jiā），《思》得撒洛尼。罗马帝国统治下的马其顿首府，原名是德玛。Thessalonica

Terms.Localization: a city of Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 杜达（du da），《旧》丢大，《思》特乌达。公元一世纪，加利利之犹大叛乱前的暴乱分子领袖。Theudas

Terms.Localization: a Jewish insurrectionist

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞戏园，戏院，剧场。相当大的露天建筑物，通常呈半圆形，可容纳数千人，经常用作公众集会场地。theater

Terms.Localization: a rather large, normally semicircular open structure capable of seating several thousand people and often used for public assemblies

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞动物，野兽，走兽。任何四足动物，无论是野生的还是驯养的。animal; beast

Terms.Localization: any four-footed animal, either wild or domesticated

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞野兽，坏人，邪恶的人。（ θηρίον“（野）兽”的引申义）恶人，意指这种恶人既有害又危险。bad person; wicked person; evil beast

Terms.Localization: a figurative extension of the meaning of θηρίον (wild) animal: a bad person, in the sense of being both harmful and dangerous

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞野兽。敌基督，被描绘为危险的野兽。Beast

Terms.Localization: antichrist, depicted as a wild and dangerous animal

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞库房。存放贵重物品的房间。storeroom

Terms.Localization: a room for the storage of valuables

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞宝盒。存放金钱或贵重物品的箱子。treasure box

Terms.Localization: a box in which valuables are stored

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞ 财宝，宝物，宝贝。具有非凡价值并保管稳妥的东西。treasure, wealth, riches

Terms.Localization: that which is of exceptional value and kept safe

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞刀鞘；护套。与刀剑形状大小相约的盒子或袋子，用来保护和携带刀剑；用皮革、布、金属，甚或木制成；连到肩带或腰带上，可以挂在肩膀或系在腰间。sheath

Terms.Localization: a case or bag about the size and shape of a sword, used to cover and to carry the sword; made of leather, cloth, metal, or even wood; attached to a strap or belt that could be hung over the shoulder or tied around the waist

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞陷阱，圈套。用来诱捕动物（除雀鸟之外）的装置。trap; snare

Terms.Localization: an device used for trapping, especially of animals other than birds

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞牲畜。驯养的四足动物，主要是牲畜。livestock; cattle

Terms.Localization: domesticated four-footed animals, primarily livestock

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞宗教，崇拜，虔诚。对神明和超自然力量的适当信念并虔诚地履行相关义务。veneration, piety

Terms.Localization: appropriate beliefs and devout practice of obligations relating to supernatural persons and powers

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞宝座。相对较大和设计精致的座位，是统治者在正式场合上的尊座。throne

Terms.Localization: a relatively large and elaborate seat upon which a ruler sits on official occasions

Localization.Gloss: 推雅推喇（tuī yǎ tuī lǎ），《思》提雅提辣。位于吕底亚和每西亚边界，士每拿东北的一个城镇，以青铜和染织业著名，是启示录作者致函的小亚细亚七个教会之一。Thyatira

Terms.Localization: a city in Lydia

Localization.Gloss: 香炉；香坛。相对细小、用来焚香的祭坛；是木制的。incense altar

Terms.Localization: a relatively small altar used for burning incense; made of wood

Localization.Gloss: 香；香料。任何燃烧时会产生香味，因而为人所用的芳香物质（通常是树脂）。incense

Terms.Localization: any aromatic substance (usually a resin) burned for its pleasing aroma

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞盾牌。矩形的长盾牌；在战斗中用来保护全身；用木、金属、皮革绷在木上做成，或用木条或芦苇条编织而成。shield

Terms.Localization: a long, oblong shield; used to protect the entire body in battle; made of wood, metal, leather stretched over wood, or plaited strips of wood or reeds

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞窗户，窗口。墙壁上可以透光的开口，同时让室内空气流通，内外视野不受阻挡。window

Terms.Localization: an opening in a wall for the entrance of light and air and for the purpose of seeing in or out

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞或＜阴＞看门的人，门房。守卫通往房屋或建筑物的门的人。doorkeeper

Terms.Localization: one who guards the door giving access to a house or building

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞祭坛。任何类型的圣坛或类似物体，人们在其上献礼，然后举行宗教仪式向神明表示敬意。altar

Terms.Localization: any type of altar or object where gifts may be placed and ritual observances carried out in honor of supernatural beings

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞牺牲，祭物；牲祭。用作献祭的物品。sacrifice; offering

Terms.Localization: that which is offered as a sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞香橼木制的，香橼木的。指由香橼木制成的，或包含香橼木的东西（即来自香橼树，一种针叶树，如柏树、松树、雪松；树高达九米；鳞状叶，树皮红褐色，木质气味芳香）。of citron wood

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being made or consisting of citron wood (that is, from a citron tree, a coniferous tree related to cypresses, pines, and cedars; up to 9 m high; scaly leaves, reddish brown bark, sweet-smelling wood)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞门，大门。房子或建筑物的门，通常是复数形式，表明双扇门或双闸门。door; gate

Terms.Localization: the door to a house or building (often occurring in plural form and designating double doors or gates)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞门口；入口。通往房屋或建筑物的入口。entrance; entranceway; portal

Terms.Localization: the entranceway into a building or structure

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞宰杀；献祭。按照仪式宰杀祭牲来向神明献祭。sacrifice

Terms.Localization: to slaughter an animal in a ritual manner as a sacrifice to deity

Localization.Gloss: 多马（duō mǎ），《思》多默。耶稣的十二门徒之一，又名“低土马”，希腊文的意思是“双生子”。Thomas

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ ge），《思》雅各伯。以撒的儿子，以扫的孪生弟弟，以色列人的族长和先祖。Jacob

Terms.Localization: the patriarch Jacob, a son of Isaac

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ ge），《思》雅各伯。马但的儿子，《马太福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。Jacob

Terms.Localization: the father of Ἰωσήφ (2) in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《现》洋布雷（yang bu lei），《和》佯庇（yang bi），《思》杨布勒。在法老面前与雅尼一起对抗摩西的埃及术士。Jambres

Terms.Localization: an Egyptian sorcerer who together with Jannes opposed Moses before Pharaoh

Localization.Gloss: 雅拿（yǎ na），《思》雅乃。耶稣家谱中的一员。Jannai

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ ge），《思》雅各伯。耶稣的十二门徒之一，是西庇太的儿子。他和兄弟约翰一起捕鱼的时候蒙耶稣的呼召，并被取名为“半尼其”。James

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles and the son of Zebedee and brother of John

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ ge），《思》雅各伯。耶稣的弟弟。耶稣在世的时候，他的兄弟似乎不是很活跃；但在耶稣复活以后，他们都进入了基督徒的行列中。James

Terms.Localization: a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ ge），《思》雅各伯。耶稣的十二门徒之一，是亚勒腓的儿子。有学者认为，此雅各跟《马太福音》27:56提到的“雅各和约瑟的母亲马利亚”中的雅各是同一人。James

Terms.Localization: the son of Alphaeus and one of the twelve apostles; some scholars consider (3) and (4) to be the same person

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ ge），《思》雅各伯。马利亚的儿子，有时被称为“小雅各”。有学者认为，此雅各跟《马太福音》10:3提到的“亚勒腓的儿子雅各”是同一人。James

Terms.Localization: the son of Μαρία (4) and also called "the younger"; some scholars consider (3) and (4) to be the same person

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ ge），《思》雅各伯。耶稣的门徒犹大（不是卖主的加略人犹大）的父亲。James

Terms.Localization: the father of Judas, one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 雅尼（yǎ ni），《思》雅乃斯。在法老面前与洋布雷一起对抗摩西的埃及术士。Jannes

Terms.Localization: an Egyptian sorcerer who together with Jambres opposed Moses before Pharaoh

Localization.Gloss: 雅列（yǎ lie），《思》耶勒得。耶稣家谱中的一员，玛勒列的儿子，以诺的父亲。Jared

Terms.Localization: the father of Enoch in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《现》叶鲁（ye lǔ），《和》睚鲁（ya lǔ），《思》雅依洛。一名会堂主管，耶稣使他的女儿从死里复活。Jairus

Terms.Localization: a synagogue official

Localization.Gloss: 耶孙（yē sūn），《思》雅松。帖撒罗尼迦的一个基督徒，由于接待保罗和西拉而受到犹太人的攻击。Jason

Terms.Localization: the host of Paul and Silas in Thessalonica

Localization.Gloss: 耶孙（yē sūn），《思》雅松。在《罗马书》16章发出问安的一个人。Jason

Terms.Localization: a person who sends greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 以土买（yǐ tǔ mǎi），《思》依杜默雅。在犹太地南部的山区，即旧约时代的以东。Idumea

Terms.Localization: a mountainous region south of Judea (Edom of the OT)

Localization.Gloss: 《现》耶洗碧（yē xĭ bi），《和》耶洗别（yē xǐ bie），《思》依则贝耳。腓尼基公主，西顿王谒巴力的女儿，北国以色列王亚哈的妻子。热衷巴力崇拜，压制打击以色列人敬拜耶和华。Jezebel

Terms.Localization: King Ahab's notorious queen

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞祭司职分，祭司职位。担任祭司的角色。priestly office, priesthood

Terms.Localization: the role of being a priest

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞执行祭司的职务，作祭司。作为祭司去进行宗教仪式和执行职务。serve as a priest, be a priest

Terms.Localization: to serve as a priest in the performance of religious rites and duties

Localization.Gloss: 希拉坡里（xī lā pō lǐ），《思》耶辣颇里。古代小亚细亚的重要城市，位于弗吕家，在今日土耳其的西南部，此处有保罗所认识的教会。Hierapolis

Terms.Localization: a city in Phrygia

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞祭司（集合名词）。担任祭司的角色。priesthood

Terms.Localization: the role of being a priest

Localization.Gloss: 耶利米（yē li mǐ），《思》耶肋米亚。犹大末年最重要的先知之一。在犹大王约西亚十三年奉召为先知（公元前627年），作先知超过40年，直至耶路撒冷陷落（公元前587/6年）和被掳初期。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞祭司。替别人举行宗教仪式和执行职务的人。priest

Terms.Localization: one who performs religious rites and duties on behalf of others

Localization.Gloss: 耶利哥（yē li gē），《思》耶里哥。犹太地的一个城市，位于死海北端不远处。耶利哥在新旧约时代都是一个重要的城市，是南约旦河谷的古城，又称为棕树城。Jericho

Terms.Localization: a city in Judea, not far from the north end of the Dead Sea

Localization.Gloss: 耶路撒冷人（yē lu sā lěng ren），《思》耶路撒冷人。耶路撒冷的居民。Jerusalem (person from)

Terms.Localization: an inhabitant of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 耶路撒冷（yē lu sā lěng），《思》耶路撒冷。指耶路撒冷城，包括其中的居民。字义为“平安之城”，位于迦南山区，古名耶布斯，大卫攻取之后，便以此为首都，取名为“大卫城”或“锡安”。新约时代，耶路撒冷更是犹太人的宗教中心。Jerusalem

Terms.Localization: the city of Jerusalem, including its inhabitants

Localization.Gloss: 耶路撒冷（yē lu sā lěng），《思》耶路撒冷。指将来天上的圣城耶路撒冷。Jerusalem

Terms.Localization: the heavenly Jerusalem of the future

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞作祭司，担当神圣的职务。作为祭司去进行宗教仪式和执行职务。serve as a priest, administer in sacred service

Terms.Localization: to serve as a priest in the performance of religious rites and duties

Localization.Gloss: 圣殿。圣殿或圣所以及周围的神圣区域。temple

Terms.Localization: a temple or sanctuary (ναός[a]) and the surrounding consecrated area

Localization.Gloss: 祭司职分；祭司职任。作祭司的角色。priesthood; priestly office

Terms.Localization: the role of being a priest

Localization.Gloss: 耶西（yē xī），《思》叶瑟。大卫的父亲，耶稣家谱中的一员。他属于犹大支族，住在伯特利附近。Jesse

Terms.Localization: the father of King David in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 耶弗他（yē fu tā），《思》依弗大。以色列的士师，基列的勇士。他是妓女所生，因此被同父异母的兄弟赶出家门。Jephthah

Terms.Localization: one of the judges of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约雅斤（yuē yǎ jīn），《和》耶哥尼雅（yē gē ni yǎ），《思》耶苛尼雅。耶稣家谱中的一员，犹大国的一个王。Jechoniah

Terms.Localization: a king of Judah mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 耶稣（yē sū），《思》耶稣。拿撒勒的耶稣基督。新约的中心人物，他的生、死，和复活，是上帝为拯救罪人而有的行动。Jesus

Terms.Localization: Jesus Christ of Nazareth

Localization.Gloss: 约细（yuē xi），《思》耶苏。耶稣家谱中的一员，以利以谢的儿子。Joshua

Terms.Localization: the son of Eliezer mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 耶数（yē shu），《思》耶稣。保罗的同伴，别名是犹士都。Jesus

Terms.Localization: an additional name assigned to Justus, a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 约书亚（yuē shū ya），《思》若苏厄。摩西的继承人。以法莲人，嫩的儿子，原名“何西阿”，摩西称他为约书亚。Joshua

Terms.Localization: Joshua, the successor of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以哥念（yǐ gē nian），《思》依科尼雍。罗马帝国加拉太省的一座城，位于吕高尼，在现今土耳其境内。Iconium

Terms.Localization: a city in Lycaonia

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞罪得赦免的方法，挽回祭，赎罪祭。罪得赦免的方法。the means of forgiveness, propitiation, expiation

Terms.Localization: the means by which sins are forgiven

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞罪得赦免的方法；赦罪的地方。罪得赦免的方法；罪得赦免的地点或地方（传统的译本作施恩座）。propitiation; place where sins are forgiven

Terms.Localization: the means by which sins are forgiven; the location or place where sins are forgiven (in traditional translations rendered mercy seat)

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞仁慈，怜悯；赦免。对处在困境中的人表示同情和关切，尽管那人犯了道德方面的罪。have mercy; forgive

Terms.Localization: to show compassion and concern for someone in difficulty, despite that persons having committed a moral offense

Localization.Gloss: 以利哩古（yǐ li lǐ gǔ），《思》依里黎苛。马其顿北部的地区，罗马帝国的一个省份，在今日的前南斯拉夫和阿尔巴尼亚境内。Illyricum

Terms.Localization: a district to the north of Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 衣服；服装。任何种类的衣服。clothing; apparel

Terms.Localization: any kind of clothing

Localization.Gloss: 带子；鞋带。皮带（用作凉鞋或鞋的系带，或用作鞭子的皮条）。strap; thong

Terms.Localization: leather strap or thong (used in binding sandals or shoes and as thongs in a whip)

Localization.Gloss: 衣服；服装。任何种类的衣服。clothing; apparel

Terms.Localization: any kind of clothing

Localization.Gloss: 斗篷；外套；长袍。任何类型的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: 约旦河；《和》《思》约但河。约旦河从加利利海的北边流下，流过加利利海，又穿过约旦河谷，最后流入的死海。Jordan River

Terms.Localization: river that flows through the Sea of Galilee into the Dead Sea

Localization.Gloss: 犹太（you tai），《思》犹大／犹太。巴勒斯坦的南部，大部分是山区，东部是沙漠。由于耶路撒冷位于犹太，这地因而成为犹太人生活的中心。或指犹太民族居住的较广阔的地区。Judea

Terms.Localization: the southern part of Palestine, or: the wider region occupied by the Jewish nation

Localization.Gloss: 犹太（you tai），《思》犹太。属于犹太的；与犹太有关的。Judean

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Judea

Localization.Gloss: 犹太人（you tai ren），《思》犹太人。种族名称，指属于犹太民族的人。《新约》常用οἱ Ἰουδαῖοι这术语来指犹太人民、耶路撒冷和周围地区的居民、耶路撒冷的当权者，甚至是与耶稣敌对的人。Jew

Terms.Localization: the ethnic name of a person who belongs to the Jewish nation. In NT usage the reference of the term οἱ Ἰουδαῖοι may be either the Jewish people as such, the inhabitants of Jerusalem and environs, the authorities in Jerusalem, or even the people hostile to Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 犹太人（you tai ren）／犹太化（you tai hua），《思》犹太人／犹太化。与犹太民族有关的。犹太人原指王国时期南国犹大的人民，由犹大支派和便雅悯支派组成。到了被掳之后和新约时代，犹太人是指被掳归回者的后裔，和散居在各地的以色列人。Jewish

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the Jewish nation

Localization.Gloss: 像犹太人的，以犹太人的方式的。与犹太民族有关的。like a Jew, in a Jewish manner

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the Jewish nation

Localization.Gloss: 犹利亚（You li ya）；《思》犹里雅。在《罗马书》的问安名单出现的一名女信徒。Julia

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 犹尼亚（you ni ya），《思》犹尼雅。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一名犹太基督徒。Junias

Terms.Localization: a Jewish Christian greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹达斯。耶稣十二门徒之一，来自加略城。在门徒之中，他是负责管理钱财的。犹大为了金钱出卖耶稣，事后又后悔，上吊自杀。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas Iscariot, the betrayer of Jesus and one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹大。犹大支族的领土，界于盐海和地中海岸的非利士人地区之间，其中主要城市有耶路撒冷、希伯仑，和伯利恒。Judah

Terms.Localization: the territory of the tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹达。雅各的儿子，耶稣十二门徒之一。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas the son of James, and one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹达。耶稣的弟弟。Judas, Jude

Terms.Localization: Judas, Jude, a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹大。居于大马士革直街的一个人，保罗在路上遇见主之后去到大马士革，便住在他的家中。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas, Paul’s host in Damascus

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹达。别号巴撒巴，是耶路撒冷教会的领袖。耶路撒冷教会差派他和西拉代表教会，一同与保罗和巴拿巴往安提阿去视察。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas, called Barsabbas, a leading Christian in Jerusalem and a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹达。加利利的犹大，在公元7年，居里扭进行人口普查时造反的革命领袖。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas, a revolutionary leader

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹达。耶稣家谱中的一员。Judah

Terms.Localization: Judah, a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹大。耶稣家谱中的一员，雅各的儿子，以色列犹大支族的先祖。Judah

Terms.Localization: Judah, a son of Jacob in the genealogy of Jesus and an ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 犹大（you da），《思》犹大。犹大支族。Judah

Terms.Localization: the tribe Judah

Localization.Gloss: 犹流（you liu），《思》犹里约。御营的罗马军官。Julius

Terms.Localization: a Roman centurion

Localization.Gloss: 犹士都（you shi dū），《思》犹斯托。别号巴撒巴，名叫约瑟，与马提亚同被提名为使徒的继任人。Justus

Terms.Localization: an additional name of Joseph Barsabbas, one of two candidates for the place of Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 犹士都（you shi dū），《思》犹斯托。提多犹士都，哥林多的犹太归信者。Justus

Terms.Localization: an additional name of Titius, a Jewish proselyte

Localization.Gloss: 犹士都（you shi dū），《思》犹斯托。耶数的别名；保罗的同伴。Justus

Terms.Localization: Jesus called Justus, a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 约帕（yuē pa），《思》约培。巴勒斯坦沿岸的一个港口，今称“耶法”。有一段时期，约帕曾是地中海地区唯一的港口，此城距离耶路撒冷约56公里，也作为耶路撒冷的港口。Joppa; Jaffa

Terms.Localization: a seaport on the coast of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: 以撒（yǐ sā），《思》依撒格。字义“笑声”，他是亚伯拉罕一百岁、撒拉九十岁时所生的儿子，是雅各和以扫的父亲。Isaac

Terms.Localization: a son of Abraham and father of Jacob and Esau

Localization.Gloss: 加略人（jiā lue ren），《思》依斯加略人。这名称用以识别出卖耶稣的犹大（可能是根据一个地方名）。Iscariot

Terms.Localization: an identifying name (probably based on a place name) of Judas, the betrayer of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞同心的。有相同想法或态度的。likeminded

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being of the same mind or attitude

Localization.Gloss: 《现》以色列人（yǐ se lie ren）／以色列同胞（yǐ se lie tong bāo）／上帝的选民（shanɡ di de xuǎn min），《和》以色列人（yǐ se lie ren），《思》以色列人。种族名称，指属于以色列民族的人。Israelite

Terms.Localization: the ethnic name of a person belonging to the nation of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 以色列（yǐ se lie），《思》以色列。即先祖雅各；上帝给雅各起的另一个名字。Israel

Terms.Localization: the patriarch Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 以色列（yǐ se lie），《思》以色列。以色列民族，雅各和他十二个儿子的后裔。他们被称为上帝的百姓或以色列民。Israel

Terms.Localization: the nation of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 上帝的子民／上帝的选民（shang di de zǐ min/shang di de xuǎn min），《和》以色列人／以色列民（yǐ se lie ren/yǐ se lie min），《思》真以色列人／新以色列。基督徒，比喻为真正的以色列人。Israel

Terms.Localization: a figurative reference to Christians as the true Israel

Localization.Gloss: 以萨迦（yǐ sa jiā），《思》依撒加尔。利亚给雅各生的第五个儿子，以色列十二支族的祖先之一。Issachar

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 有力气；有足够力量去做。身体足够强壮去做某事。have power, be strong enough to

Terms.Localization: to be physically strong enough for some purpose

Localization.Gloss: 健康的。健康的状态，有健壮和充满活力的含义。be healthy

Terms.Localization: a state of being healthy, with the implication of robustness and vigor

Localization.Gloss: 能，能够。具有做或经历某事的特殊个人能力。be able to, be capable of

Terms.Localization: to have special personal ability to do or experience something

Localization.Gloss: 意大利的。属于意大利的，与意大利有关的。Italian

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Italy

Localization.Gloss: 意大利（yi da li），《旧》义大利，《思》意大利。新约时代，意大利隶属罗马帝国，境内的罗马城是当时的世界中心。其他的城镇有利基翁、部丢利、亚比乌和三馆。Italy

Terms.Localization: Italy

Localization.Gloss: 以土利亚（省）（yǐ tǔ li ya (shĕng)），《思》依突勒雅（省）。与以土利亚有关的；以土利亚是罗马帝国的一省，希律的兄弟分封王腓力的属地，在加利利湖的东北。Ituraean

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Ituraea

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小鱼。ἰχθύς“鱼”的指小词，指任何比较小的鱼。small fish

Terms.Localization: diminutive of ἰχθύς fish: any kind of relatively small fish

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞鱼。任何冷血水生脊椎动物的统称，有鳃，通常有鳍，细长的身体上有鳞片；重要的食物来源。fish

Terms.Localization: general word for various cold-blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; important source of food

Localization.Gloss: 约坦（yuē tǎn），《思》约堂。耶稣家谱中的一员。犹大王（约公元前750-734年），在位十六年，行上帝眼中看为正的事。Jotham

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约亚拿（yuē ya na），《思》约哈南。耶稣家谱中的一员。Joanan

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约亚娜（yuē ya na），《和》约亚拿（yuē ya na），《思》约安纳。希律安提帕官邸的官员苦撒的妻子。Joanna

Terms.Localization: the wife of Chuza, an official of Herod Antipas

Localization.Gloss: 约翰（yuē han），《思》若翰。施洗者约翰，他住在约旦河的旷野，传扬上帝国的临近和悔改赦罪的信息，并且给人施洗。John

Terms.Localization: John the Baptist

Localization.Gloss: 约翰（yuē han），《思》若望。耶稣的十二门徒之一，他是西庇太的儿子。约翰和兄弟雅各在打鱼的时候，蒙耶稣呼召，跟从了他。John

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles and the son of Zebedee and brother of James; some persons consider (2) and (3) to be the same

Localization.Gloss: 约翰（yuē han），《思》若望。教会传统认为，约翰是《约翰福音》、《约翰书信》和《启示录》的作者。John

Terms.Localization: the author of the book of Revelation; some consider (2) and (3) to be the same

Localization.Gloss: 约翰（yuē han），《思》若望。约翰．马可，保罗的同工马可的别称。John

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul who was also called Mark

Localization.Gloss: 约翰（yuē han），《思》若望。西门彼得和安德烈的父亲。John

Terms.Localization: the father of Peter and Andrew

Localization.Gloss: 约翰（yuē han），《思》若望。犹太议会的成员，一同在议会中审讯使徒。John

Terms.Localization: a member of the Sanhedrin

Localization.Gloss: 俄备得（e bei de），《思》敖贝得。耶稣家谱中的一员，波阿斯和路得的儿子，耶西的父亲，大卫的祖父。Obed

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约大（yuē da），《和》犹大（you da），《思》约达。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员，约亚拿的儿子。Joda

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约珥（yuē ěr），《思》岳厄尔。毗土珥的儿子。旧约的先知，在南国犹大发预言。Joel

Terms.Localization: an OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 约南（yuē nan），《思》约南。以利亚敬的儿子，《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。Jonam

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约拿（yuē na），《思》约纳。迦特希弗人亚米太的儿子，耶罗波安二世时期北国以色列的先知。他约在公元前8世纪早期作先知。Jonah

Terms.Localization: an OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 约兰（yuē lan），《思》约兰。犹大王（约公元前849-842年），耶稣家谱中的一员。Joram

Terms.Localization: a king of Judah mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约令（yuē ling），《思》约楞。玛塔的儿子，《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。Jorim

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约沙法（yuē shā fǎ），《思》约沙法特。耶稣家谱中的一员。南国犹大的君王（约公元前873-849年在位），统治25年。在位期间，他加强犹大的防御工作，与以色列缔结和约，除去国内的异教作风，派遣教师往各地教导摩西律法。Jehoshaphat

Terms.Localization: a king of Judah mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约瑟（yuē se），《思》若瑟。雅各和拉结所生的儿子，以色列其中一个支族的先祖。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 约瑟（yuē se），《思》若瑟。耶稣的母亲马利亚的丈夫。Joseph

Terms.Localization: the husband of Mary the mother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约瑟（yuē se），《思》若瑟。亚利马太人，耶稣的门徒，犹太议会的成员；耶稣被埋葬在他的新坟墓里。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a person from Arimathea who was a member of the Sanhedrin

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约瑟（yuē se），《和》约西（yuē xī），《思》若瑟。耶稣的兄弟。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约瑟（yuē se），《思》若瑟。又名巴拿巴，是在塞浦路斯出生的利未人。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a Levite from Cyprus, also called Barnabas

Localization.Gloss: 约瑟（yuē se），《思》若瑟。初期教会的信徒，是继承加略人犹大的使徒位置的侯选人之一。他的家族名字是巴撒巴，他又称为犹士都。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a man whose family name was Barsabbas and who was also called Justus; he was one of two candidates for the place of Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约瑟（yuē se），《和》约西（yuē xī），《思》若瑟。马利亚的儿子，小雅各的兄弟。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a son of Mary (Μαρία 4)

Localization.Gloss: 约瑟（yuē se），《思》约色夫。《路加福音》之耶稣家谱所记载的两个人。Joseph

Terms.Localization: persons mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约色克（yuē se ke），《和》约瑟（yuē se），《思》约色黑。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。Josech

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约瑟（yuē se），《和》约西（yuē xī），《思》若瑟。耶稣的弟弟。Joses

Terms.Localization: a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《现》约瑟（yuē se），《和》约西（yuē xī），《思》若瑟。小雅各的兄弟，马利亚的儿子，这位马利亚是在耶稣钉十字架的现场的妇女之一。Joses

Terms.Localization: a brother of James the younger

Localization.Gloss: 约西亚（yuē xī ya），《思》约史雅。耶稣家谱中的一员。南国犹大的王，在宗教上大行改革，把亚述的偶像从圣殿中除去；在政治上也有显著的成就。Josiah

Terms.Localization: a king of Judah mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 约伯（yuē bo），《思》约伯。乌斯地的一个义人，因遭撒但攻击而遇到家庭惨变及身体病患的极大苦楚。他与朋友对苦罪的问题的争辩，构成了旧约圣经《约伯记》的主要篇幅。Job

Terms.Localization: the central figure of the book of Job

Localization.Gloss: 仁慈的，怜悯人的。表示怜悯。merciful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to showing mercy

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞马。大型家养单蹄四足动物；比今天的马矮而粗壮，头较短，脖子较粗；高约 122-142 厘米，身长约有 2.1 米；毛色从深棕色至浅棕色不等；素食动物；用于战场上，可以乘骑，也可以拉战车；象征军事实力；与太阳相提并论，据说太阳是乘着战车横越天空的。horse

Terms.Localization: large domesticated solid-hoofed quadraped; Equus caballus; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; coat varies from dark to pale brown; eats plants; used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

Localization.Gloss: 该亚法（gāi ya fǎ），《思》盖法。公元18年，罗马总督所任命的大祭司，在耶稣的定罪中起重要作用，又逼迫初期教会。Caiaphas

Terms.Localization: the high priest who played a prominent role in the condemnation of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞洁净，洁净礼。使某物变得洁净；除去礼仪上的污秽或不洁。cleansing; purification

Terms.Localization: the action of causing something to become clean; the action of cleansing from ritual contamination or impurity

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞洁净，洗净，使洁净。使某物变得洁净；除去礼仪上的污秽或不洁。cleanse; be cleansed; purify, be purified

Terms.Localization: to cause something to become clean; to cleanse from ritual contamination or impurity

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞洁净的，干净的；纯洁的，无罪的。形容不肮脏的；在礼仪上是洁净的或纯洁的。clean; pure, innocent

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being dirty; pertaining to being ritually clean or pure

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞纯洁，洁净。除去礼仪上的污秽或不洁。purity

Terms.Localization: a state of being cleansed of ritual contamination

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞座位；凳子；椅子。用来坐的家具；款式形状和制作材料差别很大；通常是木制或藤制的框架，座椅用芦苇编织，或由木材制成；有靠背或没有靠背。seat; stool; chair

Terms.Localization: a piece of furniture used for sitting; differs widely in shape and materials; often made of a wooden or cane frame with the seat woven of reeds or made of wood; with or without a back

Localization.Gloss: 凯撒利亚·腓立比。位于黑门山山脚的凯撒利亚·腓立比。Caesarea Philippi

Terms.Localization: Caesarea Philippi, at the foot of Mount Hermon, named by Philip-2

Localization.Gloss: 凯撒利亚；《和》该撒利亚；《思》凯撒勒雅。巴勒斯坦沿岸、迦密山以南的凯撒利亚。Caesarea

Terms.Localization: Caesarea on the coast of Palestine, south of Mount Carmel

Localization.Gloss: 凯撒；《和》该撒。一个拉丁词的希腊语翻译，用作罗马皇帝的名字和头衔。Caesar; the Emperor

Terms.Localization: a title for the Roman Emperor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞稻草，茅草，禾秸。谷物或芦苇的干茎。straw; thatch

Terms.Localization: the dry stalks of grain or reeds

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞受栽培的好橄榄树。为收获果实而培植的橄榄树。cultivated olive tree

Terms.Localization: an olive tree that is cultivated for its fruit

Localization.Gloss: 佳澳（jiā ao），《思》良港。克里特岛南部海岸的一个海湾，保罗被押往罗马途中乘船经过这里。Fair Havens

Terms.Localization: a bay on the south coast of Crete

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞诚实的；美好的。指积极的道德品质，有得到积极评价的含意。honest; good

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a positive moral quality, with the implication of being favorably valued

Localization.Gloss: 《现》激进党（jī jin dǎng），《和》奋锐党（fen rui dǎng），《思》热诚者。某个犹太民族主义群体的成员，该群体寻求脱离罗马统治而独立。Cananaean = Zealot

Terms.Localization: a member of a Jewish nationalistic group seeking independence from Rome

Localization.Gloss: 该南（gāi nan），《思》刻南。亚法撒的儿子，《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。Cainan

Terms.Localization: the son of Arphaxad in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 该南（gāi nan），《思》刻南。以挪士的儿子，《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。Cainan

Terms.Localization: the son of Enos in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 迦拿（jiā na），《思》加纳。新约时代，加利利的一个村庄，位于拿撒勒以北大约13公里的地方。Cana

Terms.Localization: a city in Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 甘大基（gān da jī），《旧》干大基，《思》甘达刻。埃塞俄比亚女王的头衔；有人认为这是埃塞俄比亚女王的名字。Candace

Terms.Localization: title of the queen of Ethiopia: the Candace, the female ruler of Ethiopia; interpreted by some as the name of the queen of Ethiopia

Localization.Gloss: 加帕多家（jiā pa duō jiā），《思》卡帕多细雅。新约时代，罗马帝国的一个省份，位于加拉太的东部，在中亚细亚和黑海港口之间，是商队的必经之地。Cappadocia

Terms.Localization: a province in the interior of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞知道人心的；洞察人心的。（直译：知道心里面的事）知道别人想法的人。knower of hearts

Terms.Localization: one who knows what someone else thinks (literally to know what is in the heart)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞心，内心；心意；心志。καρδία“心”的引申义）一个人心理生活各个方面的成因来源，但特别强调思想方面。heart, inner self, mind

Terms.Localization: (a figurative extension of the meaning of καρδία heart) the causative source of a person's psychological life in its various aspects, but with special emphasis upon thoughts

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞谴责，指责，责备。判断某事是坏的。condemn

Terms.Localization: to judge something to be bad

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞谴责，定罪。判决某人确实有罪，因此要受刑罚。condemn

Terms.Localization: to judge someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞判刑，定罪。宣判某人确实有罪，因此要受刑罚。sentence of condemnation

Terms.Localization: the act of declaring someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞控制；使某人屈从于；使受奴役。控制某人，使这人屈从于自己的利益。gain control over, cause to someone to be subservient

Terms.Localization: to gain control over someone and thus make such an individual subservient to one's own interests

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞定罪；被判定有罪。判决某人确实有罪，因此要受刑罚。condemn; be condemned (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to judge someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞和解；和好。在人际关系受到扰乱或破坏后，重新建立恰当的友好关系。reconciliation

Terms.Localization: the reestablishment of proper friendly interpersonal relations after these have been disrupted or broken

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞和解；和好，复和。在人际关系受到扰乱或破坏后，重新建立恰当的友好关系。reconcile; be reconciled (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to reestablish proper friendly interpersonal relations after these have been disrupted or broken

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞帷幕；门帘；幔子。悬挂在进出通道上的布帘。drape; curtain; veil

Terms.Localization: a hanging of cloth over an opening

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞搭窝，栖息。（“窝”的衍生词）搭窝（或寻找栖身之所）。to nest

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κατασκήνωσις nest) to make a nest (or possibly to find shelter)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞巢，窝。雀鸟搭建的居所，用来孵卵和养育雏鸟 。nest

Terms.Localization: a construction built by birds in connection with brooding and raising their young

Localization.Gloss: 封上；加封条；使安全。用封条封上或使某物安全牢固。to seal; put a seal on; make secure

Terms.Localization: to use a seal to close or to make something secure

Localization.Gloss: 定罪，被判有罪。判决某人确实有罪，因此要受刑罚。condemnation

Terms.Localization: the act of judging someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞定罪，谴责。判决某人确实有罪，因此要受刑罚。condemnation

Terms.Localization: the act of judging someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞客栈。供旅客住宿的地方。inn

Terms.Localization: a place for the lodging of travellers

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞房间，客房，饭厅。在颇为大的建筑物（可能是客栈）内的一个房间，可以用作饭厅。room; quarters; dining room

Terms.Localization: a room in a relatively large structure (possibly an inn), which could serve as a dining room

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞充满偶像的。指有许多偶像。full of idols

Terms.Localization: pertaining to numerous idols

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞管辖，支配。藉着行使权力来统治 。be in authority; rule

Terms.Localization: to rule or reign by exercising authority over

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞祝福。祈求上帝给予恩惠，也暗示口头祝福本身已经是一个极大的恩惠。bless

Terms.Localization: to ask God to bestow divine favor on, with the implication that the verbal act itself constitutes a significant benefit

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞控告者。作为控告者的撒但。Accuser

Terms.Localization: Satan, as one who brings accusations against

Localization.Gloss: 高大（gāo da），《思》克劳达。克里特岛南面的一个小岛。Cauda

Terms.Localization: a small island south of Crete

Localization.Gloss: 迦百农（jiā bǎi nong），《思》葛法翁。加利利湖西北岸的一个城。这地方有罗马军队驻守，在贯通东西的公路上设有收税站。Capernaum

Terms.Localization: a city on the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞芦苇。长得高而直的草或莎草；生长在河边及沼泽内或沼泽附近。reed

Terms.Localization: a tall straight grass or sedge; growing in or near rivers and marshes

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞芦苇。芦苇的茎部。reed

Terms.Localization: the stalk of a reed plant

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞笔。经过切削的芦苇杆，蘸墨后可以在纸张或羊皮等物料上书写；长度约为二十厘米，其中一头是削尖的。pen

Terms.Localization: a reed especially cut for making marks with ink on writing material; abou 20 cm long, sharpened on one end

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞测量杆。一根用来量度的杆（可能是一根芦苇）。measuring rod

Terms.Localization: a rod (possibly a reed) used for measuring length

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞帕子，面纱。蒙在脸上的透薄布料，蒙脸的人仍然看得见东西，但别人却看不清其面貌。veil

Terms.Localization: a piece of material worn over the face, thin enough for the wearer to see through, but not for observers to recognize facial features through it

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞或＜阴＞骆驼。大型四足哺乳动物；有单峰骆驼和双峰骆驼之分；双峰驼可高达两米；单峰驼体型较大，一律为浅黄褐色；双峰驼颜色较深；适合在沙漠地区生活；驼峰能储存多余的食物，可以行走长时间也不用喝水；能在干旱地区作长途旅行；被人乘骑，也用来运载重物和拉车；骆驼毛可以织成布，用于制作帐篷或外袍；奶可作食物和饮品；是财富和商业的象征。camel

Terms.Localization: large quadraped mammal; Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; bactrians may reach 2 m.; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; suited to life in desert areas; store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods; can make long journeys through dry areas; used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; hair woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; milk used as food and drink; symbol of wealth and commerce

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞火炉；窑。用于熔炼矿石和烧制陶瓷器皿的建筑。furnace; kiln

Terms.Localization: a construction used for the smelting of ore and burning of ceramic ware

Localization.Gloss: 该隐（gāi yǐn），《思》加音。亚当和夏娃的长子，亚伯的哥哥。他因嫉妒而杀死弟弟亚伯，以致被放逐到外地。Cain

Terms.Localization: the first son of Adam and Eve and the brother of Abel

Localization.Gloss: 加布（jiā bu），《思》卡尔颇。保罗的朋友，特罗亚的基督徒。Carpus

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Troas

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞微粒，木屑。一小块木片，谷壳，甚或是稻草。speck; splinter

Terms.Localization: a small piece of wood, chaff, or even straw

Localization.Gloss: 坚革哩（jiān ge lǐ），《思》耕格勒。哥林多东部的海港。Cenchrea

Terms.Localization: a seaport of the city of Corinth

Localization.Gloss: 汲沦（ji lun），《思》克德龙。界于耶路撒冷城和橄榄山之间的溪谷，在耶路撒冷东面。Kidron

Terms.Localization: a valley between Jerusalem and the Mount of Olives

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞布块；布条。用来缠裹物件的小片布料。band of cloth; strip of cloth

Terms.Localization: small piece of cloth; used for wrapping something

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞自负，虚荣。没有根据或理由的骄傲状态。conceit; cheap desire to boast

Terms.Localization: a state of pride which is without basis or justification

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞愚蠢的谈话，空谈。缺乏重要内容的谈话。foolish talk

Terms.Localization: talk which lacks significant content

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞自负的，骄傲的。指没有根据或理由的骄傲。conceited; boastful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being proud without basis or justification

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞空的；空手的；没有目的的；没有效果的；愚蠢的；虚妄的。什么也没有的。empty; emptyhanded; to no purpose; without result; foolish; senseless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without anything, having nothing

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞使失去能力；使失去效力，落空。取走某事物的能力或重要性。deprive of power; make of no meaning or effect

Terms.Localization: to take away the power or significance of something

Localization.Gloss: 百夫长；队长；军官。指挥大约一百个士兵的罗马军官。centurion; captain

Terms.Localization: a Roman officer in command of about one hundred men

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞陶匠。（κεράμιον“陶制容器”的衍生词）制作陶制容器的人。potter

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κεράμιον earthenware vessel) one who makes earthenware vessels

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞罐，瓶。盛载或运送液体用的陶制容器。jar; vessel

Terms.Localization: an earthenware container for storing or carrying liquids

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞豆荚。（κέρας “角”的指小词）指角豆树的豆荚（看像一个小角）。carob pod

Terms.Localization: (a diminutive derivative of κέρας horn) the pod of the carob tree (which closely resembles a small horn)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞书卷。一个书卷或一部巨著的一部份。section; scroll

Terms.Localization: section of a scroll or of a long composition

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞瓦片；屋面瓦。薄板型或弯曲型的烤制黏土；用以覆盖屋顶。tile; roof tile

Terms.Localization: a thin slab or bent piece of baked clay; used to cover a roof

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞银钱；小额钱币。价值较低的钱币。coin; change

Terms.Localization: coins of lesser value

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞宣讲，通知，宣布。由传令官或起传令官作用的人以正式或官方形式宣布。proclaim, announce

Terms.Localization: to announce in a formal or official manner by means of a herald or one who functions as a herald

Localization.Gloss: 《现》矶法（jī fǎ）／彼得（bǐ de），《和》矶法，《思》刻法。耶稣给西门彼得取的亚兰语名字，相等于希腊名字Πέτρος“彼得”。这两个名字都是“磐石”的意思。Cephas

Terms.Localization: the Aramaic equivalent of the Greek name Πέτρος Peter

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞所讲的道，信息，宣道。讲道的内容。proclamation, preaching

Terms.Localization: the content of what is preached or proclaimed

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞丁税，人头税。每个成年男性向政府缴纳的税。poll tax

Terms.Localization: a tax paid by each adult male to the government

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞传道者，报信的人。传道或宣布信息的人。proclaimer

Terms.Localization: a person who preaches or proclaims

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞大鱼；巨鱼。任何大型的海洋生物。big fish; huge fish

Terms.Localization: any large sea creature

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞船；方舟。一个盒状的大型建筑物（由挪亚建成的大船）。boat; ship; the ark

Terms.Localization: a large box-like structure (the vessel built by Noah)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞箱；（约）柜；保险箱。普通的或精致的盒状容器；这里是指那用来存放法版的箱子。box; chest; coffer

Terms.Localization: any box-like container, whether plain or elaborate; here, refers to the box used to hold the tablets of the Law

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞弹奏竖琴。κιθάρα“七弦琴，竖琴”的衍生词。play a lyre; play a harp

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κιθάρα lyre, harp)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞竖琴师，弹琴者。κιθαρίζω“弹奏竖琴”的衍生词，指弹奏竖琴或七弦琴的人。harpist

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κιθαρίζω to play a lyre) one who plays the lyre or harp

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞七弦琴；竖琴。一种像竖琴但小巧的弦乐器，可以握在手中弹奏。lyre; harp

Terms.Localization: a small stringed harp-like instrument held in the hands and plucked

Localization.Gloss: 基利家（jī li jiā），《思》基里基雅。新约时代，罗马帝国的一个行省，位于小亚细亚东南角，现今的土耳其境内。这地是叙利亚和小亚细亚之间重要的通商路线。Cilicia

Terms.Localization: a province in the southeast corner of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 基士（jī shi），《思》克士。便雅悯人，扫罗王的父亲，是个大能的勇士。Kish

Terms.Localization: the father of King Saul

Localization.Gloss: 《现》喀劳底雅（kā lao dǐ yǎ），《和》革老底亚（ke lǎo dǐ ya），《思》克劳狄雅。罗马的女基督徒，保罗在信函中提及她向提摩太问安。Claudia

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman who sent greetings in 2 Tim 4:21

Localization.Gloss: 克劳第（ke lao di），《旧》革老丢，《思》喀劳狄。罗马皇帝（公元41-54年在位），在他统治年间有大饥荒。他曾下令犹太人离开罗马。Claudius

Terms.Localization: Tiberius Claudius Nero Germanicus, a Roman emperor

Localization.Gloss: 克劳第（ke lao di），《旧》革老丢，《思》喀劳狄。克劳第．吕西亚，是驻守耶路撒冷的千夫长。“吕西亚”是希腊名字，“克劳第”是罗马名字。Claudius

Terms.Localization: Claudius Lysias, a Roman officer in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞枝子，树枝。（大树或木本灌木的）枝子。branch

Terms.Localization: branch (of a tree or woody shrub)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞钥匙。用来锁门和开锁的工具。key

Terms.Localization: an instrument used for locking and unlocking doors and gates

Localization.Gloss: 革流巴（ge liu bā），《思》克罗帕。在以马忤斯路上遇见复活的耶稣的两个门徒之一。Cleopas

Terms.Localization: a believer whom Jesus met on the road to Emmaus

Localization.Gloss: 革利免（ge li miǎn），《思》克肋孟。腓立比教会的信徒，保罗在腓立比的一个同工。保罗确定他是具有属灵生命的基督徒。Clement

Terms.Localization: a member of the church at Philippi

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞（主要指葡萄树的）枝子。一种比较柔软和柔韧的枝子，如藤蔓的枝子。branch (principally of grapevines)

Terms.Localization: a more or less tender, flexible branch, as of a vine

Localization.Gloss: 小牀；牀垫；担架。一种相对较小且通常是暂时使用的物件，人可以倚靠或躺卧在其上；用芦苇或布料做成；轻薄方便携带。cot; pallet; stretcher

Terms.Localization: a relatively small and often temporary type of object on which a person may lie or recline; made of reeds or cloth; thin and light for carrying

Localization.Gloss: 小牀；牀垫；担架。一种相对较小且通常是暂时使用的物件，人可以倚靠或躺卧在其上；用芦苇或布料做成；轻薄方便携带。cot; pallet; stretcher

Terms.Localization: a relatively small and often temporary type of object on which a person may lie or recline; made of reeds or cloth; thin and light for carrying

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞火炉。用粘土制成的穹顶结构，里面烧着木柴和干草，烧热后可用来烤饼。oven

Terms.Localization: a dome-like structure made of clay, in which wood and dried grass were burned, and then after being heated, was used for baking bread

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞床；床铺；担架；病床。供人倚靠或躺卧的家具。bed; couch; cot; stretcher; bier

Terms.Localization: any piece of furniture employed for reclining or lying on

Localization.Gloss: 革罗罢（ge luo ba），《思》克罗帕。马利亚（Μαρία [e]）的丈夫，这马利亚是耶稣钉十字架时站在十字架旁的其中一名妇人。Clopas

Terms.Localization: the husband of Μαρία (e), one of the women at the crucifixion

Localization.Gloss: 革尼土（ge ni tǔ），《思》克尼多。小亚细亚西南海岸的一个半岛，保罗在前往意大利的航程中所经之地，是罗马帝国的自由城。Cnidus

Terms.Localization: a peninsula on the southwest coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞一分钱。罗马铜币，约值 1/4 铜钱（音译：阿撒利翁）或 1/64 银钱（音译：得拿利）。quadrans; penny

Terms.Localization: a Roman copper coin worth 1/4 of an assarion or 1/64 of a denarius

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞肚，腹；内脏。整个消化器官，包括胃和肠。belly, internal organs

Terms.Localization: the entire digestive apparatus, including stomach and intestines

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞共有的，公共的；分享的。指与他人分享财产，或意味着一种共同利益的关系。in common; shared

Terms.Localization: pertaining to sharing with someone else in a possession or a relationship implying mutual interest

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞凡俗的；不洁净的；污秽的。在礼仪上不被接纳的，或者是因为被玷污，或者是因为本身的性质（例如礼仪上不洁净的牲畜）。impure; common; profane

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being ritually unacceptable, either as the result of defilement or because of the very nature of the object itself (for example, ritually unacceptable animals)

Localization.Gloss: 玷污；亵渎；冒犯。使某事物变成不洁净的、污秽的，或在礼仪上不可接受的。defile; be defiled (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to cause something to become unclean, profane, or ritually unacceptable

Localization.Gloss: 分享；分担，有分。分享自己的财产，暗示有某种共同参与和共同利益。share; participate

Terms.Localization: to share one's possessions, with the implication of some kind of joint participation and mutual interest

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞慷慨的，乐意分享的，乐意助人的，随时济助的。乐意随时分享的。willing to share

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κοινωνέω to share) pertaining to willing and ready sharing

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞团契，亲密的关系；有份，分享；捐献，礼物；帮助，救济。有着密切的相互关系和参与的团体。fellowship; contribution; participation; sharing

Terms.Localization: an association involving close mutual relations and involvement

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞与＜阴＞同伴，伙伴，与…有份的人。与别人一起参与某项事业或共同关心的事情的人。partner; partaker; sharer

Terms.Localization: one who participates with another in some enterprise or matter of joint concern

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞卧室，睡房。屋内的睡房bedroom

Terms.Localization: a room in a house for sleeping

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞眼药。擦眼用的药膏。eye salve

Terms.Localization: an ointment for the eyes

Localization.Gloss: 歌罗西（gē luo xī），《思》哥罗森。在现今的土耳其境内，是小亚细亚弗吕家地区的一座城，位于通往以弗所和内陆的商业要道上，盛产羊毛。Colossae

Terms.Localization: a city in Phrygia in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞水池，池子（主要用来洗澡）。用来蓄水的大型结构。pool (primarily used for bathing)

Terms.Localization: a relatively large construction for collecting water

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞库房；圣殿库房。圣殿当中用作库房的房间。treasury; Temple treasury

Terms.Localization: a room in the Temple used as a treasury

Localization.Gloss: 哥林多人（gē lin duō ren），《思》格林多人。哥林多本地的人，居住或出生在哥林多的人。Corinthian

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Corinth

Localization.Gloss: 哥尼流（gē ni liu），《思》科尔乃略。指挥百名士兵的罗马军官，他派人邀请彼得到他家传讲耶稣基督的福音。Cornelius

Terms.Localization: a Roman centurion to whom Peter ministered

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞属世的；地上的。指世界的系统或与世界的标准相关的。worldly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the system or standards of the world

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞世界的统治者，宇宙间的势力。统治全世界的人。world power; world ruler

Terms.Localization: one who rules over the whole world

Localization.Gloss: 括土（kuo tǔ），《思》夸尔托。另有中文译本译作“夸图”。保罗在《罗马书》16章代他向罗马教会问安。Quartus

Terms.Localization: a Christian who sent greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞朱红色布。紫红色的布，染色原料是从骨螺贝类中提取的物质；生产成本高；令人联想到财富与王权。scarlet cloth

Terms.Localization: a reddish-purple cloth dyed with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish; expensive to produce; associated with wealth and royalty

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞种子，子粒。果实的核心部分，通常是谷粒或籽粒。seed

Terms.Localization: the kernel part of fruit, usually grain

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞乌鸦。黑色大鸟，喙较厚，腿相当短；非常聪明；鸦科。raven

Terms.Localization: large black bird with thick strong beak, and fairly short legs; highly intelligent; Corvus family

Localization.Gloss: 可拉（kě lā），《思》科辣黑。摩西带领以色利人出埃及时一个反叛党的领袖。Korah

Terms.Localization: the leader of a rebellion against Moses

Localization.Gloss: 哥林多（gē lin duō），《思》格林多。现称“科林斯”。它是新约时代的希腊城市，在哥林多地峡南侧，位于现今希腊境内，是罗马帝国亚该亚省的首都，也是当时重要的商业中心。Corinth

Terms.Localization: a city in Greece

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞世界，天地，宇宙。宇宙，一个有序的结构。world

Terms.Localization: the universe as an ordered structure

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞篮子。用来装食物或农产品的大篮子。large basket

Terms.Localization: a relatively large basket used primarily for food or produce

Localization.Gloss: 小牀；牀垫；担架。一种相对较小且通常是暂时使用的物件，人可以倚靠或躺卧在其上；用芦苇或布料做成；轻薄方便携带。cot; pallet; stretcher

Terms.Localization: a relatively small and often temporary type of object on which a person may lie or recline; made of reeds or cloth; thin and light for carrying

Localization.Gloss: 边缘，䍁子。用来装饰长外衣底边的流苏；或者，可能与 κράσπεδον-2 的意思相同。fringe

Terms.Localization: decorative tassel attached to the bottom edge of a long outer garment; or perhaps, same as meaning (2)

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞流苏，䍁子。犹太人必须缝在外衣四角的衣裳䍁子（参民15.37-41）。tassel

Terms.Localization: the tassels which Jews were obliged to wear on the four corners of the outer garment (see Numbers 15.37-41)

Localization.Gloss: 革勒士（ge le shi），《思》克勒斯刻。保罗的同工。Crescens

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 克里特人（ke lǐ te ren），《旧》革哩底人，《思》克里特人。克里特本地的人，在克里特出生或居住的人。Cretan

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Crete

Localization.Gloss: 克里特（ke lǐ te），《旧》革哩底，《思》克里特。地中海东部的海岛，位于今日希腊境内。保罗曾经过此地，其后留下提多在此建立教会，并在各城设立长老。Crete

Terms.Localization: an island south of Greece

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞大麦。一种与小麦有点相似的谷物，但被视为不太理想的食物。barley

Terms.Localization: a grain somewhat similar to wheat, but regarded as less desirable for food

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞案件，诉讼，告状。在法院内针对某人所采取的法律行动。court case, lawsuit

Terms.Localization: legal action taken in a court of law against someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞法官，士师。主持法庭审讯并宣布判决的人。judge

Terms.Localization: one who presides over a court session and pronounces judgment

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞能够判断的。具有审断法律案件的能力。able to discern

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the ability or capacity to judge cases

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞大麦做的。κριθή“大麦”的衍生词，用大麦制成或含有大麦的食物。of barley

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κριθή barley) pertaining to being made or consisting of barley

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞审判，裁判；判决；定罪。法官作出的法律判决，定被告为有罪或无罪；法官作出有罪方应受惩罚的法律判断。judgment, verdict; condemnation

Terms.Localization: the legal decision rendered by a judge, whether for or against the accused; the legal decision of guilt liable to punishment rendered by a judge

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞野花。通常野生的花，可能是百合，也可能是其他品种。wild flower

Terms.Localization: any one of several types of flowers, usually uncultivated

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞统治；治理。统治人民。to rule, govern

Terms.Localization: to rule over people

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞审判；定罪；决定，下决心；判断，以为，认为。在思考的过程中得出结论，因而可以作出决定。to judge; be judged (pass.); sue; decide; esteem; be considered (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to come to a conclusion in the process of thinking and thus to be in a position to make a decision

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞审判，裁判；判决；控告，定罪。法官作出的法律判决，定被告为有罪或无罪；法官作出有罪方应受惩罚的法律判断。judgment, decision; accusation, condemnation

Terms.Localization: the legal decision rendered by a judge, whether for or against the accused; the legal decision of guilt liable to punishment rendered by a judge

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞正义；公正，公平 。施行正义。justice, fairness

Terms.Localization: the administration of justice

Localization.Gloss: 基利司布（jī li sī bu），《思》克黎斯颇。哥林多一个会堂的主管，他全家人听保罗讲道后都信了主，并且接受保罗的施洗。Crispus

Terms.Localization: a leader of the synagogue in Corinth

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞牲口；牲畜；牛。较大的驯养动物，主要用来乘骑和运货。beast of burden; riding animal; cattle

Terms.Localization: a larger type of domesticated animal, primarily one used for riding or carrying loads

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞狗。比较细小的浅棕色家畜，以生活垃圾、动物尸体甚至排泄物为食；令人联想到各种污秽、侵略、贪婪和地位低微。dog

Terms.Localization: relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; Canis familiaris putiatini; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status

Localization.Gloss: 古利奈人（gǔ li nai ren），《思》基勒乃人。古利奈本地人，居住或出生于古利奈的人。Cyrenian

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Cyrene

Localization.Gloss: 古利奈（gǔ li nai），《思》基勒乃。北非的一个港口城市，在利比亚境内。Cyrene

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of north Africa

Localization.Gloss: 居里扭（jū lǐ niǔ），《思》季黎诺。公元6年以后的叙利亚省总督。Quirinius

Terms.Localization: the imperial governor of Syria

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞统治力量，掌权者；权威。超自然的统治力量；一种超自然的势力，负责控制人类的命运和活动。ruling power, lordship, authority

Terms.Localization: a supernatural ruling power; a supernatural power having some particular role in controlling the destiny and activities of human beings

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞钹。敲击乐器，由两个金属圆盘组成，互相撞击以发出尖锐的碰撞声。cymbals

Terms.Localization: a percussion instrument consisting of two metal discs which were struck together in order to make a shrill, clashing sound

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小茴香（作香料的植物）。可能是一种与胡萝卜同科的植物；从底部分枝，有相似的叶子和花，但种子气味较浓烈；每年种植和收割，高度可达 50-60 厘米；种子用于烹饪和医药。cumin

Terms.Localization: probably the plant Cuminum cyminum; same family as carrot; branches from the base and has similar leaves and flowers, though seeds have a sharper smell; planted and harvested each year, reaching a height of about 50-60 cm; seeds are used in cooking and as medicine

Localization.Gloss: 塞浦路斯人（sāi pǔ lu sī ren），《旧》居比路人，《思》塞浦路斯人。出生在塞浦路斯的人。from Cyprus

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: 塞浦路斯（sāi pǔ lu sī），《旧》居比路，《思》塞浦路斯。小亚细亚南海岸外的一个海岛，位于叙利亚海岸外约96公里的地方，岛长约224公里，宽约96公里。Cyprus

Terms.Localization: an island off the south coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞主人，主；先生，大人。有权威的人；也用来指上帝，尤其是在希伯来文旧约使用“YHWH”的情况。master, owner, lord, Lord

Terms.Localization: person with authority; also used to refer to God, especially in cases where the OT would have used the Tetragrammaton "YHWH"

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞ 狗。比较细小的浅棕色家畜，以生活垃圾、动物尸体甚至排泄物为食；令人联想到各种污秽、侵略、贪婪和地位低微。dog

Terms.Localization: relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; Canis familiaris putiatini; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status

Localization.Gloss: 哥桑（gē sāng），《思》科散。以摩当的儿子，《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。Cosam

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞蚋，蚊。细小的飞虫；吸食人类和动物的血；被视为害虫。gnat; mosquito

Terms.Localization: small flying insect; feeds on human or animal blood; regarded as pest

Localization.Gloss: 哥士（岛）（gē shi (dǎo)），《思》科斯（岛）。位于米利都之南，在爱琴海上的一个小岛，新约时代属罗马帝国的亚细亚省。Cos

Terms.Localization: an island in the Aegean Sea

Localization.Gloss: 火把。一根或一捆棍棒，可以随身携带，点燃后握在手中作照明之用。torch

Terms.Localization: a stick or bundle of sticks carried about as a light

Localization.Gloss: 灯。油灯，把油和灯芯放进一个小容器内，燃烧浸透了油的灯芯可以发光。lamp

Terms.Localization: a light made by burning a wick saturated with oil contained in a relatively small vessel

Localization.Gloss: 老底嘉（lǎo dǐ jiā）人；《思》劳狄刻雅人。老底嘉的本地人，出生或居住在该城的人。Laodicean

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Laodicea

Localization.Gloss: 老底嘉（lǎo dǐ jiā），《思》劳狄刻雅。位于小亚细亚西南方，在弗吕家的一座大城，公元前约300年由安太阿卡斯二世建立，当地教会是启示录作者致函的小亚细亚七个教会之一。Laodicea

Terms.Localization: a city in Phrygia in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞国家；民族；人民。划分全世界的人的最大单位，以他们所构成的社会政治群体为依据。nation, people

Terms.Localization: the largest unit into which the people of the world are divided on the basis of their constituting a socio-political community

Localization.Gloss: 拉西亚（lā xī ya），《思》拉撒雅。位于克里特岛南岸的一座城。Lasea

Terms.Localization: a city on the south coast of the island of Crete

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞事奉，敬拜；＜复＞作为敬拜的一部分而举行的宗教仪式。service

Terms.Localization: religious rites performed as a part of worship

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞事奉，敬拜。举行宗教仪式，作为敬拜的一部分。serve; worship

Terms.Localization: to perform religious rites as a part of worship

Localization.Gloss: 拉撒路（lā sā lu），《思》拉匝禄。马大和马利亚的兄弟，住在伯大尼。耶稣常到他们家去。他死了四天，耶稣叫他从死里复活。Lazarus

Terms.Localization: the brother of Mary (b) and Martha

Localization.Gloss: 拉撒路（lā sā lu），《思》拉匝禄。耶稣比喻里的一个乞丐，他死了以后，天使把他带到亚伯拉罕的怀里。Lazarus

Terms.Localization: a beggar in a parable

Localization.Gloss: 拉麦（lā mai），《思》拉默客。玛土撒拉的儿子，挪亚的父亲。耶稣家谱中的一员。Lamech

Terms.Localization: the father of Noah in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞栽培的植物，蔬菜。在园子里栽种的任何较小的植物，如香草和蔬菜。garden plant

Terms.Localization: any one of the smaller plants cultivated in a garden, for example, herbs and vegetables

Localization.Gloss: 《现》大群（da qun），《和》群（qun），《思》军旅。一大群污灵的名字。Legion

Terms.Localization: the name of a host of demons

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞事奉；敬拜。在世俗领域或在宗教仪式中履行服事的职务。to minister; give service; serve

Terms.Localization: to perform duties of service, whether in the secular realm or in religious ceremonies

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞事奉的。与服事有关的。ministering

Terms.Localization: pertaining to giving service

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞服事；祭司的职务；礼拜。在世俗服务或在宗教仪式中服事的任务或角色。service; priestly service; divine service

Terms.Localization: an assignment or role in serving, whether in secular service or in religious ceremonies

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞仆人，公仆，供祭司职的人。提供特别服务的人。servant; public servant; priestly minister

Terms.Localization: a person who renders special service

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞麻风病人，患麻风病的。患了可怕皮肤病的人。leper; leprous

Terms.Localization: a person suffering from a dread skin disease

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小铜钱。值一分钱（quadrans）的 1/2，或一银钱（得拿利）的 1/128。lepton; tiny coin

Terms.Localization: a copper (or bronze) coin worth 1/2 of a quadrans or 1/128 of a denarius

Localization.Gloss: 《现》利未的（li wei de），《和》利未人（li wei ren），《思》肋未（的）。属于利未子孙的，与利未子孙有关的。Levitical; of Levi

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being a descendant of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 利未（li wei），《思》肋未。一个收税的人，耶稣的十二使徒之一，另称为马太。Levi

Terms.Localization: a tax collector and one of the twelve apostles, generally regarded as being the same as Matthew

Localization.Gloss: 利未（li wei），《思》肋未。雅各与利亚所生的第三个儿子，利未支族的先祖。Levi

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 利未（li wei），《思》肋未。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员，是麦基的儿子，玛塔的父亲。Levi

Terms.Localization: the son of Melchi (a) in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 利未（li wei），《思》肋未。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员，是西缅的儿子，玛塔的父亲。Levi

Terms.Localization: the son of Simeon (e) in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 利未人（li wei ren），《思》肋未人。利未支派的成员，有责任担任犹太祭司的助手。Levite

Terms.Localization: a member of the tribe of Levi and having the responsibility to serve as an assistant to Jewish priests

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞毛巾。大概指用亚麻布制成的毛巾，主要用来把物品擦干。towel

Terms.Localization: a piece of cloth (probably made of linen) used primarily for drying

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞麻风病，皮肤病。可怕的皮肤状况，包括现今所称的麻风病，以及某些其他类型的传染性皮肤病，导致病人被其他人视为在礼仪上不洁净，因而不得与其他人有正常的社交生活 。leprosy

Terms.Localization: a dreaded condition of the skin, including what is now regarded as leprosy, as well as certain other types of infectious skin diseases, resulting in a persons being regarded as ceremonially unclean and thus excluded from normal relations with other people

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞狮子。最大型的猫科动物，身长从头部到尾部通常约有 2.8 米，肩高达一米；浅黄褐色；成年雄性在颈部和肩膀上有长鬃毛，颜色比身上皮毛较深；不洁的动物；令人联想到攻击和力量。lion

Terms.Localization: largest of the great cats, often about 2.8 m from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 m at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; adult males have a mane around the neck and shoulders that is darker than the rest of their fur; Panthera leo; unclean animal; associated with aggression and strength

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞压酒；酒榨。压榨葡萄的工具；压榨出来的葡萄汁用于酿造葡萄酒。wine press

Terms.Localization: an instrument for pressing out the juice of grapes for the making of wine

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞香炉。用来烧香的碗状器皿。censer

Terms.Localization: a bowl in which incense is burned

Localization.Gloss: 《现》自由人（zi you ren），《和》利百地拿（li bǎi di na），《思》自由人。（拉丁名）一群人，大概是犹太人，曾经是奴隶，后来获得自由；他们的会堂也同样以“自由人”这名为人所认识。Freedmen

Terms.Localization: (a Latin name) a group of people, presumably Jews, who had been slaves but later obtained their freedom; their synagogue was also known by the same name

Localization.Gloss: 利比亚（li bǐ ya），《旧》吕彼亚，《思》利比亚。北非地中海沿岸地区，又称路比、弗、路德，位于埃及的西面。Libya

Terms.Localization: a district in north Africa

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞铺石路面，石砌阶。耶路撒冷的一个地区，用扁平石块铺砌，形成一个庭院（不是一条通道）。Stone Pavement

Terms.Localization: an area in Jerusalem, paved with flat blocks of stone and forming a kind of courtyard (not a thoroughfare)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞乳香。某些树木的芳香树脂。frankincense

Terms.Localization: the aromatic resin of certain trees

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞亚麻；麻纱衣服，细麻衣。亚麻布，通常披搭成一件衣服。linen; linen garment

Terms.Localization: linen cloth, normally in the form of a garment

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞灯芯。放在油灯里的一根麻绳，用来汲取灯油。wick

Terms.Localization: a linen cord in a lamp that draws up the oil

Localization.Gloss: 《现》利努（li nǔ），《和》利奴（li nu），《思》理诺。在《提摩太后书》4章中，与保罗一起向提摩太问安的基督徒。Linus

Terms.Localization: a Christian who sent greetings in |s2TI.4:21|s*

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞合理的；理所当然的；真实的；真的。形容是真实的，意思是符合事物的真实本质。rational, genuine, true
