Terms.Localization: Pertaining to being genuine, in the sense of being true to the real and essential nature of something

Localization.Gloss: 路加（lu jiā），《思》路加。一名外邦基督徒，是一位医生，曾经和保罗一起同工。历代教会均认为他就是《路加福音》和《使徒行传》的作者。Luke

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul who is generally regarded as the author of Luke and the Acts of the Apostles

Localization.Gloss: 路求（lu qiu），《思》路基约。吉利奈人，安提阿教会的先知和教师。Lucius

Terms.Localization: a teacher and prophet at Antioch

Localization.Gloss: 路求（lu qiu），《思》路基约。在《罗马书》16章与保罗一同发出问安的一位罗马基督徒。Lucius

Terms.Localization: a person sending greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞矛枪。有锋利尖头的长形武器，用来刺、插，或投掷。spear (or spear point)

Terms.Localization: a long weapon with sharpened end used for piercing by thrusting or as a projectile by hurling

Localization.Gloss: 吕底亚（lǚ dǐ ya），《思》里狄雅。腓立比一个卖紫色布匹的妇女，是推雅推喇城的人，素来敬拜上帝。她听保罗讲道归信了基督，她和她一家的人都接受了洗礼。Lydia

Terms.Localization: a woman merchant of purple cloth from Thyatira who was converted by Paul

Localization.Gloss: 吕高尼话（lǚ gāo ni hua），《思》吕考尼雅话。吕高尼地方的人所说的语言。在希腊文原文，这个词是副词，意思是用吕高尼话（说）。Lycaonian

Terms.Localization: in the Lycaonian language, in Lycaonian

Localization.Gloss: 吕高尼（lǚ gāo ni），《思》吕考尼雅。小亚细亚内陆的一个省，在罗马帝国加拉太的中部地区，今土耳其境内。Lycaonia

Terms.Localization: a province in the interior of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 吕家（lǚ jiā），《思》里基雅。罗马帝国的省份，在小亚细亚南岸地区，现今土耳其的境内。Lycia

Terms.Localization: a projection on the south coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 吕撒聂（lǚ sā nie），《思》吕撒尼雅。施洗约翰传道时期，亚比利尼的分封王。Lysanias

Terms.Localization: a tetrarch of Abilene

Localization.Gloss: 吕西亚（lǚ xī ya），《思》里息雅。克劳第．吕西亚，在耶路撒冷驻守的一个罗马军官。“吕西亚”是希腊名字，他买了罗马的国籍后，加上“克劳第”这个罗马名字。Lysias

Terms.Localization: Claudius Lysias, a Roman officer in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞救赎，释放，使自由。释放，与释放奴隶的过程相类似。redeem

Terms.Localization: to release or set free, with the implied analogy to the process of freeing a slave

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞释放者，解救者。释放或解救别人的人。deliverer, redeemer

Terms.Localization: a person who liberates or releases others

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞灯台。可以放置一盏灯或好几盏灯的支架。lampstand

Terms.Localization: a stand designed to hold a single lamp or a series of lamps

Localization.Gloss: 吕大（lǚ da），《思》里达。彼得医治瘫痪的以尼雅的地方，即旧约时代的“罗德”，位于约帕的东南方。Lydda

Terms.Localization: a city southeast of Joppa

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞狼。野生的四足捕食犬科动物；浅棕色皮毛，类似于豺，但体型大很多；被视为贪婪和凶猛的动物；常常捕食羊群；是遍地游行、机会主义、危险、凶猛，和灵巧盗贼的象征。wolf

Terms.Localization: wild, four-footed, predatory canine; light-brown fur, similar to jackal, but much bigger; Canis lupus; regarded as ravenous and fierce; commonly prey on flocks; symbol of roaming, opportunistic, dangerous, fierce, and clever banditry

Localization.Gloss: 路司得（lu sī de），《思》吕斯特辣。小亚细亚吕高尼省内的一个城市，位于以哥念和特庇之间。Lystra

Terms.Localization: a city in Lycaonia in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞释放的方法；赎金；赎价。使人得以获释或得救的方法或途径。ransom, means of release

Terms.Localization: the means or instrument by which release or deliverance is made possible

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞救赎，释放，自由。释放的行为，与释放奴隶的过程相类似。redemption, deliverance, liberation

Terms.Localization: the act of releasing or setting free, with the implied analogy to the process of freeing a slave

Localization.Gloss: 灯。油灯，把油和灯芯放进一个小容器内，燃烧浸透了油的灯芯可以发光。lamp

Terms.Localization: a light made by burning a wick saturated with oil contained in a relatively small vessel

Localization.Gloss: 罗以（Luo yǐ）；《现》罗绮；《思》罗依。提摩太的外祖母。Lois

Terms.Localization: the grandmother of Timothy

Localization.Gloss: 罗得（luo de），《思》罗特。哈兰的儿子，亚伯拉罕的侄子。他和亚伯拉罕一同迁往迦南。Lot

Terms.Localization: the nephew of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 马加丹（mǎ jiā dān），《思》玛加丹。在加利利湖西岸的一个地方，其确实地点无从考据。Magadan

Terms.Localization: a place of uncertain location on the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 抹大拉（mǒ da lā），《思》玛达肋纳。抹大拉（位于加利利湖西岸）的一个妇女马利亚的属性名字，表明她来自抹大拉。Magdalene

Terms.Localization: the attributive name of Μαρία (c), a woman of Magdala

Localization.Gloss: 玛各（mǎ ge），《思》玛哥格。一个含义隐晦的名字，用来指敌对上帝、将被弥赛亚征服的国家或人民。Magog

Terms.Localization: a cryptic name to designate an enemy to be conquered by the Messiah

Localization.Gloss: 米甸（mǐ dian），《思》米德杨。西奈半岛的一个地区，在阿拉伯沙漠的西南区。Midian

Terms.Localization: a region in the Sinai peninsula and nearby Arabia

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞作门徒；使人作门徒。作某人的跟随者或门徒，意思是坚持领袖的教导或指示，并促进这位领袖的事业发展；使人作某个人的门徒或跟随者。be or become a disciple; make disciples, cause people to become followers

Terms.Localization: to be a follower or a disciple of someone, in the sense of adhering to the teachings or instructions of a leader and in promoting the cause of such a leader; to cause someone to become a disciple or follower of

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞门徒，学生，跟随者。某人的门徒或跟随者。disciple

Terms.Localization: a person who is a disciple or follower of someone ‎

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞女门徒。女门徒。disciple (female)

Terms.Localization: a disciple who is a woman

Localization.Gloss: 马太（mǎ tai），《思》玛窦。一名税吏，耶稣的十二门徒之一，一般认为他就是 Λευί[a]“利未”。Matthew

Terms.Localization: a tax collector and one of the twelve apostles, generally regarded as being the same as Λευί Levi

Localization.Gloss: 玛塔（mǎ tǎ），《思》玛塔特。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。利未的儿子，希里的父亲。Matthat

Terms.Localization: the father of Eli in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 玛塔（mǎ tǎ），《思》玛塔特。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。利未的儿子，约令的父亲。Matthat

Terms.Localization: the father of Jorim in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 马提亚（mǎ ti ya），《思》玛弟亚。耶稣的门徒，在耶稣升天之后，被拣选取代加略人犹大成为十二使徒之一。Matthias

Terms.Localization: the person elected to take the place of the apostle Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 玛土撒拉（mǎ tǔ sā lā），《思》默突舍拉。耶稣家谱中的一员。以诺的儿子，拉麦的父亲，挪亚的祖父。他是圣经中最长寿的人，共活了969岁。Methuselah

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞幸福，福泽，高兴。快乐的状态，暗指有利的环境。happiness, blessedness

Terms.Localization: a state of happiness, implying favorable circumstances

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞认为…是有福或快乐的，称…为有福。由于有利的环境而认为某人是快乐或有福的。regard as happy, consider blessed, call blessed

Terms.Localization: to regard someone as happy or fortunate in view of favorable circumstances

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞有福的，快乐的；有福的那一位。有福的，暗示享受着有利的环境。happy, blessed; blessed one

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being happy, with the implication of enjoying favorable circumstances

Localization.Gloss: 马其顿（mǎ qi dun），《思》马其顿。罗马帝国的一省，位于亚该亚省的北部，就是现今希腊的东北部。Macedonia

Terms.Localization: a Roman province in Greece

Localization.Gloss: 马其顿人（mǎ qi dun ren），《思》马其顿人。马其顿本地的人，在马其顿出生或居住的人。Macedonian

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 玛勒列（mǎ le lie），《思》玛拉肋耳。耶稣家谱中的一员。塞特的后裔，该南的儿子，雅列的父亲，约瑟（耶稣的父亲）的先祖。Mahalaleel

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 马念（mǎ nian），《思》玛纳恒。安提阿教会的先知和教师，是教会领袖之一；也是分封王希律的朝廷亲信。他曾参与差遣巴拿巴和保罗外出宣教。Manaen

Terms.Localization: a prophet and teacher in the church at Antioch

Localization.Gloss: 玛拿西（mǎ na xī），《思》默纳协。约瑟在埃及所生的长子，是以色列的玛拿西支族的先祖；这个支族的人拥有约旦河两岸的土地。Manasseh

Terms.Localization: a son of Ἰωσήφ (a) and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 玛拿西（mǎ na xī），《思》默纳舍。耶稣家谱中的一员。犹大王，希西家的儿子。Manasseh

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 马利亚（mǎ li ya），《思》玛利亚。耶稣的母亲。Mary

Terms.Localization: the mother of Jesus Christ

Localization.Gloss: 马利亚（mǎ li ya），《思》玛利亚。伯大尼的马利亚，是马大和拉撒路的姊妹。Mary

Terms.Localization: a sister of Martha and Lazarus (1)

Localization.Gloss: 马利亚（mǎ li ya），《思》玛利亚。抹大拉的马利亚，曾有七只鬼缠住她。她得到耶稣的医治后，就一直跟随耶稣。Mary

Terms.Localization: Mary Magdalene, a follower of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 马利亚（mǎ li ya），《思》玛利亚。雅各和约西的母亲。Mary

Terms.Localization: the mother of James (4) and Joseph (7)

Localization.Gloss: 马利亚（mǎ li ya），《思》玛利亚。革罗罢的妻子。Mary

Terms.Localization: the wife of Clopas

Localization.Gloss: 马利亚（mǎ li ya），《思》玛利亚。约翰．马可的母亲。Mary

Terms.Localization: the mother of John (4) Mark

Localization.Gloss: 马利亚（mǎ li ya），《思》玛利亚。罗马的马利亚。她是在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒，曾为罗马的教会辛劳工作。Mary

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞作见证，作证，作证人；证明，肯定，证实。提供有关某人或某事件的信息，所提供的信息是说话者直接取得的第一手资料。bear witness; testify; be a witness; attest; affirm; confirm

Terms.Localization: to provide information about a person or an event concerning which the speaker has direct knowledge

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞证言，见证；证据；声望。所见证或所说的内容；根据对个人品行的评价来评论一个人。testimony, witness, evidence; reputation

Terms.Localization: the content of what is witnessed or said; that which is said about a person on the basis of an evaluation of the persons conduct

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞证言，见证；证据；作证的机会。所见证或所说的内容testimony; witness; evidence; proof; opportunity to testify

Terms.Localization: the content of what is witnessed or said

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞作证，郑重地告诉；坚持，劝告，警告。基于假定的个人知识作出严肃的声明；以加强的语气说出观点或愿望。testify; address solemnly; insist; urge

Terms.Localization: to make a serious declaration on the basis of presumed personal knowledge; to be emphatic in stating an opinion or desire

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞空谈。没有益处的谈话，因此是无聊的和无意义的。empty talk

Terms.Localization: talk which has no beneficial purpose and is thus idle and meaningless

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞空谈者，说荒唐无稽的话的人。参与空谈和闲聊的人。empty talker

Terms.Localization: one who engages in empty and idle talk

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞变得虚妄；变得没有价值。变得无用，因此变得没有价值。become worthless, become nonsense

Terms.Localization: to become useless and hence worthless

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞没有价值，虚妄。基于是无效和没有内容而无用的 。worthlessness; futility

Terms.Localization: quality of being useless on the basis of being futile and lacking in content

Localization.Gloss: 马但（mǎ dan），《思》玛堂。《马太福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。以利亚撒的儿子，雅各的父亲。Matthan

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 玛达他（mǎ da tā），《思》玛塔塔。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。拿单的儿子，大卫的孙子。Mattatha

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 玛他提亚（mǎ tā ti ya），《思》玛塔提雅。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。亚摩斯的儿子，约瑟的父亲。Mattathias

Terms.Localization: the son of Amos in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 玛他提亚（mǎ tā ti ya），《思》玛塔提雅。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。西美的儿子，玛押的父亲。Mattathias

Terms.Localization: the son of Semein in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 玛押（mǎ yā），《思》玛哈特。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。Maath

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 马勒古（mǎ le gǔ），《思》玛耳曷。大祭司的仆人。耶稣被卖的那一夜，彼得用刀砍下他的右耳，耶稣却医好了他。Malchus

Terms.Localization: the high priests slave whom Peter wounded

Localization.Gloss: 马大（mǎ da），《思》玛尔大。马利亚和拉撒路的姊妹。Martha

Terms.Localization: a sister of Mary (b) and Lazarus (a) of Bethany

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞见证人；殉道者。作见证的人；因见证自己的信仰而被剥夺性命的人。witness; martyr

Terms.Localization: a person who witnesses; a person who has been deprived of life as the result of bearing witness to his beliefs

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞无价值的，虚幻的，无用的。基于是无效和没有内容而无用的。worthless; futile; useless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being useless on the basis of being futile and lacking in content

Localization.Gloss: 马可（mǎ kě），《思》马尔谷。又称为约翰．马可，马可是罗马名字，约翰是犹太名字。教会传统认为他就是写马可福音的作者。Mark

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul who was also called John (4)

Localization.Gloss: 大能的作为；伟大的作为；大作为。一个重要和有能力的行为。mighty act, great deed

Terms.Localization: a deed of importance and power

Localization.Gloss: 至高荣耀；威严的荣耀。上帝的头衔，字面意思：威严的荣耀。Sublime Glory, Majestic Glory

Terms.Localization: a title for God, literally majestic glory

Localization.Gloss: 至大者；至威严者。（上帝的头衔，直译：威严）威严伟大的那一位。the Majesty, the Majestic One

Terms.Localization: (a title for God, literally majesty) one who is characterized by majesty and greatness

Localization.Gloss: 米利亚（mǐ li ya），《思》默肋阿。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。买南的儿子，以利亚敬的父亲。Melea

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 马耳他（mă ĕr tā），《旧》米利大，《思》默里达。地中海的一个海岛，位于西西里岛南部。Malta

Terms.Localization: an island located south of Sicily

Localization.Gloss: 麦基洗德（mai jī xǐ de），《思》默基瑟德。意思是“公义的王”。他是亚伯拉罕时代的撒冷王，也是至高上帝的大祭司。Melchizedek

Terms.Localization: a king of Salem and priest of the Most High God in the time of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 麦基（mai jī），《思》默耳希。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。雅拿的儿子，利未的父亲。Melchi

Terms.Localization: the father of Levi in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 麦基（mai jī），《思》默耳希。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。亚底的儿子，尼利的父亲。Melchi

Terms.Localization: the father of Neri in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 羊皮纸；羊皮纸制成的书或卷轴。可以用笔墨在上面写字的特制兽皮；用这种兽皮制成的书或卷轴。parchment; books made of parchment

Terms.Localization: a sheet of specially prepared animal skin on which one could write with pen and ink; books or scrolls made of such skin

Localization.Gloss: 买南（Mǎi nan）；《思》门纳。耶稣家谱中的一员，是玛达他的儿子，米利亚的父亲。Menna

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞分配者，仲裁人，协调人。在冲突中担当调停者，判断哪一方对，哪一方错。arbitrator

Terms.Localization: someone who mediates in a conflict and determines who is right and who is wrong

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞中间人，调解人，中保。促成或帮助各方达成协议的人，有保证协议之确定性的含义。mediator

Terms.Localization: one who causes or helps parties to come to an agreement, with the implication of guaranteeing the certainty of the arrangement

Localization.Gloss: 美索不达米亚（měi suǒ bu da mǐ ya），《旧》米所波大米，《思》美索不达米亚。旧约指的是哈兰平原，在幼发拉底河和底格里斯河上游之间的区域。也称作“新月形肥沃区”。Mesopotamia

Terms.Localization: the valley of the Euphrates and Tigris rivers

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞半空中，在高空。天空中的一个点或区域，就在地球的上方。midheaven, midair, high in the sky

Terms.Localization: a point or region of the sky directly above the earth

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞分隔的墙。把一个区域与另一个区域分隔开的墙壁或篱笆。dividing wall

Terms.Localization: a wall or fence which separates one area from another

Localization.Gloss: 弥赛亚（mi sai ya），《思》默西亚。（直译：受膏者；等同于希伯来文的弥赛亚）在《新约》中，这是耶稣作为弥赛亚的头衔，但在许多经文中，尤其是不带定冠词的时候，“基督”成为了耶稣名字的一部分。Messiah

Terms.Localization: (literally one who has been anointed) in the NT, title for Jesus as the Messiah, but in many contexts, and especially without an article, Χριστός becomes a part of the name of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞懊悔，后悔；改变主意。改变自己对某事的想法，可能有后悔的含义。change one's mind; repent; regret

Terms.Localization: to change one's mind about something, with the probable implication of regret

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞悔改；懊悔；改变行事方式。一个人由于对罪和义的想法及态度彻底改变了，因此改变自己的生活方式。repent

Terms.Localization: to change one's way of life as the result of a complete change of thought and attitude with regard to sin and righteousness

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞悔改，心灵改变，转离罪恶，生活方式改变。一个人由于对罪和义的想法及态度彻底改变了，因此改变自己的生活方式的过程。repentance

Terms.Localization: the process of changing one's way of life as the result of a complete change of thought and attitude with regard to sin and righteousness

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞分享，参加；分担；属于。共享某物的所有权，包括一顿饭；属于某个团体的成员。partake, participate; belong to

Terms.Localization: to share in the possession of something, including a meal; to be included in the membership of a group

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞合伙关系，合作。有着共同目的和活动的关系。partnership, sharing

Terms.Localization: a relationship involving shared purposes and activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞温和待人，体谅人。态度温和地对待某人。deal gently

Terms.Localization: to be gentle in one's attitude toward someone

Localization.Gloss: 墨水。用于书写或标记的深色液体。ink

Terms.Localization: a dark liquid used in writing or marking

Localization.Gloss: 同伴；伙伴；同工。在生意或事业上与人合伙的人。partner; companion; partaker

Terms.Localization: one who shares with someone else as an associate in an enterprise or undertaking

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞羊皮；羊毛。经过鞣酸处理的、带羊毛的绵羊皮。sheepskin; fleece

Terms.Localization: the tanned hide of sheep with the hair adhering

Localization.Gloss: 米底亚人（mǐ dǐ ya ren），《思》玛待人。（Μηδία“米底亚”的衍生词，原词没有出现在《新约》中）米底亚的本地人，在米底亚出生或居住的人。Mede

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Μηδία Media, not occurring in the NT) a person who is a native of Media

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞弄脏，污染。使某人在道德上或在礼仪上有污点或变得污秽。defile; be defiled (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to cause someone to be morally or ceremonially tainted or defiled

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞败坏，沾污。被邪恶污染或玷污的状态。defilement

Terms.Localization: a state of being tainted or stained by evil

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞雇工，劳工。（μισθόομαι“雇用”的衍生词）受雇提供特定服务或工作的人。hired worker; hired person

Terms.Localization: (derivative of μισθόομαι to hire) a person who has been hired to perform a particular service or work

Localization.Gloss: 米推利尼（mǐ tuī li ni），《思》米提肋乃。罗马帝国的自由城，爱琴海东面的莱斯博斯岛东岸的主要城市。在今日土耳其西部海岸。Mitylene

Terms.Localization: the chief city on the island of Lesbos in the Aegean Sea

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā le），《思》弥额尔。天使长的名字。他曾经帮助上帝的百姓对抗波斯和希腊的魔君和恶势力；也曾为摩西的尸首跟魔鬼争辩。Michael

Terms.Localization: the name of the chief angel

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞败坏，沾污。被邪恶污染或玷污的状态。defilement

Terms.Localization: a state of being tainted or stained by evil

Localization.Gloss: 米利都（mǐ li dū），《思》米肋托。古代小亚细亚西岸的希腊港口城市，位于以弗所以南，今天仍保留此名。Miletus

Terms.Localization: a seaport city on the west coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞雇工，劳工。（μισθόομαι“雇用”的衍生词）受雇提供特定服务或工作的人 。hired worker; hired person

Terms.Localization: (derivative of μισθόομαι to hire) a person who has been hired to perform a particular service or work

Localization.Gloss: 拿孙（na sūn），《思》木纳松。塞浦路斯人，住在耶路撒冷的基督徒。他在保罗第三次宣教旅程结束返回耶路撒冷时，接待了保罗和他的外邦同伴。Mnason

Terms.Localization: a Christian from Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞（一个）金币，《和》（十锭）银子，《思》米纳。弥拿，希腊硬币，值 100 得拿利 [δηνάρια] 或六十分之一他连得 [τάλαντον]。 quantity of money; one hundred denarii

Terms.Localization: a Greek monetary unit worth one hundred denarii

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞坟墓；纪念碑。为纪念死去的人而立的石碑。monument; memorial

Terms.Localization: a monument built as a memorial to someone who has died

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞订婚，许配。和某人订下婚约。be engaged (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to promise a person for marriage

Localization.Gloss: 坟墓；墓穴。为埋葬死人而建的墓穴；通常是天然的洞穴，也可能是从基岩开凿而成。grave; tomb

Terms.Localization: a construction for the burial of the dead; often a natural cave or hewn out of bedrock

Localization.Gloss: 淫妇。通奸的女人。adulteress

Terms.Localization: a woman who commits adultery

Localization.Gloss: 不忠；淫乱。（名词 μοιχαλίς“淫妇”的引申义）指不忠于自己早期的真实的信仰。unfaithful, adulterous

Terms.Localization: (a figurative extension of meaning of the substantive μοιχαλίς adulteress) pertaining to being unfaithful to one's earlier and true beliefs

Localization.Gloss: 犯奸淫；通奸。已婚男子和别人的妻子发生性行为；或已婚女子与别人的丈夫发生性行为。commit adultery

Terms.Localization: (for a man) to have sexual intercourse with a married woman other than his own spouse; (for a married woman) to have sexual intercourse with a man other than her own spouse

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞淫乱，通奸。已婚男子和别人的妻子发生性行为。adultery

Terms.Localization: sexual intercourse between a man and a married woman who is not his wife

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞犯奸淫；通奸。已婚男子和别人的妻子发生性行为；或已婚女子与别人的丈夫发生性行为。commit adultery

Terms.Localization: (for a man) to have sexual intercourse with a married woman other than his own spouse; (for a married woman) to have sexual intercourse with a man other than her own spouse

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞行淫者，犯奸淫的人。通奸的人，特指男性，在一般情况下也包括女性。adulterer

Terms.Localization: a person who commits adultery, specifically referring to males, but also including females in generic contexts

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞污秽。污秽的状态，包括宗教和道德两方面。defilement

Terms.Localization: a state of defilement, involving both religious and moral aspects

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞弄脏，沾污。使某物变脏或被弄污。to soil; be defiled (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to cause something to become dirty or soiled

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞做牛犊偶像；塑造牛犊形像的偶像。制作牛犊形像的偶像。make a calf-idol; shape an idol in the form of a calf

Terms.Localization: to make an idol in the form of a calf

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞篮子；盒子。盛载干物的容器，容量约为八升（约两加仑）。basket; box

Terms.Localization: a container for dry matter with a capacity of about eight liters (about two gallons)

Localization.Gloss: 摩洛；《思》摩肋客。一个迦南神的名字。Moloch

Terms.Localization: the name of a Canaanite god

Localization.Gloss: 牛犊。牛的幼崽。calf

Terms.Localization: the young of cattle

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞碾磨器的。μύλος“碾磨器”的衍生词，指与用来磨碎谷物的石磨有关的。of a mill

Terms.Localization: (derivatives of μύλος "mill") pertaining to a stone mill for grinding grain

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞用香膏涂抹；为安葬而膏抹。μύρον“香膏”的衍生词，意思是浇上香油或香膏，通常与丧葬有关。anoint with perfume; anoint for burial

Terms.Localization: (derivative of μύρον perfume) to anoint with perfumed oil or ointment, often in connection with burial

Localization.Gloss: 每西亚（měi xī ya），《思》米息雅。罗马帝国的一个省份，位于小亚细亚西北面。Mysia

Terms.Localization: a province in northwest Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 磨的。（μύλος“磨”的衍生词）与磨谷的石磨相关的。of a mill

Terms.Localization: (derivatives of μύλος "mill") pertaining to a stone mill for grinding grain

Localization.Gloss: 磨。由两块扁石构成的用具，只要转动上磨石，便可以把谷物磨成面粉。mill

Terms.Localization: a construction of two flat stones between which grain was ground into flour by rotating the top stone

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞磨石。一种大的圆扁石，无论是上磨石还是下磨石，用来碾磨谷粒。millstone

Terms.Localization: a large, round, flat stone, either upper or lower, used in grinding grain

Localization.Gloss: 每拉（měi lā），《思》米辣。罗马帝国吕家省的省会城市，是古代良港，位于小亚细亚西南面。Myra

Terms.Localization: a city on the south coast of Lycia in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞香膏，香水，香油。一种十分芳香和昂贵的膏油。perfume; perfumed oil

Terms.Localization: a strongly aromatic and expensive ointment

Localization.Gloss: 摩西（mo xī），《思》梅瑟。字义是“从水里拉出来”。摩西是以色列民族的第一位领袖，带领以色列人离开埃及，并向以色列人颁布上帝的律法。Moses

Terms.Localization: the leader of the Israelites out of Egypt and the lawgiver

Localization.Gloss: 拿顺（na shun），《思》纳赫雄。耶稣家谱中的一员。亚米拿达的儿子，撒门的父亲。Nahshon

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 拿该（na gāi），《思》纳革。耶稣家谱中的一员。玛押的儿子，以斯利的父亲。Naggai

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 拿撒勒（na sā le），《思》纳匝肋。加利利中南部山区的一个小镇，距离耶路撒冷约140公里。Nazareth

Terms.Localization: a town in the south central part of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 拿撒勒人（na sā le ren）／拿撒勒的（na sā le de），《思》纳匝肋人／纳匝肋的。拿撒勒本地的人，在拿撒勒出生或居住的人；来自拿撒勒的。Nazarene

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Nazareth

Localization.Gloss: 拿撒勒人（na sā le ren）／拿撒勒的（na sā le de），《思》纳匝肋人。Ναζαρηνός的另一种拼写法；拿撒勒本地的人，在拿撒勒出生或居住的人。来自拿撒勒的。Nazarene

Terms.Localization: an alternative form of Ναζαρηνός

Localization.Gloss: 拿但业（na dan ye），《思》纳塔乃耳。耶稣的门徒，来自加利利的迦拿。耶稣称他为“地道的以色列人”，因为他心里毫无诡诈。Nathanael

Terms.Localization: a disciple of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 拿单（na dān），《思》纳堂。耶稣家谱中的一员。大卫的儿子，玛达他的父亲。Nathan

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 乃幔（nǎi man），《思》纳阿曼。以利沙时代叙利亚国的元帅。他患了麻风病，向以利沙求医，结果得到医治。耶稣以他为例，证明上帝的恩典临到外邦人。Naaman

Terms.Localization: a Syrian army commander healed by Elisha

Localization.Gloss: 拿因（na yīn），《思》纳因。加利利南面的一座城。Nain

Terms.Localization: a city in southern Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 拿鸿（na hong），《思》纳洪。耶稣家谱中的一员，是以斯利的儿子，亚摩斯的父亲。Nahum

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞圣殿；至圣所，圣所。人们在其中敬奉神明的建筑物（至于耶路撒冷的圣殿，则也被视为上帝的住处）。temple; sanctuary

Terms.Localization: a building in which a deity is worshiped (in the case of the Temple in Jerusalem, a place where God was also regarded as dwelling)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞神庙模型或神龛。神殿或神龛的小型复制品或模型。replica temple; model of a shrine

Terms.Localization: a small replica or model of a temple or shrine

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞船。用来运送货物或载人的大型远洋船。ship

Terms.Localization: a larger ocean-going vessel used for transporting cargo and people

Localization.Gloss: 拿鹤（na he），《思》纳曷尔。耶稣家谱中的一员。亚伯拉罕的祖父，他拉的父亲。Nahor

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞哪哒香膏（液）。从一种称为甘松（哪哒）的植物提取的芳香油。oil of nard; perfume of nard

Terms.Localization: an aromatic oil extracted from a plant called nard

Localization.Gloss: 拿其数（na qi shu），《思》纳尔基索。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒，保罗问候他一家信主的弟兄们。Narcissus

Terms.Localization: a person whose household is greeted in |sROM.16:11|s*

Localization.Gloss: 拿弗他利（na fu tā li），《思》纳斐塔里。雅各十二个儿子之一，他是拿弗他利支族的祖先。Naphtali

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 拿弗他利（na fu tā li），《思》纳斐塔里。拿弗他利支族的领土，在加利利海的西北部。Naphtali

Terms.Localization: the territory of the tribe of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞守殿者；庙宇的守护者。负责照管和守护圣殿或庙宇的人。guardian of the temple

Terms.Localization: one who had responsibility to tend to and to guard a temple

Localization.Gloss: 尼亚坡里（ni ya pō lǐ），《思》乃阿颇里。位于马其顿的腓立比的一个海港。Neapolis

Terms.Localization: the harbor of Philippi in Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 尼利亚（ni li ya），《思》乃勒乌。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒。Nereus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 尼利（ni li），《思》乃黎。麦基的儿子，撒拉铁的父亲。《路加福音》记载的耶稣家谱中的一员。Neri

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞禁食。在一段时间内不进食，藉此履行宗教责任。fasting; fast

Terms.Localization: the act of going without food for a set time as a religious duty

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞禁食。在一段时间内不进食，藉此履行宗教责任。fast

Terms.Localization: to go without food for a set time as a religious duty

Localization.Gloss: 尼迦挪（ni jiā nuo），《思》尼加诺尔。早期耶路撒冷教会选出的七个人之一，帮助使徒管理教会的膳食安排。Nicanor

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 《现》尼哥拉派（ni gē lā pai），《和》尼哥拉党（ni gē lā dǎng），《思》尼苛劳党。在以弗所和别迦摩的一个宗派，教会认为他们是安提阿人尼哥拉的跟从者。启示录的作者指责他们吃祭偶像之物和行奸淫。Nicolaitan

Terms.Localization: a follower of Nicolaus (a)

Localization.Gloss: 尼哥德慕（ni gē de mu），《旧》尼哥底母，《思》尼苛德摩。法利赛人，是犹太人的领袖和教师。他曾夜里来找耶稣谈话。他也是议会的成员，曾为耶稣辩护。耶稣死后，他和亚利马太人约瑟一同安葬耶稣。Nicodemus

Terms.Localization: a member of the Sanhedrin who spoke with Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 尼哥拉（ni gē lā），《思》尼苛劳。早期耶路撒冷教会选出的七个人之一，帮助使徒管理教会的膳食安排。Nicolas

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 尼哥坡里（ni gē pō lǐ），《思》尼苛颇里。新约时代的城市，当时最少可指九个不同的地方。保罗可能是指雅典西北方的一个城市，那是奥古斯都在公元前31年所建的。Nicopolis

Terms.Localization: a city on the west coast of Greece

Localization.Gloss: 尼尼微人（ni ni wēi ren），《思》尼尼微人。Νινευή的衍生词，原词未出现于新约。尼尼微人是尼尼微城的本地人，或居住在该城的人。尼尼微是古代亚述帝国的首都，位于底格里斯河上游东岸，是美索不达米亚地区最古老的大城市之一。Ninevite

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Νινευή Nineveh, not occurring in the NT) a person who lives in or is a native of Nineveh

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞洗涤盆。一种海碗，通常用黏土制成，用于洗手、洗脸和洗脚。washbasin

Terms.Localization: a large bowl, normally made of clay, used for washing of hands, face, and feet

Localization.Gloss: 《现》黑汉（hēi han），《和》尼结（ni jiē），《思》尼革尔。西面的别名，他是安提阿教会的先知和教师。“尼结”这个名字的意思是“黑色”，暗示他可能来自北非。Niger

Terms.Localization: an additional name of Συμεών Simeon(d), the prophet

Localization.Gloss: 法律教师，经学教师，律师。解释宗教律法的专家；或民法专家。teacher of the law; lawyer

Terms.Localization: (n) one who is an expert in interpreting religious law; or, a specialist in civil law.

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞合法地，合宜地，按规则地。根据规则和条例是正确的。lawfully; according to the rules

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being correct according to rules and regulations

Localization.Gloss: 法律教师；教法师；律法专家。精通于教导和解释律法的人（《新约》中的律法是指旧约律法）。teacher of the law; expert in the law

Terms.Localization: A person who is skilled in the teaching and interpretation of the law (in the NT referring to the law of the OT)

Localization.Gloss: 颁布律法；赐下律法。颁布或制定律法。giving of a law

Terms.Localization: the act of establishing a law

Localization.Gloss: 颁布律法；赐下律法。颁布或制定律法。enact laws; be enacted (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to give or to establish a law

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞立法者。颁布律法或制定律法的人。lawgiver

Terms.Localization: one who gives or enacts laws

Localization.Gloss: 幼鸟，雏鸟。任何在鸟巢中孵化的小鸟。young birds, nestlings

Terms.Localization: the young of any bird hatched in a nest

Localization.Gloss: 雏鸟；小鸡。任何鸟类的幼鸟。young bird, chick

Terms.Localization: the young of any bird

Localization.Gloss: 钱币。通用的官方货币。coin

Terms.Localization: common and official currency

Localization.Gloss: 法律，条例；（摩西）律法。规定人们的行事准则的正式规则（或一套规则）。law; Law (of Moses)

Terms.Localization: a formalized rule (or set of rules) prescribing what people must do

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞结婚礼堂。比较大的房间，常常用作婚礼场地。wedding hall

Terms.Localization: a relatively large room, often serving as a place for a wedding

Localization.Gloss: 宁法（ning fǎ），《思》宁法。老底嘉教会的一份子，她的家设有家庭教会。保罗曾写信问候她和她家里的教会。（也有可能是男性。）Nympha; Nymphas

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman or man

Localization.Gloss: 挪亚（nuo ya），《思》诺厄。他是当时唯一的义人，向人传悔改的道，当洪水淹没大地以前，他遵照上帝的指示建造一条大船。Noah

Terms.Localization: Old Testament figure who built an ark (boat) to escape the flood that covered the earth

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞住处，房间，客房。供离家出门的人暂住的地方。guestroom; lodging for guest; place to stay

Terms.Localization: a place of temporary lodging for a person away from home

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞瓶，罐，壶。（从拉丁文 sextarius 而来的借用词，是一种罗马的测量标准，约等于半公升，一品脱）一种小水壶或罐子。pitcher; jar

Terms.Localization: (a borrowing based on Latin sextarius, a Roman measure equal to about a half liter, one pint) a kind of small pitcher or jar

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞木的。（ξύλον“木”的衍生词）指木制的或由木头组成的。of wood; wooden

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ξύλον[a] wood) pertaining to being made or consisting of wood

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞木。指木这种物质。wood

Terms.Localization: wood as a substance

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞木柴。用作燃烧发热的木材。firewood

Terms.Localization: wood as a substance used to burn for heat

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞树。多年生木本植物，通常有一根长得很高的树干，从其上长出次生树枝 。tree

Terms.Localization: a woody perennial plant, usually with a single trunk growing to a considerable height with branches that extend from the central trunk to the sides some distance from the ground

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞棒。用来打架的大木棍。club

Terms.Localization: a heavy stick used in fighting

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞足枷，木狗。一种用两块厚重木头造成的刑具，可以牢牢地拴紧被放在木块之间的双脚。stocks

Terms.Localization: an instrument consisting of heavy blocks of wood through which the legs were placed and then securely fastened

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞十字架。（ξύλον“木”的引申义）一种死刑的刑具。cross

Terms.Localization: (a figurative extension of meaning of ξύλον[a] wood) an instrument of execution

Localization.Gloss: （隐喻）生活方式，道路。人们按照上帝的旨意应有的生活方式。(metaphorical) way to live, path

Terms.Localization: the manner in which people should lead their lives according to the Lord's will

Localization.Gloss: （上帝）的道。上帝的本性，作为。way (of the Lord, of God)

Terms.Localization: God's nature, actions

Localization.Gloss: 道。路加在《使徒行传》中描述基督教运动所用的词。the Way

Terms.Localization: Luke's term in Acts for the Christian movement

Localization.Gloss: 乌西雅；《和》乌西亚；《思》乌齐雅。耶稣家谱中的一员，是南国犹大的王。Uzziah

Terms.Localization: a Hebrew king in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞被单；亚麻布。一大块布，很可能是亚麻布。sheet; linen sheet

Terms.Localization: a large piece of cloth, probably of linen

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞细麻布。一种用亚麻植物的茎制成的高品质布料，以其坚韧耐磨和凉爽而闻名。linen cloth

Terms.Localization: a high quality cloth made from the stems of the flax plant, known for its strength and coolness

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞亲人，家人。属于某个家庭或大家庭的人。household; member of household

Terms.Localization: one who belongs to a particular household or extended family

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞家仆，仆人。一个家庭的仆人。slave; household servant

Terms.Localization: a servant in a household

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞房屋；家；住处。人所居住的建筑物或地方。house; home; dwelling; residence

Terms.Localization: a building or place where one dwells

Localization.Gloss: 建筑物；建筑。任何围蔽一个区域的建筑物或结构，但该区域可以是露天的，如圆形的露天剧场或竞技场。building; structure

Terms.Localization: any type of building or structure which encloses an area, but the area may be open to the sky, as in the case of amphitheaters

Localization.Gloss: 建立；建造；建筑物；房屋。建造某物，重点在建造起来的过程，或在建造带来的结果。building up, strengthening

Terms.Localization: the construction of something, with focus on the event of building up or on the result of such an event

Localization.Gloss: 管家职责。一项涉及管理和组织的任务。stewardship

Terms.Localization: a task involving management and organization

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞管家；管理财务者，（城市的）司库。对某事物有权力和责任的人。manager, steward, treasurer

Terms.Localization: one who has the authority and responsibility for something

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞上帝的圣殿，上帝的家。即耶路撒冷的圣殿。house (of God)

Terms.Localization: house (of God), i.e. the temple in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞世界；人类居住的地方。人类居住的地面，对比于上面的天空和下面的世界。world; inhabited earth; inhabited world

Terms.Localization: the surface of the earth as the dwelling place of mankind, in contrast with the heavens above and the world below

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞怜悯，慈爱，同情。表示怜悯和关心，有体恤和同情的含意。mercy; tender compassion

Terms.Localization: mercy and concern, with the implication of sensitivity and compassion

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞仁慈的，怜悯的。οἰκτίρω“怜悯”的衍生词，指表示仁慈或怜悯。compassionate; merciful

Terms.Localization: (derivative of οἰκτίρω to have mercy) pertaining to showing mercy or compassion

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞怜悯，体恤。表示怜悯和关心，有体恤和同情的含意。have mercy; show compassion

Terms.Localization: to show mercy and concern, with the implication of sensitivity and compassion

Localization.Gloss: 房间；住处。人可以逗留的房间或住处（通常是屋子的一部分）。room; quarters

Terms.Localization: a room or quarters where one may stay (normally a part of a house)

Localization.Gloss: 酒。用葡萄汁制成的发酵饮料。wine

Terms.Localization: a fermented beverage made from the juice of grapes

Localization.Gloss: 新酒；葡萄汁。固定短语，指新近压榨的葡萄汁，未发酵的，或在发酵的初始阶段。new wine; grape juice

Terms.Localization: a set phrase referring to newly pressed grape juice, unfermented or in the initial stages of fermentation

Localization.Gloss: 小信。指相对缺乏信心。having little faith

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having relatively little faith

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞灰心的，丧志的。达到某个目标的动机有限或减弱。faint-hearted, discouraged

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having limited or diminished motivation for the attainment of some goal

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞完全的烧化祭，燔祭。献给上帝并在祭坛上完全烧尽的祭牲。whole burnt offering

Terms.Localization: an animal which has been sacrificed to God and completely burned up on the altar

Localization.Gloss: 阿林巴（ā lin bā），《思》敖林帕。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒。Olympas

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 驴驹；小驴。驴子的幼崽foal; colt

Terms.Localization: the young of a donkey

Localization.Gloss: 阿尼色弗（ā ni se fu），《思》敖乃息佛洛。保罗和提摩太认识的基督徒，热心事奉以弗所教会，并且殷勤服侍在罗马被囚的保罗。Onesiphorus

Terms.Localization: a Christian mentioned in 2 Timothy

Localization.Gloss: 阿尼西谋（ā ni xī mou），《旧》阿尼西母，《思》敖乃息摩。这名字的意义是“有用的”。他是腓利门的奴隶，保罗的助手，也是歌罗西教会的一份子。Onesimus

Terms.Localization: a slave of Philemon

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞成熟的果子。植物的成熟果子（即已经可以食用的果子）。ripe fruit

Terms.Localization: the mature fruit of plants (that is, fruit which is ready for use)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞誓言，发誓。断言陈述的真实性，如有不实，即呼吁神明来予以制裁。oath

Terms.Localization: declaration that affirms the truth of a statement by calling on a divine being to execute sanctions against a person if the statement in question is not true

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞神圣，圣洁。圣洁的品质，表达与人性品质相对比的神性品质。holiness; sanctity

Terms.Localization: the quality of holiness as an expression of the divine in contrast with the human

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞圣洁的；纯洁的；神圣的。圣洁的，意思是具有高超的道德品格，并且拥有一些本质上神圣的品格，与人的品格相对。holy, pure, divine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being holy in the sense of superior moral qualities and possessing certain essentially divine qualities in contrast with what is human

Localization.Gloss: 灾难；灾祸；遭殃；有祸。极度艰苦或痛苦的状态。disaster; horror

Terms.Localization: a state of intense hardship or distress

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞从天上。所暗示的活动来源于天上，或是从天上而来。from heaven

Terms.Localization: the sky as a source or as a location from which implied movement takes place

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞天上；天空。地面以上的空间，包括从一个地平线横跨至另一个地平线，拱悬于地面以上的穹苍，也包括太阳、月亮和星辰。heaven; sky

Terms.Localization: space above the earth, including the vault arching high over the earth from one horizon to another, as well as the sun, moon, and stars

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞天上的，在天上的，从天上来的。与天堂有关的或位于天上的。heavenly

Terms.Localization: related to or located in heaven

Localization.Gloss: 《现》耳巴努（ěr bā nǔ），《和》耳巴奴（ěr bā nu），《思》吴尔巴诺。名字可以拼写为 Urbane。他是在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒。Urbanus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 乌利亚（wū li ya），《思》乌黎雅。大卫忠心的勇士，拔示巴的丈夫。他的妻子是耶稣家谱中的一员。Uriah

Terms.Localization: a man whose wife is referred to in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 债务人；欠债人。欠债的人。debtor

Terms.Localization: a person who is in debt

Localization.Gloss: 罪人；冒犯者。犯了罪因而欠了道德债的人。sinner, offender

Terms.Localization: one who commits sin and thus incurs a moral debt

Localization.Gloss: 有义务去做的人；必须去做的人。有义务做某事的人。one who is under an obligation, one who must

Terms.Localization: one who is obligated to do something

Localization.Gloss: 债务；债。所欠的东西。debt

Terms.Localization: that which is owed

Localization.Gloss: 某人应该做的事，本分，责任。作为责任或社会义务而应该做的事。what one should do, duty

Terms.Localization: that which ought to be done as a matter of duty or social obligation

Localization.Gloss: 义务；本分；责任。出于责任感或由于承诺而必须做的事。obligation

Terms.Localization: that which one must do out of a sense of duty or as the result of commitment

Localization.Gloss: 罪；过犯；罪孽。因犯罪而欠下的道德债。wrong; sin; guilt

Terms.Localization: the moral debt incurred as the result of sin

Localization.Gloss: 欠；亏欠。由于先前接受了有价值的东西而有付款的义务。owe

Terms.Localization: to be under obligation to make a payment as the result of having previously received something of value

Localization.Gloss: 必须；必要；应该；有义务的。是必须的或不可缺少的，暗示那是有可能发生的事；鉴于道德上或法律上的要求而有义务去做。ought; must; be obligated; be bound (to an oath)

Terms.Localization: to be necessary or indispensable, with the implication of a contingency; to be obligatory in view of some moral or legal requirement

Localization.Gloss: 犯罪；得罪。对某人犯了罪，因而欠了道德债。 sin against; wrong

Terms.Localization: to commit a sin against someone and thus to incur moral debt

Localization.Gloss: 眼前的服侍，只是做给人看的。为了讨好别人而服侍。eye-service

Terms.Localization: the act of serving with a view to impressing others

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞要塞，堡垒。stronghold

Terms.Localization: a strong military fortification

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鱼。用作食物的鱼，或鱼的肉用作食物。(cooked) fish

Terms.Localization: fish intended for food or the flesh of fish as food

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞未熟的无花果，晚造的无花果。无花果树的果实，夏季末才长成（而且往往在成熟之前便掉下来）。late fig

Terms.Localization: fruit of the fig tree, produced late in the summer season (and often falling off before it ripens)

Localization.Gloss: 名字；人 ；……的种类；……的类型。一个人的名字或一个物件的名称；引申义：可能暗指一个存在的实体，或与名字相关的个人；根据对一类实体的隐含指称而产生的种类或类别。name; person, people; category of, being of the type that...

Terms.Localization: the proper name of a person or object; by extension, a person, possibly implying existence or relevance as individuals; category or kind, based on an implied designation for a class of entities

Localization.Gloss: 驴。家畜，与马同科，但体型较小，耳朵较长；颜色从深褐色到浅褐色到灰色不等，偶尔也有白色的；用于乘骑，运载重物，或做其他工作。donkey; ass

Terms.Localization: domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; Equus Asinus africanus; used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞酸酒，葡萄酒醋。便宜的酸酒，显然是穷人特别喜欢的饮料，有较好的解渴效果。sour wine, wine vinegar

Terms.Localization: a cheap, sour wine (evidently a favorite beverage of poorer people and relatively effective in quenching thirst)

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞工具，器具。任何类型的工具或器具。tool; instrument; means

Terms.Localization: any type of tool or instrument

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞武器，兵器。打斗用的兵器，可以是攻击性还是防御性的。weapon

Terms.Localization: an instrument used in fighting, whether offensive or defensive

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞誓言，发誓。断言陈述的真实性，如有不实，即呼吁神明来予以制裁。oath

Terms.Localization: declaration that affirms the truth of a statement by calling on a divine being to execute sanctions against a person if the statement in question is not true

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鸟。任何种类的鸟，野生的或家养的。bird

Terms.Localization: any kind of bird, wild or domestic

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞鸟。任何种类的鸟，野生的或家养的。bird

Terms.Localization: any kind of bird, wild or domestic

Localization.Gloss: 圣洁的；敬虔的。圣洁的，意思是具有高超的道德品格，并且拥有一些本质上神圣的品格，与人的品格相对。holy, devout

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being holy in the sense of superior moral qualities and possessing certain essentially divine qualities in contrast with what is human

Localization.Gloss: 圣者。上帝或弥赛亚。Holy One

Terms.Localization: God or the Messiah as the Holy One

Localization.Gloss: 蛇。无足的长形爬行动物；没有眼睑和外耳；通过蠕动或滑动来前行；有些品种有毒牙；象征潜在和意想不到的危险；令人联想到谎言、欺骗和迷惑人的教导。snake

Terms.Localization: long legless reptile; no eyelids or external ears; moves by wriggling or gliding; some species have a poisonous bite; symbol of lurking, unexpected danger; associated with lies, deception, and misleading teaching

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞罗网，陷阱，圈套。主要用于诱捕或网罗雀鸟的装置。trap; snare

Terms.Localization: an object used for trapping or snaring, principally of birds

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞婢女，使女，女奴。女奴隶，可能作贴身女仆，因此带有亲切关怀的含义。maid; maidservant; woman servant; servant girl

Terms.Localization: a female slave, possibly serving as a personal servant and thus with the implication of kindly regard

Localization.Gloss: 孩童。少年人，通常指青春期之前，不区分性别。child

Terms.Localization: a young person, normally below the age of puberty and without distinction as to sex

Localization.Gloss: 奴仆。奴仆，可能是贴身的仆人，因而说的比较亲切。servant; man servant

Terms.Localization: a slave, possibly serving as a personal servant and thus with the implication of kindly regard

Localization.Gloss: 新世界，新时代。一个世界更新的时代（特指弥赛亚的时代）。new world, new age

Terms.Localization: an era involving the renewal of the world (with special reference to the time of the Messiah)

Localization.Gloss: 旁非利亚（pang fēi li ya），《思》旁非里雅。小亚细亚南部的一个省，新约时代罗马帝国；在现今土耳其南部的海岸地区。Pamphylia

Terms.Localization: a province in the southern part of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 小旅店，客栈。供旅客住宿的地方。inn

Terms.Localization: a place for the lodging of travellers

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞客栈主人。负责管理客栈的人；人们只要付出一定的价格便可以在客栈里获得膳宿的安排。innkeeper; manager of a hotel

Terms.Localization: one who manages an inn as a place where people may obtain board and room at a price

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞武器和盔甲；全副军装。进攻或防御战争中使用的全副军装（但通常强调防御性的装备，包括头盔、盾牌和胸甲）。weapons and armor

Terms.Localization: a complete set of instruments used in defensive or offensive warfare (usually, however, with emphasis upon defensive armament, including helmet, shield, breastplate)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞全能者。上帝的头衔，字面意思：全能的。Almighty

Terms.Localization: a title for God, literally: all powerful

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞比喻，格言；表象，象征。具有象征意义的相对简短的叙述。parable, allegory, figure of speech

Terms.Localization: a relatively short narrative with symbolic meaning

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞传统。传统教训的内容。teaching; tradition

Terms.Localization: the content of traditional instruction

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞恳求，敦促；要求；请求；邀请，召唤。恳切而有礼地发出请求。ask for (earnestly); request; plead for; appeal to

Terms.Localization: to ask for something earnestly and with propriety

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞鼓励，劝勉；安慰，鼓舞。用言语或非言语的方式使某人得着鼓励或安慰。encourage; console

Terms.Localization: to cause someone to be encouraged or consoled, either by verbal or non-verbal means

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞违犯，不遵守，违背法律。违反既定的习俗或法律，有故意为之的含义。disobey, break the law, violate the law

Terms.Localization: to act contrary to established custom or law, with the implication of intent

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞观察。密切注意。observation

Terms.Localization: the act of watching closely or diligently

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞乐园。义人死后可以幸福地生活的居所（通常相等于ὐρανός“天堂”）。paradise

Terms.Localization: a dwelling place of the righteous dead in a state of blessedness (generally equated with οὐρανός heaven)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞恳求；要求。恳切而有礼地发出请求。earnest request; appeal

Terms.Localization: asking for something earnestly and with propriety

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞鼓励。用言语或非言语的方式使某人得着鼓励或安慰。encouragement

Terms.Localization: causing someone to be encouraged or consoled, either by verbal or non-verbal means

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞慰助者，保惠师，代求者。可以被要求提供帮助或协助的人。Helper, Encourager, Advocate

Terms.Localization: one who may be called upon to provide help or assistance

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞罪，过错。一个人在违背上帝旨意和律法时所犯的错误或失败。transgression; trespass

Terms.Localization: what a person has done in transgressing the will and law of God by some false step or failure

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞徽号；装饰船头的像。用以识别的标志，可能是船头的雕饰。emblem; figurehead

Terms.Localization: an identifying emblem, possibly a carved figurehead at the prow of a ship

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞军营，营房。士兵集中暂住的营地或兵营。soldiers quarters; barracks

Terms.Localization: a camp or barracks for soldiers

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞处女，年轻女子。青春期后为结婚和仍是处女的年轻女子（但在某些经文中，童贞并不是字词意义的焦点所在）。virgin, maiden, young woman

Terms.Localization: A female person beyond puberty but not yet married and a virgin (though in some contexts virginity is not a focal component of meaning)

Localization.Gloss: 巴米拿（bā mǐ na），《思》帕尔默纳。早期教会选出的七人之一，帮助使徒管理教会的膳食问题。教会历史传说他在罗马皇帝他雅努统治期间，在腓立比殉道。Parmenas

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞盘子，碟子。较浅的碟子，可能比 πίναξ 小一点；用陶土或金属制成。plate; dish

Terms.Localization: a relatively flat dish, probably somewhat smaller than a πίναξ; made of baked clay or metal

Localization.Gloss: 父；父亲。（上帝的头衔，字面意思：父亲）把超自然权威与关心自己子民两方面结合在一起的那一位。Father

Terms.Localization: (title for God, literally: father) one who combines aspects of supernatural authority and care for his people

Localization.Gloss: 八罗巴（bā luo bā），《思》帕特洛巴。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒。Patrobas

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 保罗（bǎo luo），《思》保禄。初期小亚细亚和希腊教会的建立者，自称是外邦的使徒。保罗是他的希腊名字，他的犹太名字是扫罗。Paul

Terms.Localization: an apostle of Jesus Christ whose Hebrew name was Saul

Localization.Gloss: 保罗（bǎo luo），《思》保禄。塞浦路斯的总督，圣经称他是个“通达人”。他在帕弗请了保罗、巴拿巴和马可来传讲上帝的道，是《使徒行传》中第一位听福音的罗马官员。Paul

Terms.Localization: Sergius Paulus, the governor of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞豹。指两种大型猫科动物：1. 金钱豹：身长约两米，黄棕色，有花环状的黑色斑点遍布全身和尾巴；爱围捕猎物；2. 猎豹：有斑点，体型比金钱豹略小，但腿较长；速度极快；象征凶残危险或速度。leopard

Terms.Localization: refers to two members of the large cat family: Panthera pardus - leopard; about 2 m in length and yellowish brown with black spots arranged in rosettes all over the body and tail; hunts by stalking prey; and Acinonyx jubatus - cheetah; spotted but are slightly smaller and have longer legs than leopards; extremely fast; symbol of violent danger or of speed (cheetah)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞宽容，放过。故意不理会或不关注某些东西或事件。passing over; leaving unpunished

Terms.Localization: the act of intentionally not regarding or being concerned about certain objects or events

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞逾越节。纪念犹太人从埃及的奴役中得释放的犹太节日。Passover

Terms.Localization: the Jewish festival commemorating the deliverance of the Jews from Egypt

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞逾越节的羊羔。一只特别挑选的羊羔（或这种羊羔的集合名词），要在逾越节被杀和被吃，藉以记念以色列人离开埃及的事件。Passover lamb

Terms.Localization: a specially selected lamb (or a collective for all such lambs) killed and eaten during the festival commemorating the departure of Israel from Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 帕大喇（pa da lǎ），《思》帕塔辣。保罗在第三次传道旅程所经之地，位于小亚细亚西南角海边的港口，在吕家省的南岸。Patara

Terms.Localization: a city in Lycia on the southwest coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 拔摩（海岛）（ba mo (hăi dăo)），《思》帕特摩（海岛）。爱琴海上一个细小的岩岛。约翰被囚禁在这岛上，看见异象，写下启示录。Patmos

Terms.Localization: a small, rocky island in the Aegean Sea

Localization.Gloss: 帕弗（pa fu），《思》帕佛。在塞浦路斯的西南海岸，是罗马帝国在当地的首府城市。Paphos

Terms.Localization: a city on the southwest coast of the island of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞试探，诱惑，试验。竭力或试图使某人犯罪的行为。temptation

Terms.Localization: the act of trying to cause someone to sin

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞试探；诱捕；诱惑。竭力或试图使某人犯罪。tempt

Terms.Localization: to endeavor or attempt to cause someone to sin

Localization.Gloss: 那试探人的。撒但就是那诱惑者。Tempter

Terms.Localization: Satan as the tempter

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞劝导，劝诱。使某人相信的方法。that which persuades; the means of convincing

Terms.Localization: the means by which someone is caused to believe

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞ 说服；使信服；劝导。说服某人相信某件事，并以该劝告为根据去行事。persuade; convince

Terms.Localization: to convince someone to believe something and to act on the basis of what is recommended

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞信靠；依靠；有（完全）信心；信心；信任。信任某事或某人，以至于完全依赖或信靠。rely on; trust in; depend on; have (complete) confidence in; confidence; trust

Terms.Localization: to believe in something or someone to the extent of placing reliance or trust in or on

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞斗篷；外套；长袍。任何类型的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞爱管闲事。干涉别人的事情。be a busybody

Terms.Localization: to meddle in the affairs of someone else

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞头盔。头部的防护装备；用于战争中。helmet

Terms.Localization: protective armor covering the head; used in battle

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞生活，行事为人。按照习惯的方式去生活或行事，重点可能放在行为的连续性上。live, behave

Terms.Localization: to live or behave in a customary manner, with possible focus upon continuity of action

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞鸽子。亚洲野鸽：灰蓝色的鸟，颈部羽毛有粉红色光泽，尾尖呈黑色；大规模聚居，主要吃种子；一年有数次求偶、交配和筑巢；筑巢在岩石上；被用作食物和祭品；象征迅速、温顺和纯真。dove; pigeon

Terms.Localization: Asiatic Rock dove: bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; Columba via; used as food and for sacrifices; regarded as swift, docile, and innocent

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞行割礼。切除男性生殖器的包皮，以此作为一种宗教仪式，表示分别为圣和种族认同。circumcise

Terms.Localization: to cut off the foreskin of the male genital organ as a religious rite involving consecration and ethnic identification

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞割礼。切除男性生殖器的包皮，以此作为一种宗教仪式，表示分别为圣和种族认同。circumcision

Terms.Localization: the act of cutting off the foreskin of the male genital organ as a religious rite symbolizing consecration and ethnic identification

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞爱管闲事的。指干涉别人的事情。being a busybody; meddling

Terms.Localization: pertaining to meddling in someone else's business

Localization.Gloss: 彼息氏（bǐ xī shi），《思》培尔息。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一名女信徒。Persis

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鸟，飞禽。任何种类的鸟，野生的或家养的。bird

Terms.Localization: any kind of bird, wild or domestic

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞脚链，脚镣。带特殊链扣的金属链，用来缠绕脚踝，限制囚犯的活动。fetter; shackle

Terms.Localization: metal chains with special links prepared to go around the ankles; used to restrict the movement of a prisoner

Localization.Gloss: 别迦摩（bie jiā mo），《思》培尔加摩。小亚细亚西北部的一个重要城市，当地教会是启示录作者致函的小亚细亚七个教会之一；位于今日土耳其西部，士每拿以北。Pergamum

Terms.Localization: an important city in northwest Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 别加（bie jiā），《思》培尔革。罗马帝国旁非利亚的一个城，在小亚细亚南岸附近，位于今日土耳其南部。Perga

Terms.Localization: a city in Pamphylia, near the south coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 彼得（bǐ de），《思》伯多禄。耶稣的十二门徒之一，初期教会的使徒，又称为“西门”，亚兰文名字是“矶法”，后者与希腊文“彼得”的意思同为“石头”。Peter

Terms.Localization: the Greek name of the leader of the twelve apostles, who was also called Cephas and whose name was originally Simon

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞舵。位于船尾的一块大木板，用来控制船只航行的方向和航线。rudder

Terms.Localization: a large plank at the stern of a ship used to direct its course

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞芸香。一种芳香的常绿植物，常用作调味品。rue

Terms.Localization: an evergreen aromatic plant used for seasoning

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞口袋，旅行袋。旅行者（或乞丐）用以携带财物的袋子。travellers bag

Terms.Localization: a bag used by travellers (or beggars) to carry possessions

Localization.Gloss: 彼拉多（bĭ lā duō），《思》比拉多。公元26/27至36年罗马帝国驻犹太地区的总督，主持耶稣的审判并下令把耶稣钉十字架。Pilate

Terms.Localization: a procurator of Judea who gave the order for the crucifixion of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞写字板。细小的写字板（通常是木制的）。tablet

Terms.Localization: a small writing tablet (normally made of wood)

Localization.Gloss: 彼西底（bǐ xī dǐ），《思》丕息狄雅。小亚细亚中部的地区，保罗和巴拿巴在传道旅程中曾经过此地。Pisidia

Terms.Localization: a region in central Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 彼西底（bǐ xī dǐ）的，《思》丕息狄雅的。指与彼西底有关的。Pisidia

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Pisidia

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞信，相信；交托；托付（把东西托付人）。相信某事是真的，因此值得信任；委托某人照管。believe; entrust; be entrusted with (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to believe something to be true and, hence, worthy of being trusted; to entrust something to the care of someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞纯的，真的。是纯的，可能意味着有可以信赖的特质 。pure; genuine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being pure, with the possible implication of a quality which can be trusted

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞确信。相信某事是真的。be convinced of

Terms.Localization: to come to believe something to be true

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞忠心的，信实的，值得信赖的；相信。指信靠的或被信靠。faithful, trustworthy; believer, believing

Terms.Localization: pertaining to trusting or being trusted

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞盘子，碟子。比较平的大盘子；用陶土或金属制成。plate, platter

Terms.Localization: a relatively flat, large dish; for serving or eating food; made of clay or metal

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞信赖；信任；有信心；信仰；信靠 。相信以至于完全信任和倚靠的态度。faith; belief; pledge; fidelity

Terms.Localization: the attitude of believing to the extent of complete trust and reliance

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞确信，凭据。完全可信的事情。proof, evidence

Terms.Localization: that which is completely believable

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞版；碑。可以刻碑文的扁平石头。tablet

Terms.Localization: a flat stone on which inscriptions could be made

Localization.Gloss: 满心相信；绝对肯定；完全确信。完全肯定某事的真相。be fully assured, be fully convinced

Terms.Localization: to be completely certain of the truth of something

Localization.Gloss: 满心相信；绝对肯定；完全确定。完全肯定某事的真相的态度。complete certainty, full assurance, full confidence

Terms.Localization: the attitude of being completely certain of the truth of something

Localization.Gloss: 完整地传讲。详细叙述信息的内容。proclaim completely

Terms.Localization: to relate fully the content of a message

Localization.Gloss: 实现；成全；应验。使事情发生，暗示要实现某个目的。to cause to happen; to make happen; to fulfill

Terms.Localization: to cause to happen, with the implication of fulfilling some purpose

Localization.Gloss: 小船。小渔船。small boat

Terms.Localization: small fishing boat

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞船。任何类型的船，小至加利利湖上的小渔船，大至大型的远航船。boat; ship

Terms.Localization: any kind of boat, from small fishing boats as on Lake Galilee to large seagoing vessels

Localization.Gloss: 邪灵，污鬼。邪恶的超自然灵体，在礼仪上不洁净，使人在礼仪上不洁净。unclean spirit

Terms.Localization: an evil supernatural spirit which is ritually unclean and which causes persons to be ritually unclean

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞灵的，属灵的。与一个人的灵性本质或灵性生命有关的。spiritual

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the spiritual nature or being of a person

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞属灵地。与一个人的灵性本质或灵性生命有关。spiritually

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the spiritual nature or being of a person

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞ 灵；上帝的灵；圣灵。三位一体上帝第三个位格的头衔，字面意思：灵。Spirit (of God)

Terms.Localization: a title for the third person of the Trinity, literally spirit

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞灵；邪灵，恶灵。非物质的超自然存在体，《新约》中最常见的邪灵。spirit; demon, evil spirit

Terms.Localization: a supernatural non-material being, most frequently evil in the NT

Localization.Gloss: 心灵，（人的）灵。潜在对上帝有感知和反应的非物质心理能力。(a person's) spirit

Terms.Localization: the non-material, psychological faculty which is potentially sensitive and responsive to the divine

Localization.Gloss: 圣灵。三位一体上帝第三个位格的头衔，字面意思：灵。Holy Spirit

Terms.Localization: a title for the third person of the Trinity, literally spirit

Localization.Gloss: 恶魔；邪灵。邪恶的超自然生物或灵体。evil spirit

Terms.Localization: an evil supernatural being or spirit

Localization.Gloss: 到脚的长袍；长衣。到脚的长袍。robe reaching to the feet; long robe

Terms.Localization: a long outer garment reaching to the feet

Localization.Gloss: 羊群。指一群绵羊（πρόβατον）和／或山羊（αἴγειος）的集合名词。flock

Terms.Localization: a collective for a group of sheep and/or goats

Localization.Gloss: 像羊群一样的人。（ποίμνιον“羊群”的引申义，原义没有出现在《新约》中）基督的追随者，组成了一个定义明确、界限清晰的群组。people who are like a flock

Terms.Localization: figurative extension of the meaning "a herd of sheep or goats" to refer to the followers of Christ constituting a well-defined membership group

Localization.Gloss: 生活；行事为人。作为某个社群的一份子，与其他人相处时有恰当的行为表现，知道履行自己的义务。live; conduct

Terms.Localization: to conduct oneself with proper reference to one's obligations in relationship to others, as part of some community

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞充满怜悯地。有极大的爱心和怜悯的。full of compassion

Terms.Localization: pertaining to great affection and compassion

Localization.Gloss: 那恶者；邪恶的人 。那本质上是邪恶的，或在某种意义上是象征邪恶的（魔鬼的头衔，字面意思：那恶者）。the Evil One

Terms.Localization: the one who is essentially evil or in a sense personifies evil (title for the devil, literally: the evil one)

Localization.Gloss: 本都人；本都的。指与本都有关的。of Pontus

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Pontus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞奸淫，淫乱，不道德的性行为；不贞。fornication; sexual immorality

Terms.Localization: the act of engaging in sexual immorality of any kind, often with the implication of prostitution

Localization.Gloss: 从事不正当的性行为。任何形式的不道德性行为，经常暗示卖淫。engage in illicit sex

Terms.Localization: to engage in sexual immorality of any kind, often with the implication of prostitution

Localization.Gloss: 紫色布。紫红色的布，用一种从骨螺取得的物质来染色；生产成本昂贵；令人联想到财富和王权。purple cloth

Terms.Localization: a reddish-purple cloth dyed with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish; expensive to produce; associated with royalty

Localization.Gloss: 部丢利（bu diū li），《思》颇提约里。罗马南部、意大利沿岸的一个城，拿坡里湾中的港口，建于公元前6世纪。Puteoli

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of Italy, south of Rome

Localization.Gloss: 布田（bu tian），《思》普登。保罗的同伴，只在《提摩太后书》的问候中提及。布田是罗马元老院议员，在尼禄的统治下为主殉道。在公元6世纪被封为圣徒。Pudens

Terms.Localization: a Christian who sends greetings

Localization.Gloss: 《现》庞修（pang xiū），《和》本丢（bĕn diū），《思》般雀。比拉多的另一个名字。 Pontius

Terms.Localization: an additional name for Pilate

Localization.Gloss: 本都（běn dū），《思》本都。意思是“海”。小亚细亚东北部的一个地区。Pontus

Terms.Localization: a region in northeast Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 部百流（bu bǎi liu），《思》颇理约。在马耳他岛上拥有最大权力的人，是该岛的岛长或酋长。Publius

Terms.Localization: the person who had the principal authority on the island of Malta

Localization.Gloss: 波求（bō qiu），《思》颇尔基约。公元59年接替腓力斯就任犹太地区的总督。根据历史家约瑟夫的记载，非斯都是一个能干的行政官，可惜在任数年就死了。Porcius

Terms.Localization: Porcius Festus, the successor to Felix as procurator of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞宫殿；堡垒。总督的住所。palace; fortress

Terms.Localization: a governor's official residence

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞长老团，众长老。由众长老组成的议会，这词强调成熟的判断力，过于他们的年龄。council of elders

Terms.Localization: a council of elders, with emphasis upon maturity of judgment more than mere age

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞长老。在犹太人和基督徒社群中，对社会和宗教事务有责任和权柄的人。elder

Terms.Localization: a person of responsibility and authority in matters of socio-religious concerns, both in Jewish and Christian societies

Localization.Gloss: 百基拉（bǎi jī lā），《思》普黎史拉／普黎斯加。亚居拉的妻子，两人是一对犹太的基督徒夫妇，生在本都。当罗马皇帝革老丢下令所有犹太人离开罗马时，他们移居到哥林多城。Prisca

Terms.Localization: the wife of Aquila

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞以前犯罪。以前的行为违背了上帝的旨意和律法。sin previously, do wrong in the past

Terms.Localization: to have behaved previously or in the past in a way that was contrary to the will and law of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞门廊；前院。位于建筑物入口前面的区域。gateway; forecourt

Terms.Localization: the area in front of an entrance to a building

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞第一个有盼望；首先有希望。预先有盼望，指事先或先于其他人有盼望。hope previously, be the first to hope

Terms.Localization: to hope in a prior manner, either beforehand or prior to someone else

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞从开始就答应，很久以前应许。提前确定地宣告将会做什么。promise beforehand

Terms.Localization: to announce with certainty in advance as to what one will do

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞事先（早已）传好消息。在耶稣基督出现之前已经传讲关于祂的好消息。bring the good news ahead of time

Terms.Localization: to spread the good news about Jesus Christ in advance of its happening

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞安息日前一天，星期五。安息日的前一天，是预备安息日的日子。day before the Sabbath, Friday

Terms.Localization: the day immediately before the Sabbath, a day of preparation for the Sabbath

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞祷告；祈祷。向上帝说话或祈求的行为或内容。prayer

Terms.Localization: the act or content of speaking to or making requests of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞祷告。向上帝说话或提出请求。pray

Terms.Localization: to speak to or to make requests of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞皈依犹太教者；归信者。归信犹太教的外邦人。Jewish convert, proselyte

Terms.Localization: a Gentile who had converted to Judaism

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞垫子，枕头。用来枕头的物件，通常是柔软的。cushion; pillow

Terms.Localization: an object, usually soft, on which one may lay one's head

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞障碍；困难；使人犯罪。可能遇到的障碍或困难。obstacle, difficulty, cause for stumbling

Terms.Localization: an obstacle or difficulty which may be encountered

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞跌倒，绊倒，失足。走路时脚撞着东西，因而暂时失去平衡。stumble

Terms.Localization: to strike one's foot against something as one walks and in this way to lose one's balance temporarily

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞崇拜，敬拜；跪拜，俯拜。用态度、可能还有身体姿态来表达对神明的忠诚和尊敬。bow down; worship

Terms.Localization: to express by attitude and possibly by position one's allegiance to and regard for deity

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞敬拜者。敬拜的人。worshiper

Terms.Localization: one who worships

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鱼。作为食物的新鲜鱼肉。fish

Terms.Localization: the flesh of fish as food

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞供，献（特别是礼物与祭物）；献祭。献上祭物或祭品，作为一种宗教仪式。offer sacrifice; make an offering

Terms.Localization: to present a sacrifice or offering as a religious act

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞令人喜悦的，可爱的。使人喜悦某事的东西。lovely, pleasing

Terms.Localization: pertaining to that which causes people to be pleased with something

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞供献，献祭，礼物；供献或献祭的行为。offering

Terms.Localization: that which is offered to God in religious activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞偏袒，偏待人。对人进行不公正的区分，对待某人比对待另一个人更好。show partiality; show favoritism, be partial; partiality

Terms.Localization: to make unjust distinctions between people by treating one person better than another

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞偏待人的人。προσωπολημπτέω“偏待人”的衍生词，指对待某个人比另一个人好的人。one who shows favoritism; respecter of persons

Terms.Localization: (derivative of προσωπολημπτέω to show favoritism) one who unjustly treats one person better than another

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞偏袒，偏待人。对待某个人比另一人好而造成的偏袒。partiality

Terms.Localization: making unjust distinctions between people by treating one person better than another

Localization.Gloss: 说预言。受上帝的灵感动说话，不管是否谈及未来的事件。to prophesy

Terms.Localization: to speak under the influence of divine inspiration, with or without reference to future events

Localization.Gloss: 先知的。指上帝默示的话语。prophetic

Terms.Localization: pertaining to divinely inspired utterances

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞先知。代表上帝发言的人。prophet

Terms.Localization: one who proclaims inspired utterances on behalf of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞女先知。受圣灵感动代表上帝宣讲信息的女子 。prophetess

Terms.Localization: a woman who proclaims inspired utterances on behalf of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞绵羊。驯养的四足食草哺乳动物；肥尾巴绵羊；用于祭祀，肉、奶、皮、毛、角都可使用。sheep

Terms.Localization: herbivorous domestic mammal with four legs; Ovis ladicaudata - fat-tailed sheep; used for sacrifice, source of meat, milk, hides, wool, and horns

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞偏见。根据不公正的偏好来做决定，暗示是过早判断。discrimination

Terms.Localization: the act of making a decision based upon unjustified preference, with the implication of prejudging

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞绊脚石。使人绊跌的东西；引申义：使人犯罪的事情。stumbling; stumbling block

Terms.Localization: that which causes someone to stumble; or, by extension, that which causes someone to sin

Localization.Gloss: 伯罗哥罗（bo luo gē luo），《思》仆洛曷洛。早期耶路撒冷教会拣选的七个人之一，帮助使徒管理教会的膳食问题。Prochorus

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞船尾。船的尾部。stern

Terms.Localization: the back part of a boat

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞船头。船的最前部。bow

Terms.Localization: the forepart of a boat

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞跌倒，犯错误，犯罪。（πταίω“跌倒”的引申义）没有遵行律法。stumble, sin

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of πταίω stumble) to fail to keep the law

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小尖塔；（圣殿的）顶点。建筑物的顶尖或顶点。pinnacle; summit (of the Temple)

Terms.Localization: the tip or high point of a building

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鸟。任何种类的鸟，包括野鸟和驯养的鸟。bird

Terms.Localization: any kind of bird, wild or domestic

Localization.Gloss: 多利买（duō li mǎi），《思》仆托肋买。是巴勒斯坦北部沿岸的重要海港，即旧约时代的“亚柯”，现今译作“托勒密”。Ptolemais

Terms.Localization: a seaport on the coast of Palestine (called Acco in OT times)

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞簸箕。一种铲状的器具，用来把已脱粒的谷物扬到空中，利用风力使粗糠与谷粒分离。winnowing shovel

Terms.Localization: a fork-like shovel for throwing threshed grain into the air so that the wind may separate the chaff from the grain

Localization.Gloss: 通道；入口；门廊。与房屋入口或建筑物入口相连的区域。gateway; entrance; vestibule

Terms.Localization: the area associated with the entrance into a house or building

Localization.Gloss: 城门。通过城墙进到城里的入口。city gate

Terms.Localization: entranceway into a city through its defensive wall

Localization.Gloss: 永恒之火的惩罚。（πῦρ“火”的引申义）形容地狱中永远的惩罚。punishment of eternal fire

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of πῦρ fire) expression for eternal punishment in hell

Localization.Gloss: 神明的力量。一种用于占卜的超自然力量。divining power

Terms.Localization: a supernatural power of divination known as Python

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞高楼；了望塔。顶部有了望台的高楼；用石砌成；用于看守葡萄园或人们聚居的地方。tower; watchtower

Terms.Localization: a tall structure with a lookout at the top; made of stone; for guarding a vineyard or a settlement

Localization.Gloss: 毕罗斯（bi luo sī），《思》丕洛。庇哩亚人，所巴特的父亲，所巴特是与保罗一起往亚西亚传道的同伴之一。Pyrrhus

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 怒火；列怒之火。（πῦρ“火”的引申义）形容上帝的刑罚。fury of fire; raging fire

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of πῦρ fire) expression for divine punishment

Localization.Gloss: 永恒之火。（πῦρ“火”的引申义）形容地狱中永远的惩罚。eternal fire

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of πῦρ fire) expression for eternal punishment in hell

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞小驴驹。驴子的幼崽。foal; colt

Terms.Localization: the young of a donkey

Localization.Gloss: 喇合；《思》辣哈布。耶稣家谱中的一个女性，旧约耶利哥城一名妓女，曾接待以色列的探子，后得蒙拯救；Ραχάβ的另一种拼写法。Rahab

Terms.Localization: a woman of Jericho mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus; also known as Ῥαχάβ

Localization.Gloss: 拉比；老师。尊贵的头衔，特指在解释犹太圣经方面的备受认可的犹太教师和学者。Rabbi

Terms.Localization: title of respect designating a Jewish teacher and scholar recognized for expertise in interpreting the Jewish Scriptures

Localization.Gloss: 拉吴（lā wu），《思》勒伍。耶稣家谱中的一员。Reu

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 理番（lǐ fān），《思》楞番。外邦人的土星神明的巴比伦名字。Rephan

Terms.Localization: a pagan God

Localization.Gloss: 拉玛（lā mǎ），《思》辣玛。便雅悯支族领域内的一座城，位于以色列和犹大两国的边境上，在耶路撒冷以北大约8公里的地方。Ramah

Terms.Localization: a city north of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞针。细长的缝纫工具，一端是尖的，另一端有穿线的孔，用来把线穿过布料。needle

Terms.Localization: a small, slender tool, pointed on one end and with a hole at the other end, used in passing thread through cloth in sewing

Localization.Gloss: 喇合（lǎ he），《思》辣哈布。耶稣家谱中的一员，是耶利哥城的一个妓女。她敬畏上帝，救了约书亚派往耶利哥的两名探子的性命。Rahab

Terms.Localization: a woman of Jericho mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus; also known as Ῥαάβ

Localization.Gloss: 《现》蕾洁（lěi jie），《和》拉结（lā jie），《思》辣黑耳。雅各偏爱的妻子，利亚的妹妹。Rachel

Terms.Localization: the wife of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 拐杖；棍杖 。长约 1-2 米的棍杖；用于步行，放牧，驱赶野兽，打人等。stick; rod

Terms.Localization: a rod about 1-2 m. long; used for walking, herding, fighting off wild animals, beating people

Localization.Gloss: 杖。装饰过的棍杖，通常至少有一小部分由贵金属制成，象征统治者的权威。scepter

Terms.Localization: a decorated rod, often made at least partially of a precious metal, symbolizing the authority of the ruler

Localization.Gloss: 布块。缝在衣物上用来修补破洞或撕裂的布块。patch

Terms.Localization: piece of cloth or leather sewn on clothing or shoes to repair a hole or tear

Localization.Gloss: 《现》丽百加（li bǎi jiā），《和》利百加（li bǎi jiā），《思》黎贝加。以撒的妻子，以扫和雅各的母亲。Rebecca

Terms.Localization: the wife of Isaac

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞马车。一种四轮马车或运货车，供旅行和搬运重物之用。carriage; wagon

Terms.Localization: a four-wheeled carriage or wagon used for travel or the transportation of loads

Localization.Gloss: 利撒（li sā），《思》勒撒。所罗巴伯的儿子，《路加福音》耶稣家谱中的一员。Rhesa

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 利基翁（li jī wēng），《思》勒基雍。位于现今意大利南部一个海角上的港口城市。Rhegium

Terms.Localization: a city on a promontory in the south of Italy

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞字词；言语；一句话；信息；陈述。最小的话语单位，通常是一个单词；已经陈述的事情或说出的话语，焦点主要放在交流的内容上。word, saying; message, statement

Terms.Localization: a minimal unit of discourse, often a single word; that which has been stated or said, with primary focus upon the content of the communication

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞根。植物在地下的部分。root

Terms.Localization: the underground part of a plant

Localization.Gloss: 罗波安（luo bō ān），《思》勒哈贝罕。耶稣家谱中的一员，是所罗门王的儿子和继承人。他是联合王国的最后一位君王，也是南国犹大的第一位君王。Rehoboam

Terms.Localization: a Hebrew king in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 吕便（lǚ bian），《旧》吕便，《思》勒乌本。这名字的意义是“有儿子”。他是雅各和利亚所生的第一个儿子，是吕便支族的祖先。Reuben

Terms.Localization: the oldest son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 路得（lu de），《思》卢德。波阿斯的妻子，以色列最伟大的君王大卫的曾祖母，耶稣家谱中的一员。Ruth

Terms.Localization: the wife of Boaz in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 鲁孚（lǔ fu），《思》鲁富。古利奈人西门的儿子。Rufus

Terms.Localization: a son of Simon (4) of Cyrene

Localization.Gloss: 鲁孚（lǔ fu），《思》鲁富。《罗马书》16章保罗所问候的一个杰出的基督徒。Rufus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 罗大（luo da），《思》洛德。约翰马可的母亲马利亚家中的女仆。Rhoda

Terms.Localization: a maidservant in the house of Μαρία Maria(6)

Localization.Gloss: 罗底（luo dǐ），《思》洛多。小亚细亚西南海岸的一个海岛，位于土耳其西南角的海中。Rhodes

Terms.Localization: an island off the southwest coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞拯救，解救。从危险中救出来，暗示那危险是严重和急迫的。deliver; rescue

Terms.Localization: to rescue from danger, with the implication that the danger in question is severe and acute

Localization.Gloss: 罗马人（luo mǎ ren）／从罗马来的，《思》罗马人。罗马本地的人，或居住在罗马的人，或罗马帝国的公民。Roman; person from Rome

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Rome or a citizen of the Roman Empire

Localization.Gloss: 罗马（luo mǎ），《思》罗马。罗马帝国的首都，也是地中海世界最大的城市。Rome

Terms.Localization: the capital city of the Roman Empire

Localization.Gloss: 《现》万军（的统帅）（wan jūn (de tǒng shuai)），《和》万军（之主）（wan jūn (zhī zhǔ)），《思》万军（的上主）。（一个希伯来语的希腊语音译词，意为“军队”，与 κύριος[a]“主” 连用，作为上帝的头衔“万军之主”）指拥有难以抵挡之势的那一位。Sabaoth

Terms.Localization: (a Greek transliteration of a Hebrew word meaning armies and used with κύριος Lord, as a title for God) pertaining to one who has overwhelming power

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞安息日的休息。一段有特别宗教意义的时期，用于休息和敬拜。Sabbath rest

Terms.Localization: a special religiously significant period for rest and worship

Localization.Gloss: 半英里；一公里；安息日可走的路程。安息日可走的路程，略超过半英里，约 1 公里。half a mile, one kilometer, Sabbath journey

Terms.Localization: a Sabbath day's journey, somewhat over half a mile and about one kilometer

Localization.Gloss: 围网。捕鱼用的长围网。seine net

Terms.Localization: a long seine net used to catch fish

Localization.Gloss: 撒都该人（sā dū gāi ren），《思》撒杜塞人。耶稣和使徒时代耶路撒冷一个有政治影响力的犹太人政党的成员。撒都该人的组织比法利赛人小，但经常占着重要的政治和宗教职位。撒都该人和法利赛人的主要分歧，包括撒都该人不相信死人可以复活，以及他们只接受旧约的摩西五经。Sadducee

Terms.Localization: a member of a politically influential Jewish party in Jerusalem at the time of Jesus and the apostles, a smaller group than the Pharisees, but often in control of important political and religious positions. Their denial of the resurrection of the dead and their acceptance of only the first five books of the OT are important elements in some of the differences which arose between the Sadducees and the Pharisees

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。耶稣家谱中的一员。Zadok

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉铁（sā lā tiě），《思》沙耳提耳。 耶稣家谱中的一员。犹大王约雅斤（耶哥尼雅）的儿子，是犹太人被掳归回的领袖所罗巴伯的父亲。Shealtiel

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉米（sā lā mǐ），《思》撒拉米。塞浦路斯东南岸的一座城。Salamis

Terms.Localization: a city on the southeast coast of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: 撒门（sā men），《思》撒拉。耶稣家谱中的一员，拿顺的儿子，波阿斯的父亲，也是大卫和耶稣的先祖。Sala; Salmon

Terms.Localization: the father of Boaz in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉（shā lā），《思》舍拉。耶稣家谱中的一员, 希伯的父亲。Sala

Terms.Localization: the father of Eber in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 撒冷（sā lěng），《思》撒林。撒玛利亚北面的一个地方，确实位置不详。Salim

Terms.Localization: a place in northern Samaria (location uncertain)

Localization.Gloss: 撒冷（sā lěng），《思》撒冷。字义为“平安”。麦基洗德作王的地方；βασιλεὺς Σαλήμ“撒冷之王”可以理解为“和平之王”，因此可被视为一个表示敬意的名称。Salem

Terms.Localization: a place of which Melchizedek was king; the expression βασιλεὺς Σαλήμ king of Salem may be interpreted as king of peace, and as such it may be regarded as an honorific name

Localization.Gloss: 撒摩尼（sā mo ni），《思》撒耳摩讷。克里特岛东北部的一个海角。Salmone

Terms.Localization: a promontory on the northeast corner of Crete

Localization.Gloss: 撒门（sā men），《思》撒耳孟。耶稣家谱中的一员，拿顺的儿子，波阿斯的父亲，也是大卫和耶稣的先祖。Salmon

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞吹号角者，吹喇叭者。σαλπίζω“吹号角”的衍生词，指吹号角的人。trumpeter

Terms.Localization: (derivative of σαλπίζω[a] to play the trumpet) one who plays the trumpet

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞吹号角，吹喇叭。σάλπιγξ“号角”的衍生词。发出号角的声音。play the trumpet, blow the trumpet

Terms.Localization: (derivative of σάλπιγξ[a] trumpet) to produce sound with a trumpet

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞吹号角，吹喇叭。发出号角的声音（没有明确说明有吹号的人）。sound a trumpet; a trumpet sounds

Terms.Localization: to produce the sound of a trumpet (without specification of an agent)

Localization.Gloss: 撒罗米（sā luo mǐ），《思》撒罗默。一个跟随耶稣的加利利妇人，她目睹耶稣受难，也是发现空坟墓的人。Salome

Terms.Localization: a Galilean woman who followed Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 撒马利亚人（sā mǎ li ya ren）／撒马利亚的，《旧》撒玛利亚人，《思》撒玛黎雅人。撒马利亚的本地人。新约时代的撒马利亚人是种族混合的后代。由于他们不是正统的犹太人，所以受到犹太人的歧视，两者互不来往。他们仍然遵守许多的犹太传统。不过，他们是在基利心山上敬拜上帝，而不在耶路撒冷。Samaritan; person from Samaria

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 《现》撒马利亚女人（sā mǎ li ya nǚ ren），《和》撒马利亚妇人，《旧》撒玛利亚妇人，《思》撒玛黎雅妇人。一个撒马利亚本地的女人。Samaritan woman; woman from Samaria

Terms.Localization: a woman who is a native of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 撒马利亚（sā mǎ li ya），《旧》撒玛利亚，《思》撒玛黎雅。新约时代的撒马利亚不是指一个城镇，而是指巴勒斯坦中部的一个地区。Samaria

Terms.Localization: a region in the central part of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: 撒马利亚（sā mǎ li ya），《旧》撒玛利亚，《思》撒玛黎雅。是撒马利亚地区主要的城市。Samaria

Terms.Localization: the principal city of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 撒摩特喇（sā mo te lǎ），《思》撒摩辣刻。位于爱琴海北部的一个小岛。Samothrace

Terms.Localization: an island in the northern Aegean Sea

Localization.Gloss: 撒母耳（sā mǔ ěr），《思》撒慕尔。以色列的最后一个士师，早期的旧约先知，属于以法莲支族。Samuel

Terms.Localization: an early OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 参孙（cān sūn），《思》三松。一位以色列士师，属于但支族，是一个大力士，曾带领以色列人抵抗非利士人。Samson

Terms.Localization: one of the judges of Israel in the OT

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞凉鞋。鞋类，鞋底是皮革（也可能是木），用皮带固定在脚上。sandal

Terms.Localization: a type of footwear consisting of a sole made of leather (or possibly wood) tied to the foot by means of thongs or straps

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞木板。大块的木板或厚木板。plank

Terms.Localization: large board or plank of wood

Localization.Gloss: 扫罗（sǎo luo），《思》扫禄。使徒保罗的犹太名字。Saul

Terms.Localization: the Hebrew name of the apostle Paul

Localization.Gloss: 扫罗（sǎo luo），《思》撒乌耳。以色列的第一个王。Saul

Terms.Localization: the first king of Israel in the OT

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞筐子；大篮子。通常用草或芦苇织成的大容器；用来携带各种物品，包括食品和商品，也会用来搬运泥土。basket

Terms.Localization: a large container made of woven material, usually grass or reeds; used for carrying a variety of things, including food and produce, and for moving soil from one place to another

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞属物质的，物质上的；属肉体的；属血气的。属物质的或物质上的，可能有低一等的含意。material (things); carnal; fleshly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being material or physical, with the possible implication of inferior

Localization.Gloss: 沙仑（shā lun），《思》沙龙。巴勒斯坦沿岸的平原，位于约帕和迦密山之间，大约有10-20公里宽，80公里长，是一块肥沃的土地，植物生长丰茂，适合牧放。Sharon

Terms.Localization: the plain along the coast of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞魔鬼撒但，《思》撒殚。（从希伯来文和亚兰文而来的借用词，字面意思：敌对者）通常是魔鬼的固有名称。Satan

Terms.Localization: (a borrowing from Hebrew and Aramaic, literally: adversary) the usual proper name of the Devil

Localization.Gloss: 扫罗（sǎo luo），《思》扫禄。Σαούλ的另一种拼写法，使徒保罗的希伯来名字。Saul

Terms.Localization: an alternative form of Σαούλ Saul, the Hebrew name of the apostle Paul

Localization.Gloss: 安息日；星期六。一周的第七日或最后一日（在宗教上是最重要的一日，因为这是分别为圣用来敬拜上帝的日子）。Sabbath, Saturday

Terms.Localization: the seventh or last day of the week (religiously the most important since it was consecrated to the worship of God)

Localization.Gloss: 一周；一个星期。一段长度为七天的时间。week

Terms.Localization: a period of seven days

Localization.Gloss: 粗麻布。一种厚重的布料，通常用来做麻袋；人们哀痛时会披麻，表示忏悔。sackcloth

Terms.Localization: a heavy material normally used for making sacks, but worn by persons in mourning and as a sign of repentance

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞号角，号筒，喇叭。金属制的管乐器；常用于发信号，尤其是打仗的时候。trumpet

Terms.Localization: a musical wind instrument; made of metal; frequently used in signaling, especially in connection with war

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞喇叭声，号角的声音。σαλπίζω“吹号角”的衍生词，指吹号发出的响声。trumpet blast; trumpet sound

Terms.Localization: (derivative of σαλπίζω[a] to play the trumpet) the sound made by a trumpet

Localization.Gloss: 撒摩（sā mo），《思》撒摩。小亚细亚西海岸外的一个岛屿，与陆地相隔不远，位于以弗所西南数公里处。Samos

Terms.Localization: an island off the west coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 撒非喇（sā fēi lǎ），《思》撒斐辣。耶路撒冷教会的成员，亚拿尼亚的妻子。她和丈夫隐瞒奉献财产的数量，因欺哄上帝而受罚致死。Sapphira

Terms.Localization: the wife of Ἀνανίας Ananias(1)

Localization.Gloss: 撒狄（sā di），《思》撒尔德。小亚细亚西部的一个城，在士每拿以东。《启示录》作者致函的小亚细亚七教会之一就在这里。Sardis

Terms.Localization: a city in western Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 撒勒法（sā le fǎ），《思》匝尔法特。地中海岸的一个腓尼基城，在西顿和泰尔之间。Zarephath

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of Phoenicia between Tyre and Sidon

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞世俗的；属世的，属肉体的。属于典型的人性行为，但是重点特别放在更基本的生理或身体欲望上。carnal; fleshly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to behavior which is typical of human nature, but with special focus upon more base physical desires

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞肉体，身体；人，人类，世人；人的，物质的本性；人性；性命。动物和人类的身体；活的物体或生命体；作为自然存在、有血有肉的人；人的本性，强调肉体方面；人性的心理层面，对比于灵性；肉体的生命。flesh; body, physical body; people, human being; physical nature, human; human nature; life

Terms.Localization: the muscles and sinews of both animals and humans; a living body; humans as physical beings; human nature, with emphasis on the physical; the psychological aspect of human nature in contrast to the spiritual nature; physical life

Localization.Gloss: 《现》莎拉（shā lā），《和》撒拉（sā lā），《思》撒辣。亚伯拉罕的妻子，以撒的母亲，她原名叫撒莱。Sarah

Terms.Localization: the wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞崇拜，敬奉。用态度和礼仪来表明自己对神明的效忠和尊敬。worship

Terms.Localization: to express in attitude and ritual one's allegiance to and regard for deity

Localization.Gloss: 幽暗的锁链。一种用来捆绑的柔韧工具，用金属或纤维制成；这里指地狱的黑暗捆琐。chains of gloom

Terms.Localization: a pliable instrument for binding, made of metal or fiber, here as a binding in the darkness of the underworld

Localization.Gloss: 西公都（xī gōng dū），《思》色贡多。帖撒罗尼迦的外邦信徒，保罗从希腊至耶路撒冷最后一次宣教旅程的同伴。Secundus

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Thessalonica who was a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 西流基（xī liu jī），《思》色娄基雅。位于地中海的东北角，是叙利亚的港口城市。Seleucia

Terms.Localization: the port city of Antioch in Syria

Localization.Gloss: 西美（xī měi），《思》史米。耶稣家谱中的一员。Semein

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 西鹿（xī lu），《思》色鲁格。耶稣家谱中的一员。Serug

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞敬拜的对象；崇拜的对象。受敬拜的对象。object of worship; object of veneration

Terms.Localization: an object which is worshiped

Localization.Gloss: 敬拜；崇拜。用态度和礼仪来表明自己对神明的效忠和尊敬。worship

Terms.Localization: to express in attitude and ritual one's allegiance to and regard for deity

Localization.Gloss: 士求；《思》色尔爵。士求·保罗，塞浦路斯的总督。Sergius

Terms.Localization: Sergius Paulus, the governor of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞神迹，记号。被视为具有某种特殊意义的事件。sign

Terms.Localization: an event which is regarded as having some special meaning

Localization.Gloss: 塞特（sāi te），《思》舍特。耶稣家谱中的一员，亚当的儿子，以挪士的父亲。Seth

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 闪（shǎn），《思》闪。耶稣家谱中的一员，挪亚的儿子，亚法撒的父亲。Shem

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞飞蛾。短小的棕色或灰色蛾子，会产卵在衣服或其他织物上；蛾卵孵化成非常小的毛虫，以纤维为食；谷蛾科，可能是网衣蛾；象征朽烂、破坏和慢慢地毁灭。moth

Terms.Localization: smallish brown or gray moth that lays eggs in clothing or other cloth; eggs hatch into very small caterpillars, which feed on the fibers; Tineidae family, probably Tineola biselliella; symbols of decay, ruin, and slow destruction

Localization.Gloss: 西顿的人（xī dun de ren），《思》漆冬的人。西顿本地的人。Sidonian

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Sidon

Localization.Gloss: 西顿（的）（xī dun (de)），《思》漆冬（的）。属于西顿的。from Sidon

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Sidon

Localization.Gloss: 西顿（xī dun），《思》漆冬。古代的腓尼基沿岸的一个城市，位于地中海东岸，大约在泰尔以北40公里的地方，是一个商业都市和港口。Sidon

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of Phoenicia

Localization.Gloss: 西拉（xī lā），《思》息拉。初期教会的一位领导人。他和保罗同工，耶路撒冷教会选派他跟保罗和巴拿巴一同送信到安提阿教会。Silas

Terms.Localization: a Christian in the Jerusalem church and an associate of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 西拉（xī lā），《思》息拉；息耳瓦诺。通常被认为与 Σιλᾶς 是同一个人。Silvanus

Terms.Localization: generally regarded as the same person as Σιλᾶς Silas

Localization.Gloss: 西罗亚（xī luo ya），《思》史罗亚。耶路撒冷城内一个供水系统的名称；西罗亚池子可能是这个系统中的储水池，在旧约时代，亚述王西拿基立围困耶路撒冷时，犹大王希西家所建造。Siloam

Terms.Localization: the name for a system of water supply in Jerusalem; the pool of Siloam was probably the basin into which the water flowed

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞围裙。工人围在腰部或胸部一块布或皮革，用作保护以免弄脏衣服。apron

Terms.Localization: a cloth or piece of leather wrapped by a workman around his waist or chest to protect his clothes
