Localization.Gloss: 西奈山（xī nai shān），《旧》西乃山，《思》西乃山。又称为何烈山，或上帝的山，位于西奈旷野的一座岩石山，传统的说法是位于西奈半岛南部。(Mount) Sinai

Terms.Localization: a rocky mountain on the peninsula of Sinai

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞麻纱布。一种用亚麻植物的茎制成的高品质布料，以其坚韧耐磨和凉爽而闻名。linen cloth

Terms.Localization: a high quality cloth made from the stems of the flax plant, known for its strength and coolness

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞丝绸；绸缎。使用从蚕茧抽取的丝线制成的结实的细纤维。silk cloth

Terms.Localization: a strong fine fiber produced by silkworms and woven into cloth

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞肥的；养肥的；吃谷物长肥的。指用谷物喂饲因而长得肥胖；指圈养喂肥了用作宰杀的牛。fat; fattened; grain-fattened

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being well fed on grain and hence fattened; refers to stall-fed cattle that are being fattened for slaughter

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞谷物；食粮。σῖτος “谷物”的指小词，但在意义上并不表示微小；指任何谷物，但其作为食粮的意义显而易见。grain; food

Terms.Localization: (a diminutive form of σῖτος grain, but not diminutive in meaning) any grain, but with the evident implication of its relevance as food

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞不作声，缄默；平静。（σιωπάω“安静”的引申义）暴风雨过后变得平静。become still

Terms.Localization: (a figurative extension of meaning of σιωπάω to be silent) to become calm after a storm

Localization.Gloss: 锡安（xī ān），《思》熙雍。字义是“堡垒”。锡安山，耶路撒冷城内的一座山。Zion

Terms.Localization: Mount Zion, a hill within the city of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 锡安（城）（xī ān (cheng)），《思》熙雍。指耶路撒冷城及其居民，尤其是在诗歌体裁里。Zion

Terms.Localization: the city of Jerusalem together with its people, particularly in poetic discourse

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞烈酒。用谷物酿造的、会使人喝醉的饮料。beer

Terms.Localization: an intoxicating fermented drink made from grain

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。耶稣的十二门徒之一。他是约翰的儿子，安得烈的哥哥。耶稣给他取名为彼得（矶法），就是磐石的意思。Simon

Terms.Localization: Simon Peter, one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。耶稣的另一个门徒，属于奋锐党（激进党）。Simon

Terms.Localization: Simon the Zealot, one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。耶稣的兄弟，他后来取代雅各，成为耶路撒冷教会的领袖。Simon

Terms.Localization: a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。亚力山大和鲁孚的父亲，来自古利奈，罗马兵丁勉强他为耶稣背十字架前往各各他。Simon

Terms.Localization: Simon of Cyrene, who carried the cross of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。加略人犹大的父亲。Simon

Terms.Localization: the father of Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。硝皮匠，彼得在约帕时曾住在他家里。Simon

Terms.Localization: a tanner in Joppa

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。撒马利亚一个行邪术的术士。Simon

Terms.Localization: a magician of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。麻风病人，不过他的疾病已痊愈。在他位于伯大尼的家里，一个妇人用一瓶极贵的香膏膏抹耶稣。Simon

Terms.Localization: a leper

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。法利赛人，曾邀请耶稣到他家吃饭。Simon

Terms.Localization: a Pharisee

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞芥菜。芥子植物，较大的草本植物，以种子极其细小而著称，有些可生长至高达三米（约十英尺）。mustard plant

Terms.Localization: mustard plant, a large herb noted for its very small seeds and in some instances growing to a height of three meters (about ten feet)

Localization.Gloss: 谷物；小麦。任何可食用的谷物，但通常指小麦；小麦植物。grain; wheat

Terms.Localization: any kind of edible grain, though generally referring to wheat; the wheat plant

Localization.Gloss: 使跌倒；使犯罪。使犯罪，可能暗示提供某种特殊的环境使犯罪发生。cause to stumble; cause to sin

Terms.Localization: to cause to sin, with the probable implication of providing some special circumstances which contribute to such behavior

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞绊脚石，使人犯罪的试探；冒犯；冒犯的事。（σκάνδαλον“陷阱”的引申义）使人犯罪的人或事情；冒犯人，从而引起敌对的事情。stumbling block, temptation to sin; offenses, offensive thing

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of σκάνδαλον trap) that which or one who causes someone to sin; that which causes offense and thus arouses opposition

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞小船，小艇。通常放在大船上的小船，水手会用这种小船来抛锚、修理船只，或遇暴风雨的时候用来拯救生命。small boat; skiff

Terms.Localization: a small boat which was normally kept aboard a larger ship and used by sailors in placing anchors, repairing the ship, or saving lives in the case of storms

Localization.Gloss: 士基瓦（shi jī wǎ），《思》斯盖瓦。犹太人的大祭司，保罗第三次宣教旅程期间，在以弗所看见他的七个儿子替人赶鬼。Sceva

Terms.Localization: a Jewish high priest

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞器具；用具；装备。指任何人工制品的集合名词，也可以用σκεῦος“物件”来表达。things; equipment

Terms.Localization: a collective for any kind of artifact which may be referred to by σκεῦος object, thing

Localization.Gloss: 斗篷，外套，长袍。任何样式的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: 帐棚。一种用布和／或兽皮搭建的帐棚，用杆子撑起并用绳子系紧在木桩上，可以拆卸，方便携带。tent

Terms.Localization: a portable dwelling of cloth and/or skins, held up by poles and fastened by cords to stakes

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞ 帐棚；会幕。比较大的帐棚，犹太人在圣殿建成之前，以帐棚（会幕）作为集中敬拜的地方。tent; tabernacle tent

Terms.Localization: the relatively large tent used as a central place of worship by the Jews prior to the building of the Temple

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞帐棚。在一般意义上表示一个居住的地方。tent; tabernacle tent

Terms.Localization: tent representing a dwelling-place in a more generic sense

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞住棚节。犹太人的宗教节日，纪念上帝在他们漂流旷野时供应他们的生活所需。festival of the tabernacles; celebration of the tents

Terms.Localization: a Jewish festival commemorating God's provision during the wanderings in the wilderness

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞制造帐棚的人。以制造帐棚为业的人。tentmaker

Terms.Localization: one who makes tents as an occupation

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞居住；来居住。来住在某个心理或属灵意义上的地方。take up residence, come to dwell

Terms.Localization: to come to dwell in a place defined psychologically or spiritually

Localization.Gloss: 帐棚。在一般意义上表示一个居住的地方。tent; tabernacle tent

Terms.Localization: tent representing a dwelling-place in a more generic sense

Localization.Gloss: 身体。（σκήνωμα“临时居所”的引申喻意）以人体作暂时的居所。body

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of meaning of σκήνωμα temporary dwelling) temporary habitation in the human body

Localization.Gloss: 身体。（σκῆνος“帐棚”的引申喻意，原义没有出现在《新约》中）以人体作暂时的居所。body

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of meaning of σκῆνος tent, not occurring in the NT) temporary habitation in the human body

Localization.Gloss: 心硬；顽固。不屈服、固执的态度。hardheartedness, stubbornness

Terms.Localization: the attitude of being unyielding and obstinate

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞蝎子。陆栖的（八腿）蛛形纲动物，有钳子，其节状尾有毒刺，尾部可弯曲到背上；成长到大约 13 厘米长；被蝎子螫伤的痛苦和危险广为人知，因而令人联想到恶劣的生活条件。scorpion

Terms.Localization: terrestrial arachnid (eight-legged) with pincers and a poisonous sting at the end of its jointed tail, which it can hold curved over the back; grows to about 13 cm long; known for the pain and danger of its sting, and associated with harsh, inhospitable living conditions

Localization.Gloss: （永恒刑罚的）外边黑暗；外面的黑暗。（习语，字面意思：外面的黑暗）黑暗和偏远（大概是远离义人的居所）的地方或地区，因而充当邪灵和魔鬼的住所。outer darkness (of eternal punishment)

Terms.Localization: (an idiom, literally: the outer darkness) a place or region which is both dark and removed (presumably from the abode of the righteous) and serving as the abode of evil spirits and devils

Localization.Gloss: 粪土；垃圾；废物。被丢弃和扔掉的、无用或不需要的东西。rubbish; litter; trash

Terms.Localization: worthless or unwanted material that is rejected and normally thrown out

Localization.Gloss: 《现》未开化的，《和》西古提人（xī gŭ ti ren），《思》叔提雅人。Σκυθία“西古提”的衍生词，原词没有出现在《新约》中）西古提是黑海以北的一个地区，西古提人就是当地的人，被希罗世界视为无宗教信仰和完全未开化的人。Scythian

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Σκυθία Scythia, not occurring in the NT) a person who is a native of Scythia, a region north of the Black Sea, and regarded by the GrecoRoman world as utterly pagan and uncivilized

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞被虫咬的。被虫子咬的（指在溃疡组织中出现蠕虫）。eaten by worms

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being eaten by worms (a reference to the occurrence of worms in ulcerous tissue)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞蛆虫；蠕虫。没有骨头或外壳、细小、柔软、无腿的管状生物。通常以过熟的水果、腐烂的肉和类似的东西为食；多半是苍蝇或甲虫产卵后孵化出来的幼虫；象征污秽、腐烂和死亡。maggot; worm

Terms.Localization: small, soft, legless, tube-shaped creatures that have no bones or shells. They typically feed on overripe fruit, rotting meat, and similar things; most are larvae that hatch from the eggs laid by flies or some beetles; symbols of uncleanness, decay, and death

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞没药。一种带有香气的树脂。myrrh

Terms.Localization: the aromatic resin of certain bushes

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞士每拿；《思》斯米纳。小亚细亚西岸的一个城。Smyrna

Terms.Localization: a city on the west coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 所罗门（suǒ luo men），《思》撒罗满。大卫的儿子和继任人。Solomon

Terms.Localization: the son and successor of David

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞棺架，棺材；抬架。担架或厚木板，用来把尸体抬往下葬的地方。bier

Terms.Localization: a stretcher or plank used for carrying a corpse to a place of burial

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞手巾；手帕；面巾。小块的布，用作手巾、餐巾，或面巾。towel; napkin; handkerchief; face cloth

Terms.Localization: a small piece of cloth used as a towel, napkin, or face cloth

Localization.Gloss: 《现》苏撒娜（sū sā na），《和》苏撒拿（sū sā na），《思》苏撒纳。一个跟随耶稣的妇人；当耶稣在加利利传道的时候，她是一直服侍和供应祂和门徒的妇女。她可能曾患病或被鬼附，后来被耶稣治好。Susanna

Terms.Localization: a follower of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 所多玛（suǒ duō mǎ），《思》索多玛。亚伯拉罕时代，位于死海南端的一座城。罗得跟亚伯拉罕分手时，选择在这地方居住。由于当地的居民罪恶深重，上帝降火把它烧毁。Sodom

Terms.Localization: a city located at the southern part of the Dead Sea and destroyed because of its evil

Localization.Gloss: 西班牙（xī bān ya），《旧》士班雅，《思》西班牙。地中海西端的一个国家。Spain

Terms.Localization: a country at the western end of the Mediterranean Sea

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞浇奠；奠祭；倒出祭物。把祭物倒出来，作为敬拜或仪式。be poured out (as a drink offering) (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to pour out an offering as an act of worship or ritual observance

Localization.Gloss: 种子；籽粒。果实的核心部分，通常是谷粒或籽粒。seed

Terms.Localization: the kernel part of fruit, usually grain

Localization.Gloss: 动了慈心；慈爱；慈悲；怜悯；恻隐之心。对某人生发强烈的爱和怜悯。feel sympathy; feel compassion

Terms.Localization: to experience great affection and compassion for someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞喜欢，喜爱。欲望、意图和感觉的心理能力。affection

Terms.Localization: the psychological faculty of desire, intent, and feeling

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞急切。急忙的活动，暗示有相应的力气。haste

Terms.Localization: urgent or hurried movement, with the implication of associated energy

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞渴望；热切。准备投入精力和努力。eagerness; devotion

Terms.Localization: readiness to expend energy and effort

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞海绵。用来吸收液体的多孔物料。sponge

Terms.Localization: lightweight skeleton of a porous sea animal; used for absorbing liquids

Localization.Gloss: 种子；籽粒。果实的核心部分，通常是谷粒或籽粒。seed

Terms.Localization: the kernel part of fruit, usually grain

Localization.Gloss: 筐子；大篮子。通常用草或芦苇织成的大容器；用来携带各种物品，包括食品和商品；这种篮子可能比κόφινος大一点。large basket

Terms.Localization: container made of woven material, usually grass or reeds; used for carrying a variety of things, including food and produce; this basket is presumably somewhat larger than a κόφινος

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞古希腊银币，斯塔特。约值两个迪德拉克玛（didrachma）或四个得拿利（denarii）。stater; coin

Terms.Localization: a silver coin worth two didrachma or approximately four denarii

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞十字架。古代罗马帝国用以施行死刑的刑具，是一根垂直插进地里的柱子，上部连接一块横木，形成 T 字或十字形。cross

Terms.Localization: a pole stuck into the ground in an upright position with a crosspiece attached to its upper part; used as a means of execution

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞钉十字架。处死某人，把他钉在十字架上。crucify

Terms.Localization: to execute someone by nailing that person to a cross

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄；葡萄串。葡萄树所结的果子。grape; bunch of grapes

Terms.Localization: the fruit of grapevines

Localization.Gloss: 竞技场；运动场。椭圆形的露天场地（通常带跑道），四周有为观众而设的阶梯式座位。arena; stadium

Terms.Localization: an open, oval area (frequently including a racetrack) around which was built an enclosed series of tiers of seats for those who came to watch the spectacles

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞罐。常用来盛酒的罐，但在《新约》中，那是指用来永久存放吗哪的罐子。jar

Terms.Localization: a jar regularly used for wine, but in the NT it refers to the jar in which manna was kept permanently

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞麦穗，穗（五谷）。小麦和大麦等谷物那尖尖的、浓密的穗子，里面是谷物的籽粒（《新约》只用来指小麦）。ear of wheat; head of wheat

Terms.Localization: the dense spiky cluster in which the seeds of grain such as wheat and barley grow (restricted in NT contexts to references to wheat)

Localization.Gloss: 士大古；《思》斯塔辉。在《罗马书》的问安名单中出现的基督徒。Stachys

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in |sROM.16:9|s*

Localization.Gloss: 司提法那（sī ti fǎ na），《思》斯法特纳。哥林多教会的成员，亚该亚最早归主的信徒之一，曾受保罗的施洗。Stephanas

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Corinth

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞房顶。平顶屋的屋顶区域。roof

Terms.Localization: the (flat) roof or top of a house

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞花环，花圈。一种羊毛花环，可在其上添加花和叶，绕在一根权杖上，或编织成花环戴在头上。garland; wreath

Terms.Localization: a wreath of wool to which leaves and flowers might be added and either wound around a staff or woven into a garland to be worn on the head

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞华冠，冠冕。用树枝和叶子或造成枝叶形状之贵重金属制作的花冠；戴花冠象征荣誉和胜利，或作为高官要职的标记。wreath; crown

Terms.Localization: a wreath consisting either of foliage or of precious metals formed to resemble foliage and worn as a symbol of honor, victory, or as a badge of high office

Localization.Gloss: 司提反；《思》斯德望。早期耶路撒冷教会拣选出来的七名执事之一，也是第一位基督徒殉道士。Stephen

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem and the first Christian martyr

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞地上的草。用来填充床垫或铺在地上作礼仪的稻草或灯芯草。field grasses

Terms.Localization: straw or rushes used to stuff a mattress or to spread on the ground for ceremonies

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞伤痕；印记。在物体表面的东西，如线条、斑点或疤痕，没有特殊的设计，但具有重要意义 。mark, scar

Terms.Localization: something on the surface of an object, for example, line, spot, or scar, without special design but carrying significance

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞门廊，走廊。有盖的柱廊，通常一边敞开，人们可以在其间站、坐，或行走，而不用日晒雨淋。porch; portico

Terms.Localization: a covered colonnade, open normally on one side, where people could stand, sit, or walk, protected from the weather and the heat of the sun

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞基本原理；基本原则；基本道理；基础概念；浅显的学说。某事物的性质所依据的基本原理。fundamental principles; elementary principles; fundamentals; elements

Terms.Localization: basic principles which underlie the nature of something

Localization.Gloss: 《现》斯多亚派（sī duō ya pai），《和》斯多亚门（sī duō ya men），《思》斯多噶派。指希腊哲学家齐诺（Zeno）的哲学体系，他教导人们应当摆脱过度的欢乐或悲伤，并且无怨无悔地顺从。Stoic

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the philosophical system of the Greek philosopher Zeno, who taught that people should be free from excessive joy or grief and submit without complaint to necessity

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞长袍。飘逸的长袍，一直延伸到脚跟。long robe

Terms.Localization: a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞麻雀。细小的鸟；颜色为斑驳的褐色；麻雀属；成群栖息和筑巢；吃草的种子和谷物；令人联想到穷人。sparrow

Terms.Localization: small bird; speckled brown in color; genus Passer; roosts and nests in groups; eats grass seeds and grain; associated with the poor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞柱子，柱石。用于支撑建筑物的垂直结构，即柱子。pillar; column

Terms.Localization: an upright shaft or structure used as a building support

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞一同参与；与……合伙；分担困难。在一些联合活动中有交往，在某些处境下，暗示那是颇为持久的关系。participate; become partner with someone

Terms.Localization: to be associated in some joint activity, with the implication, in some contexts, of a somewhat enduring relation

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞伙伴，同伴；同享者，分担者，参加者。与其他人共同拥有一份财产或一个关系的人，强调大家的共同点。partaker; partner

Terms.Localization: one who shares jointly with someone else in a possession or relationship, with emphasis upon that which is in common

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞跟…住在一起，同生；跟…同活。与其他人共同活着。live with; live together

Terms.Localization: to live in association with or together with someone else

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞桑树。一种落叶果树，高度可达六米；树上长出黑色浆果，果汁色红味甜。mulberry tree

Terms.Localization: a deciduous fruit tree growing to about 6 m; produces black berries containing a sweet reddish juice

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞无花果树。果树；可长到 5-8 米高；弧形树冠，扎根很深；果子柔软清甜，大小像鸡蛋，有绿、黄、紫、棕等不同颜色，取决于品种。fig tree

Terms.Localization: fruit tree; grows 5-8 m high; round crown and very deep roots; Ficus carica; fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type, and is sweet and soft

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞无花果桑树，野桑树。一种宽阔巨大的树，树高可达十五米（约五十英尺），粗壮结实的树枝从树干下部长出来；果实外形像细小的无花果，但味道不太好。sycamore-fig tree

Terms.Localization: a broad, heavy tree reaching a height of some fifteen meters (about fifty feet), with large, strong branches growing out from the trunk low down on the tree; fruit has the appearance of a small fig but its taste is relatively unpleasant

Localization.Gloss: 西门（xī men），《思》西满。耶稣的十二门徒之一。西门是彼得的亚兰名字。Simeon; Simon

Terms.Localization: one form of the apostle Peter's Aramaic name

Localization.Gloss: 西缅（xī miǎn），《思》西默盎。雅各跟利亚所生的第二个儿子，西缅支派的先祖。Simeon

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 西面（xī mian），《思》西默盎。耶路撒冷的一名老者，是敬畏上帝的义人。Simeon

Terms.Localization: an elderly man of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 西面（xī mian），《思》西满。安提阿教会的先知，又名尼结。Simeon

Terms.Localization: a Christian prophet at Antioch who was also called Niger

Localization.Gloss: 西缅（xī miǎn），《思》西默盎。耶稣家谱中的一员。Simeon; Simon

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞同情；体恤。在同情的意义上分享某人的感受。have sympathy for

Terms.Localization: to share someone's feeling in the sense of being sympathetic with

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞同情的，互相同情的。同情某人或某事的。sympathetic

Terms.Localization: pertaining to feeling sympathy for someone or something

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞会堂或基督徒聚集的地方。用于集会的建筑物，与宗教活动有关（通常指犹太人举行敬拜、教导律法的建筑物，但在《雅各书》2:2中是指基督徒聚集的地方）。synagogue or Christian assembly place

Terms.Localization: a building of assembly, associated with religious activity (normally a building in which Jewish worship took place and in which the Law was taught, but in JAS 2:2 a Christian assembly place)

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞调解，使之复和。在人际关系受到扰乱或破坏后，重新建立恰当的友好关系。reconcile

Terms.Localization: to reestablish proper friendly interpersonal relations after these have been disrupted or broken

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞分享…的荣耀。与别人一起领受极大的荣誉。be honored together with

Terms.Localization: to receive great honor together with someone else

Localization.Gloss: （从死人中）复活；使……（从死人中）复活。使已经死了的人活过来。raise (from the dead); be raised (from the dead) (pass.)

Terms.Localization: cause someone who has died to rise up to life

Localization.Gloss: 是非之心；良心。能够分辨是非对错的心理能力。conscience

Terms.Localization: the psychological faculty that can distinguish between right and wrong

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞同工。和别人一起工作的人。co-worker

Terms.Localization: one who works together with someone else

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞末日，终局。标志着这个世界之终结的时刻。end of the world

Terms.Localization: a point of time marking the end of this world

Localization.Gloss: 循都基（xun dū jī），《思》欣提赫。腓立比教会的女信徒。Syntyche

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman in the church of Philippi

Localization.Gloss: 叙拉古（xu lā gǔ），《思》息辣谷撒。新约时代的西西里岛的首府城市，位于今日意大利西西里岛东岸。Syracuse

Terms.Localization: a city on the east coast of Sicily

Localization.Gloss: 叙利亚（xu li ya），《思》叙利亚。巴勒斯坦北部和东部的一个地区，旧约时代称为亚兰。Syria

Terms.Localization: a region to the north and east of Palestine and known as Aram in OT times

Localization.Gloss: 叙利亚腓尼基的妇人。叙利亚腓尼基本地的妇人。Syrophoenician

Terms.Localization: a woman who is a native of Syro-Phoenicia

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞同钉十字架。把一个人与别人一同钉十字架。crucify along with someone else

Terms.Localization: to execute someone by nailing that person to a cross along with someone else

Localization.Gloss: 叙加（xu jiā），《思》息哈尔。撒马利亚境内的一个城。Sychar

Terms.Localization: a city in Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 示剑（shi jian），《思》舍根。古代以法莲山区、撒马利亚境内的一个城，位于耶路撒冷以北大约63公里的地方。Shechem

Terms.Localization: a city in Samaria

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞同工；同事；一同做工的。在某种活动中与另一人有紧密联系的人 。yoke-fellow, fellow worker

Terms.Localization: one who is closely linked with another in some activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞灵里结合的，合一的。有相似的态度和心灵。joined in soul

Terms.Localization: pertaining to similarity of attitude and spirit

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞同作奴隶的人。一同作奴仆的人，或与另一奴仆在一起的奴仆。fellow-slave

Terms.Localization: one who is a fellow slave or a slave alongside another slave

Localization.Gloss: 《现》叙利亚人（xu li ya ren），《和》叙利亚国的，《思》叙利亚的。叙利亚本地的人。Syrian

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Syria

Localization.Gloss: 赛耳底（sai ěr dǐ），《思》叙尔提。北非海岸线上两个浅水而危险的地中海海湾，位于意大利的正南方。Syrtis

Terms.Localization: two shallow and treacherous Mediterranean gulfs along the north African coastline

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞同为成员。一个群体中的成员，强调与其他成员的协调关系。co-member

Terms.Localization: a person who is a member of a group, with emphasis upon his coordinate relation to other members of the group

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞无花果。无花果树的果子。fig

Terms.Localization: the fruit of the fig tree

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞封上；加封条；使安全。用封条封上或使某物安全牢固。to seal; put a seal on; make secure

Terms.Localization: to use a seal to close or to make something secure

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞印章；图章。有镌刻的物件，用于做记号以标示物件的所有权，表示批准，或用作封印（封印的方法通常是用印章压一下加热了的蜡，这种封印一般会出现在文件或信件上）。seal; signet

Terms.Localization: an engraved object used to make a mark denoting ownership, approval, or closure of something (normally done by pressing into heated wax and usually attached to a document or letter)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞印。有印章或图章印记的东西，用于把文件封严，或为了展示拥有权或表示认可。seal

Terms.Localization: the substance which bears the imprint of a seal or signet, used for sealing a document or for showing ownership or endorsement

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞记号，盖着…的印记。图章戒指或印章的印记，主要表示所有权。mark, seal

Terms.Localization: the impression of a signet ring or seal, primarily indicating ownership

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞印记；刻印；铭文。由印章或图章造成的记号或印记。mark, inscription

Terms.Localization: the mark or impression made by a seal or stamp

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞印证，证明，验证，证据。证明真实的证据。确认或证明某事物的真实性的东西。certification, validation, proof, evidence of genuineness

Terms.Localization: that which confirms or attests to the genuineness of something

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞绳子。把好几股线搓捻或编织而成的粗绳子；用棕榈纤维、亚麻线或芦苇等各种不同的材料制成。cord; rope

Terms.Localization: thick cord formed by twisting or braiding several strands together; made of a variety of materials, including palm fibers, linen, or reeds

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞讲堂，学校。一座专门供学习之用的建筑物，老师在其中传授知识，与学生一起讨论学问。lecture hall; school

Terms.Localization: a building where teachers and students met for study and discussion

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞身体的，肉身的。与身体有关的。in body; bodily

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a physical body

Localization.Gloss: 事实上；实际上。是真实的（在实体的意义上），与象征相对。in reality, really

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being real (in the sense of material) in contrast with being symbolic

Localization.Gloss: 所提尼，《思》索斯特乃。哥林多会堂的主管。许多学者认为 Σωσθένης-1 与 Σωσθένης-2 是同一人。Sosthenes

Terms.Localization: a leader of a synagogue in Corinth; many scholars consider (a) and (b) to be the same person

Localization.Gloss: 所提尼（suǒ ti ni），《思》索斯特乃。哥林多的基督徒，许多学者认为 Σωσθένης-1 与 Σωσθένης-2 是同一人。Sosthenes

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Corinth; many scholars consider (a) and (b) to be the same person

Localization.Gloss: 所西巴德（suǒ xī bā de），《思》索息帕特。保罗的亲属，在《罗马书》16章中向罗马教会问安。保罗称他为“亲属”，可能指他们有密切的血缘关系，或只是一个亲密的基督徒同伴。他可能是“所巴特”。Sosipater

Terms.Localization: a person who sends greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞拯救；救恩；得救。获得拯救的状态。salvation

Terms.Localization: a state of having been saved

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞救主，拯救者，救赎者；解救者。救援或拯救的人。savior

Terms.Localization: one who rescues or saves

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞拯救，救恩。人经历上帝拯救的方法。salvation

Terms.Localization: the means by which people experience divine salvation

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞拯救的，救恩的，拯救的能力的。关于上帝的拯救。saving

Terms.Localization: pertaining to divine salvation

Localization.Gloss: 所巴特（suǒ bā te），《思》索帕特尔。来自马其顿城庇哩亚的基督徒。Sopater

Terms.Localization: a Christian in Beroea

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞身体。人、动物或植物的身体，无论死的还是活的。body

Terms.Localization: the physical body of persons, animals, or plants, either dead or alive

Localization.Gloss: 救，解救，拯救；医治。从危险中救出并恢复到从前安全和幸福的状态。save; heal

Terms.Localization: to rescue from danger and to restore to a former state of safety and well being

Localization.Gloss: 客栈。供旅客住宿的地方。inn

Terms.Localization: a place for the lodging of travellers

Localization.Gloss: 大比大（da bǐ da），《思》塔彼达。一名约帕女信徒的亚兰音译名字，希腊文译作Δορκάς“多加”。Tabitha

Terms.Localization: the Aramaic name of a Christian woman in Joppa whose name was interpreted as Δορκάς

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞屋子，内室，密室。房屋内部的房间，通常没有向外的窗户。inner room

Terms.Localization: a room in the interior of a house, normally without windows opening to the outside

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞仓库；藏宝室。保管贵重物品的房间。storeroom; treasure room

Terms.Localization: a room for the storage of valuables

Localization.Gloss: 大数人（da shu ren），《思》塔尔索人。大数本地的人，或住在大数的人。Tarsus (person from)

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Tarsus

Localization.Gloss: 大数（da shu），《思》塔尔索。小亚细亚东南部基利家的省会，位于地中海东北方，离地中海岸大约16公里。Tarsus

Terms.Localization: the capital of Cilicia in southeast Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞丢进地狱。被扔进塔尔塔鲁斯（音译），或使留在塔尔塔鲁斯（一个折磨人的地方）。to hold in Tartarus (a place of torture or torment), to cast into hell

Terms.Localization: to cast into or to cause to remain in Tartarus (a place of torture or torment)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞牛，公牛。雄性牛科动物；有角和分蹄的大型反刍动物；用于祭祀，肉可作食物，或作为役畜，用来拉车或拉犁。bull

Terms.Localization: male bovine; large ruminant animal with horns and cloven hoofs; used for sacrifice and for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞邪术。基于迷信而行使的法术。magic; witchcraft

Terms.Localization: the use of magic based on superstition

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞他连得。希腊货币单位（也是重量单位），价值会变动，视乎当时所沿用的货币制度（银的他连得约等于六千得拿利，金的他连得最少是这个价值的三十倍）。talent

Terms.Localization: a Greek monetary unit (also a unit of weight) with a value which fluctuated, depending upon the particular monetary system which prevailed at a particular period of time (a silver talent was worth approximately six thousand denarii with gold talents worth at least thirty times that much)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞坟墓，坟。为埋葬死人而建的墓穴；通常是天然的洞穴，也可能是从基岩开凿而成。grave; tomb

Terms.Localization: a construction for the burial of the dead; often a natural cave or hewn out of bedrock

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞墙，城墙。极其坚固的永久结构，主要指为了保护一座城而围绕该城建造的城墙。city wall

Terms.Localization: a particularly strong permanent wall, primarily the wall built around a city for its protection

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞税棍，收税的人，税吏。为政府收税的人。tax-collector

Terms.Localization: one who collects taxes for the government

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞税务署；税关。向进城卖东西的人收税的地方。tax office

Terms.Localization: a place where taxes or revenue was collected from those entering a town to sell produce

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞税，关税。应当交给政府当局的款项。tax; revenue

Terms.Localization: payments customarily due a governmental authority

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞奇事；兆头，预兆。一个不寻常的迹象，尤指在天上的，用来预示即将发生的事件。portent, wonder

Terms.Localization: an unusual sign, especially one in the heavens, serving to foretell impending events

Localization.Gloss: 德提（de ti），《旧》德丢，《思》特尔爵。保罗的文书，为保罗代笔写罗马书；他在《罗马书》16章向信徒问安。Tertius

Terms.Localization: a person who sends greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 帖土罗（tiē tǔ luo），《思》特尔突罗。他是个善于词令的律师，代犹太人的领袖向腓力斯总督控告保罗造乱生事。Tertullus

Terms.Localization: an attorney who accused Paul before Felix

Localization.Gloss: 提比哩亚（ti bǐ lǐ ya），《思》提庇黎雅。加利利湖西岸的一座城。Tiberias

Terms.Localization: a city on the west shore of the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 提比哩亚（ti bǐ lǐ ya），《思》提庇黎雅。加利利湖的另一个名称。Tiberias

Terms.Localization: the Lake of Tiberias, also known as the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 提庇留（ti bi liu），《思》提庇留。罗马皇帝提庇留·克劳第·凯撒·奥古斯都；新约时代罗马帝国的第二位君王。他继承奥古斯都的王位，在耶稣公开传道的时期统治罗马。Tiberius

Terms.Localization: the Roman emperor Tiberius Claudius Caesar Augustus

Localization.Gloss: 底买（dǐ mǎi），《思》提买。耶稣在耶利哥治好的一个讨饭的瞎子巴底买的父亲。Timaeus

Terms.Localization: the father of Bartimaeus

Localization.Gloss: 提摩太（ti mo tai），《思》弟茂德。保罗的同工。他的母亲是犹太人，父亲是希腊人。Timothy

Terms.Localization: a friend and coworker of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 提门（ti men），《思》提孟。耶路撒冷教会所拣选出来的七个信徒之一，协助分担使徒的工作，赒济穷人。Timon

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 提多（ti duō），《思》弟铎。提多犹士都，哥林多的犹太归信者，他的家靠近会堂，接待保罗居住。Titus

Terms.Localization: a Jewish proselyte in Corinth whose additional name was Justus

Localization.Gloss: 提多（ti duō），《思》弟铎。外邦的基督徒，是保罗的朋友和在以弗所的同工，曾负责革哩底的教会。Titus

Terms.Localization: a friend and companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 荒凉可憎的。污秽圣地、令人憎恶的物件或事件，从而导致圣地被上帝弃绝，以致荒凉。abomination of desolation

Terms.Localization: an object or an event that defiles a holy place and thus causes it to be abandoned and left desolate

Localization.Gloss: 名，名字；人；……的种类，……的类型，属于。一个人的名字或一个物件的名称；引申义：人，可能暗指一个存在的实体，或与名字相关的个人；根据对一类实体的隐含指称而产生的种类或类别。name; person, people; category of, being of the type that...

Terms.Localization: the proper name of a person or object; by extension, a person, possibly implying existence or relevance as individuals; category or kind, based on an implied designation for a class of entities

Localization.Gloss: 弓。用木或其他柔韧材料做成的弧形物件，有一条绳子连着两端，拉扯使之弯曲；用来推动一支箭（射箭）；是战争的武器。bow

Terms.Localization: an arch made of wood or other flexible material and bent by a string attached to its two ends; for propelling an arrow; weapon of war

Localization.Gloss: 特拉可尼（te lā kě ni），《思》特辣曷尼。新约时代犹太王国的一个省份，位于大马士革以南。Trachonitis

Terms.Localization: a district to the south of Damascus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞公山羊。雄性山羊。he-goat

Terms.Localization: male goat

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞孔。小孔（新约只使用这字来指针眼）。hole

Terms.Localization: a small opening (used in the NT only with reference to the so-called "eye" of a needle)

Localization.Gloss: 有刺植物；荆棘；蒺藜。任何在茎部和／或枝条上有尖刺的植物；被视为无用的；象征艰难困苦。thorn plant; thistle; brier

Terms.Localization: any kind of plant with sharp projections on its stem and/or branches; regarded as useless; symbol of hardship

Localization.Gloss: 三楼（美式说法）；二楼（英式说法）。建筑物的第三层楼，即地面层以上的第二层楼。second story (British usage); third story (American usage)

Terms.Localization: the third story of a building, that is, the second story above ground level

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞生活；行为；生活方式。生活方式，重点往往在惯常的行为。way of life

Terms.Localization: manner of living, often with focus upon customary acts

Localization.Gloss: 特罗非摩（te luo fēi mo），《思》特洛斐摩。以弗所的基督徒，保罗的同工。Trophimus

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Ephesus and companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞斑鸠。一种比乌鸫略大、灰蓝色的鸟，胸部呈粉色；属候鸟，每年四月来到以色列；主要吃种子；象征和平和温柔；洁净；用作祭品。turtle dove

Terms.Localization: bird slightly larger than blackbird; blue-gray with a pinkish chest; migratory, arrives in Israel in April; eats seeds; Streptopelia turtur; symbol of peace and gentleness; clean, may be eaten; used for sacrifices

Localization.Gloss: 孔。小孔（在《新约》中只用来指针眼）。hole

Terms.Localization: a small opening (used in the NT only with reference to the so-called "eye" of a needle)

Localization.Gloss: 土富撒；《思》特黎佛撒。在《罗马书》的问安名单中出现的两个为主劳苦的妇女之一。Tryphosa

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞碟子，碗。较深的盘子，用于盛食物和各种液体，也用于烹煮；通常用陶土制成，但也有金属制的。bowl; dish

Terms.Localization: a relatively deep concave dish used for holding or cooking food or liquids; usually made of clay, but also metals

Localization.Gloss: 孔。小孔（在《新约》中只用来指针眼）。hole

Terms.Localization: a small opening (used in the NT only with reference to the so-called "eye" of a needle)

Localization.Gloss: 土非拿；《思》特黎费纳。在《罗马书》的问安名单中出现的两个为主劳苦的妇女之一。Tryphena

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 特罗亚（te luo ya），《思》特洛阿。小亚细亚西北角一个城市和地区。Troas

Terms.Localization: a city and region in the northwest corner of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 像；形像。造成人、神明、动物等形象的物件（不一定是立体的）。likeness; image

Terms.Localization: an object (not necessarily three-dimensional) which has been formed to resemble a person, god, animal, etc.

Localization.Gloss: 推喇奴；《思》提郎诺。以弗所人，保罗曾在以其命名的学房（推喇奴学房）天天与人辩论。Tyrannus

Terms.Localization: an Ephesian in whose hall Paul lectured

Localization.Gloss: 《现》泰尔的人民（tai ěr de ren min），《和》泰尔的人，《旧》推罗的人，《思》提洛的人。泰尔的本地人或住在泰尔的人。Tyrian; person from Tyre

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Tyre

Localization.Gloss: 泰尔（tai ěr），《旧》推罗，《思》提洛。腓尼基海岸的一个城，拥有久远的历史，在西顿以南，是亚设支派地业的境界。Tyre

Terms.Localization: city on the Phoenician coast

Localization.Gloss: 推基古（tuī jī gǔ），《思》提希苛。亚细亚省的一个基督徒，是保罗的同工。Tychicus

Terms.Localization: a leader from the province of Asia who was associated with Paul

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞玻璃的，透明的。ὕαλος“玻璃”的衍生词，指包含玻璃或与玻璃有关的。of glass; glassy

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ὕαλος glass) consisting of or pertaining to glass

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞大水罐，水缸。用于储存和运送水或其他液体的容器；用石头或陶土制成。pitcher; water jar

Terms.Localization: a container for storing or carrying water or other liquids; made of stone or clay

Localization.Gloss: 人子。耶稣对自己的称谓，有以弥赛亚自居的含义。Son of Man

Terms.Localization: a title with Messianic implications used by Jesus concerning himself ‎

Localization.Gloss: 《和2010》《和》许米乃；《现》舒米乃；《思》依默纳约。初期教会一个异端分子。Hymenaeus

Terms.Localization: a person who defected from true faith

Localization.Gloss: 楼上的房间。在首层以上的房间（美式用法称为二楼，在许多其他语言中称为一楼）。upstairs room

Terms.Localization: a room on the level above the ground floor (second story in American usage and first story in most other languages)

Localization.Gloss: 服侍；服务。藉着履行某些职责来提供帮助，通常是一些卑微或低贱的工作。serve

Terms.Localization: to render assistance or help by performing certain duties, often of a humble or menial nature

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞法官，警卫，助理，帮手，仆人。提供服务的人。official; servant; attendant

Terms.Localization: a person who renders service

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞驴子。载重的动物；役畜；骑乘动物。可以运载重物或可以乘骑的动物。pack animal; beast of burden; riding animal

Terms.Localization: an animal which can be used to carry a burden or can be ridden

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞伪善者，虚伪的人，假冒为善的人。假装是另外一个人，与真实的自己不同。hypocrite

Terms.Localization: one who pretends to be other than he really is

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞假装；装作。让别人以为有特定的目的或动机，而实际上却有着完全不同的目的或动机。pretend

Terms.Localization: to give an impression of having certain purposes or motivations, while in reality having quite different ones

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞压酒池或槽。放在葡萄酒压榨机下面的槽，用来接住压榨出来的葡萄汁。wine trough

Terms.Localization: a trough placed beneath the wine press to receive the grape juice pressed out

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞脚凳。用来搁脚的家具。footstool

Terms.Localization: a small piece of furniture on which one may rest one's feet

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞信任；确实的信心；保证。信任或信靠之事的基础。confidence, assurance, trust

Terms.Localization: that which provides the basis for trust and reliance

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞凉鞋，拖鞋，鞋子。任何鞋类（但通常指凉鞋而不是鞋子）。sandal; shoe

Terms.Localization: any type of footwear (though ordinarily the reference would be to a sandal rather than to a shoe)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞伪善，不诚实，假装。一种行为或态度，让别人以为有特定的目的或动机，而实际上却有着完全不同的目的或动机。hypocrisy

Terms.Localization: the act or attitude of giving an impression of having certain purposes or motivations, while in reality having quite different ones

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞高。形容“高的”。high, tall

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being high

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞玻璃，水晶。玻璃（也可能是水晶，文本的重点是玻璃的透明度）。glass, crystal

Terms.Localization: glass (or possibly, crystal--the emphasis in the texts is on the transparency of glass)

Localization.Gloss: 树林；木头；一堆木头。覆盖较大地区的茂密树林；或树木或灌木的木质部分。forest; wood; pile of wood

Terms.Localization: a dense growth of trees covering a relatively large area, or: the woody part of trees or bushes

Localization.Gloss: 牛膝草。细小的芳香灌木，无主干，许多分枝从底部长出，茎直而硬，有毛绒，高 50-80 厘米；犹太人在洁净的礼仪中常用作泼洒的工具。hyssop

Terms.Localization: small aromatic bush with a shrub-like base and stems which are stiff, many-branched, hairy, and strong, 50-80 cm tall; Origanum syriacum or Majorana syriaca; used by the Jews in the ritual purification process as a sprinkling brush

Localization.Gloss: 至高。在高度的度量方面是最高的。highest

Terms.Localization: the superlative in the measurement of height

Localization.Gloss: 至高者。上帝的头衔，字面意思：最高的：至高无上的那一位，主要指地位。Most High

Terms.Localization: a title for God, literally highest: one who is supreme, primarily a reference to status

Localization.Gloss: 高度。高度的测量。height

Terms.Localization: the measurement of height

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞母猪。猪的雌性。sow

Terms.Localization: a female pig

Localization.Gloss: 斗篷，外套，长袍。任何样式的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: 法内力；《思》法奴耳。女先知亚拿的父亲，是亚设支族的人。Phanuel

Terms.Localization: the father of Anna the prophetess

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞灯笼，提灯。户外使用便于携带的照明工具，有透明物料保护，可以遮挡风雨。lantern

Terms.Localization: a small fire which was carried about for the sake of its light and which had some type of protection from wind and weather

Localization.Gloss: 法老（fǎ lǎo），《思》法郎。古埃及统治者的头衔，意思是“伟大的家族”，被用作埃及国王的专有名称。Pharaoh

Terms.Localization: a title used as a proper name of the Egyptian king

Localization.Gloss: 法利赛人（fǎ li sai ren），《思》法利塞人。耶稣和使徒时代一个重要的犹太宗教和政治党派。法利赛人的群体比撒都该人大很多，而且在某些教义和行为模式上与他们很不相同。法利赛人严格遵守和守护旧约的律法以及无数附加的传统规条。Pharisee

Terms.Localization: a member of an important religious and political Jewish party at the time of Jesus and the apostles. The Pharisees constituted a significantly larger group than the Sadducees and differed with them on certain doctrines and patterns of behavior. The Pharisees were strict and jealous adherents to the laws of the OT and to numerous additional traditions

Localization.Gloss: 法勒（fǎ le），《思》培肋格。耶稣家谱中的一员。Peleg

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鬼怪，幽灵。一个人或物的超自然外表。apparition, ghost

Terms.Localization: a supernatual appearance of a person or thing

Localization.Gloss: 法勒斯（fǎ le sī ），《思》培勒兹。耶稣家谱中的一员。Perez

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞饲料箱；马槽；饲料槽。喂饲牲畜用的料箱或食槽（甚至可能是露天的喂饲地场）。feed box; manger; crib

Terms.Localization: a box or crib where animals feed (or possibly even an open feeding place under the sky)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞马槽；马厩。喂饲牲口的畜栏。stall

Terms.Localization: a stall where animals are fed

Localization.Gloss: 腓力斯（fei li sī），《思》斐理斯。公元52至60年间的罗马行政官，统治巴勒斯坦南部的犹大地区。Felix

Terms.Localization: a procurator of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: 非斯都（fēi sī dū），《思》斐斯托。公元59年接替腓力斯就任犹太地区的总督。Festus

Terms.Localization: Porcius Festus, the successor to Felix as procurator of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞碗。宽口的浅碗，通常用来烹饪或盛载各种液体。bowl

Terms.Localization: a broad, shallow bowl, normally used for cooking or for serving liquids

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞（基督徒之间的）兄弟爱，手足之爱。基督徒之间的手足之爱。love for one's fellow believer; affection for a fellow believer

Terms.Localization: affection for one's fellow believer in Christ

Localization.Gloss: 非拉铁非（fēi lā tiě fēi），《思》非拉德非雅。位于小亚细亚中西部的城市，当地教会是启示录作者致函的小亚细亚七个教会之一。Philadelphia

Terms.Localization: a city in the west central part of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞亲切，友善；对人类的爱。普遍意义上对人的爱。kindness; love towards humankind

Terms.Localization: affection for people in general ‎

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞爱钱，贪财。贪爱钱财的状态.love of money

Terms.Localization: the state of loving money or wealth

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞好善的，喜爱良善的。喜爱美好事物的.liking what is good, loving what is good

Terms.Localization: pertaining to liking or loving what is good

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞爱弟兄的人；相爱如弟兄；亲爱如手足。对主内信徒的爱。one who loves fellow believers; loving one another as brothers

Terms.Localization: pertaining to love or affection for fellow believers

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞爱钱的，贪财的。指对财富或金钱的热爱。loving wealth; lover of money

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the love of wealth or money

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞爱，爱惜；爱好，喜欢。基于关系而对某人或某事产生爱或感情。love; be fond of

Terms.Localization: to have love or affection for someone or something based on association

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞爱享乐的；贪求快乐的。指喜欢快乐和享受。。loving pleasure; lover of pleasure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being fond of pleasure and enjoyment ‎

Localization.Gloss: 腓利门（fei li men），《思》费肋孟。保罗的朋友，藉保罗的传道而归信主，可能是歌罗西教会的会友，也是奴隶阿尼西谋的主人。Philemon

Terms.Localization: a convert and friend of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 腓立比人（fei li bǐ ren），《思》斐理伯人。腓立比本地的，或居住在腓立比的人。Philippian

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Philippi

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞友谊；爱，喜爱。基于关系而对某人或某事产生爱或感情的行为或态度。friendship; affection

Terms.Localization: the act or attitude of having love or affection for someone or something based on association

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞诚意地，亲切地。形容对某人存着友好的关怀和良善。hospitably

Terms.Localization: pertaining to friendly concern and kindness toward someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞爱上帝的，爱神的。爱上帝的。loving God; lover of God

Terms.Localization: pertaining to love for God

Localization.Gloss: 非罗罗古（fēi luo luo gǔ），《思》非罗罗哥。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒。Philologus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞非常亲爱；非常亲密；相亲相爱。对有密切关系之人的爱，尤其是直系亲属或团体成员。loving dearly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to love or affection for those closely related to one, particularly members of one's immediate family or in-group

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞爱丈夫的。指对丈夫有感情。having love for one's husband

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having affection for a husband

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞自私的，只顾自己的。只顾自己的、以自我为中心的爱。selfish love, self-centered love

Terms.Localization: pertaining to self-centered love or concern for one's own self

Localization.Gloss: 腓理徒（fei lǐ tu），《思》非肋托。初期教会的假教师。Philetus

Terms.Localization: a false teacher in the church

Localization.Gloss: 腓立比（fei li bǐ），《思》斐理伯。马其顿东北部的一座城。Philippi

Terms.Localization: a city in Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 腓力（fei li），《思》斐理伯。耶稣的十二门徒之一，伯赛大人，曾引领拿但业见耶稣。Philip

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 腓力（fei li），《思》斐理伯。大希律的一个儿子，安提帕王的兄弟。Philip

Terms.Localization: a son of Herod the Great and brother of Herod Antipas

Localization.Gloss: 腓力（fei li），《思》斐理伯。耶路撒冷教会选出来的七个执事之一。Philip

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞朋友。与之交往的男性，对他有感情或个人的尊重。friend

Terms.Localization: male person with whom one associates and for whom there is affection or personal regard

Localization.Gloss: 弗勒干（fu le gān），《思》弗肋贡。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一个基督徒。Phlegon

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 可怕的；吓人的。引起恐惧的事物或人。fearful; terrifying

Terms.Localization: pertaining to something or someone who causes fear

Localization.Gloss: 恐惧；惧怕；害怕。处于恐惧的状态中。fear; be afraid

Terms.Localization: to be in a state of fearing (in a negative sense)

Localization.Gloss: 崇敬；敬畏；敬拜。对神明有深深的敬畏和尊崇，有敬畏接近惧怕的含意。fear; worship; reverence (God)

Terms.Localization: to have profound reverence and respect for deity, with the implication of awe bordering on fear

Localization.Gloss: 惧怕；极其崇敬；极其尊敬。对某人非常敬畏或尊敬，达到惧怕的程度。respect (among people)

Terms.Localization: to have such awe or respect for a person as to involve a measure of fear

Localization.Gloss: 腓尼基（fei ni jī），《思》腓尼基。巴勒斯坦西部和北部的沿海地区，靠近地中海，泰尔和西顿都在其境内。Phoenicia

Terms.Localization: an area along the seacoast to the west and north of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: 《现》菲比（fēi bǐ），《和》非比，《思》福依贝。在《罗马书》16章的问安名单中出现的一位坚革哩教会的女执事。Phoebe

Terms.Localization: a deaconess of the church commended in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 菲尼基（fēi ni jī），《旧》非尼基，《思》腓尼斯。克里特岛（革哩底）南岸的一个港口。Phoenix

Terms.Localization: a seaport on the south coast of Crete

Localization.Gloss: 棕树，棕榈树。棕榈科植物的开花品种；高度可达 10-20 米；有大型叶子丛生在顶部；人们为其味甜和可食用的果子而加以培植，果子大小有如人的拇指；象征优雅和风度；棕树枝象征和平和胜利。palm tree

Terms.Localization: flowering plant species in the palm family Arecaceae; grows to 10-20 m tall; cluster of large leaves at top; Phoenix dactylifera; cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb; symbol of elegance and grace; palm branch is symbol of peace and also victory

Localization.Gloss: 福徒拿都（fu tu na dū），《思》福突纳托。保罗在《哥林多前书》中提到的信徒。Fortunatus

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Corinth

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞可怕的景象或事物。引起恐惧的物件、事件或状况。dreadful event or sight

Terms.Localization: an object, event, or condition which causes fear

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞恐惧，恐怖，畏惧。极度悲痛忧伤的状态，因强烈关注即将来到的痛苦、危险、邪恶等引起的，也可能因错误地以为上述情况会发生而引起的。fear; terror

Terms.Localization: a state of severe distress, aroused by intense concern for impending pain, danger, evil, etc., or possibly by the illusion of such circumstances

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞崇敬；恭敬；敬畏；畏惧。对神明的深深尊敬和敬畏。fear; reverence (for God)

Terms.Localization: profound respect and awe for deity

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞尊重，尊敬。尊敬他人。respect

Terms.Localization: respect for another person

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞赋税，贡赋。某国人民向另一国缴纳的款项，表示他们臣服和依赖该国。tribute tax

Terms.Localization: a payment made by the people of one nation to another, with the implication that this is a symbol of submission and dependence

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鞭子。用一条皮带或多条皮带做成的皮鞭，末端或会附加一些重物；用来赶牲畜前行，或用作人的刑具。whip

Terms.Localization: an instrument consisting of either a single or multiple strips of leather with or without weighted tips on the ends; used to strike animals to make them move (faster), or as punishment on humans

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞栅栏，墙，篱笆。为了围蔽一个开阔的区域而搭建的结构。fence; wall

Terms.Localization: a structure for enclosing an open area

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞思想，想念。使用自己深思熟虑的能力，重点在于潜在的性情或态度think

Terms.Localization: to employ one's faculty for thoughtful planning, with emphasis upon the underlying disposition or attitude

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞思想，意思；深思熟虑。深思熟虑的心理能力，往往暗示明智和有远见。mind; thoughtful planning

Terms.Localization: the psychological faculty of thoughtful planning, often with the implication of being wise and provident

Localization.Gloss: 弗吕家（fu lǚ jiā），《思》夫黎基雅。小亚细亚中部的地区，在现今的土耳其境内。Phrygia

Terms.Localization: a district in central Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞枯木，干柴，木柴。树木或灌木的干树枝，被折断或砍成适当的长度，用作木柴。dry wood; firewood; sticks

Terms.Localization: dry branches of trees or shrubs broken or cut into suitable lengths for use as firewood

Localization.Gloss: 监牢；监狱。拘留关押的地方。jail; prison

Terms.Localization: place of detention

Localization.Gloss: 岗哨；哨所；警卫岗位。守卫站岗的地方或哨所。guard post; guard station

Terms.Localization: a place or post for guarding

Localization.Gloss: 更次；夜晚的四分之一。夜晚被划分为四个时间段之一（在这段时间内，一些被指派的人会担任守望工作）。watch; a fourth of the night

Terms.Localization: one of four periods of time into which the night was divided (during which time certain assigned persons would be on the lookout)

Localization.Gloss: 巢穴；住处。野兽和邪灵居住的地方。haunt; lair; dwelling place

Terms.Localization: a place for wild animals and evil spirits to dwell

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞经匣；经文袋。装着旧约经句的小皮匣或经文袋，犹太人会佩戴在手臂或前额上，尤其祷告的时。phylactery

Terms.Localization: a small leather case containing OT scripture verses and worn on the arm and forehead by Jews, especially when praying

Localization.Gloss: 提防；监视，把守，看守；看管。对可能发生的事件有所防备。to guard against; to keep under watch; to watch over

Terms.Localization: to be on one’s guard against some eventuality

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞支族；部落。民族中的一个分支，他们彼此在血缘上比与整个民族的关系更密切。tribe

Terms.Localization: a subgroup of a nation which is regarded as being more closely related biologically than the entire nation

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞植物。任何种类的植物，无论是乔木、灌木，还是草本植物。plant

Terms.Localization: any kind of plant, whether tree, bush, or herb

Localization.Gloss: 腓吉路（fei ji lu），《思》非革罗。亚西亚地区的基督徒，他和黑摩其尼一同离弃保罗。Phygelus

Terms.Localization: a Christian in Asia who with Hermogenes turned his back on Paul

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞叶子。附在植物茎上的扁平结构；通常为绿色、叶片状；主要功能是进行光合作用，为植物提供养分。leaf

Terms.Localization: a flattened structure attached to the stem of a plant; usually green and bladelike; its main function is photosynthesis, to provide the plant with food

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒底人（jiā le dǐ ren），《思》加色丁人。迦勒底的本地人。Chaldean

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Chaldea

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞嚼环；缰绳；马勒。用来控制马匹行动的装置，包括一个嚼环和一条缰绳；嚼环是放在马嘴里的金属短棒，缰绳是绳子或皮带，会连着嚼环然后套在马的头上。bit; bridle

Terms.Localization: items used to control the actions of a horse, consisting of a bit (a short metal bar placed in the mouth of a horse) and bridle (ropes or leather straps attached to the bit and fitted over the horse's head)

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞（铜）器，碗。用红铜、黄铜，或青铜制成的器皿或物件。bronze vessel

Terms.Localization: a container or object made of copper, brass, or bronze

Localization.Gloss: 迦南人（jiā nan ren）或地的；《思》客纳罕人或地的。指与迦南相关的。Canaanite

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 迦南（jiā nan），《思》客纳罕。旧约所用的地名，东西界于地中海和约旦河之间，南北界于埃及和亚兰之间。这地又称为“巴勒斯坦”，包括今日的以色列、黎巴嫩，和一部份的约旦王国。Canaan

Terms.Localization: the land west of the Jordan

Localization.Gloss: 喜乐；高兴；极大的快乐。喜乐、高兴的状态。joy; gladness; great happiness

Terms.Localization: a state of joy and gladness

Localization.Gloss: 喜乐的缘由；高兴的理由；快乐的原因。喜乐、高兴的缘由。cause of joy; reason for gladness

Terms.Localization: that which is the cause of joy or gladness

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞向……显出仁慈；怜悯。对某人表示仁慈，暗示对人表示的人是和蔼善良的。show kindness towards

Terms.Localization: to show kindness to someone, with the implication of graciousness on the part of the one showing such kindness

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞领，给，赐；慷慨，恩待，赦免，宽恕；交付或释放（犯人）；取消债务；归回。仁慈慷慨地赐予；原谅，基于对某人的宽厚仁慈。grant; forgive; hand over; give freely; be restored

Terms.Localization: to give or grant graciously and generously; to forgive, on the basis of one's gracious attitude toward an individual

Localization.Gloss: 哈兰（hā lan），《思》哈兰。地名。位于美索不达米亚北方约60公里的城，公元前2000年是宗教和政治的中心，专拜月神“欣”。Haran

Terms.Localization: a city in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 像；形像。造成人、神明、动物等形象的物件（不一定是立体的）。likeness; image

Terms.Localization: an object (not necessarily three-dimensional) which has been formed to resemble a person, god, animal, etc.

Localization.Gloss: 栅栏；防御工事。用柱子或木桩建成的防护物，用于加强防御。palisade; barricade

Terms.Localization: a fence of poles or stakes used to fortify entrenchments

Localization.Gloss: 仁慈，恩典，怜悯；仁慈的。对某人表示仁慈。favor, grace, kindness; gracious

Terms.Localization: the act of showing kindness to someone

Localization.Gloss: 礼物；恩赐；捐款；捐资。无条件地慷慨给予的东西。gift

Terms.Localization: that which is given freely and generously

Localization.Gloss: 多谢，道谢，感谢，祝谢。表达谢意。thanks, thanksgiving, gratitude, credit

Terms.Localization: an expression of thankfulness

Localization.Gloss: 礼物；恩赐，恩惠，恩典。无条件地慷慨给予的东西。gift; free gift

Terms.Localization: that which is given freely and generously

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞纸。书写用的蒲草纸。sheet of paper

Terms.Localization: a sheet of papyrus used for writing

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞按立，选择，选派。挑选或拣选，可能由一群人并通过举手来决定。elect

Terms.Localization: to choose or select, presumably by a group and possibly by the actual raising of the hand

Localization.Gloss: 基路伯（jī lu bo），《思》革鲁宾。在《新约》中，那是站在约柜上的有翅膀活物的像（但在某些旧约背景中，那是超自然的有翅膀的活物）。cherubim, winged creatures

Terms.Localization: image of a winged creature that stood over the covenant box

Localization.Gloss: 短袍；衬衫；内衣。里面的基础短服。tunic; shirt

Terms.Localization: a basic inner garment worn under the ἱμάτιον cloak

Localization.Gloss: （祭司的）衣服；服装。祭司穿的一种内衣，长袖、下摆长及脚踝，由细麻布织成。(priestly) garment, clothes

Terms.Localization: undergarment worn by priests, a kind of ankle-length shirt with long sleeves, woven of linen

Localization.Gloss: 基阿；《思》希约。爱琴海的一个岛屿；岛上有一个同名的城市。Chios

Terms.Localization: an island, with a city of the same name, in the Aegean Sea

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞袍子，外袍。罗马士兵和旅行者穿着的宽松外衣。cloak

Terms.Localization: a loose outer garment worn by Roman soldiers and travellers

Localization.Gloss: 革来（ge lai），《思》黑罗厄。哥林多教会一个女信徒，她的家人把有关教会纷争的事告诉保罗。Chloe

Terms.Localization: a person whose family members reported to Paul about divisions in the church in Corinth

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞植物，青物。绿色的植物。plant

Terms.Localization: green growth of a plant

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞猪。有蹄的四足多毛哺乳动物，棕色或灰色；非反刍动物和杂食动物；驯养的陆生动物；不洁，不能食用；被视为丑陋、肮脏和破坏性的动物，往往使人联想到异教的仪式。pig

Terms.Localization: hairy four-legged mammal with hoofs, brown or gray in color; non-ruminant and omnivorous; Sus scrofa; domesticated land animal; unclean, not to be eaten; regarded as an ugly, filthy, and destructive animal and often associated with pagan rituals

Localization.Gloss: 哥拉汛（gē lā xun），《思》苛辣匝因。新约时代加利利地区的一座城，位于迦百农以北3公里的地方。Chorazin

Terms.Localization: a city in Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 苦撒（kǔ sā），《思》雇撒。希律安提帕的家宰，他的妻子约亚拿和其他妇女用自己的财物供给耶稣和耶稣的门徒。Chuza

Terms.Localization: manager of Herod's household

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞植物；草。细小的绿色植物，在新约里主要指田野或草场上的青草。small plants; grass

Terms.Localization: small green plants (and in NT contexts referring primarily to green grass in a field or meadow)

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞苗，芽。从一粒发芽的种子长出来的幼苗。sprout; blade

Terms.Localization: the young growth of a plant arising from a germinating seed

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞神谕，上帝的回答。神圣启示或说话的内容。divine answer

Terms.Localization: the content of a divine revelation or utterance

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞仁慈；仁慈地行事。提供对某人有好处的东西，以显示出恩慈。be kind; act kindly

Terms.Localization: to provide something beneficial for someone as an act of kindness ‎

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞好的；仁慈的；容易的。指有用的和仁慈的；仁慈的；舒适的或轻松的。good; kind; easy

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being useful and benevolent; pertaining to being kind; pertaining to that which is pleasant or easy

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞仁慈。有用或有益的事件或行动。kindness

Terms.Localization: an event or activity which is useful or benevolent

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞钱（通常指硬币）。货币的统称，一般以复数形式出现。money (normally a reference to actual coins)

Terms.Localization: a generic term for currency, occurring mostly in the plural

Localization.Gloss: 基督徒（jī dū tu），《思》基督徒。被认为是基督的信徒和跟随者的人。Christian

Terms.Localization: one who is identified as a believer in and follower of Christ

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞受膏者。被膏的那一位。anointed one

Terms.Localization: one who has been anointed

Localization.Gloss: 基督；弥赛亚。（直译：受膏者；等同于希伯来语的弥赛亚）在《新约》中，这是耶稣作为弥赛亚的头衔，但在许多经文中，尤其是不带定冠词的时候，Χριστός“基督”成为了耶稣名字的一部分。Christ

Terms.Localization: (literally one who has been anointed) in the NT, title for Jesus as the Messiah, but in many contexts, and especially without an article, this word becomes a part of the name of Jesus)

Localization.Gloss: ＜动＞膏（油），抹（油）。指派某人一项任务，暗示有属灵的认可、赐福和恩赐。anoint, assign, appoint

Terms.Localization: to assign a person to a task, with the implication of supernatural sanction, blessing, and endowment

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞膏抹，受恩膏；委任，任命。指派某人一项任务，暗示有属灵的认可、赐福和恩赐。anointing, appointment

Terms.Localization: the act of assigning a person to a task, with the implication of supernatural sanction, blessing, and endowment

Localization.Gloss: 金。贵金属，古代世界最贵重的金属。gold

Terms.Localization: precious metal, most highly valued metal in the ancient world

Localization.Gloss: 金饰；黄金饰品。黄金制品。gold jewelry; gold ornaments

Terms.Localization: object or objects made of gold

Localization.Gloss: 戴着金戒指。指佩戴金戒指。wearing a gold ring

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the wearing of a gold ring

Localization.Gloss: 金货币；金币。金货币，金币。gold money; gold coin

Terms.Localization: gold money, gold coin

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞假使徒，谎称使徒的人。false apostle

Terms.Localization: one who claims to be an apostle but is not

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞假先知。谎称自己是先知并传播虚假信息的人。false prophet

Terms.Localization: one who claims to be a prophet and is not and thus proclaims what is false

Localization.Gloss: ＜阳＞假基督。谎称自己是基督或弥赛亚的人。false christ

Terms.Localization: one who claims to be the Christ or the Messiah but is not

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞生命；生物。生物存活的时期；活着的状态。life

Terms.Localization: the period of time when a creature is alive; state of being alive

Localization.Gloss: ＜阴＞自我，内心，心志，思想，感情，心，存在，灵魂。生命的本质，就思想、意志和感情方面而言。inner self, mind, thoughts, feelings, heart, being, soul

Terms.Localization: the essence of life in terms of thinking, willing, and feeling

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞属肉体的，属世的，属血气的，血肉的。形容是属物质的或是属肉体的，特别与生命的过程有关。natural, physical

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being material or physical, especially in relation to life processes

Localization.Gloss: 和散那。（亚兰语，字面意义是“求你帮助我”，“求你拯救我”，但已完全成为一种称颂赞美的礼拜用语）赞美或崇拜的欢呼。Hosanna

Terms.Localization: (an Aramaic expression meaning help, I pray or save, I pray, but which had become a strictly liturgical formula of praise) a shout of praise or adoration

Localization.Gloss: 何西阿（he xī ā），《思》欧瑟亚。北国以色列的先知。Hosea

Terms.Localization: a prophet of Israel
